title: We live and learn
synopsis: Chise and Selkie climb aboard a dragon's back to meet Lindel, to have her own mage's staff made. Frustrated by Chise's acceptance of her being kept as a pet by Elias, he describes the time he found Elias in the darkness. Meanwhile, Elias, who had stayed at home by himself, receives a letter from a sorcerer's college.

title: None so deaf as those who will not hear
synopsis: With the church's requests fulfilled, things were supposed to go back to normal. But Elias has been acting strange since the last request: he'd vanished on the first morning after Chise had spent a night in his room. Neither Angelica's kind words nor Ruth's pure words are enough to put Chise's mind to rest.

title: Let sleeping dogs lie.
synopsis: Alice sees Elias' changes and decides immediately that he could never be human. Sorcerer Cartaphilius, who is attempting to capture the black dog by manipulating Renfred and Alice, causes Elias to show a completely different side of himself when his "work" hurts Chise. Those who know Elias call him the Pilum Murialis.

title: Talk of the devil, and he is sure to appear.
synopsis: The dog, with its flowing, black hair and burning red eyes, called Chise by the name "Isabelle." The Church's final request is to investigate a black dog that emerged in a cemetetry, but the black dog ends up saving Chise from danger. Meanwhile, Renfred's apprentice, Alice, is also on the move, looking for the black dog.

title: The Faerie Queene
synopsis: Chise is deep in thought as she watches the souls return to where they'd belonged all along. More than ten days have passed since the incident at Ulthar, but she is still in a deep sleep. Elias and Simon stand worriedly by her side, when they are met by two unexpected guests: Titania, Queen of Fairies, Lord of Tír na nÓg.

title: Love conquers all
synopsis: To sorcerer Refnred's eyes, Chise is a sad girl, being duped by a mage. But no matter what Elias' true motives are, Chise has no intention of leaving him. Elias was the first person to value her, after all. As she walks towards the epicenter, she learns of the truth behind it. The sight of a boy appears behind the tragedy.

title: Everything must have a beginning
synopsis: Long ago, the humans and cats of Ulthar, city of cats, were struck by a great tragedy. For generations, the souls of those who were at the center of this tragedy have been sealed away by the king of cats. Chise and Elias travel to Ulthar in order to complete Simon's second task: to purify the spirits that remain.

title: The balance distinguishes not between gold and lead
synopsis: Simon, who is assigned by the Church to keep an eye on Elias, visits with some business. One of his requests brings Chise and Elias to the ends of the earth, where they meet Elias' mentor, Lindel, along with an old race on the verge of extinction. An old one, about to return to the earth, spends his last moments sharing a dream with Chise.

title: One today is worth two tomorrows
synopsis: Few people know the truth about the bookstore on the outskirts of London that Elias frequents. He takes Chise there, where they meet Angelica, who teaches Chise a little bit of magic, but... The true power of the Sleigh Beggy materializes a fragment of Chise's memories.

title: April showers bring May flowers
synopsis: Having given up on life, 15-year-old Hatori Chise sells herself at an underground auction, where she is bought by Elias Ainsworth, a not-quite-human mage, for 5 million pounds. She learns that he intends for her to be his future bride, and her world begins to change.

title: Part 3
synopsis: The magician of the forest invites Chise into his library. Chise is reluctant at first, but they develop a strong friendship that would have a lasting influence on her.

title: Part 2
synopsis: The magician of the forest invites Chise into his library. Chise is reluctant at first, but they develop a strong friendship that would have a lasting influence on her.

title: Part 1
synopsis: Chise is the student and future bride of the Thorn Sorcerer, Elias. They receive a package from Angelica in London: mostly textbooks, save for one special book.

title: Magical Girl - Stalking
synopsis: Saki and Sakuyo finally realize that Hyoe is the common figure involved in all the demon incidents! In order to track his activities, they opt to disguise themselves and follow him and Mohiro around town.

title: Magical Girl - Another and Another
synopsis: While Saki and Sakuyo are on the rise, the idol unit PRISMA is suffering from a shrinking fanbase. Then one day, a man calling himself a magical girl scout comes and makes them an offer they can't refuse!

title: Meet-and-Greet
synopsis: Saki and Sakuyo are making waves as idols with their first hit CD. At a joint meet-and-greet with Star Prince and PRISMA, they interact with waves of fans. But one unwelcome visitor has infiltrated their ranks...

title: Magical Girl - Lesson
synopsis: At last, the magical girls are getting the major CD debut they've been dreaming of! But their manager Konami insists they go to karaoke for training...

title: Magical Girl - Hot Springs Business
synopsis: Saki and Sakuyo visit a hot springs town for their first performance in a while as Magical Twins. But as it happens, Mohiro and Hyoe are also there shooting a PV...

title: Magical Girl - On Vacation
synopsis: Exhausted by their lives as magical girl idols, Saki and Sakuyo take a well-deserved vacation in Okinawa. Could this be the long-awaited swimsuit episode?!

title: Magical Girl - Versus Cyborg
synopsis: Saki and Sakuya are getting their first TV booking as Magical Girl idols! But when a nervous Saki runs into Mohiro at the studio, she notices a strange man clinging to him...

title: Magical Girl - Another
synopsis: Sakuyo has transformed using love power to save Saki from a scary situation. As Saki struggles with how to react, Sakuyo tells a tale of their youth, and reveals to her friend her true feelings!

title: Magical Girl - Ore
synopsis: Saki has become a magical girl to save her beloved Mohiro! Fortunately, Mohiro doesn't recognize her behind her disguise. Unfortunately, he's not the only one who was watching her fight...

title: Magical Girl - Transform
synopsis: Uno Saki is a 15 year old girl trying to make it (unsuccessfully) as an idol singer. One day, on her way home from a concert, she notices a violent-looking man trying to break into her home...

title: To the Future
synopsis: Jo Shou’s father is killed, and his mother begs Houhou to take revenge. Houhou kills the bandits without emotion. It is a terrifying sight. She saved the village, but the villagers treat her like monsters and drive her away. She separates from Jo Shou and is left alone deep within the mountains. Several years later she lives a lonely life, and decides to go find her family. Jo Shou finds a picture of Houhou. It’s been decades since he last saw her, but she hasn’t changed at all. What happens to her when she arrives in town? What does Jo Shou do? What will Soran do now that he is a part of the outsider world, and knows the truth? His destiny continues from the past. But what will his future be?

Jo San and Jo Yon’s father, Jo Shou, tells them about Houhou’s past. When Jo Shou was a child, his father and mother saved Houhou when she was being attacked by men in the mountains of the Chinese countryside. At the time she was very quiet, had no memories, and only remembered her name. Jo Shou started to live with her. Houhou trained very hard to control her ki, and Jo Shou would spend time training with her and farming with her. One day, the village was attacked by bandits. The bandits set their eyes on Houhou. Jo Shou’s father begged them to let her go, but they attacked with their sharp blade. What happened to his father? What happened to Houhou?

title: Houhou
synopsis: Houhou defeats Ja Jongu, and Soran defeats Fuu Saen, but a sneak attack from Jongu pierces Houhou’s heart and she collapses. Angry at his dirty trick, The president of the Tengekai defeats Ja Jongu, and the outsiders of the Tengekai try to treat her wounds. Jo San and Jo Yon arrive and tell the Tengekai that they will treat her instead. Do the two of them know a way to save her before Ro Ryou makes contact with Soran, saying he’s come to show him how his grandfather, Shakurin, died. What does he show Soran? Then, Jo San and Jo Yon's father comes out of his coma and says he’s going to tell them about the past. What does he tell them about Houhou’s past? What about his relationship with Shakurin? The mysteries of the past are revealed.

title: Secret Arts
synopsis: Houhou has no way to stop Ja Jongu’s attacks, and decides that she can’t win the way she’s fighting. She takes off her heels and uses her full power. Meanwhile, Soran negotiates with Saen so that if he can defeat her teleportation attacks she’ll let him go. She agrees, and launches her next attack. But her fist is stopped! What new power has Soran come up with?

title: Infiltration
synopsis: Houhou goes to the Tengekai to take back Soran. She defeats one outsider after another, but then she is stopped by Ja Jongu. He is on a different level than the other foes, and she can’t even touch him. Meanwhile, Soran is with Saen, who has been told by her father to date him. The seal doesn’t respond to Saen! Saen is serious about dating him so Soran runs away. Saen says if he’s serious about running, she’ll stop him with everything she has. She uses her teleportation powers to attack him and he has no way to fight back. Both he and Houhou are losing the fight. Two battle take place inside the Tengekai Building. What will happen to Soran and Houhou?

title: Soran's Feelings
synopsis: Soran has become a Tenshi candidate, and now he lives in a villa with Houhou. When she sees how nervous he becomes when he’s alone with a girl, Houhou decides to make a man out of Soran. Soran is angered by her selfish decision, and says he’s not going to listen to her anymore. He leaves the house, and Houhou is left standing there alone. Fuu Saen of the Tengekai is waiting for him. Soran is taken to the Tengekai, which is actually a huge corporation called the Tenge Group. He is met by Fuu Saen’s father, Fuu Chonhao, who is the leader of the Tengekai.

title: Thunder God
synopsis: Soran is kidnapped, and met by Chou Reigyoku. Reigyoku uses kinkou, the techniques that Soran was taught by his father when he was little. His kinkou is more powerful than Soran’s, so Soran has no way to fight back. At the same time, Houhou goes to save him, but Fuu Saen blocks her path. As the two of them fight, they can feel Reigyoku’s ki off in the distance. They agree to a temporary truce and go towards Soran and Reigyoku. Soran is about to give up in the face of Reigyoku’s overwhelming might. Houhou arrives and says, “Show him your power!” His grandfather, Shakurin, had taught him a power even stronger than kinkou. Soran’s kinkou begins to change color. What power does he have?

title: Welcome to Express Delivery
synopsis: In the prison on the bottom floor is Kenken, who was betrayed by Zensei and captured by Express Delivery. Jo San tries to get information about Zensei from her, but she refuses to talk. Suddenly, Jo Yon, his older brother, appears, and when she won’t answer his questions he tries to use force. Soran tries to stop him, and it feels like a battle could break out in the prison at any second. Soran wants Jo San to go easy on Kenken, and Jo San is about to agree, when Jo Yon interrupts and refuses. At last, Kenken talks. Why did they steal Chou Shakurin’s body? What does Zensei want? Why did Kenken try to join Zensei? The truth is revealed.

title: Chaos
synopsis: Excited by his first chance at a date, Soran is easily deceived by Kenken and his Kinkou is sealed away. Natsuka, Ro Ryou, and Kenken capture him. Houhou and Josan come to save him. A battle begins as the help Soran is left tied up in the corner. As more and more outsiders and zombies join the fight, Soran is saved by a new power user, Saru. The place becomes a war zone as all the outsiders use their powers. The capture of Soran brings the two outsider organizations into open conflict. Who will survive? And what will happen to Soran? less

title: Lie
synopsis: Not only has he become Houhou’s servant, but now his roommate is calling him suspicious! Just as everything’s going against him, Soran gets a friend request for a social network on his phone. And it’s from a cute girl! Soran gets excited, but Houhou tells him there’s someone she wants him to meet that evening. Soran wants to go on his date, so he ignores his master’s phone call. The girl who appears at the meeting spot is Kenken, who is as cute as her picture, and very kind as well. Meanwhile, Houhou is with Jo San, who she was supposed to introduce to Soran that night. Infuriated, she uses GPS technology to track him, saying that she’ll need to give him a very harsh on. What will happen with Soran’s date? Will Houhou find him? What will happen next? less

title: Master and Servant
synopsis: The morning after the zombie attack, Soran returns to college. Houhou tells him that she’ll be going to the same college he is, and she asks him to show her the power he used to fight the zombies. Soran jokes around, but Houhou takes out her knife and attacks him. Soran refuses to fight back, remembering his grandfather’s words. The time to use the power that his father, Yotoku, made him practice when he was young... Then, something envelopes Soran’s body. As the two of them fight, Ro Ryou, who physically looks like a young boy, and the zombie who defiled the grave are gathered in an abandoned building somewhere. At their feet is Shakurin’s body, and a beautiful woman named Natsuka appears as well. Now, Soran has no choice but to fight, and Natsuka, Ro Ryou, and the Zombie are beginning to make their move as well. What did Shakurin leave to Soran when he died? And what will Soran do now that he remembers Shakurin’s words?

title: The Chou Family's Secret?
synopsis: The grave of a man named Chou Shakurin has been disturbed in the Chinese countryside. A girl named Houhou, claiming to be the granddaughter of the grave's occupant, appears there. At the same time, Chou Soran, a student at a college in the city, has returned to the countryside to visit his grandfather Shakurin's grave.

title: Long Journey Farewell, My Friends
synopsis: Because of Polnareff's miraculous, life-risking trick, Jotaro is finally able to land a blow onto DIO. The injured DIO tries to escape within the stopped time. Jotaro tries to finish him with a rush attack, but that was the escape route that DIO was looking for. Before DIO lies the shriveled body of Joseph Joestar. Jotaro is enraged by DIO, who has now healed, and wages his final battle with DIO within stopped time!

title: DIO's World, Part 3
synopsis: Joseph is able to figure out The World's power because of the message Kakyoin left, but is quickly knocked out by a cruel attack by DIO. Jotaro then attacks The World with Star Platinum, but is no match for DIO's power. DIO stopped time and goes in for the final blow, but he sees that Jotaro's fingers are moving in the stopped time, and strengthens his defense. Jotaro telling DIO that their Stands are the same type lingers in his mind...

title: DIO's World, Part 2
synopsis: The battle is taking place in the city of Cairo at night. Joseph and Kakyoin are running from DIO as they fight, and Jotaro and Polnareff chase after DIO as they fight. Amidst all of that, Kakyoin says he has a way to figure out what DIO's Stand actually is. DIO, who was chasing after Kakyoin when he falls into Hierophant Green's trap, and then...

title: DIO's World, Part 1
synopsis: Polnareff finally comes face to face with DIO. Despite the hostility towards him, DIO tells him that he'd forgive him and will allow him to join him again. Polnareff refuses the offer, but for some reason, cannot get any closer to DIO. He unleashes Silver Chariot to at least try to reveal the identity of DIO's Stand. Right when it was about to clash with DIO's Stand, The World, the wall breaks behind them and the ones who appeared were...

title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3
synopsis: Polnareff is pushed to his limits with Cool Ice's merci attacks. He finally awaits death, but is saved at the last minute by the dying Iggy. Iggy uses the last bit of his energy, but his Stand is obviously losing power. Polnareff then stabs Cool Ice in the head. Despite showing resilience to the attacks so far, Cool Ice is finally destroyed. less

title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2
synopsis: After a long, hard journey, they are faced with a sudden goodbye of a friend. Because it's so sudden, Polnareff can't control his emotions. He starts brandishing his sword toward the unseen enemy with very little success.

title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1
synopsis: The baseball match with D'Arby continues within DIO's mansion. For some reason, Jotaro starts declaring his pitches to D'Arby. D'Arby finds Jotaro's actions strange, but still believes he has the upper hand because of his Stand's abilities.

title: D'Arby the Player, Part 2
synopsis: The battle for souls with D'Arby continues. Kakyoin challenged D'Arby to a race game, but ends up losing and D'Arby steals his soul. Before Joseph really has time to react, Jotaro picks the next game.

title: D'Arby the Player, Part 1
synopsis: Despite Iggy's injuries, Jojo and company finally make it to DIO's mansion. Once they entered, a butler named D'Arby Younger was awaiting their arrival. The younger brother of the defeated D'Arby Elder, he immediately shows off his Stand, Atum's power.

title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2
synopsis: Iggy ends up in a battle to the death in the sewers against the falcon that guards DIO's mansion, Pet Shop. Pet Shop shows no mercy, and goes after Iggy at a frightening speed. Iggy, despite being injured, runs into the river, making a dome made out of dirt to shield him. However, he underestimates Pet Shop's abilities, and...

title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1
synopsis: Jojo and the others continue to look for DIO's mansion in Cairo. Following Avdol's advice, they have a beggar look for the mansion and wait. Meanwhile, Iggy, who is wandering the city alone, gets confronted by two large dogs. The dogs are freaked out by Iggy's power, and decide to go after a bird that's at a nearby mansion instead. However, as soon as the dogs go into the mansion, they are impaled by a giant icicle. Iggy is shocked by the occurrence, and sees a falcon appear...

title: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 2
synopsis: Hol Horse and Mondatta followed Jotaro and the others to Cairo and as Mondatta's book said, Hol Horse stuck his fingers into Polnareff's nose... but he didn't know what to do from there. Then Jotaro and the others, who were looking for Polnareff, show up, but things seem to be going the opposite way of the premonition.

title: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 1
synopsis: Hol Horse arrives at Cairo in order to pursue Jotaro and the others. He has joined forces with another partner and is after the lives of Jotaro and crew once more. That partner, is none other than Mondatta.

title: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 2
synopsis: After losing to D'Arby, Joseph and Polnareff have their souls taken. In order to have their souls returned, Jotaro shows off Star Platinum's powers before going into a match with D'Arby, warning him that cheating won't work.

title: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 1
synopsis: After a long journey, Jotaro and the others finally reach Cairo. They go to a cafe and ask if anyone knows where DIO's mansion is located by showing the picture around. Then, someone says that they have seen the building before.

title: Set's Alessi, Part 2
synopsis: Because of the power of Ai's Stand, Set, Polnareff is turned back into a child. The one who came to his aid amidst his confusion was a woman named Marena. However, Alessi's evil hands followed Polnareff into her house. less

title: Set's Alessi, Part 1
synopsis: While Joseph and Avdol were fighting with Mariah, Jotaro gets concerned that they haven't shown up yet, and goes to look for them around Luxor. Then, Polnareff senses someone following them and confronts the man.

title: Bast's Mariah, Part 2
synopsis: Due to the powers of an enemy Stand, Joseph's body becomes magnetised. While chasing after the woman that seemed to be the Stand user, Avdol also touches the electrical outlet and becomes magnetised as well.

title: Bastet's Mariah, Part 1
synopsis: Jotaro and the others arrive in Luxor. While heading there, Joseph notices an electrical outlet in a rock. Obviously fascinated by the electrical outlet in the rock, Joseph gets closer, and get gets shocked.

title: Anubis, Part 2
synopsis: Polnareff had defeated the Anubis Stand user, Chaka, however the barber he had visited suddenly starts talking about Anubis and attacks him.

title: Anubis, Part 1
synopsis: Jojo and the others look for a boat to take to Cairo where DIO awaits. Meanwhile, Chaka was walking along a nearby beach where he finds a sword. The men he's with all try to draw the sword with no luck, but then Chaka tries and is easily able to draw the sword. The sword glows eerily and Chaka suddenly hears a mysterious voice, changing his usually calm demeanor. What is the true identity of this sword?

title: Khnum's Zenyatta and Thoth's Mondatta
synopsis: After their battle with N'doul, Kakyoin and Avdol are badly hurt, so they take them to a hospital in Aswan. While being careful of possible enemies around them, Polnareff picks a cafe for the rest of the crew to go into. However, that cafe had already been taken over by the Stand user brothers, Khnum's Zenyatta and Thoth's Mondatta. Zenyatta disguises himself as the manager of the cafe and tries to serve Jojo and the others poisoned black tea, but...

title: Iggy the Fool and Geb's N'doul, Part 2
synopsis: Jotaro and crew acquire the help of Iggy, but due to a surprise attack from a water Stand, Kakyoin is injured. Avdol tries out a strategy against the unseen enemy, but the enemy quickly sees through it. Despite everything going on, Iggy is napping.

title: Iggy the Fool and Geb's N'doul, Part 1
synopsis: Jojo and the others land in Egypt where DIO awaits, and are currently cutting through the desert, when a helicopter approaches them. The helicopter belonged to the Speedwagon Foundation that had been helping them on their journey so far, and brought them something that Joseph had asked for.

title: The High Priestess, Part 2
synopsis: Jotaro and the others try to escape from the submarine, as it is now sinking from an attack from the enemy Stand, High Priestess. As the group puts on scuba gear and heads out into the water, the enemy Stand attacks again. The enemy keeps changing shape, but somehow, Jotaro and crew manage to escape. They find two underwater tunnels and realize that they're close to the surface and start to relax when...

title: The High Priestess, Part 1
synopsis: Jotaro and the others obtain a submarine as a new means of travel. Through the Red Sea, they try to head toward Egypt where DIO awaits. Using the sonar to detect any threats on the outside, the submarine quietly dives in. They however realize that if they're attacked underwater, there is nowhere to escape, so they are on their guard. Finally, when they are about to surface, a coffee mug that was in the cabin transforms and cuts off Joseph's artificial hand.

title: Judgment, Part 2
synopsis: Polnareff revives his sister using one of the wishes he received, but then is attacked by her. The enemy stand user, Cameo says he'll grant his other wish, and revives Avdol. The revived Shelly and Avdol then try to eat Polnareff alive. Polnareff tries to fight back with his Stand, but starts to lose consciousness and then...

title: Judgment, Part 1
synopsis: Jotaro and the others visit an island on the Red Sea to visit someone. When they got to the island, they meet someone that looks just like Avdol, but with white hair... It was his father! However, it appears that he doesn't want to speak to Jotaro and the others, and retreats into his house. Polnareff goes to the beach, reflecting on the sadness of the fact that Avdol died protecting him.

title: Death 13, Part 2
synopsis: Kakyoin tries to convince the others that the baby is suspicious, but that backfires, and his friends start to doubt his sanity. Kakyoin then tries to convince them that he's not crazy, and shows them his arm that has "Baby Stand" carved into it... but that just makes them believe he really is crazy. Kakyoin then tries to use his Stand to attack, but is knocked out by Polnareff. Eventually, Jotaro and the others wake up in the nightmare and the truth finally comes out.

title: Death 13, Part 1
synopsis: Kakyoin is dreaming and dreams about being in a strange amusement park, where he encounters the Death tarot card. While in the dream, he witnesses Death cut down a dog. Kakyoin wakes up screaming, but can't remember what his bad dream was about.

title: The Sun
synopsis: Jotaro and the others continue their journey through the desert, trying to get to Cairo. They travel with camels and can't shake the feeling that someone is following them, but no one is in sight. Traveling in the killer heat, they realize that it's still bright out at 8pm and the sun is actually rising rather than setting.

title: The Lovers Part 2
synopsis: Dan of Steel's Stand, The Lovers, has entered Joseph's brain. Dan puts himself at an advantage, with having Joseph's life on the line, and tells Jotaro to do various things for him, knowing Jotaro has no choice but to obey. Meanwhile, Kakyoin and Polnareff also enter Joseph's brain with their Stands and find the Stand that is using brain cells as food.

title: The Lovers Part 1
synopsis: After surviving Enyaba's attack, Jotaro and crew make it to Pakistan's capital, Karachi. There, they encounter DIO's next assassin, Dan of Steel. Following DIO's orders, Dan of Steel ruthly kills Enyaba in front of them. Jotaro and the others can't help but feel conflicted about that happening, and end up in a battle with Dan of Steel. less

title: Justice Part 2
synopsis: Polnareff finally realizes that Enyaba is another assassin from DIO. He tries to warn the others, but Enyaba's Stand, Justice, has the ability to take control of people's bodies and corpses, and he is pursued. The whole village had already been under Enyaba's control.

title: Justice Part 1
synopsis: Jotaro and the others successfully survive another attack from the enemy Stand users and make it into Pakistan. However, they decide to find an inn at a nearby village because of the dense fog they suddenly hit. The village they get to is rather quiet and all of the inhabitants seem rather odd.

title: Wheel of Fortune
synopsis: Jotaro and the others head toward Pakistan in a car. Polnareff is driving the car on a very dangerous mountain road, and reckly passes a slow moving vehicle that was in front of him. less

title: The Empress
synopsis: Jotaro and the others next head toward Varanasi. On their way there, Joseph realizes his arm is quite swollen. At first, it didn't bug him much, but as it got bigger, the creepier it started looking.

title: The Emperor and the Hanged Man Part 2
synopsis: While trying to save Polnareff, Avdol is struck down by the enemy's attack. After witnessing this, Polnareff is unable to keep his cool and is in a state of shock. That is when Centerfold's Stand, Hanged Man starts its full on attack.

title: The Emperor and the Hanged Man Part 1
synopsis: Jotaro and the others safely leave Singapore and enter India. Despite being rather surprised at the difference in culture, they stop in at a restaurant. There, Polnareff is attacked by a mysterious Stand that is inside a mirror.

title: Yellow Temperance
synopsis: Joseph uses Hermit Purple to create a message using the TV, which tells them that Kakyoin is a traitor. Meanwhile, Jotaro knows nothing about this and is out and about in Singapore with Anne and Kakyoin.

title: The Devil
synopsis: Jotaro and crew get to Singapore and once they get to their hotel, they seperate. However, Soul Sacrifice was waiting for Polnareff in his room. Polnareff falls for the trap that Soul Sacrifice's Stand, Ebony Devil, had set for him. Does Polnareff have a chance of defeating an enemy he can't see?

title: Strength
synopsis: They manage to escape the boat that was destroyed by the fake captain and drift on an emergency boat. A giant ship shows itself in front of them and they go on board. Once they are on board, they realize they can't seem to find a crew or anyone on board at all... just a cage with an orangutan in it.

title: Dark Blue Moon
synopsis: With a new person in their party, they head to Singapore with the boat the Speedwagon Foundation provided them. During their journey, a stoaway is found and causes a commotion and then Jotaro is targeted by an enemy Stand from within the water.

title: Silver Chariot
synopsis: DIO's next assassin, Polnareff attacks Jotaro and crew. Despite the terrifyingly fast sword handling of Polnareff's Stand, Silver Chariot, Avdol faces him with his Magician's Red.

title: Tower of Grey
synopsis: If they do not defeat DIO within 50 days, Holly could die... Jotaro and crew head to Egypt, where they think DIO is hiding. While on the plane, they run into another one of DIO's assassins.

title: The Curse of DIO
synopsis: With his evolved Stand powers, Jotaro is able to defeat Kakyoin, an assassin sent by DIO. He takes the wounded Kakyoin back to his house, hoping to get some information about DIO from him and Joseph notices a flesh bud on his head. A flesh bud is something that DIO uses to control his followers.

title: Who Will Be the Judge!?
synopsis: Jotaro finds out that the "evil spirit" he has is actually called a Stand, and tries to hide its existence as he tries to live a normal life. However, on the way to school one day, he sustains a very odd injury and meets a new transfer student named Noriaki Kakyoin.

title: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit
synopsis: Year 1987: Japan. A young man who is a descendant of the Joestar clan, Jotaro Kujo, is being held in a cell. He tells his mother, Holly, that he is being possessed by an evil spirit, so she asks her father, Joseph Joestar for help. Joseph immediately goes to Japan along with his friend, Avdol and go to Jotaro, explaining that he knows everything about the evil spirit. His explanation brings their ominous family history to light...

title: Part 3: Battle Tendency (Second Half)
synopsis: A re-edited, re-telling of Bizarre Adventure episode 20-26.

title: Part 2: Battle Tendency (First Half)
synopsis: A re-edited, re-telling of Bizarre Adventure episode 10-19.

title: Part 1: Phantom Blood
synopsis: A re-edited, re-telling of Bizarre Adventure episode 01-09.

title: The Ascendant One
synopsis: JoJo's victory, along with his arm, is cut short when Kars manages to survive the volcano by forming a shield of air bubbles to protect him from its deadly lava.

title: The Birth of a Superbeing
synopsis: Kars demonstrates his new powers, turning his hand into a flesh-eating squirrel that deals damage to Stroheim. The sun rises, leaving a shocking discovery.

title: The Ties that Bind JoJo
synopsis: Being forced to cling onto a rope to stop Lisa Lisa from falling to her death, JoJo is at a huge disadvantage against Kars.

title: The Warrior of Wind
synopsis: Launching his Final Mode attack, Gathering Gale, which starts peeling away his own body, Wamuu begins firing a stream of wind capable of cutting stone towards JoJo.

title: A True Warrior
synopsis: Before JoJo's and Wamuu's race begins, it is revealed that during each lap, there will be a different weapon for whoever can grab it from a pillar first.

title: A Hundred Against Two
synopsis: Whilst following Wamuu's trail of blood, JoJo and Lisa Lisa encounter another vampire named Wired Beck.

title: Young Caesar
synopsis: Lisa Lisa tells JoJo of Caesar's childhood, in which he took to crime at a young age after being abandoned by his debt-ridden father, Mario.

title: A Race Toward the Brink
synopsis: Stroheim starts using his new mechanical body, which was designed to surpass Santana, to fight against Kars. However, it proves futile against Kars' Light Mode.

title: Von Stroheim's Revenge
synopsis: As JoJo awaits to warn Lisa Lisa about the Pillar Men, Esidisi's brain takes over the body of Suzi Q and sends the Super Aja off on a boat bound for Venice before confronting Lisa Lisa.

title: The Deeper Plan
synopsis: Lisa Lisa explains to JoJo and Caesar how the creator of the Stone Mask, Kars, is seeking a perfectly cut Red Stone of Aja known as the Super Aja to power the Stone Mask and become the ultimate life form.

title: Lisa Lisa, Hamon Coach
synopsis: Wanting to teach JoJo to control his Ripple powers, Caesar takes him to Venice to meet his teacher, Lisa Lisa. Lisa Lisa.

title: A Hero's Proof
synopsis: Caesar engages Wamuu in battle for killing Mark, using his Bubble Launcher technique to surround the Pillar Man in Ripple enfused bubbles.

title: Ultimate Warriors from Ancient Times
synopsis: Speedwagon brings statued remains of Santana to the headquarters of his foundation in Washington, D.C., where it is shown Santana is still alive, but his scientists are able to keep him dormant through the use of ultraviolet light.

title: JoJo vs. The Ultimate Lifeform
synopsis: As Joseph begins to fight against Santana, Joseph finds his Ripple to not be effective against Santana, but it still helps protect him from the Pillar Man's attacks. Joseph appears to be unconscious after receiving a powerful hit.

title: The Pillar Man
synopsis: Joseph is confronted by one of Stroheim's men, Donovan, but manages to subdue him, learning that Speedwagon is still alive.

title: The Game Master
synopsis: As expected, Straizo recovers from Joseph's attack and uses the laser eye attack Dio used to seemingly pierce through JoJo's head and neck. However, this turns out to be a clever trick by Joseph.

title: New York's JoJo
synopsis: In 1938, 49 years after Jonathan Joestar's death, Speedwagon and Straizo travel to Mexico, where they discover an underground room filled with similar looking masks and a petrified body believed to be the being who created them.

title: The Final Ripple!
synopsis: As Dio falls following his battle with JoJo, he decapitates himself before the ripple reaches his head, which is recovered by his zombie servant Wang Chung.

title: Bloody Battle! JoJo & Dio
synopsis: After Poco hears that Peggy has gone out to search for him, Dio sends a zombie named Doobie to attack Peggy after she refuses to join his legion.

title: Sorrowful Successor
synopsis: Zeppeli recalls how Tonpetty foretold where his death would take place; in the very place he is in right now. Knowing this, Zeppeli fights against Tarkus with the intention of finding a way to free JoJo.

title: Tomorrow's Courage
synopsis: As Bruford manages to barely avoid JoJo's attack, JoJo is once again ensnared by his hair. However, JoJo manages to block Bruford's attack...

title: The Dark Knights
synopsis: Upon arriving in Windknights Lot, JoJo's group is pickpocketed by a talented young boy named Poco who JoJo and Zeppeli manage to catch using their ripple powers.

title: Overdrive
synopsis: Three days after the incident, JoJo awakens to find Erina nursing him back to health in the hospital. As they rekindle their friendship, they encounter a strange man named Will A. Zeppeli.

title: Youth with Dio
synopsis: Having found an antidote and given it to George, JoJo prepares to turn Dio in to the police. Dio tries to get JoJo's guard down by saying he will turn himself in, but Speedwagon, who has followed JoJo from London, sees through Dio's lies.

title: A Letter From the Past
synopsis: Seven years later in 1888, JoJo and Dio are supposedly getting along, though JoJo is still fearful of Dio after what happened all those years ago while Dio plots to take over the Joestar family.

title: Dio the Invader
synopsis: England 1868. A thief tries to raid an overturned carriage, but discovers that two of the occupants, a man and his young son are still alive. The man, George Joestar, claims he will forever be indebted to his savior, who reveals himself to be Dario Brando.

title: Confession
synopsis: At the fireworks display, everyone puts their plans into motion and tries to make things work between Kazuomi and Rena. Meanwhile, a different pairing begins to take shape...

title: Double Panic
synopsis: Arata, once and for all, tries to make the dense-as-can-be Kazuomi realize what he has in his hands.

title: A Trip to the Past
synopsis: Arata decides to visit a grave and ends up taking a trip down memory lane.

title: Everyone's Selfish Desires
synopsis: Things come to a head as Chizuru and Arata decide to confront Rena over her behavior.

title: Revenge
synopsis: The rift between Rena and Honoka grows ever larger as the former decides to retire from high-school volleyball, but Chizuru and Arata decide to fix things.

title: Rift
synopsis: Honoka is distracted by her troubles and inadvertently causes an injury to Rena.

title: Test Subject 001 -> 002
synopsis: Ryo reflects on the year before and his failure supporting test subject no. 001

title: This Isn't the First Time
synopsis: Onoya An and Oga Kazuomi suddenly visit Arata for a study session, after which Onoya puts the moves on Arata?!

title: Overlap
synopsis: Things come to a head between Rena and Chizuru, which reminds Arata about a traumatic experience in his past.

title: Fall
synopsis: Kariu Rena is thrown for a loop by what she thinks is Chizuru's spiteful behavior toward her.

title: You're Old Now
synopsis: Arata receives a grim reminder of his physical age during athletic testing.

title: Communication Skills: Zero
synopsis: Arata meets Hishiro Chiziru, a girl who has zero communication skills but is trying her best to change.

title: Kaizaki Arata (27), Unemployed
synopsis: Kaizaki Arata is twenty-seven years old and doesn't have a steady job. His parents even threaten to stop sending him money, but that's when he he meets Yoake Ryo, who has a tantalizing offer for him.

title: PV
synopsis: Promo Video

title: Everyone, Let's Play Football! Ya-Ha!
synopsis: The final play comes down to Sena against Shin one on one.

title: The Final Moment!
synopsis: Shin successfully made the final touchdown for White Knights, making the score 27-22 to the White Knights.

title: A Form of Desperation!
synopsis: 3 yards till the goal line and 1:21 on the clock left.

title: The Demon's Twin Wings!
synopsis: Deimon makes a safety, making the score 20-15 and getting the ball back.

title: Turn on the Devil Stun Gun!
synopsis: The score is 20-13, Ojo to Deimon.

title: The Two Aces!
synopsis: Sakuraba attempts the Devil Backfire but fails and makes a nasty fall losing consciousness.

title: The 9999th Catch
synopsis: The episode begins with Ojo throwing a long pass. Monta intercepts it without turning around to watch the ball.

title: The Battlefield, After the Rain
synopsis: Sena uses a speed-boost to compete in power with Shin who knocks him away with some effort, giving Hiruma the chance to tackle the runner.

title: Our Fate Lies in Halftime
synopsis: Hiruma and Mamori review the game's footage to find a strategy.

title: #21, Defeated!
synopsis: Having achieved the speed of light as well, Shin declares himself the winner off the battle between him and Sena.

title: Superman!
synopsis: Shin stops the passing game of Deimon forcing them to use Sena.

title: The Impregnable Fortress
synopsis: Takami once again tells Deimon which direction he will running The Ballista.

title: The Kingdom's Ballista
synopsis: The Bats are on their fourth down and 40 yards away from the goal.

title: The Knight who Controls the Skies
synopsis: Monta catches all the passes of Hiruma.

title: Ikari's Prison Chain
synopsis: Ikari makes his debut play.

title: The Opening Fanfare!
synopsis: The battle between Ojo and Deimon has started, and Deimon gets to attack first.

title: The Challenge for Sovereignty!
synopsis: It's the match between the Ojo White Knights and Deimon Devil Bats!

title: The Demon vs. The Lightspeed Man!
synopsis: The two teams' catchers and running backs are interviewed the day before the match.

title: It's just, so we can win
synopsis: A few days before the game between Deimon and Ojo, Hiruma takes the team on a helicopter trip to remind them where Ojo is weakest.

title: The Oath to Become an Ace!
synopsis: Torakichi realizes that Sakuraba's not the ace of Ojo.

title: Ojo High's School Festival!
synopsis: Hiruma and the rest of the team go to spy on Ojo at their high school festival while Hiruma, Kurita, and Musashi get trapped doing a quiz show.

title: The Ultimate Spear!
synopsis: Ojo White Knights vs. Sado Strong Golems!

title: The Knight with no Blind Spots!
synopsis: As a celebration of their progress, Mamori decides to buy Sena and Riku new shoes.

title: Rodeo Drive Stampede!
synopsis: Riku loses his cool and gets angry at the Wolves.

title: The Wolves' Battlefield!
synopsis: Seibu Wild Gunmen vs. Misaki Wolves!

title: The Dreadnought Team - The Dinosaurs
synopsis: The Hakushu Dinosaurs will play against the Taiyo Sphinx.

title: Post-Battle!
synopsis: After winning the game, the players line up to shake hands.

title: A Huddle with no Answers
synopsis: It turns out that before Monta was tackled down, he reached his hand out and grabbed the grass on the "out of bounds area,"

title: Timeouts: Zero!
synopsis: 58 seconds remain on the clock with the score at 35-28.

title: The Will of a Warrior
synopsis: Sena grabs the ball and is about to score a touchdown when Agon gets in the way.

title: Fighting to be Number One
synopsis: At the beginning of the episode Shin comments that even though each individual in Deimon is lacking, as a team they are already regarded as the strongest in Kanto, hinting the result of the game.

title: The Power of the Rank and File
synopsis: Hiruma tells Sena that he has to blitz Agon on every play, but it just does not seem to work.

title: The 12th Athlete
synopsis: The first half ends with 32-0, Shinryuji in the lead.

title: Devils vs. Dragons!
synopsis: The game begins. Shinryuji gets the lead on Deimon.

title: The Devil Bats Move Out!
synopsis: Finally, the match with Shinryuji is about to begin!

title: The Wall Called "Talent"
synopsis: Unsei explains to Sena and the others why he trains so hard.

title: His Talent at Catching!
synopsis: Monta battles Ikkyu in a catching battle. Monta loses but vows to beat Ikkyu next time with 100% effort.

title: Sena's a Famous Detective?!
synopsis: The Devil Bats are given a night cruise on a ship to relax before the game.

title: Shinryuji is the Enemy!
synopsis: A recap of the Shinryuji and Hiruma, Kurita, and Musahi's involvement.

title: The Demon God Agon Kongo!
synopsis: An interview with Hiruma and Agon. Later, Sena protects Mamori from Agon.

title: The Last Death Game!
synopsis: Deimon vs. the NASA Aliens.

title: One Lineman Short!
synopsis: In the fourth death game against the Taiyo Spinx, Deimon is left short-handed after Jumonji gets arrested for beating up some punks who were harassing a young girl.

title: The Invincible Double-Blocker!
synopsis: Kyoshin and Bando team up to beat Deimon in the 3rd death game.

title: Overcome Your "Fear!"
synopsis: Sena, Monta, and Suzuna visit Mizumachi in the hospital.

title: The Ultimate Evil!
synopsis: The regional champions go to a place where they decide which regional teams will play against who for the Christmas Bowl.

title: The Invisible Shackle!
synopsis: Sena starts having nightmares about football.

title: The Deimon School Festival!
synopsis: Deimon has a school festival, where a large contest is being held.

title: The Chameleons Strike Back!
synopsis: Game 2 of the Death Game.

title: Farewell, Onihei!
synopsis: The challenge to the Death Game has started. The first team to play against are the Hashiratani Deers. Kurita must face up to defeat his long time hero Onihei.

title: It's here! The Kanto Tournament!
synopsis: Recap of the Fall Tournament

title: Break through the Blizzard!
synopsis: 0-17 Blizzard to Deimon. Ivan's twin brother Wan has been placed on the field with current goals.

title: The Silver Snow's Secret Weapon!
synopsis: Devil Bats vs Blizzards. Trailing 17-0 after the first half, the Blizzards send in their secret weapon to injure Sena.

title: A Shout of Friendship!
synopsis: Devil Bats vs. Savanna Survivors. In the end, the Devil Bats easily win.

title: The Brothers of the Texas Ranch!
synopsis: The Huh-Huh brothers take on a bull in order to train for the Creme Puff Cup.

title: Fighting Spirit! The Death Climb!
synopsis: Sena takes up wrestling in order to try to defeat Ivan's mammoth tackle.

title: A New Trial.
synopsis: Panther and a couple of the Devil Bats play a street game against a rival neighborhood to help Panther regain his love of football.

title: Let it begin! The Cream Puff Cup!
synopsis: The Cream Puff Tournament is a tournament in America where 4 teams representing different continents face each other.

title: Deimon's Half-time Show!
synopsis: A "halftime show" of short player-centric stories, interspersed with chibi shorts.

title: The Strongest Warriors in Tokyo!
synopsis: Deimon has beaten the Spiders and are going to the Kanto Tournament, where the high-school champs of Kanto face each other to choose who will go to the Christmas Bowl.

title: The Time-Up of Light and Shadows!
synopsis: With four minutes left in the game, the score is 36-30, Bando to Deimon.

title: The Man Beloved by God!
synopsis: Taki begins to cause problems for the Devil Bats in the critical fourth quarter of their game against the Spiders.

title: The Demon Within the Storm!
synopsis: With the wind's speed increasing, passing is impossible, and Deimon is left with no other choice but to have Sena run the ball.

title: Time has Begun Again!
synopsis: Musashi arrives just in the nick of time and scores a 45-yard field goal, and Deimon is now only behind by eleven points.

title: Run! Musashi!
synopsis: Using a combination run with Hiruma, Sena is finally able to score a touchdown.

title: The Truth Behind Red Eyes!
synopsis: The game continues to turn in the Spiders' favor, as they score yet another field goal, giving them a 20-point lead.

title: The Ultimate Kick Team!
synopsis: Using a trick kick in the beginning of the game, Akaba recovers the ball and Kotaro scores a field goal.

title: Sena Kobayakawa!
synopsis: Before the match, Sena removes his helmet to reveal his identity to the world. Mamori accepts who Sena is. The game against the Bando Spiders begins.

title: They're Waiting for Me!
synopsis: Mamori tries to help Sena, but Sena can't find enough time to transform into Eyeshield 21!

title: "The True 21!"
synopsis: Sena and Suzuna go to retrieve their helmets and cleats at a store where Sena sees a helmet with an eyeshield on it.

title: Come back, Musashi!
synopsis: Deimon realizes that they will need a kicker to win their game against the Bando Spiders.

title: The Spider's Sting!
synopsis: The Bando Spiders face off against the Ojo White Knights.

title: A Pact Between Rivals!
synopsis: After losing to the Seibu Gunmen, Tetsuma rescues Monta from getting Deimon suspended from playing.

title: The Fateful Kick!
synopsis: Kid tells Hiruma that he fell directly into his trap, and that everything is always too good to be true.

title: Lightspeed Pride!
synopsis: As the Deimon-Seibu game goes on, Sena finds out that he's more than a match for his friend Riku and brings the Devil Bats close to victory with his Devil Bat Tornado.

title: A Demonic Counterattack!
synopsis: Finally, with all the Devil Bats on the field, Hiruma can unleash the true power of the Devil Bats, but will it be enough to overtake the Seibu team?

title: Musashi is Right Here!
synopsis: After seeing the dire straits the Deimon team is in, and a stern talking to from his father, Musashi rejoins the Devil Bats.

title: The Field of Despair!
synopsis: With the triple threat of Riku, Tetsuma, and the Kid bearing down on the Devil Bats, it looks like their luck may have run out.

title: Proof He's the Fastest!
synopsis: The game with Seibu has begun and the Devil Bats are getting all they can handle from their running back, Kaitani Riku, the boy that taught Sena how to run.

title: The Three Made a Promise!
synopsis: As the time approaches for the game against the Seibu Wild Gunmen, Hiruma, Kurita, and Musashi all recall the promise they made to go to the Christmas Bowl.

title: The Sprinter's Sena?!
synopsis: Ishimaru and the track team need an extra man, so they ask Sena to help out. How will Sena keep his secret now?

title: Field Day at Deimon High School!
synopsis: Hiruma takes advantage of the school's field day to make it a training session for the team.

title: The Appearance of a Lightspeed Man!?
synopsis: Riku appears and talks about his past and how Sena could run because of him.

title: Attack and Defense for 30 Centimeters!
synopsis: With the game and their tournament hopes in the balance, Sena and the Devil Bats get help from an unlikely source.

title: How Terrifying! The Moby Dick Anchor!
synopsis: With pressure by the Devil Bats, Mizumachi and Shun conclude that it's time to unleash the true power of the Kyoushin defense.

title: Obsession with Victory!
synopsis: The game continues with a stalemate with both teams trying to break the trend and score, knowing that this will lean the game highly in their favor.

title: The Promise Made on the Field!
synopsis: The Devil Bats have made a comeback, the score is 14-12, and Deimon has the ball!

title: The Secret MVP!
synopsis: Sena finds it difficult to run against the Kyoushin team, so it's up to Hiruma to lead his team down the field.

title: The Devils vs. The Sea Gods!
synopsis: Sena and the Devil Bats start their game against Mizumachi and the Kyoushin Poseidons.

title: The Man Who Remembers #21!
synopsis: When Monta and Sena are sent to spy on the Poseidons' final practice before the game, they are caught, and Kakei tells Sena that he wants to challenge Eyeshield 21!

title: Toss him out! The Honorable Komusubi!
synopsis: Komusubi starts learning sumo. With his special training, he finds a way to overcome the physical difference between himself and Mizumachi and Kakei.

title: A Physique-al Barrier!
synopsis: With the game with the Scorpions behind them, Deimon prepares to play the Kyoushin Poseidons. However they may be with out one of their linemen, Komusubi's run away.

title: The Missing Leader!
synopsis: With Hiruma MIA and the Scorpions in the lead, it looks like the Deimon team's Christmas Bowl dreams are doomed... until Mamori remembers the game plan Hiruma entrusted to her.

title: The Fearsome, Venomous Scorpions!
synopsis: Sena and the Devil Bats play their game with the Dokubari Scorpions, who consider football to be just as much of a mind game as a physical one. However their captain Kanagushia failed to take into account Hiruma's superior tactics....

title: Clash! The Chameleons vs. the Poseidons!
synopsis: Chamelon and Poseidon start their game. Poseidon has a great advantage because they have tall players and the Chameleon team is not united.

title: Beware! The Demonic Chameleons!
synopsis: Eyeshield 21 enters the Chameleons' locker room and cuts up all their uniforms in the middle of the night. Sena said he did not do it. The Chameleons enter Deimon and try to find Eyeshield 21.

title: The Courage to Stand Firm!
synopsis: Sena learns the truth about the "real" Eyeshield 21 from a Poseidon player, Kakei Shun. Discouraged after hearing that he may never catch up to the real Eyeshield, Sena learns from Shin that it isn't size that matters, but an unwavering spirit.

title: The Refined Spirit of a Lineman!
synopsis: The Devil Bats meet the captain of the Hashiratani Deers, Yamamoto Onihei. The Devil Bats go watch the Deers game against the Kyoshin Poseidon in order to see the team that might become their future opponents.

title: A Battle of Effort, Fortitude, and Will!
synopsis: Deimon's game against the Guts begins. Hiruma tries to put pressure on them with words about this being their last chance to go to the Christmas Bowl. However, the Guts' coach has replaced the regular players with athletes from other clubs in order to win.

title: Hot! Guts!! Fire! Oh, oops!
synopsis: The Devil Bats witness the physical endurance and team bond of the Yuuhi Guts, their next opponents in the tournament. Hiruma says that the Devil Bats have a 99% chance of winning, but the Yuuhi Guts have a 1% chance of defeating them due to having more experience.

title: The Ghost vs. The Spear!
synopsis: Now substituting in a corporate league game, Sena and Shin finally get the rematch they've been wanting for so long. However, Shin is disappointed as Sena refuses to use the Devil Bat Ghost due to his previous orders from Hiruma. The Samurais are losing, as the line cannot withstand Ootawara.

title: The Ghost is Off Limits?!
synopsis: Hiruma forbids Sena to use the Devil Bat Ghost until a real game in order to keep it a secret weapon. Meanwhile Shin and Ootawara from Oujou have begun practicing in a corporation league, the Shuuei Elephants, to better hone their skills.

title: Ah ha ha! My Debut!
synopsis: Taki must pass the entrance exam to be able to play for Deimon. Suzuna tells them Taki has failed to be accepted to every single school with American football in Japan except Deimon. But Taki fails again, and Suzana leaves in frustration. As it turns out, Taki can answer the question --only if it is somehow related to American Football.

title: The Legendary 60-Yard Magnum!
synopsis: Monta and Sena are reluctant to recruit the legendary kicker "60 yard Magnum" Musashi back onto the team.

title: The Devil Bat Ghost!
synopsis: Chameleon Habashira Rui gives Sena a lift to the stadium on his motorcycle. In the game, Amino decides to target Monta and tackle him on offense and defense. Amino scores another touchdown and Ishimaru and Monta both score touchdowns for Deimon.

title: The Ace's Missing?!
synopsis: Deimon are up against Amino, a school where they use medical science to increase their muscles. Sena follows Taki onto the wrong bus and ends in Nagano. Meanwhile Deimon, without their ace, must defeat Amino.

title: The Night Before the Game!
synopsis: Kurita and the other Devil Bats learn that one loss means their entire dream will end. Once he gets home, Kurita goes into hiding, not wanting to be the cause of the Devil Bats' failure. Can the others convince him to come out?

title: The Road to the Christmas Bowl!
synopsis: While hiding from a group of television interviewers, Suzuna questions why Sena doesn't tell Mamori who he is. This leads to a quick review of the previous 38 episodes. Sena tells Suzuna that he will tell Mamori his identity when he defeats his ultimate rival, Shin Seijuuro.

title: The New Starting Lineup?!
synopsis: The Deimon Devil Bats have returned home. Hiruma must decide on the regular players. Everyone but Yukimitsu is chosen. Yukimitsu will continue to be a bench player.

title: The Distant Peak
synopsis: The Devil Bats return to Japan, but Hiruma informs them that Oujo lost to Shinryuuji. Speaking of Oujo, Sakuraba reaches a breaking point and seriously considers his future as a football player.

title: The Final Trial!
synopsis: The Devil Bats truck gets stuck in a pothole; with one final push together as a team, Deimon overcomes the last obstacle. Arriving in Las Vegas, on the pirate boat outside Treasure Island, Doburoku confronts Sena to see if the ghost move is mastered.

title: A Solitary Death March!
synopsis: Yukimitsu collapses during the run. If he does not complete the run, he will be dropped from the team.

title: Signs of a Ghost!
synopsis: Sena applies all the training from the death march in the match. When he scores the winning goal, Sena's last opponent declares that he saw a ghost beside Sena as he ran. Suzuna's brother didn't make the team, and so Sena asks him to become a member of the Deimon Devil Bats.

title: OH! My Sister!
synopsis: Sena accidentally kicks the rock into a motorcycle gang. Knowing that he will have to run the whole Death March again if he loses it, he runs after them and gets separated from the rest of the team.

title: Quitters?
synopsis: The training and the heat intensify as the team treks across Texas, but when the situation continues to get rougher, it could lead to one or two people trying to quit altogether. Is this the end of the Devil Bats' training?

title: Minds Made Up!
synopsis: The death march training begins. Monta and Yukimitsu must run routes while Hiruma shoots them. The defensive linemen must push a truck. Sena has to kick a rock across the whole 2000 km. Shin is hiking on Mt. Fuji every day. Panther challenges Shin.

title: At the Gates of Hell!
synopsis: The Devil Bats are resting at the Wild Gunmen ranch. The coach has agreed to train them. Hiruma mentions that Deimon does not allow extracurricular activities after the third year, so it's his and Kurita's last chance for the Christmas Bowl.

title: Ultimate Combo! The Devil Gunmen!
synopsis: Hiruma orders the members of Devil Bats to the beach. They come across the Seibu Wild Gunmen's coach and Kid. They form a five-man team that will compete in a beach football game for the prize of Texas beef and $1000.

title: American Football Downtown!
synopsis: When Sena and Monta get lost in America, they end up at a football field where Panther learned to play. A player's wife goes into labor. The doctor is out fishing, so Sena needs to get him before it’s too late.

title: Take Back Cerberus!
synopsis: Hiruma drags his team out of Japan to Houston for a boot camp. On the airplane, a little girl mistakes Cerberus for her stuffed toy and lures him into a suitcase with beef jerky. Sena and the others have to find Cerberus before Hiruma finds out.

title: A Real Beast!
synopsis: Trailing 26-21, the NASA Aliens finally unleash Panther and their new Moonsault Formation. Shin watches eagerly as he realizes a new speedster could threaten his reign, but will either team manage to win the wager, and what will happen if both lose?

title: The Caged Black Panther!
synopsis: Trailing 14-6, Deimon has managed to stop the Shuttle Pass and is slowly progressing the ball with the sweep, but Sena wants to embarrass the Aliens and allow Panther on the field. Will Panther finally get his time to shine?

title: Blitz! Japan vs. USA!
synopsis: The NASA Aliens and the Deimon Devil Bats are ready for their game. Un the blitz works, Deimon learns they will be deported from Japan. Can Sena use his speed to stop the tag team duo of Homer and Watts? less

title: The Weightless Man!
synopsis: The American team accepts the game against the Deimon Devil Bats. Sena and a man called Panther each learn how fast the other is. Wanting to go up against each other, they do their best to ensure total victory for their team.

title: A Mysterious Girl Appears!
synopsis: Taki Suzuna has come to Deimon High School to expose Eyeshield 21's true identity for a newspaper article. Suzuna challenges Eyeshield 21 to a race. If Eyeshield wins, she will leave him alone and not reveal his identity.

title: Fly, Devil Bat!
synopsis: Monta is having a difficult time trying to get past the Spinx's cornerback, Kamaguruma. Every time Monta goes to catch the football, he is met with a "chariot bump".

title: The Sphinx's Secret Weapon!
synopsis: The game between the Deimon Devil Bats and the Taiyou Sphinx continues. The Devil Bats are gaining points as they begin to outsmart the Sphinx's famous Pyramid Line. The first half ends, and Deimon is only one point behind in the score.

title: The Lower-class Laughs at its Challengers!
synopsis: The Devil Bats turn up at the Taiyou High School to play the Taiyou Sphinx when the Sphinx's quarterback says that his team will totally destroy the Devil Bats in only 12 plays.

title: A Slacker's Pride!
synopsis: After another futile practice, the WTF trio decide to quit the team. After hearing some of the Taiyou Sphinx players make fun of them, they challenge them to a fight, but are brutally defeated.

title: The Kid and Iron Horse!
synopsis: Hiruma tries yet another insane method of training the team, while Monta learns the importance of passing routes when the team sees Ojo nearly defeated in the spring tournament final.

title: Farewell, Kurita?!
synopsis: Kurita becomes wrongly accused of a crime. In order to keep the Deimon Football Team from getting kicked out of the tournament for the Christmas Bowl, he withdraws from the team. Sena and the others will have to find a way to prove his innocence.

title: Find Eyeshield!
synopsis: Realizing that Sena's stamina for running is under-developed, Hiruma develops an amusing way to help him work on it. Meanwhile, Mamori begins to suspect that Sena is really Eyeshield-21 and sets out to prove it.

title: The Scorching HELL TOWER!
synopsis: Recruiting new players for the team has been a snap since their win over Zokugaku, but Hiruma devises a test to separate the men from the boys.

title: The Terror of the Chameleon!
synopsis: Realizing that Habashira's not nearly as scary as Shin can be, Sena leaves him and the Zokugaku Chameleons in his dust.

title: Max Catch!
synopsis: The big game with Zokugaku starts with Raimon's debut as the new wide receiver. Realizing that Deimon now has two weapons, Habashira targets Sena/Eyeshield 21, who is still frightened of him.

title: Oath Under the Setting Sun!
synopsis: While running errands for Hiruma, Sena runs into Shin, who team up to stop two thieves trying to steal from the Devil Bats.

title: A Hero's Qualifications!
synopsis: Sena, feeling guilty, goes to see Sakuraba in the hospital. Seeing how despondent Sakuraba is, Sena challenges him to be the hero he truly is.

title: The Catching Master!
synopsis: The team needs a receiver and a catcher. They want Raimon to try out, but he is already trying out for baseball.

title: Never Quit!
synopsis: Even though they lost the game, Sena is happy because he outscored Shin.

title: Fighting to Win!
synopsis: Hiruma is thinking about leaving the game early but changes his mind once he hears how badly Sena wants to win this game.

title: The Pierce of the Spear Tackle!
synopsis: Since Sena is a great runner, the Oyjo coach lets Shin play.

title: Half-Second Bodyguards!
synopsis: Sena thinks about quitting because he does not want to play the White Knights. Kurita reminds him that he has guards around him so things will be alright.

title: What I Hold In My Hands!
synopsis: Sena starts work outs with the team.

title: Blaze a Path Down the Field!
synopsis: One of the running backs has been hurt, so Sena is sent into the game as his replacement.

title: Let's Play Football!
synopsis: Even though Sena does not know anything about football, he decides to join the team.

title: The Man With the Lightspeed Legs!
synopsis: Today is Sena's first day of school, and he has to decide if he is going to join the football team.

title: Clash of the Aces! Ace of Games versus Ace of Study!
synopsis: Yuga meets Subaru, a brilliant but standoffish schoolmate known as the Ace of Study. At Ranma's suggestion, Yuga and Subaru face off in a friendly Buddyfight.

title: Friendship Battle! Yuga versus Ranma!
synopsis: Garga adjusts to life in the human world. Yuga begins to feels guilty about getting a Buddy before his friend Ranma, just as Ranma challenges him to a Buddyfight with Garga as the prize.

title: Deity of Combat! Gargantua Dragon!
synopsis: Yuga and his best friend Ranma spend their days trying to become the next viral video stars. But when Yuga finds a mysterious card in his room, he's drawn into the world of Buddyfight, where his very own Buddy monster is waiting for him.

title: See You Again! Mighty Sun Fighter Forever!
synopsis: Gao Mikado's final Buddyfight with Tasuku Ryuenji comes to an end, with several unexpected twists and turns. Gao's thoughts turn to the future as he prepares to move to America.

title: Showdown of Destiny! Gao Mikado versus Tasuku Ryuenji!
synopsis: Gao's friends prepare for his impending departure as Gao faces Tasuku in the final match of the GGG Cup.

title: Dauntless! Purgatory Knight versus Supreme Dragon Deity of Creations!
synopsis: Gao and his friends are mystified when Kyoya Gaen asks Tasuku to face him as the Purgatory Knight for the second Semi-Final round of the GGG Cup.

title: Burn Brightly, Noboru! A Tear-Soaked Serious Buddyfight!
synopsis: Gao's friends begin to suspect that there's more to the GGG Cup Tournament than meets the eye. Noboru confronts Gao about his secretive behavior during their semi-final match.

title: Paruko's a Baby? Gao's First Commentary!
synopsis: When an accident transforms Paruko into a baby, it's up to Gao to provide commentary on the Buddyfight match between Gaito and Tasuku. Guru Bunbuku and Gao's buddies are in a race against time to find the cure.

title: Final Boss All-out Attack! Who's the Bad Guy?
synopsis: The GGG Cup continues as Noboru faces Ikazuchi and his Hundred Demons and Kyoya Gaen and Wisdom pit their unique flag cards against each other. Meanwhile, Guru Bunbuku has a prophetic dream warning of villainy.

title: Gao versus Kanata! Batzz, Drum and Bal, United!
synopsis: Gao faces Kanata in the first match of the GGG Cup tournament. Guru Bunbuku reveals the next special guest, and Noboru shows off his new power.

title: The GGG Cup Opens! All-Star, Assemble!
synopsis: Guru Bunbuku organizes an amazing Buddyfight tournament for Gao, featuring familiar faces and a whole bunch of surprises. Gao reunites with his first Buddy, Drum.

title: Win, Gao! The Last Buddyfight!
synopsis: Gao and Wisdom pull out all the stops as they battle over the fate of the parallel worlds. New cards and new abilities are revealed as the Buddyfight comes to a thrilling conclusion.

title: Final Battle! Gao versus Wisdom!
synopsis: Gao and his friends follow Wisdom to the former site of the Mirage Shrine, where Gao challenges Wisdom to a Buddyfight match. It's all-out war between the Chaos monsters and Thunder Empire!

title: Final Plan Activated! New World Chaos!
synopsis: Kiri leads a team of heroes trying to slow down the Chaosification of the remaining worlds. Meanwhile, Gao and his friends search for Chibi Panda, and Kanata faces Sakate in a Buddyfight.

title: Wisdom's Ambition! The Terrifying Upgrade Declaration!
synopsis: As monsters rampage throughout Cho-Tokyo, Wisdom announces his plans to upgrade the world through Chaosification of all monsters. Keisetsu offers to lead Gao and company to Wisdom, but Brutal of the Martial Arts stands in their way.

title: Gao versus Keisetsu! Return of the Chaos Three!
synopsis: Wisdom instructs the Chaos Three to destroy Gao and Batzz. Armed with a powerful new card, Keisetsu challenges Gao to a Buddyfight.

title: The Power that Surpasses Deities! The Ultimate Chaos!
synopsis: Guru Bunbuku reveals Geargod's secret origins. Grimoire and Wisdom face off in a Buddyfight, with the future of the Wisdom clan at stake.

title: Shine Bright! Shining Dragoner, Jackknife!
synopsis: Tasuku and Gao attempt to find and capture Geargod before Wisdom can use his hacking skills to take over its mind. Grimoire stands in Tasuku's way, while Gao has his hands full explaining the nature of true Buddies to Geargod.

title: Robo of Urban Legends? Hanako WC Appears!
synopsis: Batzz is eager to show off his new evolved form in a Buddyfight, but first Gao and his friends must deal with Hanako, a monster who has returned to haunt the boys' bathroom.

title: Behold! This is Batzz's Overthrow!
synopsis: CHAOS Gao and Geargod 099 begin chaosifying the monsters of Dragon World. Gao and Batzz challenge them to a Buddyfight.

title: Turbulent Warlord Dragon! Barlbatzz Dragoroyale!
synopsis: Gao and Chibi Panda search for Batzz. Batzz returns to Dragon World and asks Saint Glory Sword Dragon to seal him away in the same shrine where Gao first found him.

title: Buddy Breakup! Farewell, Batzz!
synopsis: Gao and Chibi Panda notice Batzz acting strangely. Meanwhile, Ku and Satsuki investigate Grimoire's activities. Grimoire reveals a surprising new side to himself and challenges Ku to a Buddyfight.

title: Gao versus CHAOS Gao! Autodeity Formation Complete!
synopsis: Gao and Batzz struggle against CHAOS Gao's Autodeity Army, which is made up of evil duplicates of the Thunder Empire cards. Batzz begins to have doubts about his own abilities.

title: A New Buddy! The Clockwork Mighty Sun Fighter!!
synopsis: Zanya reveals the results of his investigation into the Chaos Company. Geargod 099 sends a duplicate of Gao to infiltrate his home and school, resulting in an attack on Student Council President Shido. Shido challenges Gao to a Buddyfight.

title: Thunder Empire of Friendship! Geargod Rebels?!
synopsis: When Gao struggles to find a way to defeat Wisdom, Kiri tries to reignite his passion for Buddyfight by challenging him to a match. Meanwhile, Geargod and Wisdom clash over their attitudes towards Buddyfight.

title: Grasp it! The Power Beyond Overturn!!
synopsis: Gao and his friends visit Guru Bunbuku, hoping for a training session. Keisetsu faces Wisdom in a Buddyfight that tests not only Geargod 099, but also Keisetsu's relationship with Wisdom.

title: Geargod's Overkill! Gao in Dire Straits!
synopsis: Gao faces Wisdom in a Buddyfight, but things take an unexpected turn when Geargod ver. 099's Overkill is unleashed. Gao and his friends must flee when Geargod runs wild.

title: CHAOS Transcendant! Geargod Ver. 099!
synopsis: Gao tries to understand Wisdom's motivations, but they are unable to overcome their philosophical differences. The only way to settle the issue: a Buddyfight pitting their unique Flags against each other.

title: Will it reach Keisetsu? Kanata's new Impact Shot!
synopsis: Gao and his friends pursue Sakate from Grimoire Park to the Chaos Control Company HQ. Kanata must defeat Keisetsu to gain an audience with Wisdom.

title: Gaito versus Artificial Intelligence! Explosion of the Mini Geargods!
synopsis: Wisdom holds a press conference and announces his plans for Grimoire Park. An enraged Gaito storms into the park and is forced to battle the Mini Geargods.

title: The Power of Overturn! Heavenly Crystal Dragon, Aldo Athora!
synopsis: Kanata's past with Keisetsu is revealed. Grimoire hires a mercenary Buddyfighter to represent Grimoire Park. Meanwhile, monsters all over Cho-Tokyo begin to act strangely.

title: The Demonic Sword Draws Near! Keisetsu's Overkill!
synopsis: Gao and his friends infiltrate Grimoire Park in an attempt to find Wisdom. Keisetsu challenges Kanata to a Buddyfight.

title: Perfectly Ignored Fighter! Slide Kidoku!
synopsis: Gao is challenged by a mysterious Buddyfighter who wants to become Wisdom's right hand man.

title: Infinite Slashes! Demonic Descent Sword of the King, Laevateinn!!
synopsis: Gao and Batzz are invited to a ceremonial fight at the newly open Grimoire Park. Kanata and Zanya are suspicious of Keisetsu and investigate.

title: Invasion of Papa Panda! Farewell, Chibi Panda!
synopsis: Chibi Panda's father is determined to take him back to Dragon World. As the Mikado family tries to convince Papa Panda to let his son stay, Gao and Batzz must decide what is truly best for their friend.

title: Overturn versus Overkill! Unleash the X Tempest Ulti-Buster!
synopsis: Gao and Sakate have a Buddyfight over the fate of the Thunder Emperor's Fangs card.

title: Assemble! Thunder Empire!
synopsis: Gao and Batzz create a new flag card. Chibi Panda decides that Gao needs to get stronger, as Thunder Empire monsters respond to Batzz's call to arms. Wisdom's second-in-command, Grimoire, orders Sakate to destroy the new flag card.

title: Guru vs. Wisdom! The Shocking Geargod VIII!
synopsis: Gao and his friends wander through the maze-like forest as they try to stop Sakate and Keisetsu. Wisdom appears before Guru Bunbuku and tries to destroy the Mirage Card. A Buddyfight ensues.

title: Birth! Overturn Black Death Dragon Rises!
synopsis: Abygale trains desperately in order to evolve further and gain the powers of Overturn.

title: Overkill! Brutal of the Martial Arts!
synopsis: Kiri encounters Brutal while investigating the mysterious disappearance of monsters from various worlds. When Kiri rescues some Chaos Monster cards from Brutal's clutches, Brutal challenges him to a Buddyfight and shows his true colors.

title: Batzz's Overturn! Thunder Empire Formation Complete!
synopsis: Gao and friends are worried about Kanata's strange behavior. Chibi Panda wants to become stronger to protect Gao and Batzz. Guru Bunbuku tries to solve both problems through a Buddyfight with Gao.

title: Gao and Batzz! The Starry Sky Promise!
synopsis: As the training camp winds down, Guru Bunbuku reveals the truth about Batzz's past.

title: Tag Match! Kanata and Athora's Crossed Wires!
synopsis: Zanya and Tetsuya join the training camp. While Kanata tries to puzzle out the meaning of Guru Bunbuku's advice, Athora worries about their future as Buddies.

title: Grim Reaper vs. Death Sentence! The Third Turn of Destiny!
synopsis: Guru Bunbuku gives advice to Gao's friends. As they puzzle over the meaning of this words, Gaito becomes determined to face Kiri in a Buddyfight.

title: Training Camp Begins! The X Tempest Buster Revives!
synopsis: Gao and his friends start an intensive week-long training session at Master Bunbuku's training camp. En route to the camp, mysterious monsters kidnap Master Bunbuku and the others. Gao must overcome his inability to use the X Tempest Buster.

title: Paradise? Underworld? Master Bunbuku and Giant Tanuki!
synopsis: Gao reunites with Master Bunbuku, the mysterious old man who helped him reverse his dragonification. Suzumi senses that there's more to this stranger than meets the eye.

title: Time Limit! The Day that Gao Stops Existing!
synopsis: Batzz has until sunset to help people and cure Gao's dragonification. As Gao begins to fade out of existence, Baku discovers that the X Tempest Buster card has gone missing, leading to a desperate search.

title: Gao in Tasuku! A Two-in-One X Tempest Buster!
synopsis: Gao learns that he can possess humans in his current ghost-like form. When Shido grows jealous of Kanata and Gaito's popularity and concocts a plan, only Gao and his friends can stop him.

title: Terror from the Toilet! Aibo Academy is Full of Ghosts!
synopsis: A mysterious old man holds the secret to restoring Gao. Gao and his friends investigate a series of spooky events plaguing Aibo Academy.

title: After the Raging Battle...Gao Perishes!
synopsis: Gao continues his gruelling battle against Wisdom. Tasuku and Ku face off against Brutal and Keisetsu, two members of the Chaos Three, Wisdom's elite team of Buddyfighters.

title: Wisdom's Terrifying Conspiracy! Rage, Batzz!
synopsis: Wisdom invites Batzz to join him in world domination as Gao faces him in a Buddyfight. Meanwhile, Gaito corners Sakate and tries to get the truth out of him.

title: Ruler of Chaos! Geargod VII!
synopsis: As Gao and his friends race to find Batzz, Kanata faces Wisdom and his new Flag card, the Chaos.

title: The Desperate Battle Concludes! The Mirage Card Manifests!
synopsis: The final match of the World Buddy Masters continues, as Gao deals damage to Kanata and defends his life points. When Kanata uses his new card to survive a winning blow, the tournament's outcome hinges on his final turn.

title: Final Round! Who is the World Number One?
synopsis: Gao and Kanata face off in the final round of the World Buddy Masters. Baku has prepared a special deck to counter the No-Damage Fighter, but Kanata has some unexpected tricks up his sleeve.

title: Gaito versus Kanata! Impact Shoot of Destiny!
synopsis: Gao and Batzz have a fight and Gao takes drastic measures to keep Batzz in line. Gaito and Kanata are both determined to be the one who will face Gao in the final round, but Kanata finds his confidence wavering.

title: Terrifying Ambush! Batzz's Back Against the Wall!
synopsis: Gao and his friends try to come up with a strategy to defeat Sakate's powerful Ambush technique. Zanya uncovers the truth about Sakate and his boss. Meanwhile, Sakate is back to his old tricks, playing mind games and trying to recruit Batzz.

title: Gaito is...? Kaido is...? The Death Sentence Approaches!
synopsis: Batzz quits the tournament, but Dai Kaido does his best to convince him to stay. Gaito decides to use a mysterious new Impact in his next match.

title: Strongest Battleship Satsuki Launches! Attack Target: Batzz!
synopsis: Gao's next opponent is Kuu Teito, a Buddy Police trainee representing Hero World. Ku is determined to prove that her Buddy, Satsuki, is the strongest monster of all.

title: Become a Tiger! Noboru's Final Fight!
synopsis: Noboru meets his next opponent, a young boy who claims to be Noboru's biggest fan. Batzz suspects that there is more to Sakate than meets the eye.

title: The World Buddy Masters Begins!
synopsis: The World Buddy Masters tournament begins, with ten worlds represented by ten skilled Buddyfighters. Gao's first match is against Magic World representative Tetsuya, but his real challenge is learning to deal with Batzz's rebellious streak.

title: No-Damage Fighter, Kanata Ozora!
synopsis: Gao discovers that soccer star Kanata is also a Buddyfight genius who has never lost a life point. Tasuku tries to convince Kanata to represent Star Dragon World in the World Buddy Masters, but Kanata is no longer interested in Buddyfight.

title: Batzz Goes to Earth! Major Panic in Cho-Tokyo!
synopsis: To Chibi Panda and Gao's dismay, Batzz shows no interest in the World Buddy Masters. Worse still, his rampages cause city-wide blackouts. Chibi Panda learns the rules of Buddyfight, while Gaito and Abygale challenge Gao and Batzz to a match.

title: The Most Powerful Demon Lord Dragon! His Name is Batzz!
synopsis: A mysterious new dragon appears before Gao, inviting him to participate in a Buddyfight tournament that pits the parallel worlds against each other. Gao and his friends travel to Dragon World to find a Buddy that will be his partner.

title: Bye-bye! Eternal Farewell to Bal!
synopsis: As Tasuku and Gao explore the history of Bal's battles with Azi Dahaka, Bal has visions of the future. Gao's friends organize a victory celebration that quickly becomes a Buddyfight tournament.

title: Climax! Eternal Bal Blaster!
synopsis: Dragons all over the world begin to suffer as Kyoya puts his plan into motion. Gao's friends attempt to control the chaos, while Gao and Bal face off against Kyoya in a final battle for the future.

title: Fight! Buddy Champion Deciding Round!
synopsis: Gao and Bal head to Los Angeles to face Kyoya Gaen in the deciding round of the WBC Cup. Kyoya reveals his secret agenda to change the world using his new Dragon Drei card.

title: Secret! The True Nature of Project Triple D!
synopsis: Gao trains hard with Tasuku and Gaito in preparation for the Buddy Champion Deciding Round, while Baku, Kuguru and Noboru work on strategy.

title: Massive Shock! Dragon Drei's Amazing Power!
