synopsis: The world looks on as Paruko delivers a live broadcast of a historic battle. Kyoya challenges Tasuku and Gaito to a two-on-one Buddyfight, with the newly-completed Dragon Drei card as the stakes.

title: Good luck! Wolf's Final Fight!
synopsis: Kyoya orders Wolf to challenge Gao to a Buddyfight. Gao tries to uncover the truth behind why Rouga Aragami abandoned his name and went back to doing Kyoya's bidding.

title: Seriously Hot! Gemclone's Heart!
synopsis: In order to enter Gaen Tower, Gaito must battle J Genesis. J Genesis' Buddy, Origin Breaker, begs Gaito and Abygale to save his father. Gao continues to struggle with his homework.

title: Revenge! Doctor Gara Strikes Back!
synopsis: Gao struggles to balance his homework with his preparations for the Buddy Champion Deciding Round. Tasuku faces off against Doctor Gara in the hopes of evolving his Dragon Force.

title: Colliding Forces! Tasuku Ryuenji vs. Gaito Kurouzu?!
synopsis: Gao and Bal are ready to train, but first they have to deal with homework. Gaito and Abygale want to confront Kyoya, but Tasuku and Jack argue that they should leave it to the Buddy Police. A Buddyfight ensues.

title: Seriously?! A Threatening 20000 Defense!
synopsis: Kiri returns from Dungeon World, hoping to prevent the creation of Dragon Drei. Before he has a chance to put his plan into action, Gao invites Kiri to a friendly Buddyfight.

title: Whoa! Super Sun Dragon Vs. Black Sky Sun Dragon!
synopsis: Gao Mikado and Kyoya Gaen are in the throes of battle! Noboru and the others search for an old card that Baku says Gao needs in his fight against Kyoya. Pushed to the brink, Gao casts Dragonic Force, a big gamble that could bring great harm to himself!

title: Finally! WBC Cup World Championships Final Match!
synopsis: Gao Mikado and Kyoya Gaen face each other in the final. With a deck of cards expertly prepared by Baku, Gao makes a strong start as Kyoya is pushed into a corner. But then the tables are turned as the ominous specter of Azi Dahaka envelops the stadium.

title: Endless! Black Sky Sun Dragon, Azi Dahaka "Daeva"!
synopsis: Azi Dahaka achieves his final evolution form and flies off in search of his nemesis, Balle Soleil. He encounters Chief of the Sea, Dai Kaido, who tries to protect Gao and Bal by challenging Kyoya and Azi Dahaka to a Buddyfight

title: Pops! Azi Dahaka's End!
synopsis: Gaito reveals the truth about Balle Soleil and the Dragon Force. While Gao and his friends search for the missing Bal, Gaito and Abygale have a final showdown with Kyoya and Azi Dahaka.

title: Ultra-Amazing! Super Sun Dragon, Balle Soleil!
synopsis: Gao and Bal do their best to defeat J Genesis, in hopes of preventing him from selling Origin Breaker to the highest bidder as an instrument of war. Gao, Tasuku, and Gaito's strong awaken an unknown power within Bal!

title: Serious Trouble! Impact Origin Breaker!
synopsis: As Gao and his friends celebrate Gaito and Abygale's reunion, J Genesis unveils his Impact Monster's new form on live TV. Baku suffers a crisis of confidence. Bal makes contact with a mysterious entity who may hold the keys to J Genesis's plans.

title: Last Fight! Farewell, Abygale!
synopsis: Gao and Tasuku help Gaito look for his missing buddy, Abygale. Meanwhile, J Genesis and Devil Destroy Bigmachine plot to keep the two apart. Gaito attempts to deal with a traumatic incident from his past.

title: Revenge! The Tiger Roars Twice!
synopsis: Noboru must defeat Kyoya in the semifinals if he wants to face Gao in the finals. He looks back at the path that has led him here, and struggles to choose between his pride and the promise he made to Gao.

title: For Real? Fake Replica Weapon, Gemclone!
synopsis: As the Buddy Police work to uncover J Genesis's secrets, Tasuku sends Jack on a secret mission. The true nature of J Genesis' buddy Gemclone is revealed during the quarterfinals match.

title: Meow Meow! Meow meow, meow meow!
synopsis: Amigo Takata is forced to concede defeat when his cards go missing. Gao faces a mysterious new opponent and uncovers a previously unknown Buddyfight community.

title: Zetta! Shocking Armored Battle Demon!
synopsis: Abygale asks Gao and Tasuku for advice to help Gaito unlock the power of the Dragon Force. Meanwhile, J Genesis plots to crush Gaito in order to sabotage Kyoya's plans.

title: Wedding! Man Mountain Range, Devil Destroy!
synopsis: When Gao and Bal's next opponent mocks them, Bal is determined to bulk up through training. On the day of the match, Devil Destroy Bigmachine falls in love with Noboru and challenges Gao for his hand in marriage.

title: Scary Trap! Jackknife, Arrested!
synopsis: Jack is accused of attacking a WBC Cup competitor. The punishment for his crime: exile. Gao and Bal look for proof of Jack's innocence while Jack and Tasuku face off against Grim Reaper of Siberia's traps!

title: Here it Comes x3! WBC Cup World Championships!
synopsis: Gao and friends head to Los Angeles for the WBC Cup World Championships! Kyoya makes a surprise appearance as a competitor, as does the mysterious J Genesis. In the first match of the first round, Kyoya unfurls his new flag: the powerful Dragon Zwei.

title: Gao! This is the Dragon Force!
synopsis: Gao tries to help Bal regain his senses while also battling Doctor Gara. Doctor Gara reveals that he can block Final Phase as well as Impact Monsters. As Gao reminds Bal of their promise to become Buddy Champions, he unlocks a new power within himself.

title: Go, Go! Bal's Surging Steady Advance!
synopsis: On the final day of the Japan Tournament, the remaining Buddyfighters race to be the first to reach 100 wins. As Gao closes the distance between himself and top fighter Dai Kaido, Doctor Gara puts his plan into motion.

title: Wow! Bal Saucer Over Rush!
synopsis: An anonymous tip leads Tasuku and Gao to Doctor Gara's lair. Gao and Bal are reunited, but are told that they must withdraw from the tournament un they can prove that Bal is healthy enough to fight. less

title: Hot! Searing Executioners of Destiny!
synopsis: Tasuku continues to search for Bal, while Gao works on reaching 100 wins. Gaito is challenged by a mysterious fighter with a grudge, and a deadly Searing Executioners deck tailor-made to destroy him.

title: Bal! Fire, Galactical Punisher!
synopsis: Tasuku rushes to help Gao search for Bal, but is interrupted by the attention-hungry Ageha Gokuraku, whose Divine Guardians deck proves to be a great challenge.

title: Yikes! 0 Seconds to Detonation!
synopsis: Baku and Kuguru convince Gao that he should focus on winning Buddyfights while they look for the missing Bal. Rouga and Cerberus lend a hand, while Bal fights for his life against Doctor Gara.

title: Grandmother! Enter Tenka Gotsurugi!
synopsis: Gaito's quest to find the ultimate dragon power leads him to a mysterious old woman. She agrees to tell him about the Dragon Force, but only if he defeats her grandson, Tenka Gotsurugi. Tenka accidentally challenges Gao instead.

title: Danger! The Wolf Makes its Move!
synopsis: Rouga and Cerberus save Bal from Doctor Gara's latest attack. Bal gives Cerberus an Impact Monster card as thanks, and Rouga uses it to fight Dai. Gao is eager to face his former upperclassman in a Buddyfight, but Rouga has more than victory on his mind.

title: Here it Comes Again! Terrifying Natural Enemy, Zodiac!
synopsis: Tasuku digs deeper into the mystery of Doctor Gara. Gao and Bal encounter a medical student named Kaeru, who has the same Buddy monster as Gara. Kakeru helps treat Ozon B's sickness and challenges Gao to a Buddyfight.

title: Here it Comes! WBC Cup Japan Tournament!
synopsis: The Japan Tournament begins. The Buddyfighters compete to be the first to reach 100 wins and qualify for the World Championship. Meanwhile, Tasuku fights to protect Bal and uncover Doctor Gara's plans.

title: Full Steam Ahead! To The Japan Representative Invitational Island!
synopsis: As the winners of the Cho-Tokyo Championship head to the Japan Tournament, they take a look back at their adventures so far. Their destination holds many secrets, including the mysterious Dragon Force and a new enemy, Doctor Gara.

title: Shock! Zanya's Retirement Declaration!
synopsis: Zanya gives his little brother Akatsuki his Buddyfight deck, making him fear that Zanya is retiring to focus on his kendo training...or a mysterious new girlfriend. When Blazer Frill's latest plot is foiled, she challenges Zanya to a Buddyfight.

title: Pow! Great Full Bal Lariat!
synopsis: Gao and Dai's battle continues. Genma reveals the true nature of Bal and Gao's intensive training, as Gao pits his new Impact Monster against the seemingly invincible Duel Jaeger.

title: Hooray! Cho-Tokyo Championship Final Festival!
synopsis: Gao prepares for the final fight against Dai by reworking his deck, while Bal asks Genma Todoroki for advice on how to beat Dai's colossal Buddy, Duel Jaeger. Tensions mount as Gao and Dai face off in the final match!

title: It's Here! Duel Jaeger
synopsis: Tasuku and Dai Kaido face off in the second fight of the semi-finals. The story of how Dai met his Buddy is revealed, and Jack's Impact Monster meets its match in Duel Jaeger's evolved form.

title: It's Not Working! Bal Burst Smasher?!
synopsis: Gao struggles to understand Gaito's attitude towards Buddyfight. In their semi-final match, Gao and Gaito pit their Impact Monsters against each other. Can Gao befriend this fearsome opponent?

title: So Huge! Mighty Fighter Showdown!
synopsis: Gao is desperate to see Genma and Dai's Buddyfight in person and sneaks out to see the match, despite Dr. Buer ordering him to stay in bed. It's a literal clash of the titans as Genma and Dai compete to determine who is the strongest fighter.

title: Yikes! An Unexpected Fishy Disaster!
synopsis: Dash Kazakiri is Gao's next opponent...and his biggest fan! When Gao comes down with an incurable illness, Dash takes him to a doctor from Magic World. Gao's sickness gets progressively worse, but he is determined to show Dash the best Buddyfight ever.

title: What? The Stolen Impact Monster!
synopsis: As part of a revenge plot against Tasuku, Wataru sends his Buddy to steal Gaito's Impact Monster card. Bal blames himself and races against the clock to retrieve the card before Wataru and Gaito's Buddyfight begins.

title: So Lovely! Uniform Warrior of Love and Courage, Blazer Frill!
synopsis: Maska Raid and his Buddy, Blazer Frill, plot to win their match against Tasuku through any means necessary. After a series of mishaps, Blazer Frill convinces Bal to help her win.

title: It's Here! WBC Cup Cho-Tokyo Championship!
synopsis: The WBC Cup begins, and Gao and his rivals fight to become the Best 8 of Cho-Tokyo. Bal becomes convinced that the only way to win is to increase one's luck. As Noboru battles Gaito, he's forced to face some hard truths about destiny and luck.

title: Impressive! Abygale versus Azi Dahaka!
synopsis: Gao and his friends try to help a mysterious cat find Gaito. Their search leads them to a Buddyfight between Gaito and Kyoya Gaen. Azi Dahaka and Abygale's past is revealed, as Kyoya goads Gaito into showing him the power of his Impact Monster.

title: So Mean! Demon Coach Asmodai!
synopsis: Bal looks for a coach to help him train hard for the WBC Cup. Tetsuya's Buddy Demon Lord Asmodai takes Bal under his wing and challenges him physically and mentally, culminating in a Buddyfight with Bal and Gao's partnership at stake.

title: Cool! Jack's Impact Monster!
synopsis: Bal is given special permission to attend classes. A jealous student tries to get him in trouble by framing him for a crime. Jack and Tasuku work together to clear Bal's name... by challenging the villain to a Buddyfight!

title: Scary! Gaito's Impact Monster!
synopsis: When Gao forgets an important promise, Bal quits being his Buddy Monster. A mysterious dragon named Abygale takes the runaway Bal under his wing, but Gao suspects that Abygale's buddy Gaito has been challenging kids to Buddyfight and taking their cards.

title: Amazing! A Sure-fire Way to win Buddyfight!
synopsis: Bal is eager to play Buddyfight, but is frustrated when everyone points out that he's not playing by the rules. Jackknife Dragon offers to teach him a sure-fire way to win without getting complaints. Meanwhile, Tasuku transfers to Aibo Academy.

title: Uh-oh! An Impact Monster is Born!
synopsis: Gao must protect his new Buddy monster from Kyoya Gaen, who claims this newly-discovered monster could be a threat. Kyoya challenges Gao to a Buddyfight, giving him  than a day to unlock the secrets of the Sun Dragons and the new Impact Monsters. less

title: Beyond the Limit! Unparalleled Arts, Omni Lord ∞ Burst!
synopsis: The battle against Yamigedo reaches its climax as Gao faces his greatest challenge yet. Hyakugan Yamigedo seems to be indestructible, but Gao still has a secret weapon: the card that his one-time foe, Ikazuchi, has given him.

title: Save the World! A Hundred Despairs!
synopsis: Hyakugan Yamigedo's powerful abilities prove to be too much for Ikazuchi. As all seems lost, Tasuku receives aid from an unexpected ally: Kyoya and Suzaku. Gao is brought to the distant future to battle Hyakugan Yamigedo over the fate of humanity.

title: The Biggest! The Baddest! The Strongest! Hyakugan Yamigedo!
synopsis: Kyoya and Sophia are unable to control Yamigedo. As Yamigedo evolves into a final form, Ikazuchi and Tasuku team up to defeat the monster and save everyone. Yamigedo teleports to the future, and faces Ikazuchi in a battle for the world.

title: Where the Cards Went! Shido's Death Symphony of Rage!
synopsis: Tasuku and Gao confront Suzaku over his betrayal, while Sophia collects the Inverse Omni Lord cards. Shido steals one of the cards, and Sophia manipulates him into battling Gratos with the card as the stakes. Meanwhile, Kyoya puts his plan into motion.

title: Captain Answer Overlord's Rebellion!
synopsis: Shigamine surprises everyone by teaming up with Kazane to battle Kemura and an evil Captain Answer. Kazane struggles with her guilt, while Shigamine learns what it truly means to be a hero. Tasuku uncovers the truth about Suzaku, Sophia, and Kyoya Gaen.

title: Fire Lord Showdown! Burn Nova versus Venom Nova!
synopsis: Ban and Genma face off in a manly showdown. Neginoyama is cornered by Shigamine, who reveals the surprising truth about Hero World and the ninth Omni Lord. Kazane and Kemura's fight takes a disastrous turn, spurring Captain Answer into action.

title: Odd Couples! Kiri and Rouga versus Noboru and Davide!
synopsis: Kiri and Rouga's opposing personalities lead to friction. Still bitter over his defeat at Kiri's hands, Davide suggests a tag match. Much to Noboru's annoyance, Kiri's evil double, Dark Miserea joins the fight and taunts Kiri, hoping to break his heart.

title: Wh-Wh-What's this? Gao vs. Okada?
synopsis: Gao briefly reunites with Ikazuchi before his next challenge: a Buddyfight against professional wrestling champion Kazuchika Okada. The Fifth Omni Cavalry Dragons struggle as they face Crazed Tenbu. Can they really fight their Lord Tenbu's double?

title: Tag Match? Zanya and Tetsuya versus Jin and Suzuha!
synopsis: Zanya and Tetsuya face the Inverse Fiend Horde in their first ever tag match, but Zanya isn't surethat his partner's up to the task. Faced with twice the number of Inverse Omni Lords, he soon learnsthat team work is the key to victory.

title: Jack vs. Inverse Omni Lord!
synopsis: Jack and Tasuku face their first Inverse Fiend opponent, Sophia. Knowing that the loser of the battle will be turned to stone, Jack is gripped by the fear of losing Tasuku. Meanwhile, Sophia's loyalty to Kyoya forces Yamigedo to take over her body.

title: The Day the Earth Turned to Stone!
synopsis: Yamigedo's cocoon continues to spread strange threads that petrify all that they touch. When the Defense Forces and Buddy Police are unable to deal with this menace, the Omni Lords and their buddies attempt an underground infiltration of Yamigedo's lair.

title: Super Final Battle! Cho-Shibuya Destroyed!
synopsis: Ikazuchi tries to pacify O-Yamigedo while the Omni Lords seal the creature. Although Gratos is gone, O-Yamigedo absorbs his powers and begins to control the Inverse Fiends, as well as Ikazuchi. Gao engages in a desperate Buddyfight to save him.

title: Final Battle! Specter of Darkness Wasteland, O-Yamigedo!
synopsis: Trapped inside O-Yamigedo as he hurtles towards Earth, the Omni Lords battle their clones, the evil Inverse Omni Lords. On Earth, humanity takes shelter as Ikazuchi faces off against Gratos in a Buddyfight to prove who is worthy of commanding the monster.

title: Omni Lords Assemble! Seal Yamigedo!
synopsis: The eight Omni Lords are ready to face Yamigedo. They travel to the Moon to seal him, but are interrupted by the eight Inverse Omni Lords. As Yamigedo bursts out of his cocoon and attacks, Gratos's conquest of the Earth begins.

title: Ikazuchi's Return! Mikado Family Under Attack!!
synopsis: Gao's mom returns from America and is attacked by Ikazuchi, who wants a rematch with Gao. Gratos finds a new use for Ikazuchi and sends Noboru to capture him. As Gao and Noboru face off in a Buddyfight, the truth about Ikazuchi's tragic past is revealed.

title: Rouga vs. Eighth Omni Deity Lord, Grangadez!
synopsis: Gratos tests Sophia's loyalty by ordering her to capture Grangadez. Her incomplete summoning of Grangadez causes the Omni Lord to go on a rampage. When Kiri finds himself affected by Grangadez's rage, Rouga is forced to face both Omni Lords in combat.

title: Star of Hope! Radiant Guardian, Jackknife “Aster!!”
synopsis: Trapped in a dark future created by Variable Cord's selfish actions, Tasuku must find a way to heal Jack and time-travel home. Meanwhile, Sophia finds herself captured by the future version of Gratos. Can Tasuku find hope and save the future?

title: Save Jack! Tasuku Goes to the Future of Despair!
synopsis: Tasuku is filled with hope when Paruko receives a transmission from Jack, last seen travelling to the future Star Dragon World. Sophia claims she can help Tasuku travel to the future and reunite with his Buddy. How far will Tasuku go to rescue Jack?

title: Drum Kidnapped! Gao vs. Shigamine!
synopsis: Light Rim Alliot, the last of the Fifth Omni Cavalry Dragons, thinks Drum's just riding on his father's coattails. But when Shigamine kidnaps Drum and tries to take his Omni Lord emblem, everyone learns something about honor and self-worth.

title: Miserea's First Battle! Friendship Through the Ages!
synopsis: Shido heads to Cho-Hodaka to capture an Omni Lord, accompanied by the villainous Davide. Meanwhile, Kiri struggles to deal with the painful burden of his sad memories. He faces his old nemesis, hoping for closure and inner peace.

title: Tetsuya Weeps!The Demon Lord vanishes in the Void!
synopsis: Rucy and Tetsuya join Asmodai in his desperate attempt to take back the part of him that Yamigedo devoured. But nobody is prepared for what they see in the belly of the beast. Meanwhile, Tiger continues his relent battles against top Buddyfighters. less

title: Tetsuya Speechless! The Demon Lord's Betrayal
synopsis: Tetsuya's joy at meeting his favorite rock band fades when the lead singer, Rucy, insults Asmodai　and calls him a traitor. As Rucy and Asmodai's shared past comes to light and Asmodai prepares to　leave this world, Tetsuya's faith in Asmodai is tested.

title: Legend of the Mist
synopsis: While investigating some Omni Lord sightings, Gao encounters some familiar faces. But complications arise when Shido and Sophia arrive, seeking to capture the Omni Lord for themselves. In all the chaos, Kiri is forced to face a secret from his past.

title: Suzuha Blushes! A Love Letter from Tiger!!
synopsis: Zanya is shocked to hear that Jin is missing after receiving a mysterious summons. Suzuha receives a letter from the same sender, who reveals himself to be Noboru and challenges her to a Buddyfight. The changes in Noboru surprise friend and foe alike.

title: Luminize! Super Dragon Fifth Omni Formation!!
synopsis: Gao is frustrated by Count Dawn's refusal to rescue Noboru before the Omni Lords are all assembled. Meanwhile, the Fifth Omni Cavalry Dragons won't accept Drum as their leader. Can Gao convince them to join in a final assault on Ikazuchi's secret lair?

title: Farewell Buddyfight!
synopsis: Crippled by his inability to use Dragon World Decks, Gao quits Buddyfight, the Buddy Police, and bids farewell to Drum, giving his Buddy to Tasuku. But when Yamigedo and Ikazuchi beeline for Gao’s pad to devour him, will he have a change of heart?

title: Descent of the Fire Lord! Burn Nova Revived!
synopsis: Count Dawn lifts Drum’s leave to find out if Dragon Kid Ricky is really an Omni Lord. But before he can get an answer to this long-kept secret, the Hundred Demons Hunter is challenged to a Buddyfight in the darkness barrier. Will he go from zero to hero?

title: A Battle of Heroes!
synopsis: The mysterious Hero World fighter Shigamine steals an Omni Lord’s emblem, but when Zanya traps him in a Buddy Police Barrier Gao shows up to save the day. Will he be able to rise to the occasion, or will his emotional pain set him back even further?

title: Unorthodox Arts Shoraiabare Kandaichi!
synopsis: Tasuku and the Buddy Police are in hot pursuit of Sophia Sakharov. A hungry, and weakening Ikazuchi challenges Gao to a Buddyfight. But unable to use his Dragon World Deck, he must stand by and watch another friend suffer a punishing fate in his place.

title: Farewell Star Guardian Jackknife!
synopsis: As Tasuku prepares for his showdown with Suzaku Kenran, Jack falls ill and no one knows why! The enigmatic leader of Buddyfight Club reveals some startling surprises, and offers Tasuku an ultimatum. How will the Buddy Cop handle such a moral dilemma?

title: Tragic Earth Lord! A Requiem for Daichi!
synopsis: Losing Tenbu has had a severe effect on Gao, and he can’t use Dragon World decks until he deals with it. Count Dawn experiences some emotional turmoil of his own. When long repressed pain from the loss of a friend resurfaces, he must face it head on.

title: Ghoul Deity Combine! Gojinmaru!
synopsis: Zanya’s Omni Lord search takes him on an unexpected journey of self-growth, where he is confronted with the reality of his quest and position as a Buddy Police officer. Gao has a startling discovery of his own, which threatens his Buddyfighting career.

title: Punishment for Disrespect! Infinite Death Crest!
synopsis: Drum’s inability to master his newfound Omni Lord powers forces Gao to miss out on further Buddy Police duties. But Tetsuya is happy to step in to face off against a mysterious traveller from Hero World whose intentions seem dubious at best.

title: Tasuku Undercover! Buddy Fight Club!!
synopsis: The continued search for the Omni Lords leads Tasuku deep undercover where he encounters the dark forces behind the mysterious Buddyfight club. Once there, he is reunited with a familiar foe and makes a new one. Will he risk it all for the greater good?!

title: I’m the Hero! Justice Drum!
synopsis: The Hundred Demons Hunter is back, and he’s coming after Gao. But fresh off his defeat to Ikazuchi where he lost Gramps Tenbu, is Gao up for the challenge? Maybe an energy boost from Drum and a special gift from Tasuku will help get him back on his game.

title: Nanomachine Ninja Showdown! Byakuya vs. Tsukikage!
synopsis: Gao is forced to take a leave from the Buddy Police, and struggles in his new role as the Buddy of an Omni Lord. Zanya opens a can of worms in the form of a Buddy Rare card, and finds himself fighting against Tsukikage by a visitor from Katana World.

title: Yamigedo! The Fiend that Devours All!
synopsis: Just before Yamigedo swoops in for an all-out attack, Count Dawn reveals some dark truths to the gang about himself and Ikazuchi. And with Tenbu’s existence on the line as the monster’s dinner prize, Gramps makes a deal he might not live to regret.

title: Parade of Hundred Demons! Terror of the Thunder Mine!
synopsis: When the game between Gao and Death Shido ends, a vile enemy appears and throws down the gauntlet of evil! Even Asmodai’s sacrifice isn’t enough to conquer this overwhelming threat. Luckily, a familiar face arrives to save the day, but is it too late?

title: Win and Advance! 1024 Consecutive Fights!
synopsis: Gao is forced to fight for his freedom when he finds himself in a pressing engagement with Suzuha Amanosuzu. And just when he thinks a new dawn has spared him from further competition, Death Shido drags him back into their familiar Buddyfight dance.

title: The Wandering Hundred Demons’ Hunter!
synopsis: The Hundred Demons Hunter is back and he gets tangled up in Death Shido’s latest plan. The Buddy Police has their eye on the rogue biker as well and Gao is sent in to serve and protect. Wait till you see his unique ability that has Shido tied up in knots?

title: Hoo-hah! A Hundred Thousand Ziun Years in Search of Friends!
synopsis: Master Ikazuchi wants to add a new powerful monster to his menu, and he sends Shido off in hot pursuit! Zanya is the victim of mistaken identity. And things go awry in the Darkness Barrier when Gao realizes he left something valuable at home.

title: Crossnize! Star Dragon World!
synopsis: Gao and Drum are surprised when they discover who Tasuku’s been training with in Dragon World. Tasuku must conquer some personal demons to find his true self, and untap his true power. The Hundred Demon Heim agrees to relinquish Lord Tenbu for a cost.

title: The Demon Swordsman Draws Closer! Tenbu Abducted!
synopsis: Tired of Shido’s incompetence, Ikazuchi calls on the mighty Dekalfar Demon Swordsman Heim to lead the charge on stealing Tenbu away from Gao. Is Gao prepared to face the craftiest Hundred Demon yet? And who is this civilian hunting down illegal monsters?

title: Meow, Meow! Cait Sìth in Boots!
synopsis: Gao gets more than he bargained for while responding to a sighting of an illegal monster at Castle. Death Shido continues his hunt for Lord Tenbu and, with a new Hundred Demon in his pocket, accepts a challenge to fight Gao. But who is Gao’s new Buddy?

title: Brothers in Arms! The Battle of Dragon Brainbaltes!
synopsis: When a criminal fighter appears with an ultimatum and a tag team of hundred demons, Zanya is forced to step in when no one else comes forward to help. And after Death Shido raises the Darkness Barrier, Zanya is all on his own to save the day, or is he?

title: The Life of a Buddy Police Trainee!
synopsis: An illegal monster is consuming all of Chotokyo’s food, and Gao is sent into the line of fire. But when he and Drum have nothing left to give, a surprising Buddyfighter steps in to try and save Tenbu from Death Shido and his latest Hundred Demon!

title: Trouble at Buddy Fest!
synopsis: Commander I gives Gao some time off, so he goes to check out the Buddy Fest. The Castle Store manager asks Gao to help him train some newbie Buddyfighters. But Shido breaks up the fun, forcing Gao into action, when he releases one of the hundred demons.

title: Those Who Hate the Sun!
synopsis: The gang thinks they’ve figured out who the mysterious Death Shido is. Gao meets a senior member of the Buddy Police who questions his ability to be a good officer. But the young fighter has a chance to prove himself in another match against Death Shido.

title: The Hundred Demons Attack! Protect Tenbu!
synopsis: Gao’s finding it hard to juggle his duties as a Buddy Police Trainee and a full time student, especially when he has to leave in the middle of class to chase down an illegal monster who’s stolen his friends’ Buddyfight card decks. And who is Death Shido?!

title: An Overwhelming Threat!
synopsis: The Buddy Police are on red alert when an illegal monster visits earth! Commander I sends in a surprising new member of the force to back up Takihara. And just when things seem under control, the planet falls under an overwhelming threat.

title: Break to the Future!
synopsis: The battle to save Earth is on, and Kyoya’s pulling out all the stops. Will his incredible Aqulta Gwaneff, A.K.A The Sword of Truth, be too much for Gao to handle? Or will the Mighty Sun Fighter overcome the odds and save the planet from a monster invasion?!

title: The Shadow of Demise!
synopsis: The odds are in favor of Kyoya Gaen and his master plan. Only Gao Mikado stands in his way…but will he stay standing? True to form, Kyoya unveils a few surprises that leave Gao and the gang in disbelief. This is a battle you won’t want to miss!

title: Kyoya's World!
synopsis: The countdown to the battle for Earth is on. With most of the planet duped by Kyoya, children everywhere are frantic to get their hands on a Dark Core Deck Case replica. Gao helps old friends reunite, and gets some support from an unlikely source.

title: Eternal Rivals!
synopsis: With many surprising twists and turns, the deciding game of the Gaen Cup finals is decided. The truth about Kyoya’s diabolical plan is revealed. Monsters from Darkness Dragon World begin traversing through the mysterious portal and descend to Earth.

title: Gao and Tasuku’s Epic Battle!
synopsis: The final, tiebreaking game of the Gaen Cup between Gao and Tasuku gets underway. Gao is still confident he can help his friend see the error of his ways. Meanwhile, Takihara and Stella go on a special mission and find a big surprise waiting for them.

title: Rouga Leaves the Pack!
synopsis: Police Commissioner Kisaragi comes to watch Zanya and Rouga fight it out in the second game of the Gaen Cup finals. During the back-and-forth battle, Rouga opens up about his dark past and Zanya helps him shed some light on all things good and bad.

title: Gaen Cup Final Round! Tetsuya's Choice!
synopsis: The Gaen Cup final round gets underway, but not without some pre-fight drama! Sophia confronts Tetsuya and presents him with an unexpected offer. Meanwhile, Baku and Kuguru go through some unusual fight prep strategy with the team.

title: Take Back the Buddy Police!
synopsis: Commander I, Takihara and Stella interrupt Shido’s pity-party to initiate their plan to regain control of the corrupt Buddy Police. But when things go awry, it’s up to Genma to step in and set things straight before Disaster strikes.

title: Master versus Apprentice! Death Tallica and Explosive Dragon Fang!
synopsis: Gremlin’s true colors shine through during the semi-finals when he plays an epic tie-breaking game against Gao. Will Team Balle du Soleil move on to the Gaen Cup finals, or will it be the devious Team Darkness Masterminds?

title: Balle du Soleil Collapses!
synopsis: Building tensions threaten to break up Team Balle du Soleil when Baku’s big secret is revealed. Tetsuya decides to take matters into his own hands and makes a performance out of his fight with Davide. Then Zanya faces off against Shido.

title: Wolf versus Fox! A Battle of Instinct!
synopsis: Everyone’s still reeling from Tasuku’s surprising defection to Disaster, even after he explains why. Rouga and Jin face off in the second game of their semi-final showdown. Gao finds out the real reason why Team Destiny entered the tournament.

title: Sword of Nothingness! Distortion Punisher!!
synopsis: The first semi-final gets underway! The opening game in the best-of-three showdown is between Noboru and the mysterious Purgatory Knight… but there’s something familiar about him, and our gang thinks they’ve figured out his true identity!

title: Generations Collide! Drum Breaker Dragon!
synopsis: Everything goes haywire when Drum’s father shows up from Dragon World. Hoping to teach their sons a on, Takashi Mikado and Fang Slade the Thirteenth join forces against Gao and Drum in a family Buddyfight showdown! less

title: The Tiger Returns!
synopsis: We learn Kyoya’s motivations for sponsoring the Gaen Cup Tournament. Kiri wakes up in hospital and immediately sets out to realize a mysterious plan of his own. And some familiar faces return to Aibo, but something is noticeably different about them.

title: Attack of Team Purgatory!
synopsis: After Shido and Davide make quick work of the Kanme brothers, Team Purgatory takes the stage against Team Sengoku Academy. During the match, Kyoya reveals a few surprises about Darkness Dragon World and the Dark Core Decks that leaves everyone in awe.

title: Paruko Takes the Stage!
synopsis: Baku has a trip down memory lane that leaves him struggling with his loyalties. Team Goddess surprises everyone by sending out a unexpected fighter for the round one finals. Can Gao defeat someone who knows his every move?

title: The Dancing Demon takes on Medusa!
synopsis: Love is in the air when Tetsuya dances his way onto the stage to fight with— and for— the girl of his dreams. We learn some secrets about a mysterious member of Team Goddess, and Kyoya deals with his doubts about a member of Disaster

title: The Gaen Cup Begins!
synopsis: The Buddyfight stage has been set, and the inaugural Gaen Cup is underway! But who’ll be competing first? Baku and Kuguru have their suspicions about Kyoya’s motives, but the gang is rallying to win it for Kiri.

title: Balle du Soleil Reborn!
synopsis: The Gaen Cup tournament is building up steam, and several familiar Buddyfighters have been invited to take part. Will Gao choose to compete, knowing the dangers that Disaster has in store for him? And if so, who will be fighting on his team?

title: Luminize! Explosive Dragon Fang!
synopsis: Elf Kabala demonstrates his control over some newly acquired Buddy monsters and challenges Gao to a Buddyfight showdown. Tsukikage has an out-of-body experience and surprises everyone when his special bond with Zanya is put to the test.

title: Disaster Times Two!
synopsis: Tasuku and Gao fight against the forces of darkness. The ex Buddy Cop surprises his opponents with Jackknife’s awesome abilities, and then is forced to make a difficult choice. With his Buddy on the line, Gao faces off against the Grim Reaper.

title: Tasuku Takes Charge!
synopsis: Tasuku discovers some troubling news at Buddy Police Headquarters. He enlists Gao’s help to find the Grim Reaper and those responsible for supplying the Dark Core Deck Case. After learning of Disaster’s true intentions, they’ll be changed forever.

title: Disaster at Twilight!
synopsis: The Grim Reaper is on the prowl and wreaking havoc! It appears as though no Buddy or Buddyfighter is safe! And with the Buddy Police’s hands tied, Zanya allows the gang to join him on his quest to capture this sinister villain.

title: Roaring Slash! Gargantua Punisher!
synopsis: Darkness Dragon World continues to mystify the Buddyfighting community, and the Buddy Police are brought up to speed. Gao and Davide have a showcase battle at the Buddy Fest that ends with a roaring finish! Meanwhile, Kiri is still missing…

title: The Darkness of Dragon World!
synopsis: "Disaster strikes twice for Gao and the gang! Shido and Davide wield the sinister powers of their new decks, built with cards from the mysterious Darkness Dragon World! Until now, this world was just a myth, but now its monsters are coming alive!"

title: Kiri Strikesback!
synopsis: Gao receives a letter from Kiri that gives him and the gang quite a chill. They decide to pay Kiri a visit at his new school, but what they find there shocks them to the core! Gao is forced to face off against his old friend and the stakes are high!

title: Fenrir of Fate!
synopsis: The gang gets some new Buddycards, and Gao helps Kiri pick out a Special Rare! Soon after, Kiri receives a life-changing phone call but decides not to share the news with the others. Instead he decides to prove himself with a Buddyfight.

title: Medusa Unleashed!
synopsis: Gao and Drum put aside their differences to help Terumi Kuchinawa of the Disaster squad, who is sneaking around Aibo with a sinister plan. But when she runs into Asmodai and Tetsuya, things take an unexpected twist.

title: Ikarino's Fantastic Dungeon!
synopsis: It’s back to class for Gao and the gang, and it’s the school of hard knocks! Elf Kabala subs in to begin his undercover operation, and Principal Ikarino takes the class on a fieldtrip to a magical fighting stage to teach them some Buddyfighting truths.

title: Mysterious Hero! Captain Answer!
synopsis: Takihara and the Buddy Police face off against a menacing criminal fighter from another world. Some cool new monsters from Hero World arrive on the scene to help, but will Captain Answer come to the rescue?

title: Defenders of Darkness!
synopsis: The gang watches a video of their triumph over the four demon generals at Sengoku Academy. Kiri challenges Gao to a Buddyfight to test out his new deck. But little do they know the Defenders of Darkness are watching their every move…

title: Gao vs. Rouga! Round Two!
synopsis: Gao and Rouga square off for Kiri’s freedom, but not without a few fun twists thrown in by Gao for good measure. It’s a neck and neck battle that comes down to the tiniest of margins for the victor. And Tasuku’s fight for justice lands him in big trouble!

title: The Legendary Sword Excalibur!
synopsis: Shosetsu falls prey to the Disaster Force, and struggles to claim the strength he seeks. Gao and the gang learn the hard way just how powerful the Dark Core can be, while Tasuku risks his spot on the Buddy Police force in order to protect the game he loves.

title: Gao’s Buddy Skill is On!
synopsis: Gao and Drum are MIA, and everyone’s worried they’ll lose their match against Shosetsu by default. Caught up in a new crowd and desperate for strength, Kiri is led down a confusing path. Drum has a major breakthrough at a crucial moment.

title: Invincible Swordsman! Shosetsu Kirisame!
synopsis: Shosetsu Kirisame finally emerges from the shadows to enter the Buddyfight ring, determined to show Rouga what he’s made of. Gao and Drum set out on a mission for supplies and run into Sophia Sakharov, who seems to be on a mission of her own...

title: Activate! Mega Blast Bunker!
synopsis: Raremaro and Gao headline the fifth match, and let’s just say there’s a little magic in the air! Drum reveals new powers he developed during intensive training in other worlds, and Gao brings Axia off the bench to demonstrate his unusual abilities!

title: Flying Ninja Showdown!
synopsis: Zanya meets his match when he squares off ninja-style with Kanahebi. A secret from the Kisaragi family’s past comes to the surface, and raises the stakes even higher. Time will tell which Katana World fighter is really living the dream!

title: Buddies Bring Their Best!
synopsis: Kazane takes on Kemura, and we learn some secrets about the Frog-Man and Legend World. He is still reeling, however, from unwittingly using a Hate Card against Genma in his last match and needs a friendly boost to help him get his head back in the game.

title: A Challenge From Legend World!
synopsis: In the quest to find Kiri, the heated showdown between Sengoku and Aibo continues. Genma squares off against a surprising foe who shares a secret with the Seifukai leader. A difference of opinion of what constitutes fair play has the Buddyfighters at odds.

title: Buddyfight Intensified! Sengoku Academy!
synopsis: To rescue Kiri, Gao and the gang take off for Sengoku Academy, located deep in the mysterious Chohakone mountains. They see a familiar face on the way and soon learn they must obey the strict traditions of the school if they hope to help their friend.

title: The Friends of Dungeon World!
synopsis: Gao and Kazane go head to head in a friendly battle on the Castle stage, and Kazane reveals her secret for why she chose to fight for Dungeon World. Feeling left out and unhappy about his Buddyfight abilities, Kiri finds some help from a shocking source.

title: Drum’s Heroic Adventure!
synopsis: Drum returns to Dragon World, but doesn’t quite get the homecoming he was hoping for; his father sends him to a parallel world for some special training. Gao heads to Castle where he watches an exciting Buddyfight with a mysterious player called Wind.

title: Evil Power, Disaster Force!
synopsis: The gang is invited to a ‘who’s who’ of Buddyfight parties onboard Kyoya Gaen’s luxury yacht. But before the festivities get going an Ultimate Rare card mysteriously disappears. Tasuku struggles with the terms of his suspension from the Buddy Police.

title: Buddy Monsters Unite!
synopsis: Kiri gives the gang a detailed video presentation on the various Buddyfight worlds, highlighting their strengths, powerful monsters and unique spells. Meanwhile, the Buddy Police is in trouble from a higher authority, which seems to be targeting Tasuku.

title: The Powerful Sun Fist!
synopsis: The showdown for the strongest fighter continues. Genma’s Buddy monster Duel Sieger demonstrates why he’s one of the most feared dragons that’s ever lived. Gao and Genma’s battle extends beyond the fighting stage over something that might surprise you.

title: The Card Yota Left Behind!
synopsis: Gao receives a sentimental gift from his mother, and she agrees to become more involved in his Buddyfighting. Gao and Genma square off for an epic battle in Aibo’s newly renovated fighting stage arena. Who will be crowned the strongest fighter this year?

title: Menacing Duel Sieger!
synopsis: Shido tries his best, but as expected, he’s no match for the more powerful Genma. Zanya gets his rematch with Genma and his amazing Buddy, Martial Arts Dragon Emperor Duel Sieger. This battle could go either way. It’s definitely one you won’t want to miss!

title: ABC Cup Final! Exploring the Underground Maze!
synopsis: The ABC Cup Final gets underway! Gao has a special surprise up his sleeve for his opponent Zanya, but it might just throw the whole tournament out of whack! Meanwhile, the gang goes searching for Genma and finds some assistance from an unlikely source

title: Mystique Explosion! The Great Katana World Battle!
synopsis: Zanya and Jin put it all on the line in a Katana World semifinal showdown hoping to advance to the ABC Cup main event. Gao and the gang search for Akatsuki, as he may hold a clue to Genma and Doai’s whereabouts. Sophia reveals a dark truth about herself.

title: Dragons Duel! Journey of the Tiger!
synopsis: The gang finds out some upsetting news about Noboru just before his ABC Cup semifinal match against Gao. Angry and confused, Gao gives Noboru a piece of his mind during their heated battle, and we learn how the fighters really feel about each other.

title: Noble Heart! Together with the Dragon Knight!
synopsis: The final first round match of the ABC Cup begins between Noboru and Shido. And facing a difficult choice, Noboru gets some helpful advice from his Buddy El Quixote. Meanwhile Doai goes looking for Genma and finds more than he bargained for.

title: Powers Unite! Dragonic Punisher!
synopsis: The fourth and final match of the ABC Cup’s first round gets underway between Jin and Tetsuya. Meanwhile, Tasuku and Jackknife have an out-of-this-world experience. And Shido is under pressure to find a replacement for Rouga and his powers of darkness.

title: Power vs. Ninja Arts! A Fierce Competition!
synopsis: Gao’s recruited by the Seifukai. Shido’s up to no good, working secretly behind the scenes to increase his chances of winning the ABC Cup. The second match of the tournament begins, pitting all-out strength against the time-honored art of ninja warfare.

title: The Start of the Aibo Buddy Cup!
synopsis: The ABC Cup finally gets underway, but not before the principals of the elementary and middle schools get into a heated discussion. Gao and his team Balle du Soleil are drawn in the first match against the middle school, but where is their opponent?

title: The Card of Heroes!
synopsis: While everyone’s at the Aibo Buddy Cup bash, Noboru’s busy at Buddy Police HQ learning about Tasuku’s challenging past. Conflicted about his buddyfight future, Noboru is faced with a difficult challenge that eventually helps set him on a happier path.

title: The Stolen Dragon Deck!
synopsis: Gao refuses help from Baku and Kuguru. Gao uses Drum’s keen sense of smell to track down a card thief and then challenges him to a Buddyfight. During the battle, Gao is forced to try something new, which teaches him a valuable on about friendship. less

title: Break Past the Final Qualifier!
synopsis: Shido and Sophia are plotting something bad. Gao’s success in the Buddyfight arena is attracting negative attention from some middle school students. The ABC Cup qualifying round gets underway and there’s a surprising team moving on to the main event.

title: Deck Building to Victory!
synopsis: The annual Buddyfight tournament is approaching, and it has everyone buzzing. Noboru meets an unexpected ally. Tetsuya gets some creative help when he needs it most. And a tense disagreement between Gao and Baku leaves Koguru trying and pick up the pieces.

title: Rouga Aragami Attacks!
synopsis: Rouga’s thirst for revenge takes him down an unexpected path. Baku puts his faith in Gao, and offers him a special gift. Gao temporarily loses sight of who he really is and takes an obsession too far without considering the consequences of his actions.

title: Future Force Shines!
synopsis: Gao wanders off from his class during a fieldtrip and discovers something amazing. Drum learns that he can’t win every battle. Tasuku Ryuenji clashes with the villainous Buddyfighter Wolf, and realizes he needs some top-secret, Buddy Police technology.

title: The Rules of Buddyfight!
synopsis: Gao’s new friend, Kiri, learns about Buddyfighting, and takes part in an electrifying training session. Drum forgives Gao and helps him out of a tricky situation. The mysterious Buddyfighter Rouga reveals a dark power that may change Buddyfighting forever.

title: Dancing with a Demon!
synopsis: Forced to find a practice partner, Gao picks an unlikely opponent for his next Buddyfight. During the battle, an unexpected Buddy Monster arrives leaving everyone spellbound. Later, Gao upsets Drum and he threatens to reject Gao as his Buddy for good.

title: Gao vs. Tasuku!
synopsis: With the help of Baku Omori, a deck builder, and data analyst, Kuguru Uki, Gao gets a deck which he can fight with called "Dragon Blast Fury". At the prestigious fighting stage of Aibo Academy, Gao takes on Tasuku and his Buddy Monster, Jackknife Dragon.

title: Gao, Roars!
synopsis: When Gao Mikado opens a card package during writing class he gets a Buddy Rare Card called Drum Bunker Dragon. Gao and Drum Buddy up and get ready for Future Card battles!

title: Always Together
synopsis: A collector has gotten a hold of Mii-kun. The gang works together to stop him.

title: I Want to Be With You Forever and Ever
synopsis: Sora’s classmate, Suzuki, shows him a photo of an injured inugami. Sora and the gang head out to the mountains to find it.

title: A Surprise From Afar
synopsis: Sora’s dad sends him another gift. It doesn’t seem to be dangerous in any way, but it sure is talkative.

title: Kind Hands, Warm Hands
synopsis: Conny has developed some bad habits, including stealing food from the family. His relationship with Tazuki becomes strained.

title: New Places, Strange Places, Strange Friends
synopsis: The gang finds a perfect babysitter for their creatures. From there, Mii-kun sets out on an unintended adventure.

title: Scary Dreams Are Okay Because I'm Not Alone
synopsis: A student with a menacing look threatens the gang. There seems to be something wrong with him. Sora offers him his help.

title: I can't grow all at once, so I'll grow over time
synopsis: Mii-kun, Conny and Isao learn to write – kind of. Kaede’s mandrake gets loose, and the gang sets out to bring it home before the unthinkable happens.

title: Go Away Kindness, Go Away Fear
synopsis: Mogi comes home to a tiny dragon hanging out in her room. This is terrible news to her, as she has a fear of lizards.

title: You Can't Play Tag by Yourself, and It's Fun to Play With Others
synopsis: Tazuki encounters a child oni on his way home from work. Though the oni appears to be beat up pretty badly, Tazuki refuses to take him in.

title: It's Scary When Someone You Care About Gets Sick
synopsis: Sora comes down with the flu. Kaede and Mii-kun are desperate to help, but his strong sense of independence makes him a little difficult to care for.

title: Toyed With and Chased Around, Being Small Is Hard
synopsis: Balancing school and taking care of Mii-kun turns out to be a challenge, but with a little help from his friend, Tazuki, Sora takes it on like a champ.

title: White, Round, Tiny, Wimpy, and Ready
synopsis: Sora receives a package from his dad in Egypt: a huge casket with a tiny mummy. The instructions are unclear, but what’s certain is that he’s going to have to learn to take care of his new mummy, Mii-kun.

title: On a Moonlit Evening
synopsis: A single comment from Yashiro cuts far too deep for Moriko, and so Moriko flies out of the convenience store to get away. To get out from the rain, Sakurai invites her into his home. The pair of them try to convey how they feel about one another, while still assessing just how close they may already be. The two of them have made their relationship strong through the time they spent together online. But what kind of relationship does that really make?

title: I Call That Feeling Marble
synopsis: While Moriko is surprised to hear the shocking truth from Sakurai, she's still looking forward to playing MMOs together with Lily. But ever since the day in which Moriko learned the truth, Lily hasn't logged in...

title: One Step Forward
synopsis: To play online with Koiwai, Moriko makes a temporary alt character named Molly. After seeing Molly, Sakurai remembers a player he met in another game named Yuki. He met Yuki when he was still a student, and she was a working adult.

title: You and I, and Me and You
synopsis: Sakurai, now sure that Moriko is indeed Hayashi, finds himself hesitating over playing online with Hayashi. Sakurai decides to continuing playing as if not knowing who Hayashi is, but finds himself wavering when Hayashi talks so happily about Sakurai. At the same time, Koiwai decides to give the game a spin himself.

title: I'm So Embarrassed I Could Die!
synopsis: Moriko goes out to meet Koiwai, but he never shows up. Just as Moriko decides to give up and go home, she runs into Sakurai! Moriko finds out that she got the day of her day out with Koiwai wrong, and that Sakurai had been bothered by her turning down his previous invitation. What will she do now?

title: Secret Triangle
synopsis: Hayashi asks for some advice from Lily, and from what Hayashi says, Sakurai starts to wonder if Hayashi and Moriko are the same person. Meanwhile, Moriko undergoes a makeover to prepare herself for her night out with Koiwai. But when the day finally comes, Koiwai doesn't show up, even after Moriko spends so much time waiting. Just as she's about to give up and go home, who does she run into?

title: Like a Maiden in Love
synopsis: Morioka is so taken by the new loot boxes in Fruit de Mer that she decides to spend money and aim for the top prize with her guild, but the so-called greed sensor keeps getting in her way. On the other hand, in real life, a man suddenly starts talking to her at the convenience store.

title: You and I, the Cowards
synopsis: Thanks to her guild members, Moriko is now free of her worries, and she's committed to enjoying her time online. But just as she logs in, she suddenly gets an expensive present from Lily. Fearing some sort of ulterior motive, Momoko begins to panic.

title: We Don't Know a Thing
synopsis: Moriko is enjoying her online life to the fullest with Lily and all her friends. But Moriko ends up telling a lie about her personal situation outside of game to them, and now she feels guilty. Meanwhile, in the real world, Moriko ends up bumping into a hot, blond-haired, green-eyed man.

title: ♀ IRL, ♂ Online
synopsis: Morioka Moriko is a 30 year old who chose the NEET path for herself after quitting her job. She decides she'll find more happiness online than in the real world and so makes a hot male character in an MMO named Hayashi. In game, she meets an adorable and kindhearted experienced player named Lily, as well as other friends. Now begins Moriko's fulfilling online life as a self-styled "elite NEET"!

title: All Done?
synopsis: Bouichiro has taken Kena to the Suhara Shrine. He attempts to make the contract with the Law of Identity, but Akuto appears and the battle begins in the presence of the God. Akuto at last defeats Bouichiro and takes back Keena. He learns that the Demon Lord was created by the Gods to make the contract with the Law of Identity and destroy humanity. But Akuto refuses and declares his intent to kill the Gods, causing their defense system to activate. Akuto puts his life on the line to battle the Gods, and put and end to the story they've created.

title: The Girls' Final Battle
synopsis: Sai Akuto takes flight with Peaterhausen, having sworn to kill the Gods to protect Keena, but the imperial aircraft carrier "Black Crane" makes it debut and due to the work of 2V, an agent of the Cabinet Intelligence Magick Office, Sai Akuto is flattened by the Black Crane. At the same time, the troops that are under the command of Teruya Eiko raid the school to destroy the monsters infesting it, but the student council president, Riri Shiraishi, repells them. Eiko uses Hattori Yuuko to protect herself, and orders Junko to take out Riri! Meanwhile, in the school, Fujiko is taken aback by Sai Akuto's apparent death, but Keena is convinced Sai Akuto is still alive. Bouichiro appears once more and kidnaps Keena...

title: Sai Akuto's Imperial Capital War
synopsis: Yamato Bouichirou, head of CIMO8, saves Keena from being assassinated. But he was only interested in making her, who calls the "law of identity", his own in order to control the gods. Akuto uses his power as the Demon Lord to return to the school and faces off with Bouchirou, but is wounded as Boichiro's attacks surpass his mana controlling ability. Then, Fujiko appears with a horde of monsters, saving the two and going back to Peterhausen. Meanwhile, the government army under the command of Teruya Eiko arrivesoutside the school and begins "Operation Battering Ram" to defeat the Demon Lord. At last, the battle between the demon lord and his monsters and humanity begins...

title: The Marriage Interview Chaos
synopsis: Without either of their input, it's decided that an arrianged marriage meeting is to be held between Junko and Akuto at Iga Village. Junko, who has feelings for Akuto, is unable to tell him, and so invites him to the village for other reasons. Akuto knows nothing of the marriage interview, but feels responsible for the messes he's caused and decides to go with her. That night, Junko readies herself and visits his room, but another misunderstand occurs. As Akuto flees, he is confronted by Teruya Eiko who tells him that the God Suhara has decided Keena is a threat and ordered the Teruya Family to eliminate her. The Demon Lord awakens within an enraged Akuto!

title: Do You Have a Crush?
synopsis: Hiroshi gets the legendary blade, and becomes the hero Brave. But he didn't tell anybody his true identity. Meanwhile, Akuto starts to think about Keena more as he wonders if the hairpiece she wears is something he gave her when she was a child. Bu Keena herself is as easygoing as ever, still skipping class constantly. Akuto decides to try to persuade her to go to class. Junko watches him unhappily. She's been acting odd since the seaside school. And then Korone tells her to have a marriage interview with Akuto at her family's home...

title: The Legendary Hero Appears
synopsis: The island they'd come to was Hiroshi's hometown. There was a legend there: When the demon lord revives, a beast would appear, and a hero would appear who would defeat it and the Demon Lord. It was just a legend, but Hiro was depressed. That night, his little sister Yukiko appeared and asked which of them was the Demon Lord. She believed firmly that Hiroshi was the legendary hero, and if there was a demon lord, he could be the hero as well. But she cries and runs away when Akito denies it, and is captured by a mysterious man! As they chase after her, a gigantic beast appears!

title: Let's Go to School by the Sea!
synopsis: By defending Fujiko, Akuto finds himself in control of the Demon Lord's secret treasure: a dragon named Peterhausen. Despite his wishes, his reputation as a Demon Lord grows. Under observation by the government, Aktuo is depressed to find out he can't go to the seaside school. But Korone arranges for him to go by offering to take responsiblity for him herself. Akuto is enjoying (is he?) the beach with Junko and the others, and things with Junko are about to a the beach with Junko and the others, and things with Junko are about to about to start getting better, but Korone and Keena show up and screw things up in their usual way.

title: Beware the Underground Labyrinth
synopsis: Students keep getting hurt as they try to find the treasure on the map Keena put up. Akuto, in his role as disciplinary committee member, insists that they give up looking, but a girl named Teruya Eiko appears suddenly and he ends up having to find it himself. Akuto, Korone, and Hiroshi go to the school's underground labyrinth to find the spot on the map. But they find there a treasure once allowed only to a Demon Lord.

title: Is Solitary Fun?
synopsis: Keena's intervention manages to somehow make Junko and Akuto friends again. But during a class on mana control he knocks her unconscious again. His teacher, Mitsuko, recommends that he go into the Mental Self-Discipline Chamber. Inside the chamber, where people are said to have died, Akuto gets depressed. For some reason Korone and Keena came along, and he's caught between the two of them. However, they find a mysterious map. Keena is intrigued and wonders if it is a treasure map. The next day, Keena copies the map and it ends up all over school. It becomes the talk of the whole academy. But, Fujiko recognizes something on the map...

title: The Upperclassman Who's A Bit Scary
synopsis: Akuto applies for the position of Disciplinary Committee member at Fujiko's suggestion so he can get back in Junko's good graces. But that job entails defeating those who threaten the school's discipline, and is considered perfect for the "Future Demon Lord". Akuto is suspicious of Fujiko, but his doubts disappear when she arranges for him to meet her. He goes to the designated spot, but there he's ambushed by a bunch of thugs. He defeats them, but Junko sees him beating them up and gets the idea that he's planning on making them his personal army so he can take over the school. Junko submits an application to the school to take him down, and Akuto is forced to go up against the entire student body...

title: The Odd Observer
synopsis: On his first day, Akuto was told he was destined to become a Demon Lord. He tries his best to tell everyone it's all a misunderstanding, but everything he does just makes matters worse. And then things get even crazier: the government sends an artificial human called a Liladan to watch over him 24/7 and Keena shows up suddenly and jumps him while naked! But then, the most popular girl at school, the head of the girl's dorm Etou Fujiko says that she understands him, and that she'll patch things up with Junko. However...

title: Your future occupation is: Demon Lord
synopsis: The year is 3000 where magic is common place. Transferring to the Constant Academy of Magical Arts just as the new quarter begins, Sai Akuto hopes to become a High Priest. But during his aptitude test on the first day, the artificial spirit Yata-garasu says that he's destined to become a "Demon Lord"! So now Hattori Junko, who he'd sworn an oath of friendship with earlier that day, challenges him to a duel. The duel is interrupted by a girl named Keena as the misunderstandings get worse and worse! Akuto, potential future Demon Lord, begins his days of trying to fix these misunderstandings!

title: Cherry Blossoms in Full Bloom and a Romantic Storm
synopsis: Yuru Yuri's protagonist Akaza Akari here!! This is the final episode of Yuru Yuri San Hai!. But if you want to see us again, you probably will! Now let's head to the club room!

title: Terrible No Matter How Much You Struggle
synopsis: Good to see you again, everyone. Furutani Himawari here. I thought we'd finally get to be together again, but time flies, doesn't it? And... it seems Sakurako is causing more trouble. I need to look after her...

title: With You, Forever
synopsis: Funami Yui here. I'm glad to see you all again. Kyoko still isn't doing her homework and still causes trouble by bringing weird things to school... But with Akari, Chinatsu-chan, and even Kyoko around, nothing really serious happens, but I do have fun.

title: This is the Story of a Little Love and Courage
synopsis: Ikeda Chizuru here. I guess I'm gratefull to see you again. Tsk! Anyway, she had to get involved and make things complicated again... Sheesh. I'm not mad because I want to be, but... Sometimes I wish I could smile like my sister.

title: It is the Piece of a Smile Everyone Acquires
synopsis: ・・・・・・・・・・・・。・・・・・・・・・・・・・・。 ・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・。 ・・・・・、・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・。・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・。 (Student council president Matsumoto Rise here. I'm glad to see all of you. Since I apparently have a turn as well, I'd appreciate your continued support. Come to think of it, Nishigaki-sensei has a new colleague. I hope you'll enjoy it.)

title: It Will Be an Unforgettable Day
synopsis: Ha ha ha! Yuru Yuri's true protagonist Toshino Kyoko here! I know I'm a bit late, but did everyone wait like good girls and boys? The Amusement Club is off to defeat new enemies, so come along! What? That's not in the script? Too bad.

title: The Invisible Face is There
synopsis: Yoshikawa Chinatsu here. Seeing Yui-senpai doing this and that, I'm just... overjoyed! I suppose I can let the rest of you take a peek as well! I've invited Yui-senpai to my house again today. I'd better dress myself up!

title: The Girl Falls Into Darkness
synopsis: Ikeda Chitose here. I'm glad to see everyone again. Also, Ayano-chan and Toshino-san have already shown me so much already... It's great fodder for my fantasies. Oh, no. My nose is bleeding... No, wait. Today I have plans to go out with Ayano-chan! I'm so excited!

title: The Night Will Bring Them Together
synopsis: Hello, everyone. This is Akari's sister Akaza Akane. Thank you for looking after Akari. Akari's so cute. She's always such an angel. She's the apple of my eye. I could do this to Akari's that, and... Oh, excuse me. My friends are coming over today. I must get ready.

title: No Self-Awareness
synopsis: Tada! Omuro Sakurako-sama has arrived! Has everyone been doing well? I'm always full of energy! Come to think of it, the other day I studied with Himawari. I think Himawari's... uh... b-breasts might have gotten bigger again... Argh! She even lectured me, too. Okay, I've got a good idea!

title: Tremble in Fear
synopsis: S-Sugiura Ayano here! No one told me it was my turn to do this! I'm glad to be back here with everyone. I-I didn't come back here for you! But thanks for waiting! Huh? My mom's calling me. What could it be...?

title: It is the Beginning of Amusement
synopsis: Yuru Yuri's protagonist Akaza Akari here!! Yuri Yuri has returned to TV! Since summer vacation is over and school is starting, I hope to have lots of fun with the members of the Amusement Club! Now let's head to the club room!

title: Good Bye Protagonist, Until We Meet Again
synopsis: The Student Council and Amusement Club Presents: Snow White.

title: The Akari Who Leapt Through Time
synopsis: The Amusement Club is cleaning the club room in preparation for new students and perhaps new members. Opening a mysterious closet they discover a device that sends Akari back in time, with she takes as a chance to fix her mistakes.

title: School Trip R
synopsis: The older students are off on a school trip leaving Akari and a needy Chinatsu alone. Nadeshiko watches Himawari and Sakurako fight and remembers them as children.

title: A Day Something May or May Not Happen
synopsis: The girls team up to do one last study group and do everything but study. Chinatsu meets Akane in the worst way, and Yui sees a different side of her Senpai.

title: Chinatsu Unrivaled
synopsis: Winter Comu is coming up and Kyoko is hard at work with Akari and Yui helping her finish her make the deadline. Their biggest program is keeping Chinatsu from ruining everything.

title: Sisterly Relations and Such
synopsis: The sisters of Yuru Yuri finally get their screen time and they are just as unique as the Amusement club.

title: [Breaking News] Yuru Yuri Sold Out
synopsis: The Comic Extreme Market is happening again and the amusement club is out in full force.

title: Lazy, Japanese Summer
synopsis: Akari misses the train, Yui dreams in RPG, and Himawari and Sakurako spy on Akari.

title: Achoo
synopsis: The girls discuss the best ways to handle allergies, Ayano tries her best to save her pudding, and rain makes for a boring day.

title: Chocolate and Tears and Girls and Girls and Isobe Fries
synopsis: Himawari is spending time helping Chinatsu with her Valentine day gift, but Sakurako feels like a pain when Himawari is not around checking her homework.

title: Yuru Yuri Everyday
synopsis: The girls discuss the money, being sick, nick names, and hand-gargling.

title: The Protagonist Returns
synopsis: Akrai is no longer a dotted outline in the background. She is loved and adored by her classmates and teachers alike. This marks a new year for the ultra-popular Akari!

title: PV
synopsis: Promotional Video

title: Everyone's Poka Poka at Training Camp
synopsis: Uh... Hello, everyone. I'm Yuru Yuri protagonist Akaza Akari. ...I'm the protagonist, right? It's the final episode, but I can still call myself the protagonist with confidence, right? I was so confident in the first episode... sniffle. No, you mustn't give up, Akari! Have confidence, Akari! Today's our overnighter. It's the perfect place to establish my presence! Come on, everyone, I'll show you my brilliance! Until we meet again!Until we meet again... Akarin.

title: Our Amusement Club
synopsis: I am Toshino Kyoko. I am currently in charge of the Amusement Club. All the members of the Amusement Club are in attendance today. There's Yui, Akari-chan, Chinatsu-chan and... me. I certainly enjoy spending time with everyone, but I can't play all the time. Besides, this room belongs to the tea club. Rules are meant to be followed. ...I've made up my mind. Listen up, everyone. As of today, the Amusement Club is--

title: It's called a school trip, but what are we here to study?
synopsis: She says, "I am student council president Matsumoto Rise. Nice to meet you." Oh, and I'm science teacher Nishigaki Nana. I'm always looking for new explosion buddies.... What? You're lonely because the second years are away on their school trip? Don't worry, I'll stir up some ruckus for you.... No, I'll make some tea. It's not bad getting a change of pace from my experime---BOOOOM!

title: This Summer Isn't Scary
synopsis: Ikeda Chizuru... Chitose's younger twin sister...Despite the summer heat, my sister diligently performs her student council duties without a single complaint. I knew she could do it. She's amazing. As usual, she works with Sugiura-san. No matter how hot it gets, they're always together... (drool) Oh, my sister's laughing happily with Sugiura-san... (gush)...Hm? ...She's back again. Why does she always interfere with my sister and Sugiura-san... Don't come over here! Blow yourself up!

title: April Fool's
synopsis: Everyone, you must not let Sakurako deceive you. The position of next student council vice president belongs not to her, but to me, Furutani Himawari! It's spring, the season of new encounters, new life and a new self. I have a new start as a... new first year? ...Well, whatever. More importantly, I must work hard to become the next student council vice president. Oh, Ikeda-senpai, what perfect timing. I wanted to talk to you about... huh? You're Ikeda senpai... right?

title: Christmas
synopsis: Listen up, everyone! It's next student council vice president Omuro Sakurako! I will be Sugiura-senpai's successor! This year's already almost over, and... huh? Was there a student council election? Well, whatever. Today's Christmas. This year I'll stay up until Santa arrives and receive a mountain of presents! But first, I've got the student council and Amusement Club joint shuffle date. Will I be paired with Akari-chan? Or maybe Chinatsu-cha... It's you!? Damn!

title: Art Arter Artist
synopsis: I am student council member Ikeda Chitose. Thank you for watching our show. Toshino-san and her friends are enjoying an artistic fall and seem to be up to something interesting. Art, huh? Ayano-chan should join them. Ayano-chan could model for Toshino-san as she draws (spurt!) or sculpts (gush!) or writes about their love together (drip), right? Artistic autumns are the best... (bam!).

title: When Akari and the Cicadas Cry
synopsis: I'm vice president of the Nanamori Middle School student council, Sugiura Ayan. Toshino Kyoko pushed me around the entire first semester, and it was absolutely awful! Just thinking I won't have to see her over summer vacation makes me feel so much better...Is someone calling me? Toshino Kyoko!? I wonder what she's inviting me to do... (thump thump) I suppose I'll have to accompany her... Where are you taking me!? Toshino Kyoko's taking over my summer vacation, too? Cut me some slack Iraq!

title: Summer Harvest
synopsis: I'm Yoshikawa Chinatsu, and I love, love, love Yui-senpai. I can't believe I just said that out loud. How embarrassing! Final exams have ended and summer vacations has begun... but with school out of session, I don't get to see Yui-senpai. Summer's boring! Is what I was thinking when I got an invitation from my Yui-senpai! I'm so happy. I want to swim in the ocean during the day and set off fireworks at night! Yui-senpai's swimsuit! Yui-senpai's yukata! Hooray, summer's great!

title: You Wanna Come Visit!?...Yeah, Let's Go!
synopsis: Funami Yui here. For those of you watching this for the first time, the second episode's summary is a complete lie, so there's no reason to believe it. Even though she has Akari and Chinatsu-chan as juniors now, Kyoko forgot her homework again. She'll never grow up. Well, it's Sunday, so I'll forget about Kyoko and lounge around... What are you doingi here? Oh, well. With Akari and Chinatsu-chan here, I wonder what sort of Sunday this will be.

title: Me and You and the Student Council
synopsis: Hey, I'm president of the Amusement Club, Toshino Kyoko! Just kidding. (Snap, wink) Now that we're finally an anime, I thought I should establish my character! (You don't need to do that. by Yui) The second episode goes in a different direction. The student council that quietly supports the school is on the move. We'll take on the student council like any good school anime! Come with me, Yui and Akari! And Chinatsu-chan, leap into my arms!

title: Middle School Debut!
synopsis: Hehehe! Hello, everyone. I'm the main character, Akaza Akari. This spring, I became a middle school student. Yay for me!

title: Late-night Slumber Party
synopsis: The idols have a slumber party.

title: Aiko Santa's Merry Problem / A Wish to Anzu Santa / You Should Understand!
synopsis: The idols gear up for Christmas.

title: Chomp! / My Far Yet Close World / Hold Happiness in the Palm of Your Hand
synopsis: The idols share some winter musings with the producer.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Atsumi takes a mountain-climbing challenge.

title: Achoo! / Knitting Is the Mark of a Mom / Tiptoe Valentine
synopsis: The idols enjoy the winter season.

title: Everyone's Feelings / Girls Shuffle! / Secret Plan
synopsis: The idols do impressions of each other, sing each other's songs, and have a photo shoot.

title: Touch... / Try New Things / (Still Hasn't Changed)
synopsis: Sachiko gets ready for a gravure shoot by gathering advice, but...

title: Ranko Quest
synopsis: The idols fight slimes and more in a fantasy world.

title: Showing off Ninja Arts / Competing With Youth?! / Every Five Minutes, From Chihiro-san
synopsis: The idols spend a day at the beach.

title: Trick or NEET / It's Formal / Counter-Trick
synopsis: The idols celebrate Halloween.

title: I'm Confident in My Teeth / Inner Punchlines / Where Are You!?
synopsis: Riina wants to learn to play the guitar for an upcoming concert, but what she has in mind isn't quite what anyone's expecting.

title: The Trick Is To... / The Never-Ending Reading Pile / Love Your Mushrooms
synopsis: Koume needs help with her form, but...

title: My Precious...
synopsis: What do the idols get up to when their producer's late?

title: Infinite Possibilities
synopsis: Spinning a grand tale together! When you open a new door to expose a forbidden book…

title: Can't Hide My Cuteness
synopsis: Swimsuits Again Episode! You can't hide the cute, charming parts?!

title: Robot Episode
synopsis: Earth is targeted by evil! Who will confront this evil?! "Final Battle of the Glassy Empire!" Change, Kirarin!

title: When I Grow Up
synopsis: Another trip to the hot spring. Beautiful, youthful skin and grown-up appeal...is ultimately...

title: Three Sister Detectives!
synopsis: The first princess of the Lipps Dukedom is kidnapped! Don't miss "Three Sister Detectives! Episode 4: Sexy & Guilty"

title: Isn't This What Maids Do?
synopsis: There are many kinds of maids! But a teacher is very important!

title: My Exciting Room
synopsis: Slipping into a dressing gown for a leisurely night at home. However, it you're an IDOL...

title: Cleanse My Wings
synopsis: Let's all go to the hot spring! A little rest and relaxation might be possible…

title: Flower-Viewing in the Off Season
synopsis: Kaoru seems disappointed that she missed viewing the cherry blossoms. So Sae decides to cheer Kaoru up…

title: I'll Keep Asking Until It's All Gone
synopsis: Donning a wedding dress for work leads to wild ideas! The IDOLS are girls, after all.

title: Dere-Radi...Guest...H-Hello...
synopsis: Today is radio day at work! Everyone’s excited, but…

title: Splash Panic
synopsis: When it’s summer, you hit the beach! At the beach, you wear swimsuits! When the IDOLS change into swimsuits…

title: Our Derella G Guest
synopsis: The memorable first episode with cat ears! At work, you must add a “meow” at the end of your sentences!

title: Uzuki's Present
synopsis: Uzuki gives the producer a special present.

title: Camouflage?
synopsis: Morikubo becomes a mushroom, a mushroom...

title: We Jest, Mistress
synopsis: Sae dresses up as a maid, but...

title: Photograph Me, Producer!
synopsis: Rika has the producer take pictures of her.

title: Untitled
synopsis: The idols celebrate the Cinderella Girls anniversary with a quiz show.

title: Rockin' Place, Right?
synopsis: Natsuki and the producer take a stroll down a rockin' street.

title: Those Old Track Team Habits...
synopsis: Yuuki shows off a skateboarding trick for the producer.

title: Youthful Attractions
synopsis: Mizuki lives it up at a place for young people--the amusement park.

title: Communicating From the Heart
synopsis: Yuko's silly personality makes it hard for her to say serious things. Can she tell the producer how she really feels?

title: Miracle Pitch?
synopsis: Mirei is ready to show off her pitching skills!

title: Twilight Premonition
synopsis: An idol stops at twilight!

title: Karin VS...
synopsis: An idol confronts her archenemy!

title: A Zvezda I Don't Know?
synopsis: What happens when stars go stargazing?

title: I Feel Like I Can Do Anything!
Gazing at the Sea and Dreaming
Expressions are Part of Your Glasses too
Mount Fuji and the Laid-Back Camp Girls
synopsis: Rin gets back from buying extra supplies, and the gang hangs out for a while longer before going to bed. They’ll be watching the sun rise over Mount Fuji the next morning.

title: Christmas Camp!
synopsis: Rin and the OutClub arrive early for their Christmas camping trip. They have ice cream, play with Saitou’s chihuahua, and decorate their teacher, who is already smashed.

title: Clumsy Travelers and Camp Meetings
synopsis: With Chiaki and Nadeshiko’s help, Rin makes it to her campsite. The OutClub begins making plans for a Christmas camping trip.

title: A Night of Navigator Nadeshiko and Hot Spring Steam
synopsis: The exams are over, and Rin invites Nadeshiko out camping again, but she’s fallen ill. Rin heads out to Nagano again, while Chiaki hangs out with Nadeshiko.

title: Exams, Caribou, Steamed Buns, Yum!
synopsis: Despite upcoming exams, the OutClub continues to obsess about camping, doing maintenance on a bowl and skillet that Chiaki and Aoi had bought. Another camping trip is in the works.

title: A Night on the Lake Shore and Campers
synopsis: At Lake Shibire, Rin gives Nadeshiko a scare with the story of a monster that may or may not live in the water. They have trouble starting the fire for the barbecue.

title: Meat and Fall Colors and the Mystery Lake
synopsis: Rin buys a portable grill online, which Nadeshiko discovers. They decide to go on a weekend camping barbecue.

title: Two Camps, Two Campers' Views
synopsis: After a courageous battle against the temptations of the hot springs, the OutClub makes it to their campsite. Meanwhile, Shima Rin arrives at Takabotchi Highlands by herself.

title: The Outdoor Activities Club and the Solo Camping Girl
synopsis: The Outdoor Activities Club prepares for their first camping trip. They may have to improvise a little. Meanwhile, Rin sets out to camp in Nagano.

title: Mount Fuji and Relaxed Hot Pot Camp
synopsis: Nadeshiko gets wind that Shima Rin is camping at Fumoto Campgrounds. She invites herself to join, bringing a basket of hot pot supplies for them to enjoy.

title: Welcome to the Outdoor Activities Club
synopsis: Kagamihara Nadeshiko joins the Outdoor Activites Club. Shima Rin finds out that they go to the same school, but avoids her, preferring to camp alone.

title: Mount Fuji and Curry Noodles
synopsis: Shima Rin goes solo camping at Motosuko Lake, where she encounters an odd girl sleeping on a bench.

title: This Way and That Way
synopsis: The No. 1 Division finally comes to No. 2 Division's aid in their most desperate hour. Michelle and Akari both use their BUGS powers and face off with the Terraformars. Because they are reunited, the truth of Sheila's death also comes to light. Meanwhile, the presidents of the allied nations was meeting with the prime minister of Japan, Hiruma Ichiro. The Annex crew is about to face the true test of survival!

title: Shooting Star On Track and Reckless
synopsis: After being surrounded by the thread that a Terraformar with the powers of a silkworm laid out, Shokichi remembers Akita Nanao. Shokichi regrets the fact that they had to leave her body behind on Mars after they had killed her during the Bugs 2 mission. Now, he wants to get revenge. Will Shokichi be able to restart the clock that had stopped twenty years ago? Meanwhile, The No. 3 Division is within the pyramids and find something that shouldn't be there, and suddenly, a deafening sound can be heard throughout Mars.

title: Boxer
synopsis: The No. 1 Division were spread apart because of the Terraformars. In the depths of a dark hole, the gong had rung on a battle of the Earth vs. Mars. On Mars's side, a weevil-based Terraformar and on Earth's side, was Onizuka Keiji! He had always lived a very simple life.
