synopsis: Meeting the person you're destined for is a miracle... But that's never restrained to gender...

anime_name: I Can't Understand What My Husband Is Saying
title: Surpass Gender and Blood. Come Forth, Otokonoko
synopsis: Hajime's little brother is an otaku, and a best-selling BL doujinshi otokonoko author to boot. How did this happen...

anime_name: I Can't Understand What My Husband Is Saying
title: How I Got Into Hobbies I Don't Understand
synopsis: Marriage makes sadness half, doubles joy, and quadruples living expenses.

title: Counterattack
synopsis: Mi Liu faces the monsters to save Yaya's life. In his moment of desperation, he's saved by Anji and her awakened hemomancy powers.

title: Boom
synopsis: Lee Shin continues his mind rampage. Prepared to die, Mi Liu fights alone. As he fights, Anji and Chen Fong are forced to make a difficult decision. less

title: Plan
synopsis: After rejecting Lou Yao's help, he returns to Anji and the others with uncertainty. There he encounters and awakened and deranged Lee Shin.

title: Meeting
synopsis: In order to save their new companion Yaya, Mi Ryu and company request Lu Yao's help while fully aware of the risks. Will their deal with the devil turn out in their favor or turn against them?

title: Countdown
synopsis: Why and how was Anji revived? Amidst the joy and confusion, a little traveling companion connected to the mystery joins the group. However, it is also the beginning of a new problem.

title: Reunion
synopsis: Still unable to believe the truth, Mi Ryu continues aimly walking while carrying Anji as though it were his punishment. less

title: Choices
synopsis: The weak perish and the strong survive. As the bloodivores are tossed about by their cruel fate, Li Shin challenges Lu Yao, the strongest of the failures.

title: Sapphire
synopsis: Anji's wound is deep. To save her, Mi Ryu uses the data terminal forced on him by his father. However, through it he discovers a shocking truth.

title: Sacrifice
synopsis: The bloodivores and hemomancers fight together to survive. However, their alliance is fleeting—no more than a false friendship.

title: Hemomancy
synopsis: Bloodivores and hemomancers are gathered at the prison. Then monsters suddenly appear. As questions and suspicions mount, Mi Ryu is forced to recall unpleasant memories from his childhood.

title: Awakening
synopsis: Punished for a crime he didn't commit, when he awoke, Miryu found himself inside a mysterious facility. Waiting for him there was a survival game of life and death.

title: Bloodivores
synopsis: A case of insomnia swept across the globe. As a side effect of the drug developed to suppress this sickness of causes unknown, the “bloodivores” were born. Born from bloodivore and human parents, protagonist Mi Ryu was known as “The Child of Hope” tying bloodivore and humankind together. However, when Miryu is arrested as the principal offender in a bank robbery, he is taken to a special prison operated by the Bureau of Special Threat Management for observing bloodivores.

title: Hand 13: Old Friends
synopsis: The second round was absolutely grueling, with every school never letting up. Still, thanks to Saki's performance, Kiyosumi moves on to the semi-finals. After finding "Achiga Girls'" on the pamphlet, Nodoka asks Saki to come to the arena with her, but just outside, Saki has to stop for a moment.

title: Hand 12: Truth
synopsis: The 5th player match has finally progressed into the all-deciding south round. This is where Saki does something she's never done before: declaring a kan to then discard the tile she gets right away.

title: Hand 11: Threat
synopsis: Iwato Kasumi from Eisui Girls' High School changes into her 'offensive' mode after realizing that defense alone won't cut it. Kasumi's onslaught turns the tide completely. Himematsu High School entered the 5th player match in first place, but is now in last place.

title: Hand 10: Friends
synopsis: The 2nd round of the National Tournament is coming to a close. Himematsu High School's Suehara Kyouko bold playing style of declaring riichi after riichi backfires as she always ends up dealing into Miyamori Girls' High School's Anetai Toyone's chasing riichi hand.

title: Hand 9: Sortie
synopsis: Miyamori Girls' High School' s Usuzawa Sae completely blocks off Usuzumi Hatsumi. However, holding Hatsumi down every time she was the north player takes a heavy toll on Sae's body.

title: Hand 8: Fortress
synopsis: In the first half of the 4th player match, Nodoka completely finds her own style. The strongest emotion controlling her is that "Losing means we're going to be scattered all over".

title: Hand 7: Attention
synopsis: Enjoying the national stage, enjoying mahjong... Faced with her opponents, Hisa remembers that those are the important things and gets back into gear. However, she can't overtake Hiroe Atago, who had widened her lead in the first half of the 3rd player match, and Hisa ends in 2nd place.

title: Hand 6: Withering
synopsis: Despite putting up a good fight, Kiyosumi High's mahjong club ends up in third place behind Miyamori's Kosegawa Shiromi and Eisui's Jindai Komaki. Miyamori's Aislinn had shown overwhelming performances at the regional tournaments, so naturally all eyes were on her.

title: Hand 5: Gods and Demons
synopsis: Even after Miyamori's Kosegawa Shiromi scores a haneman tsumo win, Yuuki continues to drive the first player match in a favorable direction.

title: Hand 4: East Wind
synopsis: Thanks to Hisa's great performance, Kiyosumi's mahjong club makes it through the first round without Nodoka or Saki having to play at all.

title: Hand 3: Start
synopsis: The one who Hisa had dubbed the "Star of the camp" is Yumeno Maho. Saki is awed as Maho shows off her ability to copy the play style of all of the players of the Kiyosumi mahjong club.

title: Hand 2: Support
synopsis: After the matchups are all settled, Saki realized that she won't be able to play against her older sister un she makes it to the finals. Driven by her desire to face Teru, she vows again to make it to the finals. less

title: Hand 1: To Tokyo
synopsis: After making it through the fierce regional preliminaries, the Kiyosumi High Mahjong Club makes its way to the Nationals. In rapid succession, the representative schools for the other regions are decided as well and the powerful players make their way to the battleground.

title: Nationals
synopsis: The final decision match, and its members chosen from 4 schools, has started. However, upon arriving instead of training, everyone played around in the lounge. In the meantime, Saki and Nodoka slip out over the schools fence and share something that can only be bought with time...

title: Summer Festival
synopsis: Everyone decides to go to the summer festival to have fun, however Yuki must remain behind because she failed her final exam. Saki and Nodoka agree to stay back and help Yuki, however she is having a bit of trouble concentrating. During the same time, the Ryumonbuchi, Kazekoshi and Tsuruga clubs, each received a letter from Hisa...

title: Serious
synopsis: We finally welcome the Nationals for the individual tournaments. Saki needs to regain her strength with the ones that remain in this tough competition. Momoko goes into stealth mode for the strong, hard battle. At that time, Saki recalls the intensive training she had during training camp.

title: Promises
synopsis: The second day of the individual competition has begun. Team competition results have demonstrated that these players deserve the top rankings, however the individual competition is a different field...Before long, the morning competition comes to and ending, and upon checking the ranking, Nodoka can't believe what she sees.

title: Recollection
synopsis: Prefectural Representative Selection Ceremony for the individual competition has begun! Few turn out for the presentation, as preparation is the number one priority. As the names of the competitors are placed on the board, the Kiyosumi Mahjong Clubs vows to give it their all and focus on their training for the competition ahead. Meanwhile, a figure lurks in the shadows...

title: Sisters
synopsis: Kiyosumi High School mahjong members are instructed by the captain of the club to bring their swimwear for a special training session at the Sportsland Pool. Nodoka and Saki show off how beautiful they are in their swimsuits, attracting people and attention from all directions...

title: Friends
synopsis: Amae Koromo prevented Saki from extending the game. The scene became more and more tense as there was an overwhelming point spread where Amae Koromo was far ahead putting pressure on Kajiki, Ikeda, and Saki.The prefectural competition's finals, the last battle is about to begin.

title: Link
synopsis: Ikeda encountered a dilemma. They were the lowest ranked, and it seems they won't recovery from the point spread. Despite Ikeda's desperate condition, she was very determined to continue fighting as to come out on top. Saki, on the other hand, recalled her original playing style and naturally returned to it.

title: Nightmare
synopsis: Amae Koromo’s powerful lead ends the first half of the match. She is keeping the other schools as far as possible. Most of the players haven’t been able to hide their state of shock from what just went on. Ikeda cuddles up to Fukuji; Momoko encourages Kajiki; Saki and Hisa hold hands and make a promise together. So, begins the second half.

title: Conspiracy
synopsis: No matter how many tiles pile up, Saki, Ikeda, and Kajiki can't seem to advance. It's like being dragged along the bottom of an ocean. Amae Koromo seems to be the only one who is able to keep up....The nightmare begins...

title: Demon
synopsis: Finally, it's the last match of the prefectural team competition. It all depends on these four players. Kiyosumi's, Saki Miyanaga;Kazekoshi's, Kana Ikeda; Tsuruga's, Yumi Kajiki; and last year's MVP Ryumonbuchi's, Koromo Amae. The game is on!

title: Existence
synopsis: Nodoka is playing at a steady pace gaining points for her team. She is quickly advancing but Touka Ryumonbuchi will give her a hard time. Touka prevents Nodoka from having her "perfect game" resulting in extending the game.

title: Light Fever
synopsis: Nodoka played with such high tension that her health began to suffer. Slowly, her heart was filled with many feelings but she eventually felt better. Touka Ryumonbuchi was happy to finally meet her arch rival.

title: Awakening
synopsis: The main part of the competition has ended. Kazekoshi's Bundo was unable to maintain their lead. Just when she saw their captain Fukuji running toward her, tears began to pour out. Fukuji embraced the grieving Bundo!

title: Prank
synopsis: Hisa obviously starts the next match at a disadvantage. However, her style is claiming victory by confusing her opponents. She wants to overwhelm them and jump into first place. Ryuumonbuchi falls into last place and Kunihiro begins to feel...

title: Beginner
synopsis: Immediately following the commencement of the next match, Mako took off her glasses. With her blurred vision, she was reminded of an important game from the past which appeared right before her eyes. Those images are helpful when in critical situations.

title: Eyes Open
synopsis: The finals have started and Kiyosumi's mahjong club is in a state of panic! Tacos, the source of Yuki's power, was taken away. In shock, her sadness was seen during her plays. The match is with Kazekoshi's captain!!!

title: The Night Before
synopsis: Kiyosumi High School advanced to the next round of the National prefectural nominations. They all get to travel around the country together! Saki and Hisa experienced these feelings together. However, the players at Ryuumonbuchi, Kazekoshi, and Tsuruga refuse to be defeated!

title: Tradition
synopsis: Nodoka brought her stuffed penguin to the competition room. Those who noticed this were creating a commotion and eyes were fixed on Nodoka as some seemed irritated. It looked like the only person having fun with this was Hisa.

title: The Tournament Begins
synopsis: The prefectural nominations have finally begun! The girls from the favorites such as Kazekoshi slowly began to fill up the meeting area. That's when Saki strayed away from the group. During her solitude, she saw a member from last year's team championship from Ryuumonbuchi High School.

title: Training Camp
synopsis: In order to blow out the other teams at the prefectural qualifiers, training camp has started. Saki and Yuki are on their journey for their special training but in the meantime are enjoying themselves in an open air bath and dining on a delicious meal. Nodoka who is also part of the special training begins to think like Hisa which has caused her to become timid in her play.

title: Beat-down
synopsis: The day is drawing near for the National Mahjong Tournament for the prefectural nominations. Saki and Nodoka are at Mako’s house helping with the family’s store. Hisa begins to talk about the training when she really has something up her sleeve.

title: Confrontation
synopsis: Everyone senses that Nodoka feels uneasy when Saki plays. When it’s certain that the problem takes a turn, Nodoka explodes! Meanwhile, Hisa and Mako are nominated by their prefecture to participate in a high school’s mahjong tournament.

title: Battle
synopsis: Even though winning has been a difficult feat for Saki, Hisa proposes a mini-match to test Saki's true potential and reveal her hidden ability. In a powerful performance, Saki blows away Hisa's expectations, but was it too much for Nodoka?"

title: Encounter
synopsis: Saki doesn't understand why she was taken to play mahjong but that's where Saki and Nodoka met. Nodoka wins but questions Saki's playing style so she asks for another game.

title: Conquest
synopsis: At the battle of Hiei Mountain, Oda Nobuna will become history’s tyrant or something more.

title: The Retreat at Kanegasake
synopsis: The death of two retainers has caused Nobuna’s wraith to cover the land and fuel her conquest. But is this the right path.

title: Nobuna in Grave Danger
synopsis: Lies, secrets, and traitors will cost Nobuna victory and perhaps the death of one of her retainers.

title: The Battle at Kiyomizudera
synopsis: The storyline is continuing to change and events are not happening like they should. Nobuna’s trust in Sagara is waning, and the group plotting against Nobuna is making their move.

title: Golden Free City: Sakai
synopsis: Many do business in Saki, but when it comes an issue about money, you can only battle it out with an Iron Chef: Future vs. Sengoku.

title: Nobuna Advances on Kyoto
synopsis: Events are being changed thusly dropping Sagara’s usefulness. Nobunaga sends him to Kyoto to prepare for her arrival where he meets every man’s dream.

title: Sunomata Castle in a Night
synopsis: To build a castle in one night is preposterous, but Yoshiharu knows it’s the next move to make. But convincing Nobuna will take longer.

title: The Plan of the Genius Strategist
synopsis: For Oda to win against the advancing armies against her, she seeks the aid of Takenaka Hanbee. But meeting with such a reclusive figure prove to be near impossible.

title: Winds of Change! Okehazama!
synopsis: Nobuna has fired Yoshiharu, but a talk with Dousan has re-kindled his fire and he sets off to prove his worth to Oda Nobuna.

title: The Mino Disturbance
synopsis: The sons of Saitou Dousan have turned against him and he is forced to fight a losing war. At the same time Asai Nagamasa visits Nobuna with a proposal that could save many.

title: Oda Clan Power Struggles
synopsis: Yoshiharu has made the mistake of insulting Oda Kanjuurou Nobukatsu; he demands that Nobunaga deliver Yoshiharu head to him.

title: Nobuna and the Monkey
synopsis: Kinoshita Toukichiro is a big fan of the game, Lord Oda Nobunaga’s Ambition. But after waking up in a battlefield, the game has changed.

title: PV 2
synopsis: Promotional Video 3

title: PV 3
synopsis: Promotional Video 2

title: PV 1
synopsis: Promotional Video 1

title: The Dawn of Darkness ~ a sötét hajnal
synopsis: Kakeru figures out how to defeat Lisolette and save Yuka-- but it will take ironclad determination. In the meantime, Kakeru finally gets the answers he seeks about his past.

title: The Option of Destruction ~ válogatott-hoz kialvás
synopsis: Yuka has released Lisolette, the Witch of Babylon.

title: The Witch Awakens ~ bukott angyal
synopsis: The group has lost one of their own which has caused the group to become divided. Yukiko wants revenge, and Yuka wants nothing but to have Kakeru by her side forever.

title: Broken Bonds ~ törött kötés
synopsis: The bonds of friendship are tested when Superbia's plan is unveiled: sever the ties between Kakeru and Yuka.

title: The Witching Hour ~ félhomály öv
synopsis: Yuka finally awakens her power and wants to use it to protect Kakeru. However, Kakeru implores her not to use it, as he fears it will do more harm than good. Meanwhile, the Black Knight, Superbia, plans to eliminate the fragments.

title: Twisted Awakening ~ kanyargós ébredés
synopsis: Yuka goes missing in the Red Night. Everyone searches for her after Takahisa finds one of her belongings in the nurse's office.

title: Disturbed Minds ~ szíbtép fájdalom
synopsis: Kakeru finally awakens the power of the Eye of Aeon. However, possessing this power comes at a high price.

title: For Friends and For Tomorrow ~ barátoknak, holnapra
synopsis: Kakeru's main concern is protecting Yuka, but he struggles to conjure his power. The timing couldn't be worse, as they are once again transported to the Red Night. Once there, Kakeru finds himself up against a Black Knight.

title: A Smiling Mask ~ a doboz mögött maszk
synopsis: Kakeru is determined to find his power, but he cannot seem to awaken it. They are taken once more to the Red Night and are attacked by two of the Black Knights.

title: Lonely Pride～egyedülálló büszkeség
synopsis: Kakeru is determined to learn how to wield a sword so he can protect Yaku from the dangers that lurk in the Red Night. He asks Misuzu to teach him but she refuses.

title: The Girl in the Crystal ~ egy lány -ban kristály
synopsis: Kakeru and Yuka are thrown back into the Red Night dimension. This time they meet the powerful Misuzu Kusakabe, who saves them from a horde of the evil creatures. Then they come across a girl who is trapped within a crystal.

title: Red Night ~ Piros éjszaka
synopsis: Kakeru and Yuka are thrown into an alternate nightmarish world they call "Red Night".

title: Good-bye, Nyarko-san W
synopsis: The Banshin had been built in a day rather than 500 years, and Nyarko, Kuuko, and Hasuta are ordered to leave Earth as a result because they aren't needed anymore. The group goes to check to see what the Banshin actually is, as it determines if they really do have to leave or not. Will Mahiro have to say goodbye to Nyarko, Kuuko, and Hasuta?

title: A Certain Camp's Haunted House
synopsis: The whole group goes camping on a day off. Nyarko grills some suspicious meat on the BBQ and Mahiro won't eat it. Nyarko's friend, Atko, had sent them some chocolates, but Mahiro won't eat that, either. As they wander the forest, they find an old mansion. They attempt to explore it, but a rather unexpected surprise awaited them...

title: Yuggoth Attacks!
synopsis: Nyarko is usually happy and hyper, but she's caught a cold and is stuck in bed. Nyarko is smitten by Mahiro, who's being a little nicer than usual. It's then that they get a report that an intruder has shown up at the North Pole. They leave Nyarko behind to recover and find that Mi-go was waiting for them...

title: High School of the Heat
synopsis: "Yasaka Household, I have returned!" Kuuko's cousin, Kuune, seems rather mad that she had been left alone for so long. Once Mahiro and the others get to school, there is a strange aura surrounding it. Their classmates have fallen under a mass hypnosis and human-shaped flames attack the group. At this rate, the Earth is in danger! Is this the work of Kuune, or...

title: A Little Love Song
synopsis: Shanta-kun expresses that she'd like to be of some use to Mahiro who is always taking care of her and her master, so Kuuko gives her some red and blue candy. As soon as she ate it, she turned into a little girl! Shanta-kun tries really hard to be of some help to Mahiro, but Nyarko doesn't seem to like that. "There's no way that my pet is this little girl!" she said, as she chased them around...

title: Color the Pool Red with Blood
synopsis: Mahiro's mother, Yoriko, wins some tickets in a lottery for them to all go to the pool. Nyarko wears an amazing sexy and commando bathing suit to try to tempt Mahiro, as well as asking him to rub sun tan oil on her in an indoor pool. As Tamao works at the takoyaki stand that Luhi runs at the pool, she notices that Luhi seems to be troubled by something and tries to help her out...

title: I'll Try to Act it Out
synopsis: To try to chase Kuune away, Mahiro and Kuuko keep acting like a couple, but Kuune still isn't convinced after seeing their awkward date, adding that she can't see the subtle lust for each other in each other's eyes. After having to see Mahiro and Kuuko act like their are engaged to each other, Nyarko finally...

title: Say It Isn't So, Kuuko
synopsis: As usual, the Yasaka household living room is the gathering area for the deities and they're rowdy as ever. However after Mahiro's request that they make their own private living space, Nyarko, Kuuko, and Hasuta finally start building their rooms. A little worried, Mahiro decides to check on each of the rooms, and then they are suddenly visited by Kuuko's cousin, Kuune, who brings Kuuko news about a marriage appointment that's been set up for her...

title: Talent at Love
synopsis: Kurei Tamao is known as the "Walking Speaker." Not only is she the one to go to about gossip, but she's also famous for her advice on love. She's even had students from other schools ask her "What should I do about my cross-dressing childhood friend?" Knowing that, Nyarko decides to ask Tamao what she should do in order to get closer to Mahiro...

title: Super Deity Apocalypse
synopsis: The troubles from the library continue as the group travel to the ancient city of Alaozar. Before Nyarko can dispense justice the Great Old Ones pull an unexpected move.

title: Celaeno Library War
synopsis: The Celaeno Library in the Pleiades star cluster is home to the largest book collection in the universe. It's said that even variants of Yiu-th only handed out at events can be found there. Mahiro is dragged along for some reason as Nyarko goes there to return a book. Hasuta, a former worker at the library, does his best to show Mahiro around, but they soon encounter two evil deities who have infiltrated the library...

title: Attack on Evil Deity
synopsis: The deities of the Chutlhu mythos who live in ordinary high school student Yasaka Mahiro's home - Nyarko the Nyarlathotepian, Kuuko the Cthughan, and Hasuta the Hasturian - are enjoying the wonders of Earth entertainment yet again. They drag Mahiro along as they indulge in video games, shopping, cosplay, and more...

title: PV
synopsis: Promotional Video

title: He Waits, Dreaming
synopsis: His peace and quiet has been achieved, but to the extreme. Everybody is gone, everybody on the earth!

title: Lost Girl From the Stars
synopsis: The only thing Mahiro wanted was a quiet and simple life, is that dream impossible?

title: The Ruler of Super Time-Space
synopsis: If things couldn’t get worst after switching bodies with Nyarko, a visit to Isuka ends up in a battle to save the world!

title: I am Him and He is Me
synopsis: What was turning out to be a simple day was interrupted by Isuka-San, a time traveler who needs to borrow Nyarko’s body. But in her rush, not everything goes as planned.

title: Nyarko's Exciting High School
synopsis: Yoriko takes the group out souvenir shopping. While doing so, Mahiro happens upon an old game console. Whatever happens next, Mahiro better take the right route.

title: Blue Coral Reef
synopsis: As the group enjoys spending more time at the beach, Nyarko has become even clingier to Mahiro. Enough is enough, four words from Mahiro breaks Nyarko spirits causing her sanity level to drop rapidly.

title: The War in the Market
synopsis: After finding Mahiro’s mother, Luhy reveals her master plan that could mean game over for Mahiro, Hasuta, and Nyarko. Zombies, CEOs, and forks; how will this battle end?

title: Let's Go Great Conspiracy X!
synopsis: The person Hasuta is looking for is none other than Mahiro’s Mom. The more time Hasuta spends with Mahiro, he more his feelings grow and Nyarko is not having it. Before the fight for Mahiro can begin, a new player enters and their target is… Yoriko?

title: Mothers Attack!
synopsis: Mahiro's parents return suddenly from their trip abroad, giving the two aliens no time to come up with an excuse for living in their home, and leaving Mahiro flustered. The moment Yoriko hears Nyarlathotep's name, she flies into battle with a fork in each hand. Who knew Mahiro's own mother was a deity hunter? What an unbelievable secret! Mahiro tries to calm down Yoriko, but in the commotion, Noriko discovers Shanta-kun...

title: Yasaka Mahiro Wants to Live in Peace
synopsis: Someone has killed the gods of the Dreamlands, and their next target is Nyarko. Meanwhile, Nyarko moves into the Yasaka home and begins moving into Mahiro's every day and school life. Mahiro's anger continues to grow as Nyarko demands his affection. Kuko appears once again before the two when she transfers into their school. Having joined the Planetary Defense Organization, Kuko has been assigned to go to Earth to solve the Dreamlands murders with Nyarko.

title: "Goodbye Nyarko-san"
synopsis: Another day, another attack from the mysterious Nightgaunt monsters, and another resounding victory for Nyarko and her Space CQC. Rather than waiting for the monsters to attack, Nyarko announces her plan to go on the offensive. In order to take out all their enemies at once, Nyarko and Mahiro head to the underground auction held at their enemies' base, R'lyeh. However, the two find themselves face to face with an assassin, Nyarlathotep's archnemesis, Cthuga the Living Flame.

title: Like a Close Encounter of the Third Kind
synopsis: One night, Yasaka Mahiro finds himself under attack from a mysterious monster. In his moment of need, a silver-haired, green-eyed girl appears. "I'm the chaos that always crawls up to you with a smile, Nyarlathotep." Identifying herself as the deity from the Cthulu Mythos, she claims to have come to protect Mahiro. However, she tricks Mahiro into leaving his home, goes shopping at anime shops, and in general mixes business with her personal affairs. Meanwhile, they are assaulted by another mysterious monster. Why do these monsters keep attacking Mahiro?

title: Monster Strike The Movie
synopsis: Junior high school student Ren Homura and his friends are a team in Monster Strike. They combine the forces of different monsters and go to battle against their foes. But for some reason, none of them can remember a certain time in their past. One day, a monster appears from beyond space and time and sends one of them back. Ren and the others start to regain their memory as this incident unfolds. They remember a time when Monster Strike was a highly-kept secret, a time when only they, as children, were allowed to play it. The hidden truth of Monster Strike comes to light. And with it, the lost memories of a childhood adventure.

title: The Fated MSonic!
synopsis: MSonic is right around the corner. Unable to perfect Sonic Fever in practice, D'Artagnyan's nerves show. Shion encourages her. At the same time, the Wicked Pistols take the stage. Will Two for All be able to succeed?

title: A Growing Friendship
synopsis: D'Artagnyan decides she's not going to be beaten by Shion and starts to train. Shion sees this and starts to train alongside her. Soon after, they catch word about a music festival called MSonic! and decide to team up and try out. They're right in the middle of their audition, when suddenly...

title: Her First Day
synopsis: To survive as a pop idol, you have to team up. At least, that's what Nonno told D'Artagnyan. Now D'Artagnyan wants to join up with Shion, but something strange happens when she sees a day on the job with Nobunaga, The Demon King of the 6th Heaven!

title: The Great Roommate Shion
synopsis: To start her new life as a pop idol, D'Artagnyan moves to a dormitory in the city. There, she meets Mustang, Nonno, Alice, and all the rest of the older idols, who tell D'Artagnyan about her legendary roommate. But what kind of person will she be?

title: Shining Sonic Beam!
synopsis: D'Artagnyan goes about her everyday life until she makes a trip to Tokyo. There, she spots Lucy singing alone in the moonlight. Unable to forget the incredible sight, D'Artagnyan's friend Izumo invites her to see a concert featuring the popular Angelic Divas. Little did she know, that experience would completely change D'Artagnyan's life!

title: A Rhapsody Called Lucy -The Very First Song-
synopsis: Change the world with music? Foolish. Lucy's world stops after her band disbands. Meaning days pass, until she meets her cousin Lucifer and his bandmate Ibaraki Doji. They ask her to join their indie band, the "Wicked Pistols". Lucifer talks about his dream of going major after winning the MONSTERS ROCK competition, only for Lucy to reject him outright. However, Lucy's heart begins to thaw after a certain event... less

title: Mana, Angel of Love
synopsis: - Flames of purity, be my strength! - Ren and his Strike Ring awaken new powers within Mana. Miroku is unfazed by this new turn of events, but can Mana summon forth the power to stop the red moon?

title: Ryoma, Heart Ablaze
synopsis: Ryoma puts his life on the line in a battle against Miroku. Meanwhile, Ren tries to reach Mana but suffers serious injuries from the altar's defenses. It seems the time for Mana's awakening is soon at hand...

title: Death Match: Ryoma VS Miroku
synopsis: Ren and Ryoma venture inside the red moon's altar. Through the strength of their friendship, they defeat the spectral defenses and enter the altar's inner reaches, where they find Mana bound helply. To save her, it seems they'll have to go up against Miroku herself! less

title: Only thou can know what thou must do
synopsis: When it seems even Walpurgis's magic can't stop the monstrous Mana, Ren and company discover that Mana's real body is hidden inside Miroku's altar. Heeding Walpurgis's words, Ren and Ryoma rush onward to save Mana!

title: Target: Mana Anima
synopsis: Mana awakens as the bringer of the red moon. Upon transforming into a monster, she is attacked by an onslaught of missiles, but then she responds with her own overwhelming power. As the situation unfolds before them, Ren and company watch in horror. They desperately call out to Mana, hoping they can somehow bring her back to her senses...

title: Lucy VS Yomi
synopsis: As Ren and company press onward to save Mana, Akira and his group face a fierce battle against Yomi's Army of Doom. Just as things are looking bleak, out come Haruma and Lucy! Meanwhile, when Ren's group reaches the rooftop, they see something completely unexpected...

title: Yomi, Assassin of the Underworld
synopsis: Walpurgis reveals Mana's secret to Ren and company as Miroku continues her preparations at Madarame Tower. When Ren and crew head there to save Mana, Miroku summons forth the otherwordly Yomi to stop them dead in their tracks!

title: Save Mana! The Decisions They Each Make
synopsis: Leaving behind nothing more than a note, Mana suddenly disappears. Ren and the crew try to piece together where she could have gone, eventually going to speak to the heavily-injured Walpurgis. When Walpurgis tells them Mana's secret and her plan to sacrifice herself, Ren and crew rush to save her.

title: Mana's Hidden Truth Revealed
synopsis: As her friends lay in the hospital, Mana stands there, acting the same as always. But then she begins to think about what Miroku said, and conflict grows inside her. As troubling thoughts fill her head, she goes to see Walpurgis. Witnessing her injuries first-hand, Mana finally decides to...

title: An Overwhelming Gap in Strength! Miroku Stands in the Way
synopsis: Miroku's true intentions are finally clear. She says if the monster world and the human world continue to merge, the cosmos will near its end. To save it, Miroku plans to destroy the human world. Naturally, Ren and company are strongly opposed to this, but to stop her, it seems they have no choice but to fight...

title: The Beginning of the End
synopsis: With all of the Energy Points unleashed, Nostradamus foretells of a bleak future, leaving Ren feeling uneasy. Amidst this new development, President Madarame announces his newest project to the world. And just when it seems like things couldn't get any worse, Ren and Ryoma's greatest foe appears: Eden. Meanwhile, long after watching in silence, Miroku begins to make her move...

title: The Last Guardian
synopsis: Ren and company return from Taiwan to find the Energy Points in Japan causing a ruckus. Following Genma's instructions, they split into two groups to cover their targets. But right as they leave, they run into Haruma and Taiyo!

title: The Truth of Mazu
synopsis: The battle with Teach concludes, and the true killer of Mazu is revealed. Will they be able to save Meimei?

title: The Scheming of Blackbeard Teach
synopsis: Mana races inside a tornado to save Meimei from Teach, who wants the treasure of the God Mazu.

title: Admiral Navis the God Killer
synopsis: The group tries to solve the mystery of Mazu's murder with the help of Quanliyan, her former assistant.

title: The Lady Pirate Alwida's Arduous Battle
synopsis: Everybody's going to Taiwan! but when they get there, they find that Mazu, the goddess of the sea, has been murdered, and the pirates and the navy are at open war with one another.

title: Tsukuyomi VS Tsukuyomi: Zero
synopsis: The negative aspects of Tsukuyomi's personality are causing great harm to the people of Tokyo. The group must work together to stop her.

title: The Moon's Eternal Dreamer
synopsis: A strange phenomenon has been occurring recently in which the moon is full every single night. Ren and the others encounter the monster Suihanjar, who's on patrol to protect all the town's dinner tables, and learn that the moon goddess Tsukuyomi is probably behind the moon incident. What has happened to Tsukuyomi?

title: Robin Hood (Evolution)
synopsis: Ren and the gang follow a Monster Signal into the mountains, where they encounter a man who calls himself Robin Hood. He tells them that he came to this world in pursuit of some vicious monsters. Then the monsters he's been chasing, Gordi and Bardi, suddenly appear. All at once, the forest has become a battlefield!

title: Each of Their Feelings
synopsis: During a brief break, Ren and his friends decide to see a fireworks show. Aoi is overcome by a feeling she can't put into words when she sees the mood being set between Ren and Mana, but Napoleon and Nostradamus give her a push to be more honest with her own feelings...

title: The Eternal Endless Cycle
synopsis: Ren and the others struggle to deal with Hraesvelgr's assault as well as the attacks from Shambhala's right and left hands. Aoi and Nostradamus attempt to make contact with the young girl controlling Shambhalla, but she refuses to listen. So Nostradamus, vowing to change the future, launches a counterattack along with Aoi!

title: The Great Seer Nostradamus
synopsis: Ren and the others struggle to deal with Hraesvelgr's assault as well as the attacks from Shambhala's right and left hands. Aoi and Nostradamus attempt to make contact with the young girl controlling Shambhalla, but she refuses to listen. So Nostradamus, vowing to change the future, launches a counterattack along with Aoi!

title: The King of Terror
synopsis: Ren is searching for Nostradamus, the great seer of the monster world. He follows a monster signal to find Angolmois, a monster that serves Nostradamus. Having gained the cooperation of Angolmois, Ren and his friends race around Tokyo in search of Nostradamus!

title: Even the Fortune Teller is Baffled! Where's the Energy Point?
synopsis: To help President Madarame, Ren and his friends decide to search for the energy points hidden in various locations. During a visit to Harajuku in search of clues, they meet a fortune teller. But the fortunes they hear start to diverge in an unexpected direction, revealing the pasts of Walpurgis, Napoleon, and Ryoma...

title: The Singularity of All Creation
synopsis: After picking up a Monster Signal from the Rainbow Bridge, Ren and his friends rush there with President Madarame. When they arrive, they see the bridge enveloped in a flickering heat haze. In the midst of it, the guardian of the new energy point, Marici, appears.

title: A World With No Fighting
synopsis: Ren takes Mana to Odaiba, where they meet CEO Madarame of the Madarame group. Madarame is a rich and powerful man, and an MS player too! He takes a liking to the group and invites them back to his penthouse, where he tells them about the reason for the sudden rise in monster attacks.

title: CEO Madarame
synopsis: Ren and the gang have brought Mana to Odaiba. They expected a fun day of sightseeing, but suddenly face trouble when Kraken appears! Then President Madarame, an MS player who runs a huge company, and his monster, Miroku, make a grand appearance…

title: The Beautiful Angel's Steamy Case File
synopsis: In the hot-spring town, Akira and Genma encounter Raphael, who has come in search of healing waters. They join Ren and the gang, but just as they decide to enjoy the hot springs, they pick up a monster signal from the women's bath! Gabriel, Lucifer, and the rest engage in battle against the ruffians trying to disturb their bath time!

title: Holy Healing Hot Springs
synopsis: Ren and the gang visit a hot-spring resort after being invited by Mana. Just when they all think they can relax, something causes the hot water in the springs to boil. And then, Lucifer and Raphael appear…

title: Seventh Galaxy Explosion!
synopsis: Azazel uses his powers to create a horde of demons that overwhelm Sinbad. Sinbad's only chance is the manliness cannon aboard his warship, but he can't power it up fast enough alone. He'll need help from Ren... and Mana too?!

title: Chicken Skewers, Manliness, and the Voyager
synopsis: Maya has another crazy idea in her head: she wants to see Ren's "manliness". Ren takes her to a place that sells chicken skewers, where he meet the very manly Sinbad. But their manly meal is interrupted when Azazel comes to collect on Sinbad's debts, and he doesn't care how what happens to the people around him!

title: Walpurgis Night
synopsis: Mana and Walpurgis save the day at the last minute by defeating Fudou Myouou. Mana is now a full-fledged member of the team. But who is Walpurgis, and what does she want?

title: The Karmic Fist of Wrath
synopsis: Ren agrees to take Mana around to see the town, but she's anxious about and uncomfortable around Monster Strike. When Ren gives her a MS ring, however, she gladly accepts it, thinking it's an engagement ring. When she realizes her mistake, she runs off in shame... and that's when a monster makes it move.

title: The Transfer Student Is Impossible-Level?
synopsis: There are still monsters about, and the gang is spending their days fighting them. They go to school during the day, and when they're not at school, they protect the city from monsters. But their peaceful routine is interrupted by the arrival of Mana Livingstone: a transfer student from America who's got the craziest ideas about Japan!

title: The Long-Awaited Utopia
synopsis: The big threat is passed, but the gang's still got little threats to handle. The monsters are becoming a part of daily life, but there's one big thing missing: Oragon. One day, a powerful monster appears in the middle of town. It's got Oragon inside!

title: An Encore and Continuance: Pandora's Box
synopsis: After defeating the War Gods, Ren and his friends are living the dream. It seems like they've finally managed to regain their normal lives. However, a mysterious girl by the name of Pandora appears, bringing with her a box that must never be opened. An unfortunate incident results in the box opening (of course), setting the world up for some big changes...

title: [Finale] Strike Shot! An End and New Beginnings - We'll defeat you and reclaim everything! -
synopsis: Ren is thrown into despair as he is confronted with the amnesiac Aoi, Minami, and Akira. However, a familiar voice emerges from his smartphone. With smartphone in hand, Ren calls on the last remnants of his strength and goes toe to toe against Karma!

title: Of Light and Flame - Harken the light! -
synopsis: Attacking Karma is a double-edged sword—the party gets increasingly weak due to Karma's debuffs. Akira realizes a path to victory and dashes forward with Kamui, only to be cut down by Karma. Left with no options, Akira is handed a smartphone by Genma. He prepares to strike...

title: Karma, Light of War - The memories of humans are so beautiful... -
synopsis: Karma, the Light of War appears. Ren and friends battle to reclaim their memories, but there's something about Karma's arms...

title: Oraternative Memories - Do you believe in destiny? -
synopsis: A petrifying attack hits Oragon as he makes a stand. Oragon, on his last dregs of strength, begins to glow. A light flashes, parting to reveal the depths of Oragon's memories...

title: Ziggurat of Chaos - Feel the pain that I have felt! -
synopsis: Ren and friends level their resolve against Babel. Into the fray enters Himiko, Alice, and Romeo! The situation shifts and Oragon now finds himself the target of Babel's wrath...

title: The Descent of Angels - These memories... they're ours! -
synopsis: To reclaim Haruma's memories, the gang stands up to Babel. But Babel has only one target: Ren. Ignoring Ryoma and the rest of the monsters' attacks, Babel continues to aim for Ren. In the midst of the chaos, an "Angel" descends...

title: World Ender Babel - A despair deeper than death... -
synopsis: Babel has escaped the now destroyed physics research center. Now, it terrorizes the residents of Kaminohara. What did Babel mean by "a despair deeper than death"?

title: An End to the Past - We've been here in the past. -
synopsis: Kushinada has been defeated and Shino rescued—but at what cost? Monster Strike has spilled into the real world, leaving damage in its wake. Before the dust has settled, a message from Haruma arrives. He has found the physics research facility...

title: An Offering to Orochi - Dance until you break! -
synopsis: Kushinada's warps and cross laser put the gang on the defensive. Napoleon is defeated, while Ryoma and Alice are hanging on by a thread. But not all is lost, as Minami discovers a nifty trick...

title: The Sun Sets on Orochi
synopsis: In Kaminohara, Haruma sets out to find clues of Shino's whereabouts after her sudden disappearance. Ren and friends join in the search, but they come upon a giant snake who strikes without warning.

title: Off-the-Charts Performance!
synopsis: The gang arrives for XFLAG PARK. They have a blast at the venue, but they forget their original goal.

title: Gather in Kaminohara! - You need help? I'm there! -
synopsis: K is attempting to open another monster gate. To prevent K's plans from succeeding, the gang heads to a physics research facility. Taiyo and Shino join up in search of clues.

title: Akira and Haruma - I wanted to apologize for that time... -
synopsis: After discovering K's ambitions, Ren and the rest of the gang return to Kaminohara. Telling Haruma that he wants to check on something, Akira heads to the hospital where Haruma's mother lies in a coma.

title: The Truth of K - We were friends... -
synopsis: It becomes apparent that the one who sent Memento Mori was none other than K, who reveals himself to be Genma, Haruma's father. Why did the Warrior Gods appear? What is their connection to the happenings in Kaminohara? Genma reveals his ambitions...

title: In Darkness, Ryoma - Come to your senses, Haruma Kagutsuchi! -
synopsis: Shino, Mariko, and Kaoru rise against Memento Mori to rescue Haruma. Romeo, Alice, and Himiko's bump combos push back Memento Mori. However, in the field appears a black coffin...

title: The Imprisoned Lily - I will not let you have Haruma... -
synopsis: Memento Mori, the Spirit of War, shows herself to be the cause behind Haruma's pain. Ryoma holds the elemental advantage, fire against wood. As Ryoma moves in to finish the battle in one blow, a fog obstructs his path...

title: Death's Embrace - He's the one who killed me, your mother... -
synopsis: The indomitable dragon and fallen angel clash, lighting up the city. Both refuse to give an inch. Haruma struggles, torn between memory and reality. A mysterious shimmer appears...

title: Ryoma VS Lucy - I've trained—and now I'm here to see you again. -
synopsis: Ryoma sweeps the flock of a thousand Bahamuts in one fell swoop. In front of him appears Lucy and Haruma. Another deathmatch begins...

title: The Indomitable Dragon - I'll protect my friends and Haruma! -
synopsis: The gang battles desperately, fighting for their very own survival. Yet the enemy is simply too powerful. One by one, they reach the limits of their strength. In the end, only Ren is left standing. Ren's determination to protect his friends and Haruma resonate, awakening a new bond with Ryoma...

title: The Flock of Bahamut - One thousand?! -
synopsis: Lucy appears once more, jacking the entire city. A sinister smile signals the coming of a swarm of Bahamuts. As crows change to dragons, the skies of Shibuya are covered in darkness.

title: Blade Versus Gun - Return to ash... -
synopsis: Kamui is overpowered by Romeo's onslaught. Napoleon takes the full brunt of Himiko's strike shot. Even with the odds against them, Akira and Aoi continue fighting. They gather their strength for one final push, all for the sake of meeting Haruma again.

title: The Scarlet Shrine Maiden - Divine words hold great power! -
synopsis: An insane battle featuring Himiko's golem and Napoleon's rabbit army ensues. A flurry of lasers and explosions rock the battlefield. The scene then shifts to Akira and Taiyo battling against Kaoru. A demonic shadow materializes before Kamui and Loki...

title: Alice in a Mad Wonderland - I'll cut you into cute, tiny, bite-sized pieces. -
synopsis: Alice's gatling gun and deadly trump minions push back Minami's Dead Rabbits. The Rabbits manage to strike back. But instead of weakening, Alice becomes crazed and rips off a maniacal strike shot!

title: Booya! Return to Shibuya - Don't even think about touching Haruma! -
synopsis: The team returns to Shibuya with Taiyo and his team. There they reunite with Haruma. However, Haruma refuses to speak and dissapears, leaving behind a new enemy in his wake.

title: An Accidental Double Date
synopsis: Ren is invited by both Aoi and Minami to go out shopping for their victory celebration. In a stroke of stupidity, Ren manages to double book both of the girls. How will he manage to escape from his perilous situation?

title: Assemble, Assault, and Assail - It's always a party! -
synopsis: The team is barely staying afloat against Nirvana. Their attacks are ineffective and laughed away by the drunken Battle God. It's taking everything they have to stay one step ahead. In a stroke of luck, a ray of light is assessed in the shape of a hole in a strange place.

title: Nirvana, Inferno of War - It's always a party! -
synopsis: The age of idols ends with Ren and the rest intact. They've managed to avoid Snow Bow, but instead of disappearing, the field becomes consumed by fire. From the depths of the inferno, a mysterious presence appears!

title: Melodious Snow Bow - Here's a bow, tied right on your heart. -
synopsis: After a furious succession of battles, the gang finds themselves resting at Minamikaze. But there, an out-of-control Akane storms onto the scene?! To stop her, a battle begins, but there the first notes of a concert unfold.

title: Dark Usurper Zeus - From the heavens... -
synopsis: Ren's vowed to bring out Ryoma's potential, but is once again pushed back by an enemy stronger than Sakura—Dark Usurper Zeus. With even Kamui and Napoleon struggling, Ren remembers words Akira has spoken in the past. And then...?

title: The Saber Amid the Blossoms - Impossible's just a ten letter word! -
synopsis: Ryoma's on the ropes, unable to display his true power. Ren's time to shine has come to an abrupt end, but behind him the calvalry arrives. Aoi and Napoleon attack head-on and begin to turn the tables. Will it be enough to snatch victory from defeat?

title: Come One and All: MS Club - Defeat the top four! -
synopsis: Haruma's on a different level. To meet him again, Minami announces the creation of Club MS —all in the name of reaching the top in Kaminohara. However, the student council's president may have a few complaints...

title: From the Ring, Hope - A new monster takes the stage! -
synopsis: Haruma's words stab at the hearts of Ren and his friends. After their crushing defeat at Haruma's hands, the team lies broken. Amid the gloom, the strike ring glows —a faint flicker of hope that brings the promise of a new meeting.

title: Lucy the Annihilator - Bow before the lord of the fallen! -
synopsis: The team is locked in a desperate battle against Underworld Rebel Lucy. Blasted by a fiery energy circle, they fire off their Strike Shots, only to be denied by an impervious barrier. How will the dice fall?

title: Where Art Thou, Haruma? - You're not even on the same level. Begone! -
synopsis: The team searches for Haruma in Shibuya. A gigantic monster gate appears. As Ren and friends prepare for a throwdown, a mysterious attack destroys the monsters. Could it be, Haruma?

title: Pieces of Memories - We played MS in the past? -
synopsis: Ren and his team manage to escape from Doom's grasp. Monster Strike and all the strange happenings associated with it leaves the gang with more questions than answers. K's prophetic words linger—"The answers lie in your past."

title: Counter! A Strike Shot for the Ages!- xThere's always an answer! -
synopsis: Kamui goes berserk, and Fox Metal falls out of the ring. Doom's strength devastates the entire party. All appears lost, until Ren begins to figure out the rules.

title: Beware the Warrior God - You end here! -
synopsis: The deathmatch against Izanami Zero has ended, but a new threat appears. Who is K (King), and what is he aiming for? And a warrior god appears?! The curtains rise, unveiling a new season of Monster Strike the Animation!

title: Izanami - Past despair, there was... -
synopsis: Akira’s fine play should have turned the tables, but the dark aura surrounding Izanami Zero pushes the team to despair. It’s a do-or-die situation!

title: Impossible Task - Are they serious?! -
synopsis: There may be a connection between MS Coliseum and the strange happenings in Kaminohara. To investigate, the team sneaks into the coliseum. There an ominous shadow appears...

title: Ora-gone?! - No more secrets. Ora ora ora! -
synopsis: Is there a connection between Oragon and the possessed?! The team harbors doubts about Oragon while investigating his secret..

title: Welcome, Minami! - Enter a new comrade—but she's an airhead? -
synopsis: After the victorious battle, Ren and Aoi welcome the no-longer-possessed Minami into the team. To form a team of four, Aoi once again asks Akira but...

title: Shopfront Shocker - Leave this to me! -
synopsis: The team challenges Minami in a bid to remove the embarassing video. While being pushed back by Minami's aggression, something becomes clear...

title: SOS! A Shocking Video?! - If you want to erase it... -
synopsis: Minami has decided to destroy Aoi outside of Monster Strike. As announced, Minami uploads a shocking video of Aoi. Can they stop the out-of-control Minami?

title: Evil Eye Minami - A mild and ditzy girl? -
synopsis: Ren and the others set out to convince Minami to rejoin the team. They find a cursing Minami in the midst of a ferocious battle. Can Aoi manage to recruit Minami?

title: Operation Recruit Akira
synopsis: Aoi carries out Operation Recruit Akira—leading to a no-holds-barred blitz aimed at persuading Akira to rejoin the team. Is success around the corner?

title: The Glinting Blade
synopsis: Akira appears, bringing renewed hope to the desperate pair. Unfortunately, he refuses to fight as a team. Can the trio win the battle?

title: Mall Brawl
synopsis: Ren and Aoi are attacked by a mysterious team of junior high schoolers. Backed into a corner, the two fight back...

title: A Night At The Colloseum
synopsis: Ren decides to challenge the Colosseum after being inspired by the epic battles between monsters. But Aoi's a stickler and wants to do things right before joning the fray.

title: Aoi Mizusawa's Secret
synopsis: Almost every junior high student in Kaminohara plays Monster Strike. After a brief meeting, Aoi invites Ren to a special place—one where MS players gather.

title: Slingshot Away! Call Me Oragon!
synopsis: Ren is forced into a heated battle with the bestial Fenrir X. Unable to control his companion Oragon and on the verge of defeat, a girl appears before Ren. Who could she be?

title: The First Strike!
synopsis: Ren returns to the town of his childhood, Kaminohara. Strangely, Ren is unable to recall any memories of the town. Meanwhile, his smartphone installs a mysterious game called Monster Strike — heralding the start of a desperate battle!

title: Kon of Knack
synopsis: Kon shows every one what being a Hyperion is all about.

title: Knighthood
synopsis: It’s an all-out war between the Empire, Jugglaburk, and the hidden hand of the Ulga.

title: No Margin
synopsis: The easy part was becoming a Hyperion; the hard part is dealing with family.

title: Before Crisis
synopsis: The beginning of the group, Incognito, is a unique tale that requires sharing.

title: Metamorphose at Gate
synopsis: The Mysterious woman has brought Ecarlate and her group along with Erec and his team to tell them the reason behind everything.

title: Xing Point
synopsis: Ecarlate and Jugglaburk will spend their first night together and Ecarlate is prepared to fulfill her duties. Kon is beside himself and can’t handle the atmosphere.

title: Off Key
synopsis: The cowlick is back and the Princess wants to sing. Sing Kon! Sing Mari! Sing Sainglain! The world depends on it!

title: Formality and Obstruction
synopsis: No matter what Incognito does they can’t seem to foil the wedding ceremonies. But after seeing Kon laying out dominos, Erec can’t take any more and does the unthinkable.

title: Bridal Service
synopsis: Kon answers on how to get home are at the research center, but when he makes it the lab chief will not give up any answers without payment.

title: Hit Back
synopsis: Incognito has been ordered on stand by and therefore unable to track the still alive Kon. But that won’t stop one member from sneaking aboard the Lords airship and putting a bullet into his enemies.

title: Midnight Trial
synopsis: Kon just wants to make it to the library but will uncover the capitals many hidden societies, whether he likes it or not.

title: Evidence Veiled
synopsis: While the group debates the best way to continue on to the capital, Kon discovers something interesting about their furry little friend.

title: Accidental Contact
synopsis: Miranda is so full of love and joy she has to spread her energy no matter what. When Kon catches her eye it must be fate, but he just keeps ruining it.

title: Behavioral Examination
synopsis: Gustave has taken it upon himself to observe Marion and Sanglain following the death of the Princess and DT. But KT thinks Gustave is in the city of Marquesas for other reasons.

title: Unexpected Victory
synopsis: A surprise attack by Erec and his men with their new super weapons leave Kon and crew running for their lives. In the aftermath, each group is left with a prisoner of war to “interrogate”.

title: Home Sick
synopsis: Kon has seemed to have lost his mind and reverted back to his days as an anti-social gamer nerd. The princess has ordered Marion and Sainglain to bring him back to his senses.

title: Incognito Trail
synopsis: Erecpyle travels with the mysterious beauty Alma Flora to retrieve a new weapon; meanwhile the announcement of his return has caused his subordinates to fight for the honor of Erec’s right hand man.

title: Shining Master
synopsis: Kon-trol, Kon-sumer, Kon-vention, Kon-pact, Kon-vict?

title: Keep On
synopsis: What should have been a relaxing trip to the hot springs and complicated by Kon’s glowing inability to control his self and that Erec is staying at the same Inn.

title: Highness Guardians
synopsis: The group has never been in more danger than now. The princess has entered her hyperactivity period and no person, city, or country is safe if she reaches her danger zone.

title: Beautiful Life
synopsis: Marian is a trap, something Kon keeps forgetting. When he ask about Marian's back story, the story he is given is…expected.

title: Pretty kama
synopsis: Erec has returned home to recover, a plot against honor and family is hatched against him.

title: Newcomer v.s. Kon
synopsis: While Erec deals with the loss of another family jewel. Kon is in a battle against a furry little creature.

title: Erecpyle Dukakis
synopsis: After his defeat to Kon, Erec has been left lopsided. Meanwhile, Kon wants to find a way home but the Princess has other plans.

title: DT
synopsis: Kon was getting nowhere in the game until a character by the name of Flora asked for his help in the “real world”

title: PV
synopsis: Promotional Video

title: The Gongen-sama on the Northern Mountain | Anchin and Kiyohime
synopsis: A goddess lives on the northern mountain. Kiyohime becomes a snake and attacks the one she loves.

title: The 16th Day Cherry Tree | Monkey Bridge
synopsis: A cherry tree blooms on the night of the full moon. A bridge-maker makes a bride over a steep canyon.

title: The Monk Who Went to Hell | Mito Mitsukuni Is Hungry
synopsis: A greedy priest is sent to hell. A great man named Mito Mitsukuni is very hungry.

title: The Colt that Escaped from a Painting | The Cold Soup Granny
synopsis: A horse from a painting comes alive. A recipe is made for cold soup.

title: Ishidoumaru | Konoshiro and Matsue Castle
synopsis: A boy called Ishidoumaru searches for his father. A lord battles a monster in his keep.

title: Yagorou-don and the Men | The Bug-Sending of Tsugaru
synopsis: A giant called Yagorou-dono lived long ago. A god drives away insects from crops.

title: The Mountain Monk Tanuki | The Doll Stones of Kintai Bridge
synopsis: A raccoon disguises itself as a mountain monk. A woman is sacrificed to make a bridge sturdy.

title: The Paper Bag Wind | Tanabata-san's Present
synopsis: A man bags the wind. An ancient legend about Tanabata is still told to this day.

title: Mountain Granny Shrine | Sugawara Michizane and the Legend of the Flying Plum
synopsis: A mountain grannie repays those who are kind to her. A child prodigy is banished far from the capital.

title: The Swordsman and the Bale of Straw | The Pack Carriers of Mackerel Highway
synopsis: A samurai breaks a teacup owned by a poor man. Pack runners carry salmon along a mountain path.

title: Three Grains of Rice, Three Grains of Gold | Jirochou of Shimizu
synopsis: Three grains of rice become three grains of gold. A man named Jirochou is an inpsiration to everyone.

title: The Invisible Man | The River Otter of Shimanto River
synopsis: A man becomes invisible and feels very alone. A river otter is tricked by dastardly shrimp.

title: The Mountain Granny's Mochi | Namahage
synopsis: A mountain granny brings prosperity in exchange for delicious mochi. Horrible creatures called Namahage strike a town in Akita.

title: The Farting Wife | The Chef of Shuri Castle
synopsis: A wife farts so hard that she blows down trees. A chef in Okinawa competes for the best dish.

title: The God Riding on a Cucumber | Use an Abacus to Make Kaga a Million Koku
synopsis: A god rides on a cucumber. A lord becomes rich using his abacus to keep expenses down.

title: Yajiemon and the Big Bear | Nikkou Toushougu and Hidari Jingorou
synopsis: Yajiemon fights a giant bear. A man designs the gate for a temple after badly injuring his left hand.

title: Wanting To Be Poor | The Blessings of Uzumi
synopsis: A man wants to be poor. A lord forbids his people from luxuries.

title: The Man Who Wanted to be a Black Kite | The Mountain Princess of Yakushima
synopsis: A man wants to be a black kite. A sinister creature haunts a tree on a island.

title: The Priest and the Old Tanuki | Otane's Lake
synopsis: A priest becomes friends with an old raccoon. A beautiful woman called Otane meets a sad fate.

title: Eyeball Swapping | The Byakkotai
synopsis: A man becomes a doctor after his eyeball falls out. In Aizu, the Byakkotai dies at the end of a war.

title: The Rain of the Setomono Festival | The Silkworm and the Wife Lord
synopsis: A hard-working potter learns the secrets of lacquerware. In Shirataki, the wife is the boss.

title: The Ship Ghosts of Usa | The Tanuki War of Awa
synopsis: A ship of ghosts tries to drag the living to the bottom of the ocean. Raccoons fight a war in Awa.

title: The Bikki Wife | The Oumi Merchant
synopsis: A man marries a frog wife. A merchant from Edo teaches people a valuable on about quality goods.

title: Heishirou of Dokkoi Makabe | Standing on Mt. Fuji
synopsis: A boy becomes high priest after a lowly upbringing. A girl becomes the first woman to stand on Mt. Fuji.

title: The Sesame Seed Manjuu | The Beginning of Dougo Hot Springs
synopsis: A woman uses sesame seed buns to turn people into cows. The hot springs at dogo are discovered.

title: The Rice-Spouting Priest Statue | The Dog Goes to Ise
synopsis: A priest statue spits out yummy rice. A dog goes to Ise.

title: Ninja Isuke and the Oosanshouuo | Arita-yaki Shine like Persimmons
synopsis: A ninja learns secret techniques. New methods for pottery are divised.

title: The Dream-Telling Priest Statue \ The Iwatsuki Doll
synopsis: A priest statue gives warnings in dreams. A master dollmaker makes a doll from unique materials.

title: Daikoku-sama and Denzaburou the Rich Man | The Tanuki Priest and Kenchin Soup
synopsis: A lazy man becomes rich with the help of a god. A raccoon gathers donations for a temple.

title: Osengafuchi | The Medicine-Seller of Toyama
synopsis: A man falls in love with a carp he catches in a lake. A lord learns the ways of herbs.

title: A Story of Sage Kume | The Moon, The Buddha, and My Soba
synopsis: A man wants to be a Sennin but fails, so he becomes a salesman instead. Kobayashi Issa, the haiku poet, thinks of the sun, the moon, and his soba.

title: The Power Given by an Ogre | The Okesabushi of Okei
synopsis: An oni gives a girl great power. A cat of repays the kindness of its owners.

title: The Pilgrim and the Bath / The Slaying of the Monster of Himeji Castle
synopsis: A man gets a bathtub stuck to his butt by an angry god. A warrior challenges the ghosts of Himeji castle.

title: Tanuki Fields | The Orange Boat of Bunzaemon
synopsis: Tanuki plow a field for a kind man. Bunzaemon becomes rich selling oranges.

title: Houko-san | Wabicha and Senno Rikyuu
synopsis: A girl sacrifices herself to save her master's daughter. Sen Rikyuu creates a new style of tea.

title: The Tofu Priest Statue | Hiraga Gennai
synopsis: A greedy man wants to cheat customers out of tofu. A lowly merchant grows to great riches.

title: The Giant Barley Straw Snake | Uesugi Youzan Makes It Work
synopsis: A snake made of straw comes to life. Uesugi Youzan makes things happen.

title: The Beefy Biceps Given by a Ghost | The Yummy Miso that's a Hacchou Away
synopsis: A ghost makes a man strong. Good miso is found only a short distance away.

title: Doukan | Priest Enkuu
synopsis: A peasant hears about Japanese poetry and decides to try some for himself. A monk whittles 100,000 statues of buddha.

title: The Wolf Rich Man | Shouki-san and the Demon Roof Tile
synopsis: A man gains the ability to see others for the animals they really are. A demon roof tile brings misfortune.

title: The Golden Ladle | The Chaguchagu Pony
synopsis: An ogre possesses a golden ladle. A young boy's beloved horse is brutally treated by a rich man.

title: Chikaraishi Plays Sumo | The Great Buddha of Nara
synopsis: A man named Chikaraishi battles Kappa for sumo supremacy. The great buddha of Nara is built over a period of decades.

title: The Akoya Pine | The Spicy Lotus Root of Higo
synopsis: A girl falls in love with the spirit of a pine tree. A frail lord is tempted into eating more by the power of mustard and lotus root.

title: Granny Orin and the Bottle Rock | The Madara Demon God and Kannon-sama
synopsis: An old woman sacrifices herself to bring prosperity to a starving village. A demon god repairs a destroyed temple.

title: Anju and Zushiou | Kicchomu-san the Sharp
synopsis: A brother and sister escape from enslavement. Stories are told of Kicchomu, who is famous for his cleverness.

title: The Hunter and the Oni | The Three Shrine Festival of Asakusa
synopsis: A hunter outwits a giant ogre called an oni. Two sons find a statue of one of the buddhas while trying to catch fish for their sick mother.

title: Kappa Stone | The Moss Ball of Akan Lake
synopsis: A boy throws a rock at a baby kappa, and its father puts a powerful curse on him. The lake moss of the Ainu come to be refered as the heart of the forest.

title: The Catfish God | Inou Tadataka
synopsis: A wife unwittingly offends a powerful catfish god. Inou Tadataka becomes the first man to make a map of Japan.

title: The Bamboo Shoot Child | The Demon Kite of Ikinoshima
synopsis: A child appears from inside a stalk of bamboo. A village makes a kite with the face of an oni.

title: Sameuratarou Became a Rock | Koukichi Flies Through The Sky
synopsis: A whale turns into a rock. A man wants to learn to fly, but runs into resistance from the Japanese government.

title: Little One Inch | The Great Snake of Onnagawadani | The Rain Calling Boddhisatva
synopsis: Issun Boushi is very small. A great snake threatens the villagers of Onnagawadani. A Bodhisattva calls the rain.

title: Urashima Tarou | The One Ka Priest | The Body-Throwing Stone
synopsis: Urashima Tarou visits an undersea palace. A priest teaches a magistrate a on for wasting his time. A horse falls in love with a princess. less

title: Kintarou | The Curse of the Utou Bird | Yattobei and the Tengu
synopsis: Kintarou grows up to be big and strong, and fights a demon. The Utou birds unleash a terrible curse. Yattobei battles a Tengu.

title: Momotarou | The Guardian of Farts | The Mitten Crab Repays a Debt
synopsis: Momotarou is born from a peach. A man protects a storehouse with his giant farts. A mitten crab repays a debt.

title: The Tanuki Forest of Shoujou Temple | The Night Forest of the Hina Dolls | The Man Who Almost Became a Cat
synopsis: Raccoons play the drums at Shoujouji temple. Hina dolls play drums throughout the night. A man almost become a cat.

title: The Medicine that Works Here and There | The Monster Master | The Frog of Kyoto, the Frog of Osaka
synopsis: A woman wants a drug to slowly kill her mother-in-law. An old man is terrible to his servants, even when those servants are monsters. A frog from Kyoto and a frog from Osaka visit each other's cities.

title: Starfire | Yam Forest | The Ageha Butterfly Repays a Debt
synopsis: Two boys catch a star. A greedy old woman won't share her yams. A butterfly repays a debt.

title: The Badgers of Noto Island | Fukusuke-san, the God of Blessing | Shiro and the Little Kid
synopsis: Badgers protect an island. Fukusuke becomes the god of bing. Acolytes at a temple are jealous of a smart dog.

title: Sadaroku and Shiro | The Man Who Healed the Dragon's Eye | The Talisman Bead of the Oni
synopsis: A faithful dog tries to save his master and fails. A good doctor spreads medicine even after being betrayed. A boy challenges demons to win back the medicine he needs for his sick mom.

title: The Priest's Hand Towel | A Story of Fuki | A Thousand Ships of White Sesame Seeds and a Thousand Ships of Black Sesame Seeds
