A priest brings back candles as a gift, but the villagers don't know what they are. One pretends that they're a kind of food...

title: The Cat's Teacup / Monogusatarou / The Monkey and the Toad
synopsis: A man finds an expensive bowl being used as a cat dish and schemes to get it. A lazy man is sent to the capital to work. A monkey and a toad go to Ise, but the monkey does all the work.

title: The Priest Statue Falls in Love / The Flat Nose of the Trickster Fox / A Room with an Owl
synopsis: A statue falls in love and goes to visit its lover every night. A trickster fox loves to tease an old man, but one night it goes a little too far. An owl dies a crow different colors, but the crow doesn't like them.

title: Asamutsu Bridge / The Strong Wife / The Flower-Watching Ghost
synopsis: A man looks for a box of treasure at a bridge A couple is dealing with a violent governor. An old man who loves to drink finds a skull in a field.

title: The Bean and the Priest Statue / The Reed Spring / White Bird Pass.
synopsis: An honest old man's bean is eaten by a priest statue, and in exchange he gets a demon's treasure. A man saves a snake from a volcano and is given a reed full of water that will make a spring. A farmer saves a wounded swan, and marries a beautiful woman.

title: The Soul that was Hunted by the Dead / Octopus Bhaisajyaguru / The Nursing Willow
synopsis: A wife weaves her loom to raise money for the family, but the spirits of the dead hear the sound and come to claim her soul. A monk buys some octopus for his ailing mother, but an irritating local man calls him out. A man raises his daughter alone, and one day a woman under a willow tree gives her milk.

title: The Buddha That Keeps Away Fire / The Curse of the Willow / The House That Would Not Eat Salmon
synopsis: There is a kid who works hard but the priest has never seen him work hard. Yahei's friends cut down a willow tree, and their tongues were ripped out of their throats and they died horrible deaths. Okoma is kidnapped by an eagle and saved by a salmon.

title: Dragon God Granny / You Can't Shake Sleeves You Don't Have / The Raccoon Wood of Shoujou Temple
synopsis: An old woman who is an excellent midwife hears a woman in pain with a difficult birth. A man saves a snake and is rewarded with a strange sleeve that creates money when shaken. A ghost in an old temple turns out to be a raccoon.

title: The Mole and the Sun / The Fox Repays a Debt / Drinking Tea
synopsis: The mole clan is very rough and violent. They plan to shoot down the sun. A young hunter saves a fox from being eaten by a snake. An old man known for his wit wins a game against the local lord, who challenges him to bring 10 barrels of tea seeds in an attempt to get revenge.

title: Ikkyuu-san Defeats the Tiger / The Mountain God and the Child / Tsurumizuka
synopsis: Ikkyuu is a smart young man. The shogun hears about him and gives him a difficult task: defeating a tiger that lives inside a painting. A child meets an old man in the mountains who tells him that if he goes to the mountain god's shrine and prays, his wish will come true. An old man saves a crane who's been caught by some children.

title: The Bride on a Hazy Moonlit Night / Hitomokko Mountain / The Flying Shed
synopsis: A poor young man lets a traveling girl stay the night in his hut, and ends up marrying her. Two giants compete to build the largest mountain in Japan. A rich man sends a letter to a local priest. If he'll come to the rich man's house and pray, he'll be given a barrel of rice.

title: The Carried Priest / The Man Who Knew Hell / The Ghost Ladle
synopsis: Late one night, a thief tricks a priest into letting him ride on his shoulders, hoping to steal the priest's cloak. A priest stays the night at an old temple, where he sees demons torturing a young girl. A sailor is attacked by ghost ships in the Seto Inland Sea, and is the only survivor.

title: The Treasure Swamp / Tatsukohime / Kurohime and the Dragon
synopsis: A rich man learns of a treasure in a swamp and forces his servants to drain it. Tatsuko goes to a shrine in the mountain every night seeking eternal beauty. The black dragon, who is the master of a huge swamp, wants to marry the beautiful Kurohime.

title: The Weasel and the Rat / Kotaro and the Dragon / The Thunder God and the Girl
synopsis: A weasel and a rat plant a field with chestnuts because they're starving. Kotaro goes to visit his mother up the river when the woman who raised him dies. A lightning god comes to Earth and finds a woman who he falls in love with.

title: Matsu Goes to Ise / The Zatou's Tree / The Powerful Servant
synopsis: A young man meets an old man on the way to Ise, and promises to visit his village. A boatman saves a blind man from a flood, but the blind man dies. A rich man has a very powerful servant. The servant is smart, too, so the rich man gives him one challenge after another.

title: The Trout Repays a Debt / The Foreigner's Cowbones / The Six Warriors
synopsis: A man works hard at tilling an arid field near a river. A girl saves his mother from drowning and he marries her. A foreign ship crashes near a small fishing village.A young man leaves on a journey to become strong, and encounters more and more friends with surprising talents.

title: The Sun and the Golden Rope / The Kid and the 31 Characters / Ushiwakamaru
synopsis: A mother raises two sons alone after her husband dies. A boy at a temple hides two buns to give them to a kind family, but snow falls and he doesn't know where they are... The Tengu of Mt. Kurama gives Ushiwakamaru his father's sword, and trains him to become a great samurai.

title: Masakichi and the Jizo Statue / The Bee and the Bandit / The God of Death
synopsis: Masakichi, a fisherman who picked up a priest statue from a wrecked ship, is visited by it in his dreams. The merchants of Kyoto are attacked by bandits. They manage to escape but their horses and goods are stolen. A loser meets the god of death, who tells him to become a doctor. He does as he's told and immediately becomes very rich...

title: Eating in Order / The Old Woman Who Became a God / Yayoi's ship
synopsis: A master hunter goes to the mountain, where he has a dream of a frog eating a worm, and then being eaten by a snake. An Ainu village is attacked, and an old woman and her grandson Tonkuru escape into the forest where they get separated. A girl named Yayoi crosses the mountains every day to go to work, and each day she would talk to a tree.

title: Takohachi the Headman / The Rich Man and Bracken / The Wife's Talent
synopsis: With the help of his loving son, an old octopus fisher goes on a trip. There was a very rich man who promised to pluck all the warabi off the mountain in a single day. An old couple turn to fraud to make more money at their store, but drive customers away.

title: The Sending Star / The Promise with the Master of the River / Gonbei the Duck Hunter
synopsis: The Sending Star: A young, hard-working man hears that his grandmother is dying. He visits her house and sees that she is fine. On his way home, he finds himself in great peril... A promise with the master of the river: A boy is born and it is prophesied that his life will be taken by the master of the river when he turns 18. The year of his 18th birthday, a huge rain causes the river to almost flood. Gonbei the Duck Hunter: A hunter named Gonbei ties a rope around the legs of 50 ducks stuck in the water, but when it melts they fly off, dragging him towards a great adventure.

title: The Monk and the Turtle / Kijimuna / The Stingy Memorial
synopsis: The monk and the turtle: A travelling monk saves a turtle, and the turtle later saves the monks life. The turtle reappears when the monk is in grave danger. Kijimuna: A mountain occurs near a small village, and the guardian tree of the village is burnt down. A mischievous fairy called a Kijimuna appears to beg for food, but he has a very good reasons. The stingy funeral: There was once a very stingy man. He doesn't know who to give his money to when he dies. So he asks his three sons what kind of funeral they'd give him.

title: The Phoenix / The Wood Buddha and the Gold Buddha / Shibahama
synopsis: The people of a village are beset by a firebird. They call upon the Lion King to protect them, and a great battle begins. A wooden buddha made by a faithful believer and a rich man's golden buddha have a sumo match. The rich man bets everything he owns, and the young man offers to become his servant forever, as a strange battle behinds. A lazy drunkard finds a wallet and uses it to throw a huge party. But when he wakes up it was a dream...!?

title: Render the Fat / The Star Wife / The Rich Kashiki
synopsis: A lazy man who wants to not work goes to a mansion where they feed him feasts every day. The eldest of the seven sisters of the big dipper falls in love with a man. A man on a fishing ship who makes the food, called a Kashiki, gave the leftovers to the fish.

title: The Mountain Grannie of Mt. Choufuku / Sadaroku and Shiro / Zashiki-Warashi
synopsis: The mountain grannie has given birth to a child and the villagers are told to bring Mochi. The talented hunter Sadaroku is never found without his hunting dog, Shiro. He has a license to hunt wherever he wants, but one day he leaves it at home and is arrested. A traveling medicine seller stays at a mansion where he is visited by three young children in a dream. They were Zashiki Warashi, said to bring prosperity.

title: Gonpachi and Tsubaki / The Thousand League Sandals / Mother and Child Hill
synopsis: Gonpachi was working hard at a gold mine to raise money for his family. Three brothers get lost in the mountains and find themselves at the house of a terrifying mountain grannie. A traveler comes to an inn on the Sumidagawa river. She's looking for her son who vanishes.

title: Raita and the Demon / O is Hard / The Burnt Statue
synopsis: Asakichi and his wife save the thunder when it falls from heaven. A rough country girl who doesn't know how to be polite says "o" in front of everything because her mom tells her to. A young, hardworking girl is to be adopted by her master, but his jealous wife makes her quit while the master is away.

title: The Demon who Became a Rock / Octopuses Don't Have Bones / The Ryuuguu Abyss
synopsis: A demon and his son live in the mountains. The princess of Ryuuguu castle has a baby. Taikichi, who always gives an offering to the Ryuuguu Abyss, is given a wife and child by Ryuuguu Palace.

title: Cowlove Pass / Momotarou / Seibei the Soba-Eater
synopsis: Cowherd Okaru took care of a young black calf that transformed into a handsome young man when it was three years old. Momotarou is born from a peach, and raised by an old couple into a strong young boy. Seibei is known as a man who loves to eat soba noodles.

title: The Snow Woman / Oshira-sama / The 600-year-old Woman
synopsis: A young woodcutter seeks shelter from a blizzard with his master. A young woman has a horse she loves. After the battle between the Heike and the Genji, a young girl finds a conch shell on the beach that she feeds to her mom.

title: The Whispering Vinegar / The Old Man Who Swallowed Birds / The Tengu and the Sky Journey
synopsis: There is a man who can hear the voices of the vinegar he makes. A bird gets its leg stuck in a rice ball. There was a young man who was afraid of nothing.

title: The Stink Vine / Shippei-Tarou / Half-Naked Buhyo
synopsis: The stinkvine weed smelled terrible, and the big tree always made fun of it. To save a girl from a demon, a traveling monk goes to find the one thing it fears, "Shippeitarou." Buhei is a man proud of his strength.

title: Sumo Inari / The Fava Bean, Straw, and Charcoal / The Man of the East & the Man of the West
synopsis: The lord of a poor province is sad to see how weak his sumo wrestlers are for this year's tournament, but they all defeat even the strongest wrestlers. A fava bean, a piece of straw, and a piece of charcoal all bounce out of an old woman's kitchen and decide to visit Ise. There are two men who live on the east and west side of town, and each night they come to a bar to drink. They always drink the same drink, and insult each other.

title: Snake Lake / The Deep Voice / The Priest, the Kid, and the Fava Bean Tree
synopsis: Governot Shimada has come to Kazusa, where there is no water and the harvest is dependant on the rain. Two men tie a pipe between their houses so they can talk even when they're snowed in. Even though they were alone, they could cheer each other up by talking, but then they stop getting answers... The priest tries to raise a fava bean tree to help the starving villagers, but the kids at the temple eat it.

title: The Herrings and the Old Woman / The God of Wind and the Children / The Spider's Determination
synopsis: An old woman loses her husband in a storm, but a statue of a god washes up with his boat and she worships it. One day in early spring, as the children are playing, a young man suddenly appears. A young carpenter is trying to build a bridge across a river, but every storm that comes washes it away.

title: The Deer Springs / Tail Fishing / Hachiroutarou
synopsis: A woodcutter meets a wounded deer in the mountains. He saves it from a hunter and watches until its wounds are healed... The Fox comes to see the river otter, who is good at catching fish. He takes fish from the river otter but never gives any himself. And so the River Otter comes up with an idea... A young man in the village of Matagi, Hachirou Tarou, goes to the mountains with two of his friends, but as he gets ready for dinner he gives into his hunger and eats their fish.

title: The Safflower Ship / The Story of the Twelve Signs of the Zodiac / Sent Salt
synopsis: There is a splendid picture of a rooster in the room where the crimson flower merchant says. And they say that it crows at midnight. God creates the calendar to rule the world, and wants the animals to protect it. The animals all rush to God's temple on new years. But the rat lies to the cat. Zenzaemon, of Kishou Swamp, is sent to learn the secrets of salt-making from Akou Province and is caught. But official Ooishi Kuranosuke is moved by his devotion to his homeland, and lets him go.

title: The Gold Horse of New Years / The Statue with an Umbrella / Odote-sama
synopsis: A couple works hard but is still poor, and meets the new year with a sigh. On new years, a man can't sell his hemp so he trades it for an umbrella. An honest cow-herd meets a strange monster who can read thoughts.

title: The Joroku Statue / The Gods of Poverty / The Carp in the Basin
synopsis: A huge rock saves a village from a flood. The villagers use it to make a giant statue, but the statue is too big to carry to the temple. But then the statue... A poor old man goes to sell balls of thread for new years. Gorouhei, a poor man, trades an old basin from his family for rice.

title: Sacrificial Inari / The Crane Returns a Favor / The Monster in the Hat
synopsis: A field worker named Manzou gets a small field with a shrine from the rich man. A charcoal-maker takes pity on a crane being sold by the road, and pays money to free it. An old man loves to fish at night at a waterfall. He gets old and decides to retire, and gives his fishing pole to a young man.

title: The Ghost Well / The Man Who Bought Dreams / Tougorou the Potato Digger
synopsis: A mysterious woman visits a candy store every night. The owner follows her after she leaves, but she disappears into a grave... A traveling merchant buys his partner's dream of treasure for a lot of money. The beautiful daughter of a rich man is sent to marry tougorou the potato digger. Tougorou is lonely and miserable and poor in the mountains, but one day...

title: The Cracking Mountain / The Three Charms / The Kappa and the Handwashing Basin
synopsis: A raccoon badly injures a kind old woman. The rabbit hears about this from her husband, and angrily avenges her. A child is picking up chestnuts in the forest, and before he knows it it's night. A demon grannie catches him. A new hand washing basin has been put in the village shrine. But the kappa used this stone to sit on and think or keep watch.

title: The Mysterious Blacksmith / The Fox Gives Birth / Senkamejo
synopsis: "If I can make a hundred swords in a night, give me your daughter," a traveler says, and locks himself in a blacksmith's forge. There was a mean doctor who lived in a village. One night, he goes to a mansion to save a young girl who's having a hard birth. Senkamejo grew up spoiled by her mother, and was the prettiest girl in town, but selfish and arrogant. One day she hears that a beautiful statue of Kannon-sama is at the temple, and she and her mother go to see it.

title: The Old Woman and the Giant Octopus / Dokkoisho / The Tengu of Ashitaka Mountain
synopsis: An old woman cuts off the leg of an octopus on the beach, and gets rich by selling it at the market. A groom is given botamochi rice balls at his bride's village. He wants his mom to make them, so he keeps saying "botamochi" on the way home, but then he trips and rises up saying, "dokkoisho! A strong-willed and hardworking mother goes all alone to Ashitaka Mountain, where a Tengu lives. But she doesn't come back.

title: The Three Masks / The Tengu's Magic Cloak / The Flying Door
synopsis: A young servant girl is given a demon mask as a goodbye present, and goes to a new place to work. A young boy learns that if you put on a Tengu's cape you'll be invisible. He steals the cape from the Tengu, and now he can play all the tricks he wants, but... "We've saved this money up for the future. Don't waste it," an old husband tells his silly wife... but then, a pair of thieves come when he's not home.

title: The Village of the Dragonflies / The White Rabbit of Inaba / The Fortune Telling Competition
synopsis: A fisherman's wife dies from illness, and he meets a woman who looks just like her on the rocks of a cape. The white rabbit who lives on the island of Inaba tries to trick the crocodiles to let him cross the sea, but they strip off his skin. Doujimaru is said to be the son of the white fox, and to have inherited his mother's mysterious powers.

title: The Ear Statue / The Centipede Gets the Doctor / Benten's Swamp
synopsis: A statue by the river reminds a boy of his dead mother. His stepmom tells him that if the statue will eat a rice ball, he can have one too, so off he goes. The insect children are playing in the depths of the forest when walking stick falls from a tree and starts to cry. One late night, a pack driver is returning home when he meets a beautiful woman.

title: The Sparrow With The Severed Tongue / The Horse Mountain Woman / The Dance of the Cats
synopsis: An old man loved a swallow, but when it eats his wifes glue, she cuts out its tongue. He goes deep into the mountains to find her... A packdriver buys a good horse in town, and then some mackeral to give to the god of horses. Shinkichi works at a soy sauce shop, but since he's so care everyone treats him like a child. less

title: The Silver Temple / The Pebble Letter / The Famous Blade Kisenbamaru
synopsis: Midon the fisherman is wounded and can't go fishing. He borrows money from a samurai, but can't pay it back. A wife gets mad at her drunkard husband and returns to her parents. But she misses her husband now that she's left him. A young servant named Sutekichi loves katanas. He wants his own, so he pays a blacksmith with a thousand logs to make one for him.

title: The Little Chestnut / The Day The Kappa Came / The Oryuu Willow
synopsis: A massive pumpkin grows from a tiny vine, and a man is very happy. Parents hear from the mountain god and water god that their child will be stolen by Kappas on his twelfth birthday. A huge willow stands in front of a tea shop. The son of the shop saves it from being cut down.

title: Monkey Crab / The Straw Headman / Head Lake
synopsis: Crabs seek revenge upon a monkey for wounding their mother, and are aided by a mortar and cow poop. A divine oracle leads a man to riches. A man's head becomes the scene of strange happenings.

title: Unspeaking Okiku / Ubasute Mountain / The Sumo Wrestler's Little Sister
synopsis: A girl sings a song, and her father is sacrificed. A son is tasked with taking his mother to the mountains, where she will left to die. A tense hostage situation at a sumo wrestler's dojo.

title: The Puppet Master / The God of the Bathroom / The Whale and the Sea Cucumber
synopsis: A puppet master visits a strange temple. A goddess is punished for her dalliances. An arrogant whale loses a race.

title: Dandarabochi and the Giant Sandals / The Painted Wife / The Fox in the Bag
synopsis: A titan lays seige to a small fishing village. An evil lord steals a man's beautiful wife. Friends of a lord plot to take back his money from a fox haunting a graveyard.

title: A Story of Futons / Chakurikakifu / The Dancing Bones
synopsis: The ghostly voices of children cry out at night from a haunted bed. A man tries a new strategy to sell his wares. The dancing bones of a murdered man bring fame and wealth to the one who killed him.

title: Earless Houichi / Niou and Dokkoi / Badger Disaster
synopsis: A musician is haunted by the spirits of fallen samurai. Two massive men duel for supremacy. A transforming badger runs a con at a mountain pass.

title: The Tree in the Pot / Princess Kaguya / The Monk and the Fox
synopsis: A fallen lord sacrifices his prized possessions for a traveling monk. A princess is found in a stalk of bamboo. A priest tricks a fox, and finds himself confronted by the lost souls of hell.

title: Filial Devotion in Dreams / Rat Sumo / A Story of Stolen Melons
synopsis: Two men are visited in dreams by their dead fathers.. Rats fight it out in the sumo ring. A mysterious old man makes magic with watermelons.

title: The Swallow with the Broken Leg / Left Behind / The Legend of the Nine-Headed Dragon
synopsis: An old man saves a broken swallow, who rewards him with a magic watermelon seed. A man encounters a terrifying ghost at a haunted stream. A traveling priest visits a village where an evil dragon is devouring virgin sacrifices.

title: The Talking Fish / Urashima Tarou / The Demon's Handprint
synopsis: A stranger comes to a fishing village, which plans to catch lots of fish through poisoning the river. As the villagers debate, they are warned against this by a traveling priest. A fisherman saves a little turtle and is taken to an undersea palace. Two boys go to ask the fire god to help them with a demon who's been raiding their village.

title: Minister Yuriwaka / The Fire Man / The Kid and the Priest Eat Poisonous Snacks
synopsis: A southern ruler named Yuriwaka is abandoned on an island. An old man brings home a boy named "Fire Man". A stingy priest tells the children at his temple that his snacks are made of poison, but...

title: Monkey Masamune / The Days Pass So Fast / The Woodcutter & the Mountain Grannie
synopsis: A runner saves a group of monkeys at an expensive cost, the Sun, Moon, and Thunder come to an agreement, and a Woodcutter gets the last laugh.

title: The Dragonfly Rich Man / The Fishwife / Ikkyuu-san's Funny Story
synopsis: Dainichi Nyorai guides a family, a fisherman learns to appreciate what he has, and a young monk learns not to judge a book by its cover.

title: The Female Fox / Hirabayashi / The Wild Warrior and the Ox Cart
synopsis: Monkey steals a baby, Hirarin, Heirin, Tairarin, Tairabayashi and Ippachijuu no Mokumoku, and Hitotsutoyattsudetokkikki , and legendary heros can't catch a break.

title: The Monkey Repays A Debt / Little One Inch / The Gourd Boy
synopsis: Monkey steals a baby, the smallest shows the biggest bravery, a unique shapped baby growns into a unique man.

title: The Carp Wife / The Snot-Nosed Boy / The Giant Beanstalk
synopsis: A man marries a unique woman, a flower seller forgets to keep his promise, and a farmer makes it rain.

title: The Red Thread / The Cow's Marriage / Beyond the Mirror
synopsis: A man fights fate, the lazy man gets the cow, and a son sees his father.

title: The Mermaid's Feast / The Fox and the Bear / The Beginning of Man
synopsis: A simple trip leads to an unfortunate life, a fox learns of karma, the Fire god is lonely.

title: When The Moon's Ring Disappears / The Rat Sutra / A Punch As A Reward
synopsis: A young girl is thrown into the river, a man buys a dream, and a king learns a on.

title: The Radish Samurai / The Furuya Forest / The Golden Horse Poop
synopsis: A radish saves, a thief is scary, a wolf is scary, but the worst is the Furuya Flora, and can a horse poop gold?

title: The Mother and Daughter slay a demon / Kintaro / The Farting Girl
synopsis: A mother fights for her daughter, we learn the tale of Sakata no Kintoki, and toot causes great embarrassment.

title: Tears Overflow / Strong Tarou / The Skylark and the Water of Youth
synopsis: A man learns about the importance of community, a couple creates a child from dirt, and a skylark ruins everything.

title: Snake and Fox Repay a Debt / The Old Man Who Made the Dead Trees Blossom / The Pheasant and the Crow
synopsis: A good deed is repaid ,a dog rewards a kind master, a bumpkin gets the last laugh.

title: Bat / The Old Man And His Bump / Lunch Works
synopsis: The bat flys at dusk, an old man with a bump dances for a demon band, and lunch, works.

title: Mother's Crystal / The Rolling Rice Ball / The Golden Arches
synopsis: A mother provers her love, and old man’s accidental gift is repaid, and a man gets greedy with his prayers.

title: Yamata no Orochi / The Satori Woman and the Bucket Maker / Return the Smell
synopsis: Susano’o has to prove his worth, a Satori woman finds her man, and a cheapo meets his match.

title: The Thousand League Sandals / The Mountain Priest & the White Wolf / The Days Pass So Fast
synopsis: Three brothers run from a demon, a priest spends a night in a tree, and the Sun, Moon, and Thunder come to an agreement.

title: The Cry That Split The Night / Octopuses Don't Have Bones / The Former Dog
synopsis: A dog is loyal no matter what, the Queens wants monkey livers, and a dog wishes to be human.

title: The Seven Swans / The Mysterious Love Poem / 'O' Is Hard
synopsis: A sister saves her brothers, a love is found, lost, and found again, and you put an “o” in front of everything to be polite.

title: The Farting Priest / The Demon Mask That Wept / Starfire
synopsis: A priest gains the power to control farts, a mother in law true colors are show, and brothers want to cook with a star.

title: The Hiding Snow / The Three Riddles / The Deep Voice
synopsis: Is it a gift from Buddha or is it stealing? The answers you sneak can come in many forms and give your friend the benefit of the doubt.

title: The Bridge Where You Buy Miso / The Cat Congregation / The Old Man Who Swallowed Birds
synopsis: A giving man waits by a bridge, a monk witness his cat give a moving speech, and Chichinpuyopuyo Pupuyopuyo

title: Blessings Of Heaven And Earth / The Leaf Hachibei / The Ginger Wife
synopsis: An honest man gets rewarded by a liar, a husband white lie turns into a great whale, and a couple tries the ginger trick.

title: The Wind God and the Children / The Lacquer Brothers / The Ama no Jyaku and the Child
synopsis: Children learn how to seasons come in, a brother’s greed leads to ruin, and an Ama no Jyaku gets tricked.

title: The Snake Boy / The Kappa And The Straw Shoes / The Fava Bean, Straw, & Charcoal
synopsis: A couple raise a snake, a kappa gets married, and a Fava Bean, Straw, and Charcoal take a trip to Ise

title: We Stopped The War / The Giant Snake And The Hunter / Otter's House
synopsis: A nation tricks a war hungry nation, a hunter tricks a snake, and an otter tricks a fox.

title: Momotaro / Princess Flowerpot Head / The Story Of the Twelve Signs Of the Zodiac
synopsis: A couple finds a baby, a young girl lives with a flowerpot on her head, and how the zodiac got its animals.

title: The Jizo Statue With The Hat / The Mortar That Made Salt / A Guest On New Year's Eve
synopsis: The gods repay a kindness, greed gets you nowhere, and a true act of kindness is always rewarded.

title: The City Rat And The Country Rat / Oshira-sama / The Tortoise And The Hare
synopsis: A country rat tries out the big city, a father learns a hard on, and it’s tortoise vs. hare.

title: The Three Charms / The Kid and the Cat Picture. / The God of Poverty
synopsis: A kid learns to trust his priest, a priest learns to believe in a child’s dream, and the gods have to go.

title: The Crane Repays A Debt / Slaying the Demon of Ooeyama / The Water of Youth
synopsis: A crane repays a fisherman, a group of heros defeat a demon, and moderation is key.

title: The Treasure Gourd / The White Rabbit of Inaba / The Bald Wife
synopsis: A thief gets tricked, a rabbit plays tricks, and a brother’s revenge for a trick goes too far.

title: The Three Brothers / The Wolf's Eyebrows / Dokkoisho
synopsis: Three brothers learn the best use of money, wolves won’t eat a good man, and dokkosiho is delicious!

title: Straw Bale Touta / The Fox Gives Birth / Cling And Hold
synopsis: The fearsome warrior Fujiwara Touta Hidesato fears nothing; a village doctor changes his way, and Please! Cling! Please! Hold!

title: The Rich Charcoal Maker / The Tree That Grows Gold / The Priest's Towel
synopsis: Money gets up and walks away, everybody farts, and true kindness is always repaid.

title: The Mountain Pear Hunter / The Old Woman In the House / The Centipede Gets The Doctor
synopsis: Rustle Rustle Don't Go, a bully gets his, and walking stick breaks a bone.

title: The Cat Wife / The Gonzo Bug / The Long-Nose Fan
synopsis: A cat wants to replay her master, a greedy man trips to much, a lazy man fans too much.

title: The Horse Mountain Woman / The Shrimp Goes to Ise / What Sickness?
synopsis: A mountain woman overeats, there is always someone bigger, and a man shouldn’t eat.

title: The Tengu's Cloak / Grannie Demon Is My Matchmaker / King Enma Is Hachigoro-don
synopsis: Invisibility comes with a price; a demon repays a kindness, and always carries some Yaki-Gobou when you die.

title: Tanokyuu / Tee-tee The Little Monk / The Fake Jizo Statue
synopsis: Tanokyuu tricks a snake and gets a reward, monsters pick a fight with the wrong monk, and a monk and raccoon do battle.

title: The Listening Hood / The Dog and Cat's Treasure / The Ghost's Poem Reading
synopsis: A man listens to the world around him, a dog and cat rescue their master, and a ghost is lost in rhyme.

title: Mouse Takes A Groom / The Pebble Letter / The Silence Contest
synopsis: Mother and Father Mouse hunt for the best husband, a wife and husband communicate without words, and a couple battles for the last rice ball.

title: The Farting Wife / The Cat and the Teapot Lid / Chakurikakifu
synopsis: A new bride is explosive, a hunter gets lucky, and Cha – Kuri – Kaki – Fu.

title: Three Axes / The Monkey's Groom / The Tengu and the Thief
synopsis: Did you drop the gold axe or the silver axe? A man makes a deal with a monster, and a Tengu is tricked.

title: Umisachihiko And Yamasachihiko / The Day The Kappa Came / King Enma Screws Up
synopsis: Two bothers exchange jobs, a kappa waits 14 years, and 3 souls get a 2nd chance.

title: Princess Kaguya / The Demonic Little Sister / Scary Meat Buns
synopsis: An elderly couple is bed with a daughter born from a bamboo stalk, a little boy’s sister has become a real demon, and a worker is terrified of meat buns. less

title: Ubasute Mountain / The Letterbearer Of The Water God / The Lucky Samurai
synopsis: The old is thrown away, a man delivers a letter for a water god, and a fake samurai gets lucky.

title: The Painted Wife / Left Behind / If You Pick Up Money
synopsis: A man fights for his wife, a haunt ditch, and more money more problems.

title: The Winged Robe of Heaven / The Child Kidnapped by Eagles/ The Konnyaku Interrogation
synopsis: A lie does not build a family, a mother never stops searching, and a traveling priest searches for the answer.

title: The Straw Headman / The God of the Bathroom / Niou and Dokkoi
synopsis: An unlucky man goes west, a god of luck gets a bum rap, and Japan challenges China in a strong man contest.

title: The Fire Man / Rat Sumo / The Priest and the Kid's Pupupatapata
synopsis: A man is repaid for an accidental gift, but greed ruins all, an old couple sponsors a rat, and two kids trick a sneaky priest.

title: Orihime and Hikoboshi / The Old Woman's Skin / Potato Rolling
synopsis: The origin of the Tanabata festival is told, a snake causes a calamity, and manners are important.

title: The Teapot Raccoon Dog / The Razor Fox / Sosou Soukurou
synopsis: A raccoon repays a debt but learns a on, the fox thinks 5 steps ahead, and Mr. Careless needs to slow down.

title: The Furuya Forest / The Traveler's Horse / A Crow in the Dark of Night
synopsis: A thief is scary, a wolf is scary, but the worst is the Furuya Flora, two children fight a witch, and a painter learns a on. less

title: The Wife Who Wouldn't Eat / The Snot-Nosed Boy / The Priest And The Boy Who Had To Pee!
synopsis: A man learns to look beyond the surface of a person, a flower seller forgets to keep his promise, and everything is sacred.

title: Sannen-Netarou / The Last Lie / Happy, Splendid, Wonderful!
synopsis: A good for nothing saves the day, a liar gets the last laugh, and we learn the importance of names.

title: Shippei-Tarou / The Son Who Went Up To Heaven / Who's The Laziest?
synopsis: A priest saves a town from sacrificing another daughter, a lazy man learns hard work, and a lazier man learns nothing.

title: The Carpenter And Oniroku / The Bear And The Fox / The Priest And The Child Cross The River
synopsis: A demon puts a carpenter in an unwanted deal, a fox learns of karma, and what is more important, honesty or obedience.

title: The Fish Wife / The Rich Pond Snail / The Lying Girl
synopsis: A fisherman learns to appreciate what he has, a couple is bed with an unusual child, and a lying boy meets a lying girl. less

title: Kintarou / The Two Squid / The Three Cry
synopsis: We learn the tale of Sakata no Kintoki, a lord learns more than expected, and sometimes you have to cry to move on.

title: Urashima Tarou / The Monkey Buddha / Comparing Treasures
synopsis: A Fisherman’s is given a gift that turns about to be a curse, monkeys worship a Buddha without getting their butts wet, and a merchant learns what is important in life.

title: Strong Tarou / The Village of the Nightingales / Hirabayashi
synopsis: A couple creates a child from dirt, a woodcutter breaks his promise, and in the last tale we learn the meaning of “Hirarin, Heirin, Tairarin, Tairabayashi and Ippachijuu no Mokumoku, and Hitotsutoyattsudetokkikki”

title: The Old Man And His Bump / The Transforming Hood / The Love Potion
synopsis: An old man with a bump dances for a demon band, a fox gets tricked, and a love potion backfires horribly.

title: Little One Inch / The Rolling Rice Ball / The Cow's Marriage
synopsis: In this episode, the small shows the biggest bravery, and old man’s accidental gift is repaid, and the lazy man gets the cow.

title: The Old Man Who Made the Dead Trees Blossom / The Man Who Bought Dreams / The Rat Sutra
synopsis: In this episode, a dog rewards a kind master, and an old woman's gift is repaid, and a man buys a dream.

title: PV
synopsis: PV

title: Building Twelve: The Bond Between Haruki and His Sisters.
synopsis: The sisters get unusual close.

title: Building Eleven: How Yayoi Nurses?!
synopsis: Haruki is down with a cold, and the only one to help him out is Yayoi.

title: Building Ten: Mutsuki’s Request?!
synopsis: Mutsuki has run into a problem she can't handle on her own. Is her request too much for Haruki to handle?

title: Building Nine: For the Love of Pranks?!
synopsis: Haruki is on his guard against Uzuki's pranks, but is that was Uzuki is really planning?

title: Building Eight: Definitely Siblings
synopsis: Do all twins look the same? Join the Nakanos as they look through some family history.

title: Building Seven: The Apartment Complex's Pool Opening?!
synopsis: It might be a little early to go to the beach, but that's not going to stop these siblings from having some fun in the water.

title: Building Six: The Siblings’ Multiplication
synopsis: Multiplication is a fundamental skill! Everyone has to learn their multiplication tables in elementary school. If they don’t...

title: Building Five: Satsuki's Anime Clock
synopsis: Satsuki and Haruki have an unexpected hobby in common. And Satsuki never misses a beat.

title: Building Four: Curry and Rice
synopsis: The grocery shopping must be done, so the Nakano siblings get together to conquer the week's shopping list.

title: Building Three: Mutsuki's True Colors
synopsis: Mutsuki is bright and beautiful, and diligent to top it all off. But she shows a different side in front of Haruki...

title: Building Two: The Twins' Homework
synopsis: Uzuki and Satsuki do their best to finish their homework. Their assignment? A report on their family members!

title: Building One: The Yumeno Apartments
synopsis: Welcome to the Yumeno Apartments, where Haruki Nakano lives out his everyday life with his four sisters.

title: Bonds
synopsis: Nanaka recalls that on the night of the fire and a memories around it.  Accepting it for what it is, it appears as if she has decided to leave it behind and get closer to Sana.

title: Memories in Red
synopsis: With feelings low due to Syuri and Syusuke leaving, everyone decided to go to the river to take their minds away from what had just happened. However, before they headed off, Sana received an interesting phone call...

title: Confession
synopsis: Sana visits Asami in the hospital, where Asami reveals an unexpected piece of information. When Syuri and Syusuke arrive to visit Asami, she acts normally, although she asks Syuri to converse privately with her. Meanwhile, in the hospital's courtyard, Sana asks Nanaka something of importance...

title: For the Sakura…
synopsis: Syuri and Syusuke travel to the grave of their mother to pay their respects, each buying each other presents afterwards to cheer themselves up. When they return to school the next day, an anonymous letter revealing a terrible rumor. Although the school refuses to pursue this, Syuri and Syusuke's father angrily beats Syusuke for this. Syuri, Asami, and Sana then go to give a gift to one of the ladies from the retirement home.

title: Good Luck! Animenger!
synopsis: The whole gang heads to the theme park, where they meet Asami and her cousin. After they all meet up they decide to head off and watch a "Hero Show" prompting Nanaka to talk to Sana as they ride the ferris wheel.

title: Episode 8 -The Secret Mailbox
synopsis: Nanaka acts coldly towards Sana the following day, even after Sana tries to explain things. Sana comes upon an old mailbox that Sana and Nanaka used for private communication in their youth, and finds dozens of letters...

title: Teacher’s Caramel
synopsis: With the construction plans in motion to build a new town hall on the nature center site where Sana and everyone used to play, Shuri attempts to gather signatures to stop the project. However, the school's administration forbids Syuri to continue. Meanwhile, while still volunteering at the retirement home, Sana and Asami decide to fulfill a request by an elder lady...

title: Adulthood
synopsis: "After learning that her mother will not be home for her birthday, Hinako moves into Sana's apartment. Sana's shocked at how Hinako moves around like she's been living there for years. Initially, Sana feels as if this arrangement might cause trouble between them, however after learning of why Hinako moved in, Sana goes along with this arrangement..."

title: Non-blooming Sakura Blossoms
synopsis: "Nanaka begins to spend increasing amounts of time practicing for the upcoming festival at the temple, where she will perform a traditional dance so the sakura will bloom that year. Unexpectedly, she ditches practice to go with Sana, Syuri, and Asami to help at a retirement home. And a the day of the festival, everyone watches Nanaka perform her dance, including Sana..."

title: I'm Not a Child
synopsis: On his way home, Shu rescues a school girl from a bully. Hinako tracks Shu down and comes to see him every day. Unknown to Shu, Hinako who is only 10 years old wants to profess her love for him but does not know how and seeks out his friends advice.

title: Cookies and Pebbles
synopsis: When Sana was away, a rift formed between him and Nanaka. To mend the rift, the group plans a day trip to the river to reminisce. Nanaka becomes jealous when Asami is invited by Sana but soon sees they all are still friends when gifts are exchanged.

title: A Precious Melody
synopsis: It is Sana's first day of school and to his surprise he is nominated as the class monitor. As he explores the school looking for a lost box, he happens across a piano and immediately remembers the song that was a gift to him many years ago.

title: The Place of Memories
synopsis: Sana returns home after being away for five years. He takes a walk through town to see what has changed since he was last there only to discover that things are pretty much the same.

title: The Color Of Ripe Golden Grains
synopsis: Kyrie talks about his past to Caramia and Scarlet, but once he’s finished, he tells them it was all a lie. Axel emerges to see Caramia on the ground and Kyrie holding a water gun. Kyrie has doused Caramia, fully knowing he hates water...

title: Substitute
synopsis: Caramia substitutes for Kyrie and helps Scarlet study for his exam. On the way home, they are greeted by Caesar. Caramia points out Scarlet has changed and isn’t afraid of Caesar anymore.

title: Hazardous Materials
synopsis: Scarlet is forced to make a promise with Axel about not telling the other students about his sweet tooth. As Scarlet reassures Axel he won’t tell a soul, Ande interrupts them. Ande threatens them to buy box of matches or else she’ll spread rumors about their secret conversation...

title: Field Trip
synopsis: Scarlet is out in town for a field trip and wanders around to see where he can pass the time. A boy named Alfani drags him to a butler café saying it’s a perfect place to pass the time. A man named Dorian Gray tries to force Scarlet in the café, but So, the headmaster of Oz Academy, interferes...

title: The Student Council President
synopsis: While walking down the hallway, Scarlet is called by the class president, Pashet. She demands a report regarding the gardening club which Scarlet has no clue. Scarlet sees Kyrie walking by and calls him to clear things out, but Kyrie looks annoyed for some reason...

title: Donuts
synopsis: Scarlet visits the nurse’s office to check on his teachers only to find... a lion? While trying to figure out where Caramia is, a scarecrow and a tin-man appear to make the matter more confusing. As the masked man, Robin Hood, explains about the teacher’s special powers, Hameln walks in...

title: Attack
synopsis: Caramia, Kyrie, and Axel are preparing for the attack by the Grimm Academy, but somehow, Scarlet is involved as well. Kyrie hands Scarlet a sniper rifle and tells him to participate in the battle. As Scarlet tells Kyrie he’s never even seen a gun before, the students of the Grimm Academy, Hansel and Gretel appears...

title: The Letter
synopsis: Scarlet and Bercy are walking to school when they bump into Judie. He’s been dumped by a girl again, but he feels he will succeed in getting a girlfriend soon. Scarlet wonders if he himself will ever have a girlfriend when a mysterious girl appears with a letter and a gift...

title: The Cafeteria
synopsis: Scarlet forgets his lunch and decides to buy lunch at the cafeteria. There, he meets a larger-than-life cafeteria lady. She tells Scarlet to call her "Big sister." Scarlet finds a vacant seat by the window, but someone was already at that table...

title: Remedial Club
synopsis: As Scarlet gets ready for Kyrie’s club, his classmate Bercy starts talking to him. Scarlet admits he didn’t recognize Bercy and feels guilty. When Scarlet arrives in the teacher’s office, Kyrie tells him to sit on Axel’s chair...

title: Remedy
synopsis: Concerned about the difficult classes, Scarlet tries to consult with Caramia. But before he can ask, Kyrie comes to confront Caramia. Kyrie suggests Scarlet to join his club if he wants to raise his grades.

title: Welcome to Oz Academy
synopsis: Today is the 1st day of Oz School for Scarlet. Worried about his new environment, Scarlet gets lost in the forest while walking towards the school. Fortunately, he finds someone and tries to ask him for direction, but the guy takes out two swords?!

title: The Hero Returns
synopsis: Ros faces off with the revived Rchemides, but even with his revived power he is unable to defeat him and has to seal him away again. Alba tries to stop him before he leaves, but Ros is unwavering. Just as he reaches his hand out, Ros vanishes with the demon king. What will Alba do now? And how will the story end? The last episode of "Senyu." Please enjoy the story.

title: The Hero Makes a Choice
synopsis: A shocking event makes everyone freeze. A stunned Ros resigns himself to an irrevocable truth and at last unleashes his sealed poewr. But the price of this is great, and the sealed demon king, the first Rchemides, awakens from his long slumber...

title: The Hero Unleashed
synopsis: The arrival of Alba's group makes a mess of everything and December is very mad. He points his anger at Alba, the center of the group, and attacks. The next moment the whole group freezes... what has happened to Alba?

title: The Hero Falls
synopsis: The heroic deeds of our hero, Alba, save the party from certain doom. Samejima falls into the depths of despair right after his revival, but Ros goes back to his normal self. Meanwhile, December is angry over having his plan to revive the Demon King interrupted and is about to attack again.

title: The Hero Reunites
synopsis: December reveals Ros's secret. The party is shocked and glad to hear it. But Ros seems unhappy, and December thinks he knows why. He says that if Ros uses his power it will revive the Demon King, and so he orders Juli to attack again.

title: The Hero Transforms
synopsis: Janua freezes at Juli's words, and Juli strikes. Just when it seemed that Janua might fall as well to his violence, Ros uses his hidden power to save them.

title: The Hero Falls Silent
synopsis: Samejima's sacrifice saves the party from Juli's sneak attack. His anger at his wounded friend causes Janua to unleash his powerful ninjutsu, but Juli is unphased and speaks to him with a smirk.

title: The Hero Becomes Speechless
synopsis: Alba escapse from prison with the help of Elf's amazing disguises. He gives his full name as Elf November and says he hopes they'll meet again.

title: The Hero Is Terrified
synopsis: With Samejima's help the battle with Zwei is finally brought to an end. After the battle Zwei has a change of heart and tells them the truth about the revival of the Demon King. Just then a new assassin strikes! Meanwhile Alba has joined the mysterious elf who attacked him, and tries to go into the town. But he ends up someplace strangely familiar...

title: The Hero Is Overwhelmed
synopsis: Outside Turtle Alba is left alone. A bounty hunter attacks him in disguise. Who is this assassin with his hidden weapons? Meanwhile in town, Hime-chan's repairs are complete. They try to test the new functionality, but...

title: The Hero is Set Up
synopsis: The party arrives at the mechanical city of Turtle to find themselves involved in a murder. Alba is holding a bloodstained knife. What happened to him? Who is the culprit?

title: The Hero is Stunned
synopsis: While in the dimensional rift, Rchi-tan and the others find the original King Rchimedes, however he seems to be asleep with no sign of waking up. Ros suggests that they should leave the dimensional rift as soon as possible since time passes much faster there and then another random fellow shows up...

title: The Hero Broods
synopsis: Alba gets seperated from Rchi-tan and Ros and they get stuck in the dimensional rift. Despite being the hero, Alba somehow ends up in the background and meanwhile in the dimensional rift, Ros and company find someone rather unexpected...

title: The Hero is Left Behind
synopsis: The true enemy is…

title: The Hero is Confused
synopsis: With so many Heroes gathering around, thing’s still aren’t getting done.

title: The Hero Gets Depressed
synopsis: The inmates have time for dodge ball while Hime deals with her Hero.

title: The Hero is Shocked
synopsis: Even after saying his goodbyes, the witch, Februar Zwei will not let Janua leave as he is one of the chosen.

title: The Hero is at a Loss
synopsis: Janua has a simple request for the Hero.

title: The Hero Gets Tired
synopsis: Janua shows off his skill in Ninjutsu.

title: The Hero is Shocked
synopsis: Locked up, there is nothing the party can do but share stories. And Rchi shares the story of the 12 demons.

title: The Hero Runs
synopsis: Rudolf volunteers to tell the king the true nature of the Demon king but that doesn’t end very well.

title: The Hero Gets Excited
synopsis: Everybody has their reason for stopping the Demon King, some not as honorable as others.

title: The Hero Gets Flustered
synopsis: A new hero by the name of Foyfoy will stop the Demon king!

title: The Hero Regrets
synopsis: The Demon King is out to destroy the world! Right?

title: The Hero's Encounter
synopsis: The Hero has to level up and does it in the worst way...

title: The Hero Journeys Forth
synopsis: The Demon King, Rchimedes, has been revived and Hero and Royal Solider are out there to level up.

title: White Darkness
synopsis: Yuuya fights a final battle with the Scarlet Twins and the BETA to stop Red Shift from activating and destroying Alaska.

title: The Victory Song of the Dead
synopsis: A mass of BETA are rushing towards the Red Line. If they get there, Red Shift will activate and destroy Alaska. Sandek has a plan to stop them, and the only ones who can carry it out are Argos Squad.

title: Untainted Revenge
synopsis: Yuuya fights 24 TSFs to buy time for the rest of Argos to escape, and is only saved by the timely intervention of Inia. Before the enemy commander goes down, however, she's planning on taking Cui with her...

title: Something or Another
synopsis: Chaos ensues and no one is sure what is going on, and who is attacking from where. The Argos Test Flight team meet up and attempt to repel a force attacking for seemingly unknown purposes, but who will come out on top when no one knows who they can trust?

title: The World Bares Its Fangs
synopsis: Everyone is so focused on the fight with the BETA and improving their forces to fight the menace, that they forget to look at how their society is forced to live. Tensions build, and sometimes that leads to action. Total Eclipse is no exception.

title: Pre-Climax Special
synopsis: A summary ep that reviews the characters and important events of the preceding episodes, and gives important information that will help you enjoy the climax 10 times as much!

title: Deep Green
synopsis: To deal with the increasing rivalries between the nations competing in Blue Flag, the higher-ups involved in the Prominence project decide to send the Eishi on a wilderness backpacking trip. On the way to their destination, they encounter a bear. It turns out the bear is actually a hot springs...

title: The Sound of Twisted Wings
synopsis: Vincent wins big by betting on the first round of Blue Flag, and takes the whole Test Flight out for drinks. Yuuya sits in a corner and talks to the bartender. Meanwhile, Cui wants to talk to Lt. Takamura about Yuuya...

title: Dark Recollection
synopsis: The Blue Flag exercises are in full swing, and America shows off its Raptor and its advanced stealth technology, but after the fight, Yuuya finds himself running from the MPs in the city after the Scarlet Twins tell him they need to talk to him urgently...

title: Pale Blue Flame
synopsis: In the first stage of the Blue Flag exercises, Argos Flight is pitted against the Chinese Bao Feng. With Tarisa flying the new Shiranui unit 2, Argos is badly outmatched, when Yuuya challenges their leader to a duel.

title: Cross To Bear
synopsis: The team returns safely to Alaska and throws a party to celebrate. The party is interrupted by the leader of the Chinese Bao Feng Squad, Cui Yifei. She has more than a passing interest in Yuuya...

title: An Eishi's Honor
synopsis: Yuuya is forced to flee as the BETA overwhelm the base and Russian bombers advance. With no hope of recovering the EM Cannon's core module, he staggers home as the Zhar Battalion launches a last-ditch effort to keep the entire Far East defense line from collapsing.

title: The Price of a Choice
synopsis: Yuuya rescues Yui from the hangar, and tries to escape with the core for the EM Radiation Cannon. But all the BETA suddenly start heading towards them, and they have to make a quick escape...

title: The End of a Deadly Battle
synopsis: Yui is trapped in the abandoned supply base, and the BETA have broken through the defense lines. With no hope of escape, she attempts to destroy the prototype cannon to keep it from falling into the wrong hands...

title: BETA Offensive
synopsis: A massive force of underground BETA is heading towards the Soviet Base, and there's no time to do anything but pack up and leave. Yui stays behind to destroy the Type 99 Cannon, but the Soviets want it for themselves...

title: Premonition
synopsis: Yuuya destroyed over 3000 BETA with a single cannon blast. The whole base throws him a party, but instead of attending he spends the evening staring up at his TSF. He begs Yui for a chance at some real close-range combat experience, but changing the schedule, she says, will be very difficult.

title: Falling Tears
synopsis: It's finally time for Yuuya's first battle: A carefully scripted fight against a limited number of BETA that will allow him to test both his TSF and the new prototype cannon. But things quickly go off script as the BETA overwhelm the front lines, and if he doesn't act fast, the entire team could be wiped out.

title: The Far East Front Lines
synopsis: Argos Flight is sent to the front lines of the U.S.S.R. to get real combat data in their TSFs. At the same time, Yuuya is assigned to test a brand new EM cannon, keeping him back in a support role. But things aren't as peaceful on a front line base as they are back in the Yukon...

title: Wanderer's Whereabouts
synopsis: Yui, Yuuya, and Cryska are trapped on a deserted island in the middle of a terrible rainstorm. With potentially a full week until they're found by the rest of the military, they're forced to try and work out their differences from the confines of their small cave...

title: Ultramarine
synopsis: As part of a morale-building exercise, Argos Flight is sent to the Caribbean for a photo shoot. During a boat race, Yui, Cryska, and Yuuya are stranded on a deserted island. Cryska gets sick, and an injured Yui tries to force herself to help, but the rain is getting worse...

title: The Right Stuff
synopsis: Yuuya continues his attempts to master the Japanese TSFs, to little success. During one last exercise, an unknown suddenly appears on the practice ground, and it's heading straight for him...

title: A Flock of Hazy Moons
synopsis: Yuuya Bridges, the new American test pilot at Yukon base, is struggling with his first assignment: a joint project between the US and Japanese militaries. To master his new TSF, he must first learn to think like the Japanese, and that means confronting his own past...

title: Verdant Yukon
synopsis: Yuuya Bridges, an elite American test pilot, has been sent to a backwoods Alaskan base to test the next generation of TSFs. But he hasn't even arrived when two other test pilots wander off the course in a deadly game of cat and mouse, and they're heading straight for his plane...

title: The Imperial Capitol Burns - Part 2
synopsis: The BETA have invaded Japan, and are advancing on Kyoto. An alien vanguard breaks through the Japanese lines, and attacks Yui's supply base. Badly outnumbered and cut off from support, she has no choice but to flee...

title: The Imperial Capital Burns - Part 1
synopsis: It is the year 1997, and aliens have taken over most of Eurasia. Humanity fights back with giant robots called TSFs, but is gradually losing ground to end alien armies. Now the aliens are advancing on Japan, and Yui Takamura, a trainee at the Imperial Guard Academy, will have to battle them... less

title: PV 1
synopsis: Promotional Video 1

title: PV 3
synopsis: Promotional Video 3

title: The Allied Forces Strike at Ukitsu
synopsis: Toutaku and Kaku escape Rakuyou with the help of Kayuu and Shuutai. The allied forces learn of the plan's success from Shuutai's letter, and advance from Shisui Pass to Korou Pass. Just as Toutaku surrenders, and is about to throw open the gates, Chouryou stands alone before the allied army, challenging any of them to duel her.

title: Chouryou Faces Off With Kan'u
synopsis: Defeat the evil Toutaku! Enshou sends a call to the other lords, and in response Sousou, Sonsaku, the Touka Village Army, and one other person answer the call. The allied forces advance on the capitol of Rakuyou where Toutaku awaits, but are stopped by Ryofu at Shisui Gate. As they hold a strategy conference, Ryofu's strategist Chinkyuu comes to them alone...

title: Shuutai Sneaks Into the Palace
synopsis: After their long journey, Ryuubi's party at last returns to the village. Chouhi sees Kan'u again for the first time in ages, and jumps into her chest overjoyed. With the Nanban Elephant's Belly Button Lint, Koutou pill, and the persistence herb all gathered, they, they have everything they need to stop Kashin from turning into a cat. What will happen?

title: The Lords Attempt to Defeat Toutaku
synopsis: While taking her afternoon nap, the king of Nanban, Moukaku, bites Payapaya's tail. When Payapaya complains, she gets angry and chases him away. Meanwhile, Ryuubi's party has come to the steamy jungles of Nanban. They're taking a bath to deal with the heat when a mysterious animal approaches...

title: Moukaku Is Captured and Released Many Times
synopsis: With the ingredients collected, the girls return back home to have the doctor make the medicine that will reverse the effects of the Nyan poison that was given to Kashin-san.

title: Kougai Makes a Plan to Deceive Her Allies
synopsis: Kogai-dono pretends to over indulge in a rare alcohol in order to trick Shuyu into getting trapped in the store room with Saku-dono to force them to get along.

title: Gien's Life Is In Danger
synopsis: Ryuubi's party heads for Nanban. As they travel the twisty mountain paths, they encounter a series of strange accidents. Meanwhile, Gien sense something dangerous around them. Ryuubi's leg is injured during a rock fall, and the party is forced to spend the night at a mountain cabin, but...

title: Sonshoukou Attempts to Fulfill Her Duty
synopsis: As Kan'u heads for Koutou, she stops at a town ruled by Enjutsu. She walks through the town, looking for presents for the others, when she runs into Son Shoukou. She lectures her on running away from home again, but Son Shoukou says she's here on an important mission. But...

title: Gien Falls in Love at First Sight
synopsis: Ryuubi's group is eating dumplings on their way to Nanban. On the way, they hear rumors of Toutaku from a merchant, and are shocked at how evil she's seemingly become. Then, a boyish-looking girl name Gien appears from the tears and jumps at them. With her dango ruined, Batai challenges Gien to a duel...

title: Ryomou Tries Academics
synopsis: Son family bodyguard Ryomo is given the task of guarding Sonken. As she watches Sonken study every night, Ryomo takes an interest in learning, and begins to study with her. Then one day, Sonsaku invites a band of traveling performers to the palace...

title: Houtou Hides Something
synopsis: The volunteer army leaves on its journey to save Kashin. To save her, they need to get three ingredients for the medicine. Kan'u goes to Koutou, Chou'un and Bachou go to Mt. Taishan, and Ryuubi, Chouhi, and Koumei go to visit Suikyou. The latter group arrives, but the ingredient they need isn't there...

title: Ryuubi Leaves on a New Journey
synopsis: After their victory in the battle against the Yellow Scarves, the volunteer army, now led by Ryuubi, returns to peaceful Touka Village. Things seem to have calmed down, but Ryuubi is secretly worried: after all these easy days, her thighs and stomach are getting fat! Ryuubi tries to go on a diet, but...

title: Sengoku Collection
synopsis: The final battle is now, but a new warrior will change everything.

title: Marshal Princess
synopsis: Yoshimoto is ready for her battle against Nobunaga, but Sessai knows she isn’t ready. Kotaro takes Yoshimoto on a trip to the mountains, while their Yoshimoto will learn much about her weaknesses.

title: Peaceful Empress-EX
synopsis: The life of an Idol is wearing thin on Ieyasu, she is currently at the top of the Idol World and the work is non-stop. Will this adventure be her last?

title: The Dune
synopsis: Amago Tsunehisa entered the sandbox on 6/28 and in  than a month, she was the ruler.

title: The Splendor

But for some reason, none of them can remember a certain time in their past. One day, a monster appears from beyond space and time and sends one of them back. Ren and the others start to regain their memory as this incident unfolds. They remember a time when Monster Strike was a highly-kept secret, a time when only they, as children, were allowed to play it. The hidden truth of Monster Strike comes to light. And with it, the lost memories of a childhood adventure.

title: The Fated MSonic!

Soon after, they catch word about a music festival called MSonic! and decide to team up and try out. They're right in the middle of their audition, when suddenly...

Unable to forget the incredible sight, D'Artagnyan's friend Izumo invites her to see a concert featuring the popular Angelic Divas. Little did she know, that experience would completely change D'Artagnyan's life!

title: A Rhapsody Called Lucy -The Very First Song-

They ask her to join their indie band, the "Wicked Pistols". Lucifer talks about his dream of going major after winning the MONSTERS ROCK competition, only for Lucy to reject him outright. However, Lucy's heart begins to thaw after a certain event... less

title: Mana, Angel of Love

synopsis: Ryoma puts his life on the line in a battle against Miroku. Meanwhile, Ren tries to reach Mana but suffers serious injuries from the altar's defenses. It seems the time for Mana's awakening is soon at hand...

title: Death Match: Ryoma VS Miroku
synopsis: Ren and Ryoma venture inside the red moon's altar. Through the strength of their friendship, they defeat the spectral defenses and enter the altar's inner reaches, where they find Mana bound helply. To save her, it seems they'll have to go up against Miroku herself! less

title: Only thou can know what thou must do
synopsis: When it seems even Walpurgis's magic can't stop the monstrous Mana, Ren and company discover that Mana's real body is hidden inside Miroku's altar. Heeding Walpurgis's words, Ren and Ryoma rush onward to save Mana!

As the situation unfolds before them, Ren and company watch in horror. They desperately call out to Mana, hoping they can somehow bring her back to her senses...

title: Save Mana! The Decisions They Each Make
synopsis: Leaving behind nothing more than a note, Mana suddenly disappears. Ren and the crew try to piece together where she could have gone, eventually going to speak to the heavily-injured Walpurgis. When Walpurgis tells them Mana's secret and her plan to sacrifice herself, Ren and crew rush to save her.

title: Mana's Hidden Truth Revealed
synopsis: As her friends lay in the hospital, Mana stands there, acting the same as always. But then she begins to think about what Miroku said, and conflict grows inside her. As troubling thoughts fill her head, she goes to see Walpurgis. Witnessing her injuries first-hand, Mana finally decides to...

title: An Overwhelming Gap in Strength! Miroku Stands in the Way

To save it, Miroku plans to destroy the human world. Naturally, Ren and company are strongly opposed to this, but to stop her, it seems they have no choice but to fight...

Amidst this new development, President Madarame announces his newest project to the world. And just when it seems like things couldn't get any worse, Ren and Ryoma's greatest foe appears: Eden. Meanwhile, long after watching in silence, Miroku begins to make her move...

synopsis: The negative aspects of Tsukuyomi's personality are causing great harm to the people of Tokyo. The group must work together to stop her.

title: The Moon's Eternal Dreamer
synopsis: A strange phenomenon has been occurring recently in which the moon is full every single night. Ren and the others encounter the monster Suihanjar, who's on patrol to protect all the town's dinner tables, and learn that the moon goddess Tsukuyomi is probably behind the moon incident. What has happened to Tsukuyomi?

title: Robin Hood (Evolution)
synopsis: Ren and the gang follow a Monster Signal into the mountains, where they encounter a man who calls himself Robin Hood. He tells them that he came to this world in pursuit of some vicious monsters. Then the monsters he's been chasing, Gordi and Bardi, suddenly appear. All at once, the forest has become a battlefield!

title: Each of Their Feelings
synopsis: During a brief break, Ren and his friends decide to see a fireworks show. Aoi is overcome by a feeling she can't put into words when she sees the mood being set between Ren and Mana, but Napoleon and Nostradamus give her a push to be more honest with her own feelings...

title: The Eternal Endless Cycle
synopsis: Ren and the others struggle to deal with Hraesvelgr's assault as well as the attacks from Shambhala's right and left hands. Aoi and Nostradamus attempt to make contact with the young girl controlling Shambhalla, but she refuses to listen. So Nostradamus, vowing to change the future, launches a counterattack along with Aoi!

title: The Great Seer Nostradamus
synopsis: Ren and the others struggle to deal with Hraesvelgr's assault as well as the attacks from Shambhala's right and left hands. Aoi and Nostradamus attempt to make contact with the young girl controlling Shambhalla, but she refuses to listen. So Nostradamus, vowing to change the future, launches a counterattack along with Aoi!

title: The King of Terror
synopsis: Ren is searching for Nostradamus, the great seer of the monster world. He follows a monster signal to find Angolmois, a monster that serves Nostradamus. Having gained the cooperation of Angolmois, Ren and his friends race around Tokyo in search of Nostradamus!

title: Even the Fortune Teller is Baffled! Where's the Energy Point?
synopsis: To help President Madarame, Ren and his friends decide to search for the energy points hidden in various locations. During a visit to Harajuku in search of clues, they meet a fortune teller. But the fortunes they hear start to diverge in an unexpected direction, revealing the pasts of Walpurgis, Napoleon, and Ryoma...

title: The Singularity of All Creation
synopsis: After picking up a Monster Signal from the Rainbow Bridge, Ren and his friends rush there with President Madarame. When they arrive, they see the bridge enveloped in a flickering heat haze. In the midst of it, the guardian of the new energy point, Marici, appears.

title: A World With No Fighting
synopsis: Ren takes Mana to Odaiba, where they meet CEO Madarame of the Madarame group. Madarame is a rich and powerful man, and an MS player too! He takes a liking to the group and invites them back to his penthouse, where he tells them about the reason for the sudden rise in monster attacks.

title: CEO Madarame
synopsis: Ren and the gang have brought Mana to Odaiba. They expected a fun day of sightseeing, but suddenly face trouble when Kraken appears! Then President Madarame, an MS player who runs a huge company, and his monster, Miroku, make a grand appearance…

title: The Beautiful Angel's Steamy Case File
synopsis: In the hot-spring town, Akira and Genma encounter Raphael, who has come in search of healing waters. They join Ren and the gang, but just as they decide to enjoy the hot springs, they pick up a monster signal from the women's bath! Gabriel, Lucifer, and the rest engage in battle against the ruffians trying to disturb their bath time!

title: Holy Healing Hot Springs
synopsis: Ren and the gang visit a hot-spring resort after being invited by Mana. Just when they all think they can relax, something causes the hot water in the springs to boil. And then, Lucifer and Raphael appear…

title: Seventh Galaxy Explosion!
synopsis: Azazel uses his powers to create a horde of demons that overwhelm Sinbad. Sinbad's only chance is the manliness cannon aboard his warship, but he can't power it up fast enough alone. He'll need help from Ren... and Mana too?!

title: Chicken Skewers, Manliness, and the Voyager
synopsis: Maya has another crazy idea in her head: she wants to see Ren's "manliness". Ren takes her to a place that sells chicken skewers, where he meet the very manly Sinbad. But their manly meal is interrupted when Azazel comes to collect on Sinbad's debts, and he doesn't care how what happens to the people around him!

title: Walpurgis Night
synopsis: Mana and Walpurgis save the day at the last minute by defeating Fudou Myouou. Mana is now a full-fledged member of the team. But who is Walpurgis, and what does she want?

title: The Karmic Fist of Wrath
synopsis: Ren agrees to take Mana around to see the town, but she's anxious about and uncomfortable around Monster Strike. When Ren gives her a MS ring, however, she gladly accepts it, thinking it's an engagement ring. When she realizes her mistake, she runs off in shame... and that's when a monster makes it move.

title: The Transfer Student Is Impossible-Level?
synopsis: There are still monsters about, and the gang is spending their days fighting them. They go to school during the day, and when they're not at school, they protect the city from monsters. But their peaceful routine is interrupted by the arrival of Mana Livingstone: a transfer student from America who's got the craziest ideas about Japan!

title: The Long-Awaited Utopia
synopsis: The big threat is passed, but the gang's still got little threats to handle. The monsters are becoming a part of daily life, but there's one big thing missing: Oragon. One day, a powerful monster appears in the middle of town. It's got Oragon inside!

title: An Encore and Continuance: Pandora's Box
synopsis: After defeating the War Gods, Ren and his friends are living the dream. It seems like they've finally managed to regain their normal lives. However, a mysterious girl by the name of Pandora appears, bringing with her a box that must never be opened. An unfortunate incident results in the box opening (of course), setting the world up for some big changes...

title: [Finale] Strike Shot! An End and New Beginnings - We'll defeat you and reclaim everything! -
synopsis: Ren is thrown into despair as he is confronted with the amnesiac Aoi, Minami, and Akira. However, a familiar voice emerges from his smartphone. With smartphone in hand, Ren calls on the last remnants of his strength and goes toe to toe against Karma!

title: Of Light and Flame - Harken the light! -
synopsis: Attacking Karma is a double-edged sword—the party gets increasingly weak due to Karma's debuffs. Akira realizes a path to victory and dashes forward with Kamui, only to be cut down by Karma. Left with no options, Akira is handed a smartphone by Genma. He prepares to strike...

title: Karma, Light of War - The memories of humans are so beautiful... -
synopsis: Karma, the Light of War appears. Ren and friends battle to reclaim their memories, but there's something about Karma's arms...

title: Oraternative Memories - Do you believe in destiny? -
synopsis: A petrifying attack hits Oragon as he makes a stand. Oragon, on his last dregs of strength, begins to glow. A light flashes, parting to reveal the depths of Oragon's memories...

title: Ziggurat of Chaos - Feel the pain that I have felt! -
synopsis: Ren and friends level their resolve against Babel. Into the fray enters Himiko, Alice, and Romeo! The situation shifts and Oragon now finds himself the target of Babel's wrath...

title: The Descent of Angels - These memories... they're ours! -
synopsis: To reclaim Haruma's memories, the gang stands up to Babel. But Babel has only one target: Ren. Ignoring Ryoma and the rest of the monsters' attacks, Babel continues to aim for Ren. In the midst of the chaos, an "Angel" descends...

title: World Ender Babel - A despair deeper than death... -
synopsis: Babel has escaped the now destroyed physics research center. Now, it terrorizes the residents of Kaminohara. What did Babel mean by "a despair deeper than death"?

title: An End to the Past - We've been here in the past. -
synopsis: Kushinada has been defeated and Shino rescued—but at what cost? Monster Strike has spilled into the real world, leaving damage in its wake. Before the dust has settled, a message from Haruma arrives. He has found the physics research facility...

title: An Offering to Orochi - Dance until you break! -
synopsis: Kushinada's warps and cross laser put the gang on the defensive. Napoleon is defeated, while Ryoma and Alice are hanging on by a thread. But not all is lost, as Minami discovers a nifty trick...

title: The Sun Sets on Orochi
synopsis: In Kaminohara, Haruma sets out to find clues of Shino's whereabouts after her sudden disappearance. Ren and friends join in the search, but they come upon a giant snake who strikes without warning.

title: Off-the-Charts Performance!
synopsis: The gang arrives for XFLAG PARK. They have a blast at the venue, but they forget their original goal.

title: Gather in Kaminohara! - You need help? I'm there! -
synopsis: K is attempting to open another monster gate. To prevent K's plans from succeeding, the gang heads to a physics research facility. Taiyo and Shino join up in search of clues.

title: Akira and Haruma - I wanted to apologize for that time... -
synopsis: After discovering K's ambitions, Ren and the rest of the gang return to Kaminohara. Telling Haruma that he wants to check on something, Akira heads to the hospital where Haruma's mother lies in a coma.

title: The Truth of K - We were friends... -
synopsis: It becomes apparent that the one who sent Memento Mori was none other than K, who reveals himself to be Genma, Haruma's father. Why did the Warrior Gods appear? What is their connection to the happenings in Kaminohara? Genma reveals his ambitions...

title: In Darkness, Ryoma - Come to your senses, Haruma Kagutsuchi! -
synopsis: Shino, Mariko, and Kaoru rise against Memento Mori to rescue Haruma. Romeo, Alice, and Himiko's bump combos push back Memento Mori. However, in the field appears a black coffin...

title: The Imprisoned Lily - I will not let you have Haruma... -
synopsis: Memento Mori, the Spirit of War, shows herself to be the cause behind Haruma's pain. Ryoma holds the elemental advantage, fire against wood. As Ryoma moves in to finish the battle in one blow, a fog obstructs his path...

title: Death's Embrace - He's the one who killed me, your mother... -
synopsis: The indomitable dragon and fallen angel clash, lighting up the city. Both refuse to give an inch. Haruma struggles, torn between memory and reality. A mysterious shimmer appears...

title: Ryoma VS Lucy - I've trained—and now I'm here to see you again. -
synopsis: Ryoma sweeps the flock of a thousand Bahamuts in one fell swoop. In front of him appears Lucy and Haruma. Another deathmatch begins...

title: The Indomitable Dragon - I'll protect my friends and Haruma! -
synopsis: The gang battles desperately, fighting for their very own survival. Yet the enemy is simply too powerful. One by one, they reach the limits of their strength. In the end, only Ren is left standing. Ren's determination to protect his friends and Haruma resonate, awakening a new bond with Ryoma...

title: The Flock of Bahamut - One thousand?! -
synopsis: Lucy appears once more, jacking the entire city. A sinister smile signals the coming of a swarm of Bahamuts. As crows change to dragons, the skies of Shibuya are covered in darkness.

title: Blade Versus Gun - Return to ash... -
synopsis: Kamui is overpowered by Romeo's onslaught. Napoleon takes the full brunt of Himiko's strike shot. Even with the odds against them, Akira and Aoi continue fighting. They gather their strength for one final push, all for the sake of meeting Haruma again.

title: The Scarlet Shrine Maiden - Divine words hold great power! -
synopsis: An insane battle featuring Himiko's golem and Napoleon's rabbit army ensues. A flurry of lasers and explosions rock the battlefield. The scene then shifts to Akira and Taiyo battling against Kaoru. A demonic shadow materializes before Kamui and Loki...

title: Alice in a Mad Wonderland - I'll cut you into cute, tiny, bite-sized pieces. -
synopsis: Alice's gatling gun and deadly trump minions push back Minami's Dead Rabbits. The Rabbits manage to strike back. But instead of weakening, Alice becomes crazed and rips off a maniacal strike shot!

title: Booya! Return to Shibuya - Don't even think about touching Haruma! -
synopsis: The team returns to Shibuya with Taiyo and his team. There they reunite with Haruma. However, Haruma refuses to speak and dissapears, leaving behind a new enemy in his wake.

title: An Accidental Double Date
synopsis: Ren is invited by both Aoi and Minami to go out shopping for their victory celebration. In a stroke of stupidity, Ren manages to double book both of the girls. How will he manage to escape from his perilous situation?

title: Assemble, Assault, and Assail - It's always a party! -
synopsis: The team is barely staying afloat against Nirvana. Their attacks are ineffective and laughed away by the drunken Battle God. It's taking everything they have to stay one step ahead. In a stroke of luck, a ray of light is assessed in the shape of a hole in a strange place.

title: Nirvana, Inferno of War - It's always a party! -
synopsis: The age of idols ends with Ren and the rest intact. They've managed to avoid Snow Bow, but instead of disappearing, the field becomes consumed by fire. From the depths of the inferno, a mysterious presence appears!

title: Melodious Snow Bow - Here's a bow, tied right on your heart. -
synopsis: After a furious succession of battles, the gang finds themselves resting at Minamikaze. But there, an out-of-control Akane storms onto the scene?! To stop her, a battle begins, but there the first notes of a concert unfold.

title: Dark Usurper Zeus - From the heavens... -
synopsis: Ren's vowed to bring out Ryoma's potential, but is once again pushed back by an enemy stronger than Sakura—Dark Usurper Zeus. With even Kamui and Napoleon struggling, Ren remembers words Akira has spoken in the past. And then...?

title: The Saber Amid the Blossoms - Impossible's just a ten letter word! -
synopsis: Ryoma's on the ropes, unable to display his true power. Ren's time to shine has come to an abrupt end, but behind him the calvalry arrives. Aoi and Napoleon attack head-on and begin to turn the tables. Will it be enough to snatch victory from defeat?
