title: Come One and All: MS Club - Defeat the top four! -
synopsis: Haruma's on a different level. To meet him again, Minami announces the creation of Club MS —all in the name of reaching the top in Kaminohara. However, the student council's president may have a few complaints...

title: From the Ring, Hope - A new monster takes the stage! -
synopsis: Haruma's words stab at the hearts of Ren and his friends. After their crushing defeat at Haruma's hands, the team lies broken. Amid the gloom, the strike ring glows —a faint flicker of hope that brings the promise of a new meeting.

title: Lucy the Annihilator - Bow before the lord of the fallen! -
synopsis: The team is locked in a desperate battle against Underworld Rebel Lucy. Blasted by a fiery energy circle, they fire off their Strike Shots, only to be denied by an impervious barrier. How will the dice fall?

title: Where Art Thou, Haruma? - You're not even on the same level. Begone! -
synopsis: The team searches for Haruma in Shibuya. A gigantic monster gate appears. As Ren and friends prepare for a throwdown, a mysterious attack destroys the monsters. Could it be, Haruma?

title: Pieces of Memories - We played MS in the past? -
synopsis: Ren and his team manage to escape from Doom's grasp. Monster Strike and all the strange happenings associated with it leaves the gang with more questions than answers. K's prophetic words linger—"The answers lie in your past."

title: Counter! A Strike Shot for the Ages!- xThere's always an answer! -
synopsis: Kamui goes berserk, and Fox Metal falls out of the ring. Doom's strength devastates the entire party. All appears lost, until Ren begins to figure out the rules.

title: Beware the Warrior God - You end here! -
synopsis: The deathmatch against Izanami Zero has ended, but a new threat appears. Who is K (King), and what is he aiming for? And a warrior god appears?! The curtains rise, unveiling a new season of Monster Strike the Animation!

title: Izanami - Past despair, there was... -
synopsis: Akira’s fine play should have turned the tables, but the dark aura surrounding Izanami Zero pushes the team to despair. It’s a do-or-die situation!

title: Impossible Task - Are they serious?! -
synopsis: There may be a connection between MS Coliseum and the strange happenings in Kaminohara. To investigate, the team sneaks into the coliseum. There an ominous shadow appears...

title: Ora-gone?! - No more secrets. Ora ora ora! -
synopsis: Is there a connection between Oragon and the possessed?! The team harbors doubts about Oragon while investigating his secret..

title: Welcome, Minami! - Enter a new comrade—but she's an airhead? -
synopsis: After the victorious battle, Ren and Aoi welcome the no-longer-possessed Minami into the team. To form a team of four, Aoi once again asks Akira but...

title: Shopfront Shocker - Leave this to me! -
synopsis: The team challenges Minami in a bid to remove the embarassing video. While being pushed back by Minami's aggression, something becomes clear...

title: SOS! A Shocking Video?! - If you want to erase it... -
synopsis: Minami has decided to destroy Aoi outside of Monster Strike. As announced, Minami uploads a shocking video of Aoi. Can they stop the out-of-control Minami?

title: Evil Eye Minami - A mild and ditzy girl? -
synopsis: Ren and the others set out to convince Minami to rejoin the team. They find a cursing Minami in the midst of a ferocious battle. Can Aoi manage to recruit Minami?

title: Operation Recruit Akira
synopsis: Aoi carries out Operation Recruit Akira—leading to a no-holds-barred blitz aimed at persuading Akira to rejoin the team. Is success around the corner?

title: The Glinting Blade
synopsis: Akira appears, bringing renewed hope to the desperate pair. Unfortunately, he refuses to fight as a team. Can the trio win the battle?

title: Mall Brawl
synopsis: Ren and Aoi are attacked by a mysterious team of junior high schoolers. Backed into a corner, the two fight back...

title: A Night At The Colloseum
synopsis: Ren decides to challenge the Colosseum after being inspired by the epic battles between monsters. But Aoi's a stickler and wants to do things right before joning the fray.

title: Aoi Mizusawa's Secret
synopsis: Almost every junior high student in Kaminohara plays Monster Strike. After a brief meeting, Aoi invites Ren to a special place—one where MS players gather.

title: Slingshot Away! Call Me Oragon!
synopsis: Ren is forced into a heated battle with the bestial Fenrir X. Unable to control his companion Oragon and on the verge of defeat, a girl appears before Ren. Who could she be?

title: The First Strike!
synopsis: Ren returns to the town of his childhood, Kaminohara. Strangely, Ren is unable to recall any memories of the town. Meanwhile, his smartphone installs a mysterious game called Monster Strike — heralding the start of a desperate battle!

title: Untitled
synopsis: Mi-chan might not make it...

title: Untitled
synopsis: To Mai, monsters are like Santa Claus

title: Untitled
synopsis: 20,000 yen is not enough.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Dogs can save the world or take you to New Jersey.

title: Untitled
synopsis: The club follows Ponoka to learn the secrets to her awesomeness.

title: Untitled
synopsis: A rebellious bug has big Mai and Mi so it is up to their Senpai to shock some sense into them.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Mi v.s. a cat!

title: Untitled
synopsis: Mi has been sucked into the world of online video games and only her friends can save her!

title: Untitled
synopsis: A time tunnel has appeared and there is only room in the pot for one.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Mi-chan is incredibly courageous and will do anything to prove it.

title: Untitled
synopsis: A new contender has entered the realm and challenges Ai Mai and Mi to a manga battle!

title: Untitled
synopsis: Manga is a tough business and only the strong will survive.

title: Untitled
synopsis: The girls of this manga club have the imagination for manga, but not the work ethic.

title: Counterattack
synopsis: Mi Liu faces the monsters to save Yaya's life. In his moment of desperation, he's saved by Anji and her awakened hemomancy powers.

title: Boom
synopsis: Lee Shin continues his mind rampage. Prepared to die, Mi Liu fights alone. As he fights, Anji and Chen Fong are forced to make a difficult decision. less

title: Plan
synopsis: After rejecting Lou Yao's help, he returns to Anji and the others with uncertainty. There he encounters and awakened and deranged Lee Shin.

title: Meeting
synopsis: In order to save their new companion Yaya, Mi Ryu and company request Lu Yao's help while fully aware of the risks. Will their deal with the devil turn out in their favor or turn against them?

title: Countdown
synopsis: Why and how was Anji revived? Amidst the joy and confusion, a little traveling companion connected to the mystery joins the group. However, it is also the beginning of a new problem.

title: Reunion
synopsis: Still unable to believe the truth, Mi Ryu continues aimly walking while carrying Anji as though it were his punishment. less

title: Choices
synopsis: The weak perish and the strong survive. As the bloodivores are tossed about by their cruel fate, Li Shin challenges Lu Yao, the strongest of the failures.

title: Sapphire
synopsis: Anji's wound is deep. To save her, Mi Ryu uses the data terminal forced on him by his father. However, through it he discovers a shocking truth.

title: Sacrifice
synopsis: The bloodivores and hemomancers fight together to survive. However, their alliance is fleeting—no more than a false friendship.

title: Hemomancy
synopsis: Bloodivores and hemomancers are gathered at the prison. Then monsters suddenly appear. As questions and suspicions mount, Mi Ryu is forced to recall unpleasant memories from his childhood.

title: Awakening
synopsis: Punished for a crime he didn't commit, when he awoke, Miryu found himself inside a mysterious facility. Waiting for him there was a survival game of life and death.

title: Bloodivores
synopsis: A case of insomnia swept across the globe. As a side effect of the drug developed to suppress this sickness of causes unknown, the “bloodivores” were born. Born from bloodivore and human parents, protagonist Mi Ryu was known as “The Child of Hope” tying bloodivore and humankind together. However, when Miryu is arrested as the principal offender in a bank robbery, he is taken to a special prison operated by the Bureau of Special Threat Management for observing bloodivores.

title: When Summer Ends
synopsis: Noel and Celia face off as Takahiro watches. Noel's feelings toward the younger sister she fought so hard for bring about a miracle, and as Takahiro looks on, he once again realizes the path he must take.

title: Where Victory Lies
synopsis: As the tournament reaches its climax, Akane and Celia face off on the quarterfinal stage. The Akane who couldn't even talk to her admired senpai before is nowhere to be found, and both fight with all their strength. Then, as the semifinals are about to begin, Noel's father arrives at the academy...

title: Clash
synopsis: It's finally the day of the summer tournament. Takahiro, who is participating as a begleiter, tries to convey his intentions to everyone, but an emergency suddenly takes him away from the action.

title: The Maidens' Festival
synopsis: On the day before the summer tournament is the Miss Winford Contest, a competition to decide the most beautiful girl in the academy. Amid the excitement around the school, a rumor spreads that Takahiro will become the winner's begleiter!

title: I Wish Upon a Shooting Star
synopsis: The girls go to Bertille's summer home to go and train for the upcoming summer tournament. This house even has a outdoor bath, but the girls work hard, sometimes having fun along the way. Takahiro and Ayako are there as support to help out. Takahiro learns why Noel wishes to fight one night, and also learns more about himself. Mio runs into Takahiro in the bath during his reflection. The girls show up looking for Mio and high jinks ensue.

title: Under the Windmill
synopsis: Akane finds herself weak as she admires Celia just way too much. She decides that she must undergo training to overcome this, but rain comes instead. She goes to find shelter in a windmill, and finds Celia there, as well. There's trouble, and they find themselves unable to leave the windmill. Takahiro realizes something is up, and he comes to find them, but you'll never believe what happens...

title: Time Off in Helen's Hill
synopsis: Takahiro runs into Lisa by chance one day, and then learns from Reina, the student council vice president, about Lisa's past. He is then asked by her to become Lisa's begleiter. Takahiro does not know what to do, as he is also being asked by Celia and Noel. Takahiro wanders around town on their day off, only to run into the girls who are also spending their day off in different ways. Takahiro talks a little bit about the arena in which all knights wish to find themselves someday...

title: Girls Without Their Armor
synopsis: Mio realizes how she truly feels about jousting and decides to participate in the summer tournament! Celia, the student council president, invites Mio to have tea with her so she can see how Mio really feels about jousting. After having her entry accepted, Mio goes to visit Noel's house with Takahiro. They meet Noel's younger sister who is confined to a wheelchair, Mireille. Takahiro and Mio learn about why Noel really wants to participate in the summer tournament...

title: What It Takes to Be a Knight
synopsis: Ryuuzouji Akane: a woman given an A-ranking in the knight division, a trusted confidant of Mio, and also hails from the same land as Takahiro. A girl in black armor appears before Akane. Akane gets into a fight with some underclassman, and as a result ends up having to fight that black knight. The first year Lisa Eostre is the one wearing that suit of armor! Meanwhile, Mio find herself lost now that she doesn't need to joust anymore...

title: The Morning of the Duel
synopsis: Takahiro elicits helps from Noel a second-year knight student who wants to show just how strong she is by helping to train Mio. The day of the duel comes, and Mio doesn't just learn how fun jousting can be, but also how tough. You'll be surprised how different Mio looks when she shows up to meet Takahiro in the morning. It's time for Mio's duel with Bertille . What will happen?

title: Sakura's Trial
synopsis: Kisaki Mio, a normal student in her second year, has been friends with Takahiro since he came abroad. There was a little misunderstanding, and now she's going to duel with Bertille, a second year knight. Takahiro couldn't stand back and watch--he's gonna be her begleiter. Mio doesn't even know how to hold a lance, but she realizes jousting is fun while Takahiro teaches her. All the women who wanted Takahiro to be their begleiter are surprised.

title: The Flower Garden
synopsis: Knights hold lances and thrust at each other with them. It's jousting. Mizuno Takahiro goes to Winford Academy and wanted to be a knight, but he got hurt, and stopped working towards that dream. Now he's a begleiter. He doesn't have a partner yet. Lots of women abound. There's a lot going on.

title: PV
synopsis: Promotional Video

title: Building Twelve: The Bond Between Haruki and His Sisters.
synopsis: The sisters get unusual close.

title: Building Eleven: How Yayoi Nurses?!
synopsis: Haruki is down with a cold, and the only one to help him out is Yayoi.

title: Building Ten: Mutsuki’s Request?!
synopsis: Mutsuki has run into a problem she can't handle on her own. Is her request too much for Haruki to handle?

title: Building Nine: For the Love of Pranks?!
synopsis: Haruki is on his guard against Uzuki's pranks, but is that was Uzuki is really planning?

title: Building Eight: Definitely Siblings
synopsis: Do all twins look the same? Join the Nakanos as they look through some family history.

title: Building Seven: The Apartment Complex's Pool Opening?!
synopsis: It might be a little early to go to the beach, but that's not going to stop these siblings from having some fun in the water.

title: Building Six: The Siblings’ Multiplication
synopsis: Multiplication is a fundamental skill! Everyone has to learn their multiplication tables in elementary school. If they don’t...

title: Building Five: Satsuki's Anime Clock
synopsis: Satsuki and Haruki have an unexpected hobby in common. And Satsuki never misses a beat.

title: Building Four: Curry and Rice
synopsis: The grocery shopping must be done, so the Nakano siblings get together to conquer the week's shopping list.

title: Building Three: Mutsuki's True Colors
synopsis: Mutsuki is bright and beautiful, and diligent to top it all off. But she shows a different side in front of Haruki...

title: Building Two: The Twins' Homework
synopsis: Uzuki and Satsuki do their best to finish their homework. Their assignment? A report on their family members!

title: Building One: The Yumeno Apartments
synopsis: Welcome to the Yumeno Apartments, where Haruki Nakano lives out his everyday life with his four sisters.

title: Mr. Penguin's Secret / Cherry Blossom Viewing in Spring
synopsis: Panda and Polar Bear team up to figure out some of Penguin’s secrets. Everyone get together for a cherry blossom viewing.

title: Mr. Grizzly's Reunion / Mr. Llama's Time Capsule
synopsis: Grizzly gets a surprise visit and the Café patrons go on a treasure hunt.

title: Sloth's Trip / I Became a Doll / White Day
synopsis: Sloth sets out for a hot spring, the café crew takes a trip around the world, and Mr. Hana is confused on what to get Sasako.

title: South Pole Squad Penguinger / Even More, What is Roasting!?
synopsis: The Penguins get their chance to shine on the Yama Yama! Yama Arashi! Show! Masaki wants his chance to roast coffee, but doesn’t get encouragement from everyone.

title: Doll Festival / The Animal Doctor
synopsis: The baby penguins set up for the traditional doll festival. Polar Bear gets sick and it’s up to his friends to take care of him.

title: Rin Rin and Mei Mei's Super Exciting Plan / Smelt Fishing
synopsis: Rin Rin and Mei help each other out in getting dates with their idols. Polar Bear takes everybody smelt fishing with humorous results.

title: The Everyday Zoo! / The Zoo in the Rain.
synopsis: A major change at the zoo leaves one attraction a little bit lonelier.

title: Pun Café! / Mr. Full-Time Panda, Mr. Llama, and Rin Rin!
synopsis: Polar Bear gets a taste of what's it’s like to be on the receiving end of puns. Full-Time Panda and Llama have a wild night!

title: Polar Bear's Insomnia / Mr. Grizzly's First Love
synopsis: The café patrons suggest different ways to cure Polar Bear’s insomnia. Unable to sleep, Grizzly does some work around the café while Polar Bear shares a story from their youth.

title: Scattering Beans With Everyone / The Café in the Afternoon
synopsis: The animals gather at the café for the traditional scattering of the beans. Sasako and Llama share a quiet afternoon together reminiscing about their youth.

title: The Hammock Sea / Panda Mama's Gardening
synopsis: Polar Bear tries to enjoy an evening in a Hammock. Panda ruins his mother’s garden and tries to make up for it as best he can.

title: The Animals' Hidden Talent Competition! / New Year's Guest.
synopsis: The café regulars display there not so hidden talents and while Polar Bear is on a New Year’s vacation, Penguin doesn’t know what to do without being at the café.

title: Big Cleaning at the Café / For Whom Does the Bell Toll
synopsis: Its end of the year cleaning at the cafe and the New Year brings up reflection.

title: Christmas Planning! / Christmas Trouble!
synopsis: Panda is expecting a wealth of Christmas gifts, but the only one who seems to get him is Rin Rin, and Penguin just wants to party.

title: Grizzly's Hibernation Preparations! / Grizzly's Hibernation!
synopsis: Grizzly and Polar Bear go shopping for the perfect pillow, but Polar Bear is not helping much. In the end, Grizzly doesn’t get much sleep.

title: Sloth Wants To Work! / Mr. Handa's Present
synopsis: Sloth gets a job, but what for? Lesser Panda and Polar Bear attempt to help Handa pick the perfect gift.

title: Wolf's Occupation Change / Mr. Penguin's New Love!
synopsis: Wolf has quit his job at the bakery and spends some time with his friend Tiger. Mr. Penguin hasn’t been visiting the café recently; it seems he has found a new café…

title: Panda Corner Contest! / Coffee Roaster Masaki
synopsis: Panda is jealous of the Penguin Action Hero Show and asks his friends how get his popularity back. Masaki taste the bitter truth of why you have to learn all the steps to roasting coffee.

title: The Café Yard! / Sales Penguins' Sales!
synopsis: Polar Bear gives his friends a tour of the café’s yard. The Penguins meet up to discuss how to move more penguin cards.

title: Mr. Penguin's Dilemma! / Idol: Yama Arashi!
synopsis: Mr. Penguin has to make a choice of which Penko is right for him. Panda Mama and Ms. King Penguin attend an idol concert!

title: Halloween! / Llama Day!
synopsis: Polar Bear, Penguin, and Panda try their hand at trick and treating. Llama sits down with co-workers to discuss himself.

title: Panda's New Part-time Job! / Mr. Penguin Goes Flying!
synopsis: Panda works his way up the ladder and Penguin dreams of flying.

title: Panda's Apology! / Rin Rin Welcomed!
synopsis: Panda gives Polar Bear the day off and Full-Time Panda invites Rin Rin out for drinks and advice.

title: Animal Field Baseball
synopsis: Grizzly has sent a declaration of battle to the Café: Wild Animals vs. Polar Bears

title: The New Panda! / Reunion at the Grizzly Bar!
synopsis: Full time panda is scared of losing his job and MC 469MA brings the bar down.

title: Mr. Penguin's Hobbies / Their Childhood Days
synopsis: Mr. Penguin art exhibit is disturbed by some uncultured guest. Grizzly Bear shares his childhood memories of growing up with Polar Bear.

title: Panda's Apprenticeship / A Sports Day Filled With Animals Panda
synopsis: Panda is jealous of Masaki apprenticeship with Mr. Tree Kangaroo and is determined to find his own Master. Sasako and Hanada are unexpectedly thrown in the neighborhood sports day.

title: Mr. Handa's Discussion! / Panda Mama's Daily Life
synopsis: Mr. Handa invites Polar Bear out to lunch, while Panda and Penguin discover more about Sasako. Panda Mama has much to learn when it comes to all- you-can-stuff and all-you-can-eat situations.

title: Sales Penguin / Mr. Penguin's Picnic
synopsis: The Penguins meet up to discuss ways to move their penguin species cards. Mr. Penguin comes to the café looking for answers to his Penko problem.

title: Panda is no Longer a Panda. \ Mei Mei's Prince!
synopsis: With the Zoo Director’s permission, Panda has a change to try his paw in different zoo jobs. Mei Mei finds the lover of her life, in the wrong person.

title: The Ideal Single Living / Summer Festival
synopsis: Panda has decided it is time for him to move out and goes apartment searching with his butler, Mr. Penguin. Polar Bear's Café and Grizzly's Bar are teaming up to run a food stall with a special gust, Panda’s “older brother” or something like that.

title: There Are Many Kinds of Penguins / What is Baisen!?
synopsis: A trip to the pool pits penguin against penguin, and the secret of Polar Bear’s coffee is revealed.

title: The Café's Ghost Stories \ Panda Runs Away from Home
synopsis: The staff and regulars of the Café share ghost stores, and Panda doesn’t get the idea of running away.

title: Let's Go Camping! \ Rin Rin and the High School Girl
synopsis: Grizzly and Penguin work double duty while camping, and Rin Rin breaks a girl’s heart.

title: Mr. Grizzly Goes on an Adventure \ A Strange Restaurant
synopsis: Mr. Grizzly hears some disturbing news about an old friend, and a stranger happens upon Polar Bear’s Café.

title: Weeding in the Summer \ Mr. Penguin's Romance.
synopsis: The weeds have over grown the Café and Penguin seems to be the only person to care. Afterwards, Penguin finally confesses his love with great results!

title: Enthusiastic Polar Bear.\ Let's go to the beach!
synopsis: Panda and Polar bear decided to switch jobs for the day; it works out well for one of them. Afterwards Panda, Polar Bear, and Penguin decide to spend the day at the beach.

title: Tanabata Decorations \ Panda's Wish
synopsis: The patrons and staff of Polar Bear’s Café prep for Tanabata. This is Panda’s first Tanabata and he is concerned about what to wish for.

title: Panda, Tired of Boredom \ Panda's Advice Room for Troubles
synopsis: A rainy day at the zoo leads Panda and his fellow animals to think of creative ways to pass the time. Panda is still worried that Mr. Handa does not have a girlfriend.

title: Mr. Penguin's Broken Heart \ Panda's Night Out
synopsis: While in the park, Mr. Penguin sees Miss Penko on a date. Grizzly stops by and tells Polar Bear it’s a guy’s night out.

title: Mr. Handa's Group Blind Date? \ Mr. Handa's Group Blind Date!
synopsis: After eating Mr. Handa very plain lunch, Panda gets Mr. Handa invited on a group date in hopes his lunches improves. But when the 3rd male drops out, Panda goes to the café to find a replacement.

title: Rin Rin Deeply Moved! Panda's House! \ Mr. Penguin's Proposal
synopsis: Rin Rin the florist gets a truly random opportunity to visit the home of Panda, whom he adores. But just meeting Panda Mama and Panda Sister might be too much for him. Meanwhile, Mr. Penguin is getting pumped up to ask Miss Penko out on a date.

title: A Magazine Interview Comes By! \ Salmon Hunter: Mr. Grizzly!
synopsis: The Café is being featured in the magazine, Furafura Walker Monthly. What should be a simple interview proves to be anything but thanks to Furafura unique editor in chief. The Cafe is closed for the day so Polar Bear can get fresh ingredients. A hungry and curious Panda joins Polar Bear and Grizzly Bear on their fishing trip.

title: Mr. Handa's Make-over Plan \ Love Love Driving Tactics
synopsis: Panda new obsession is with popularity, he attempts to raise Mr. Hanada’s popularity with the help of Polar Bear. Penguin finally got his license but now has to get his dating license before he can take Miss Penko out for a drive.

title: Panda's Diet / Strive for it! Wild Panda
synopsis: After breaking the slide at work, Panda has decided to lose some weight. His ideal body shape is far from his current look. To fit his new look, Panda wants to be wilder but he admits he was born meek. An invite from Polar Bear leads Panda to the bar, Grizzly’s.

title: Panda gets Enthusiastic / Everyone's Parfait
synopsis: Full Time Panda is away for a week, so Panda has to work his shifts. He gets some encouragement from a fan name Rin Rin, who he searches for every day. Mr. Polar Bear wants to serve a special menu and when word gets around it will be Parfaits, everyone has a suggestion.

title: Obsessed with Smartphones / Super Fun Driving Lesson
synopsis: Penguin is excited about his new smartphone. But the café patrons are not impressed until Panda shows them his new phone. Along with a new smartphone, Penguin is taking driving classes to get his license. Polar Bear has agreed to give him a few pointers.

title: Polar Bear Goes to the Zoo / Panda's Problems
synopsis: Panda has convinced Polar Bear and Penguin to visit him at the zoo. Being their first time, Polar Bear seems to want to go places he is strictly forbidden. Back at the Café, the zoo workers discuss the pains of stereotypes.

title: Everyone's Café / Café's Cherry Blossom Viewing
synopsis: The patrons of Polar Bear’s Café have their own idea on the dream café, which starts to take form. But when the cherry blossoms start to fall, thoughts turn to having a viewing party,

title: Polar Bear's Café
synopsis: Panda, part of generation cupcake, is prodded by his mother to get a job, but he just wants to eat bamboo. While avoiding his mother's ire he happens upon a cafe run by Polar Bear, who just so happens to be looking for a part-time employee.

title: An Eternal Arcadia
synopsis: The Aube Hunters finally locate Erebos. Angelique finds herself alone with Nyx.

title: To the sky...
synopsis: Everyone is begging Angelique to please stay. She finally tells everyone that the only way she can be happy is to protect Arcadia from ruin. Just as everyone is about to depart on the ship, Erenfried discovers a bomb planted on their ship.

title: Slumber in Celestizam
synopsis: Angelique is angered that Erebos mortally wounded Mathias which causes her powers to increase. Rene urges Angelique to tell everyone that she will be leaving soon to become Queen and what will happen to her.

title: Atonement
synopsis: Rene tells the Aube Hunters about Erebos. Now that the city is deserted Mathias is feeling very lonely. Rene finds Mathias and asks for his forgiveness as he never considered Mathia’s feelings before.

title: Snow Field Termination
synopsis: Erenfried learns that Yorgo is to be executed the next morning. He has to stop the execution as Yorgo is the only one who can stop Mathias and recover the Holy City.

title: Realisations of the Young Men
synopsis: The gang and the Aube Hunters arrive safely at Nyxs’ family where Angelique tells them Nyx is possessed by Erebos. Erenfried is upset about making the artifact chip and to make amends gives Rene a good luck charm to be used to save Mathias.

title: One Night of Truth
synopsis: Mathias orders Jet to bring Angelique to him. When Nyx and Angelique arrive at Nyxs’ family home, she asks him what happened that night at the Hidamari mansion.

title: The Rebellion at the Sacred Capital
synopsis: Just as Rene' is about to be crowned Mathias stops the ceremony claiming he is the only one who can be king. Jet knows he only have a little bit of time left so he asks Angelique to run off with him.

title: My Little Angel
synopsis: Rene and Angelique meet up at the Sacred Capital where he tells her he is taking over as the leader of the Organization. Roche and Bernard try to figure out the truth about Nyx by studying a letter from the past.

title: Tower of Dream Soul
synopsis: The Thanatos are at the Spirit Illusion Tower and the Silver Wood Knights are on their way to investigate this appearance. Along the way Sir Dion tells Angelique of Hyuga’s past.

title: Sword in that hand
synopsis: On their way to Celestizam Angelique is captured by three men. A woman appears to save her who turns out to be a captain of a ship. Along the way the Thanatos attacks the ship.

title: Melody of Encounter
synopsis: Rayne has taken Bernard and Roche to where all of them have been hiding since the fire and proceeds to tell them what happened that day. Mathias accepts Erenfried’s offer to build the jinx and spare Yorgo.

title: The Lost Light
synopsis: The Thanatos have reproduced at such an alarming rate due to the fire that burned down the Hidamari mansion; that no one has seen the sun for the last six months. Most people are blaming this on the Aube Hunters.

title: Repatriation, And Then...
synopsis: The Aube Hunters agree to help Hyuga protect Angelique. They plan on releasing Angelique's Purifying power. This will cause all the Thanatos to come and attack Angelique and then Hyuga and the Aube Hunters can destroy them all.

title: Imprisonment of Angelique
synopsis: Agelique was kidnapped by Jet. She was brought in the Artifact Building. She was being experimented on by Erenfried. Later, the Aube Hunter came to save her. They have fought the jinx but they didn't have enought power to defeat Jet. But hearing the voices of them, Angelique with her power help them to win. At last they won. They once united but suddenly Yorgo have a important talk to Rayne. Yorgo told him that Ange can save the world with her power. But Rayne was opposed of Yorgo. Angelique found Rayne and have a talk. Rayne was afraid that Angelique would not live but he let her decide if she wants to save the world with her power even it is exchange of her life. Agelique was able to decide she would do it even if she would die.

title: Dark Clouds
synopsis: Thanatos attack Jinx and destroy them. More Thanatos appear at Angelique's old school and Sally and Hannah are missing along with a photographer who turns out to be Bernard. The boys fight the Thanatos while Angelique looks for her friends, whom she finds cornered by a Thanatos, Angelique with the help of a broken Jinx kills the Thanatos, but as the episode ends, Angelique is kidnapped, by Jet.

title: Rondo of Time
synopsis: The Jinx are taking longer and longer to destroy the Thanatos. Nyx takes Angelique to a ball, where some questions are raised about Nyx's past.

title: A Day Off In Wodon
synopsis: Angelique takes a day off to visit friends, whom she runs away from when they have a fight. Roche finds Angelique and takes her out on a date.

title: Jinx
synopsis: The consortium has created a new weapon to battle the Thanatos. The orb hunters are invited to see a demonstration of Jinx's awesome power.

title: The Seeds of Happiness
synopsis: J.D. mysteriously collapses and is found out to be an artifact. Angelique and Hyuga set out to find his cure located in J.D’s past in a town called Kozu.

title: The Pilgrimage to a Holy City
synopsis: The Aube Hunters enter Celestizam while Hyuga stays outside. Angelique has an audience with the Religious leader and sorts out her emotions. When leaving she runs into Roche, which persistently tries to get an exclusive interview. Angelique escapes with the help of Rene and is taken to his secret place the Silver Tree. Meanwhile J.D is starting to have a problem and is trying to desperately hide it from his friends

title: The Journey of Determination
synopsis: The group, now referred to as the Aube Hunters, set off to Celestizam to meet with the Religious Leader. On the way there they make a short stop off at the Melrose Girl's Academy then continue on to a small town that welcomes them for the night. While there Angelique is put to the test to perform to people’s expectations and questions if she really can do it.

title: The Black Attack
synopsis: Bernard, a reporter for the Wodon Times, sets off to Hidamari Mansion to investigate the rumored “Queen's Egg”. When Angelique is alone in the field Jet appears. Rayne, Nyx, J.D., and Hyuga show up fight back against the Thanatos and Jet while Angelique shows her power healing light.

title: The Silver Knight
synopsis: Angelique and Rayne are sent to destroy Thanatos on the Ship of Stars. When few Thanatos escape from the ship, Hyuga, a man which Angelique met earlier helps to destroy them. It is revealed he is also a Purifying Ability Compatible and vows to protect Angelique.

title: Under the Table
synopsis: Angelique and Rayne set off on their first mission to Rayne's hometown to destroy a few Thanatos. During their mission, they meet another Purifying Ability Compatible, J.D. who helps them in their mission.

title: The Girl of Miracles
synopsis: Nyx goes to Angelique's school to ask her to aid him in protecting the world of Thanatos. While fighting the Thanatos Angelique discovers that she has a special power.

title: Tsukishima Jinbei is here!
synopsis: The well gives the Magistrate back her power and she transforms into Shiroageha, but her memories are lost. She attacks Jinbei, and the power of the well makes Sanada much stronger. Jinbei, who swore to fight until he dies, is faced with his last enemy. The final battle begins!

title: The Promise Is Hope Within Despair
synopsis: When he learns that the power of the well will cost the servant her memories, Jinbei goes into the well after her. She was prepared to lose her memories but Jinbei persuades her not to. When she leaves, Sanada Yukimura is there...

title: The Insect Magistrate's Cursed Past
synopsis: The battle for Wakayama castle continues! Muagi battles Saizou while the rest of the Magistrate's fights the last of the crucifix insects, and Jinbei attacks Yukimura. The Magistrate plunges herself into the Eternal Well, and her mysterious past is revealed.

title: My Life's Greatest Task
synopsis: Jinbei's flower team advances steadily. Meanwhile the snow team, the Magistrate's party, reaches the eternal well. Kirigakure Saizou then reveals his true self and begins a one on one fight with Mugai.

title: Who Is Righteous!? Tenma and Justice!
synopsis: The fourth battle of Wakayama Castle is between Ichinotani Tenma and Anayama Kosuke. Anayama says "Justice" a lot. He attacks Tenma with his warped sense of justice. A badly wounded Tenma continues to fight, hoping for just one thing: to meet the father and mother he's never seen.

title: The Compassion Slash That Cuts G!!
synopsis: The Miyoshi brothers have powerful regenerative capabilities. They say that taking life is offering salvation, and in them Shungiku sees his own younger self. Oooka, who knows the old Shungiku, is doubtful he can win the battle.

title: Dream of the Butterfly
synopsis: The second battle of Wakayama Castle is against Kirigakure Saizou, the strongest of the Ten Crucifix Insects, who is a master of strange techniques. Hibachi is dazzled and bewildered by illusions of her past.

title: He Shed His Skin!? The Insect-men's True Form!!
synopsis: The battle with the Ten Crucifix Insects begins! The first round is Tsukishima Jinbei vs. Nedzu Jinpachi. As soon a the battle begins Jinbei is drawn into the castle moat, and forced to fight underwater at a huge disadvantage. Does Jinbei have a way to win? And what is the true form of the Ten Crucifix Insects!?

title: Time's Up! The Insect Magistrate's Office Arrives!
synopsis: Jinbei heads to meet the lord of Kishuu, but he finds Hibachi instead. The party meets with the rest of the City Patrol group and enjoys a brief rest. But the time limit is drawing nigh, and just when the Ten Crucifix Insects attack the people of Kishuu...

title: Sanada Yukimura's Trap! Caught in a Net!!
synopsis: Jinbei is chased and captured by the people of Kishuu at the order of Sanada Yukimura. The village of Iwamatsu, where he is kept, is attacked by bandits, and he wins the hearts of the people by chasing them off. However, there is only a brief moment of rest. Two of the ten crucifix insects, the Rokurou Combo, take a girl hostage!

title: The Cool Guy in Glasses Lectures on Right and Wrong
synopsis: The Insect Magistrate heads to Kishuu to recover her lost powers. Oooka Tadasuke, Edo's smartest man, accompanies her as her guard. Jinbei goes as well, but Oooka is upset by his failings as a Samurai. And then Nezu Jinpachi, one of the 10 Crucifix Insects, appears!

title: To Kishuu! The Ten Crucifix Insects of Sanada Appear!
synopsis: Sanada Yukimura's 10 Crucifix Insects attack one village after another. The Insect Magistrate rushes to Edo Castle, where she discovers a secret in Nagatomimaru's room. And the secret past of Jinbei's father Genjuro, and how he met Jinbei's mother, is revealed!

title: Insect!? Man!? A Mysterious Enemy Attacks!
synopsis: A mysterious insect man, Sarutobi Sasuke, appears in Edo. The city is in danger but the City Patrol Group is nowhere to be found. The Shrine and Samurai House patrol groups fight back, but are overwhelmed. Just when everything seems lost to his speedy attacks...!?

title: We'll Show You Everything!! The Edo Women's Baths!!
synopsis: Osono the journalist plans to write an expose about the Insect Magistrates and knows she will get her big scoop at the women’s bath.

title: Training with Father! The Thirty-six Blades of Fuji!!
synopsis: Returning to Edo, the Insect squad is stunned to see mounds of bug carcasses and one man standing alone.

title: Jinbei's Power Awakens!!
synopsis: Cornered by Sougan, the strongest of the Insect Hunters, attacks the Insect Magistrate but seconds before death an unfamiliar Jinbei awakens.

title: Kuroageha Arrives
synopsis: The Insect Magistrate is confused by Jinbei’s actions; is he friend or foe? Jinbei continues his fight against the hunters but the difference in skill is obvious.

title: The Insect Hunters Attack!! Battle of Hachijo Island!!
synopsis: The Insect Magistrate is in danger and all military groups must set out! But as the groups set off a bug attacks Edo and Jinbei must decide to save the town or follow orders.

title: Mitsuki's Honey Trap
synopsis: A former team member of Mugai has been tasked to gather information on the Insect Magistrate, she attaches to Jinbei as a source of info, learning this Mugai offers her some advice.

title: Summer War in Edo!!
synopsis: Tsukishima runs around preparing for the famous Ryogoku River Opening, as everyone else evacuates for the best seat for Summer War.

title: The Hot Guy Beneath the Mask: Nagatomimaru
synopsis: A masked figure is stalking the headquarters of the Insect Brigade. What does he want and why does he know so much about their inner workings?

title: Mugai: What Solitary Eyes See
synopsis: A request from Minster Mizuno Saneyoshi has requested for Mugai to perform an insect extermination. Mugai has picked Jinbei to accompany him, but won’t explain why…

title: Ichinotani Tenma! I Can Do It!
synopsis: The youngest member of the group, Ichinotani Tenma and his shikigami are very powerful, but even he has a fatal weakness that Jinbei is determined to help him overcome.

title: The Killer of 99, Koikawa Shungiku
synopsis: While on patrol, Jinbei can’t understand why the people of Edo hate Shungiku. When Shungiku is accused of murder, Jinbei stands by his new sword master.

title: My rival is female ninja, Hibachi!
synopsis: Teamed up Hibachi for his first assignment, he is regulated to the sidelines, forbidden to draw his sword.

title: Here comes Tsukishima Jinbei!
synopsis: Jinbei has traveled all the way to Edo to join the Insect Magistrate’s Office. That is if he can find it before being killed by a Yarougumo.

title: PV
synopsis: Promotional Video

title: 12th Night: Roasted Ginkgo Nuts
synopsis: Wakako eats roasted gingko nuts.

title: 11th Night: Hokke
synopsis: Wakako eats hokke.

title: 10th Night: Deep-Fried Asparagus Skewers
synopsis: Wakako eats deep-fried asparagus skewers

title: 9th Night: Kani Miso
synopsis: Wakako eats kani miso

title: 8th Night: Goya Chanpuru
synopsis: Wakako eats goya chanpuru.

title: 7th Night: Potato Salad
synopsis: Nothing beats a good potato salad! On tonight's menu is the common man's best friend, potato salad, accompanied by oolong tea highball. The down-to-earth drink and potatoes form a top-class B+ duo, filling both your belly and your soul.

title: 6th Night: Steamed Clams
synopsis: After a tiring day's work, have some relaxing steamed clams and sake. The perfectly-prepared soup soaks into the clams and heals your exhausted body and soul. The sake goes down smoothly, perhaps aided by the feelings of gratitude towards the seven seas for providing this delicacy.

title: 5th Night: Yakitori
synopsis: The perfect plan! On tonight's menu is some charcoal-grilled yakitori and draft beer. With a glass of beer in hand, Wakako stuffs her face with the skewered yakitori and immediately washes it down with her drink. In that smoky ambience, this sip feels divine.

title: 4th Night: Sea Urchin Cresson
synopsis: A local specialty! On tonight's menu is Hiroshima's famous sea urchin cresson and beer. When placed on a pan with melted butter, the urchins seem like they break out into a dance. And what else could go better with this working-class meal than a cold beer?

title: 3rd Night: Monkfish Liver in Ponzu
synopsis: Drown your sorrows in alcohol! On tonight's menu is a comfort meal, monkfish liver in ponzu accompanied by hot sake. After stuffing her face with the liver, Wakako washes it down with the sake. Even the worst days at the office can seem like no big deal after this.

title: 2nd Night: Fried Chicken
synopsis: Freshly-fried food is out of this world! Tonight's menu is comprised of stuff that Wakako has strong cravings for every now and then, fried chicken and chilled beer. The beer goes perfectly with the chicken as it washes down the fresh'n'juicy aftertaste. Dig in while it's hot!

title: 1st Night: Fried Salted Salmon
synopsis: Murasaki Wakako is a twenty-seven year old working lady. As per her daily routine, she rewards herself for a hard day at work by bar-hopping in search of the best alcohol and seafood the world has to offer. On tonight's menu, she has some crispy fried salted salmon and cold sake. This ultimate combination makes her purr in satisfaction.

title: Navel and Dignity
synopsis: The mock exams are coming up and Shun is worried about his future. Some of his friends are easy going about the test while others are serious about it. He feels stuck in the middle without a clear direction.

title: Stripped Bare
synopsis: With his parents going out on a trip, Kaname will be eating dinner with the neighbor. What should have been a fun time is interrupted by some disturbing news.

title: sugar baby, fly baby
synopsis: Kaname is worried about never seeing Mary with friends from her class.; Mastushita assumes she has lots of friends. But what does Mary think?

title: Cherry
synopsis: It’s graduation season and the school is prepping to send the senior class off. As the guys goof off, the absence of Mary is becoming noticeable. When she finally gets pushed back into the group, the tension between her and Chizuru is noticeable

title: Mix Juice
synopsis: Desperate to get his hands on a new game, Yuki reluctantly begins working at a family restaurant. Under the direction of his overenthusiastic boss, instead of doing a good job, Yuki serves another customer's juice to his friends. In an attempt to cover up his mistake, Yuki prepares another order of juice while Yuta pretends to be his brother. Will their plan succeed?

title: Us Boys
synopsis: Shun's younger brother Fuyuki and his girlfriend Mamiya-san kissed. When Shun finds out, he asks his friends what he should do as Fuyuki's older brother. Fuyuki ignores his brother and goes on a date with Mamiya. The gang decides to follow the couple on their date and end up at a karaoke box.

title: Sweet sweet, bitter
synopsis: Masaki wants to deliver the chocolate she painstakingly made for Valentine's Day. Just as she is about to approach Shun after school, a girl from another school stops Shun with her own chocolate and a confession. After witnessing the event, Masaki tries to leave, but Chizuru notices and chases after her.

title: Colorless blue
synopsis: Yuki continues to gather stickers for his plate. However, his points have stagnated since the boys stopped rotating "sticker duty." While Yuki has kept in touch with Kayo, who also collects stickers, when he learns she plans to quit working in the cafeteria, their conversations run dry. Looking back on his interactions with Kayo, Yuki decides to...

title: The Hem of the Sky
synopsis: The five boys decide to go to a shrine together. While there, Chizuru accidentally throws the bicycle key he picked up into the box of offerings. The owner of the key "Akihiro" forces the boys to carry his unrideable bicycle. With entrance exams looming over the third year high schooler, Akihiro finds the laid back attitude of the boys irritating. Akihiro receives a charm from his girlfriend, but because she has already been accepted into a university, he finds himself unable to reciprocate her kindness.

title: In The Steam
synopsis: On New Year's Eve, the Asabane household finds itself a little busier than usual with cleaning. While cleaning their room, Yuta accidentally gets water on Yuki's manga. Yuta and Yuki get into a fight, ending with Yuki leaving the house. Yuta has trouble understanding the situation until a piece of paper he finds in the edge of his room triggers his memory.

title: Very Christmas
synopsis: The five boys watch DVD's at Kaname's home on Christmas. Having watched all the movies they rented, the boys return to the rental store to rent some more. They expected to have an uneventful day, but a certain incident leads to them dressing up as Santa Claus and helping out with a shopping mall event. On top of that, "Akira" arrives dressed as Santa as well.

title: Mary's Christmas
synopsis: Just before winter vacation, as Chizuru wanders through town without any Christmas plans, he runs into Masaki carefully considering her potential purchase. When he realizes She is shopping for a Christmas gift for Shun, Chizuru finds himself unable to be frank with Masaki as she happily chooses her gift. Later, when Masaki arrives at the classroom to give Shun his gift, a classmate takes the present.

title: The Rabbit in the Moon Hops All Night Long
synopsis: Shun is sharing his tangerine and ends up going to Kaname's house, but Chizuru, Yuki and Yuta end up going too and all 5 stay for dinner. While it was expected they would leave after dinner, instead at Chizuru's suggestion, it becomes their first 5 person sleepover.

title: Trailer
synopsis: Promotional Trailer

title: The Crunchyroll Holiday Special feat. Mike Toole
synopsis: Do you dream of watching anime with your friends while drinking eggnog? Well twist off a cap from your favorite carton and join us as we celebrate the holidays the only way we know how to... with Mike Toole! We've got jolly jingles, festive friends, gifts galore and lots and lots of good nog!

title: Crunchyroll's Christmas Special
synopsis: Featuring several members of the Crunchyroll team, the Holiday Special is a bizarre, hilarious, awkward, and ani-mazing 30-minute event guaranteed to get you in the holiday spirit!

title: Special Feature
synopsis: What makes us love going to anime conventions and what keeps us coming back? Anime, Fandom, and Friendship is a short documentary exploring how anime brings us together. Features Rooster Teeth's Kerry Shawcross and animator Hiroshi Shimizu.

title: The Promise
synopsis: March 21st, 3:00pm - One teacher and six students gathered at Takamitsuka High School's Tsugumi dormitory because none of them wanted to be separated. The promise that was made under the blue sky was carried out. The last year of the Tsugumi dormitory and the tale of the last seven people is to never be forgotten by us.

title: Naoko Asakura (Part 2)
synopsis: Tsujisaki, who used to like Naoko, appeared in front of Wataru and Naoko. Tsujisaki was the original student of Tsugumi Dormitory and is currently a student at Yatsuhashi University but it’s said that heavenly bodies appear on Minami-sakōjima island. Wataru sees him...

title: Naoko Asakura (Part 1)
synopsis: Naoko and Wataru met when he was still a middle school student. He heard that she was the prettiest girl on the island and wanted to try to win her over again. Naoko disregarded the fact that he insisted on the date but when he got the chance to say something, what did he do?

title: Saeri Kirishima (Part 2)
synopsis: Wataru and Saeru were investiaging on what the principal and vice principal of Takamitsuka High School had up their sleeves. However, Wataru was cross examined by the vice principal about a embrace he had with a girl in front of a hotel. An emergency staff meeting was held to decide on his expulsion. What will be the fate of Wataru and Takamitsuka High School?

title: Saeri Kirishima (Part 1)
synopsis: The principal and vice principal at Takamitsuka High School are eager to demolish Tsugumi dormitory. For this reason, there were people inspecting the circumference of the dorm. Wataru and Saeri started investigating when this was suggested by the principal and vice principal.

title: Umi Hayama (Part 2)
synopsis: The fact that Issei is living in the dorms was leaked by Wataru. It was said that he left the dorm but that was denied. So Umi was talking to her dad, Katsuhiko, about her relationship with Wataru but was hesitant in saying too much. What will become of Wataru and Umi's relationship?

title: Umi Hayama (Part 1)
synopsis: Wataru and Issei talked about many things including bringing Issei to the school and living in the dorms. At the same time, Umi was also talking to her dad, Katsuhiko. Both of them kept the fact that they are sharing a life together in the dorm a secret.

title: Shizu Fujimura (Part 2)
synopsis: Shizu has gotten used to life in the Tsugumi dorms but she didn't score very well on her test so she must take another exam. Shizu dreaded taking this so she ran away from it. Saeri was the one who decided to do this so Wataru is beginning to wonder if it was a good idea to have Shizu live in the Tsugumi dormitory.

title: Shizu Fujimura (Part 1)
synopsis: Wataru was lying by the river bank when he came across girl with a blank stare. When Wataru called out to her, she ran away into the middle of a sugar cane field and ended up dropping her straw hat. Her name is Shizu Fujimura. When he meets her again, he comes to understand her situation but...

title: Rokujou Miyaho (Part 2)
synopsis: Wataru gives some insight about Rokujou Miyaho

title: Rokujou Miyaho (Part 1)
synopsis: Wataru reminisces about meeting Miyaho

title: Sawaki Rinna (Part 2)
synopsis: Life on South Sakojima Island changes when new student Sawaki Rinna becomes the center of attention.

title: Sawaki Rinna (Part 1)
synopsis: Wataru Hoshino lives with four other girls and their teacher on South Sakojima Island

title: Masaki
synopsis: Act06 of Yasuhiro YOSHIURA's "Time of Eve" series.

title: Chie & Shimei
synopsis: Facing his demons, Rikuo wrestles with his despair over android artists and his own dreams of playing the piano. Meanwhile,Masaki simmers with anger after finding alarming hints that androids are being developed to handle childcare. Can Rikuo and Masaki retain their humanity as they struggle to define themselves in a world populated with androids?

title: Nameless
synopsis: Act04 of Yasuhiro YOSHIURA's "Time of Eve" series.

title: Koji & Rina
synopsis: Act03 of Yasuhiro YOSHIURA's "Time of Eve" series.

title: Sammy
synopsis: Act02 of Yasuhiro YOSHIURA's "Time of Eve" series.

title: Akiko
synopsis: Act01 of Yasuhiro YOSHIURA's "Time of Eve" series.

title: Good Bye Akazukin
synopsis: Souta and Ringo wake up to a normal day...

title: Door to the Future
synopsis: Lady Cendrillon, in possession of both keys, opens a portal between the real world and Phandale.

title: The Story of Two Worlds
synopsis: Trapped in Lady Cendrillon's castle, the gang witnesses the power of Souta's key.

title: The Key's Power
synopsis: Souta is taken into a mysterious world where Lady Cendrillon tempts him by giving her the Key to Erde.

title: To The Sealed Land
synopsis: Before entering into the Sealed Land, Red Riding Hood promises to keep Souta and Ringo safe.

title: Hansel and Gretel
synopsis: The gang takes a break inside a ravine beside a flowing river.

title: The Symbol of Friendship
synopsis: The Musketeers have to pass through a village in order to reach the Sealed Land

title: Eternally Bremen
synopsis: While wandering down a road, the gang hears a strange voice coming from afar...

title: Their Bond
synopsis: After trying to defeat Jed with her Princess Mode, Red Riding Hood pushes on while the others are worried.

title: Wiese Forest's Memories
synopsis: Red Riding Hood practices her techniques in preparation for an attack.

title: Lonely Gretel
synopsis: The Musketeers cross the only way leading to the Sealed Land... which happens to be across an shaky rope bridge.

title: The Dwarf's Flowerpot
synopsis: Souta has a dream about meeting the same girl over and over again

title: The Magic Castle
synopsis: The Musketeers comes across Cendrillon's floating castle.

title: Akazukin Vs. Snow White
synopsis: The gang comes across a town that they suspect is full of evil magicians.

title: The Tiny Princess
synopsis: Snow White finds a magic comb that causes you to shrink and become younger!

title: Souta's Mother
synopsis: Rain continues to hinder the Musketeer's journey.

title: Glass Slippers
synopsis: Ringo reveals a little bit of her feelings to Souta.

title: The Bride Rapunzel
synopsis: The Musketeers encounter a very tall tower.

title: Fernando's Present
synopsis: The Musketeers are in a field, getting ready to draw a picture of a pale moon.

title: Princess Akazukin
synopsis: The Musketeers face Trude once more

title: Moonlight ~Juusui~
synopsis: The Musketeers are close to a town called Ridom

title: The Three Singing Musketeers
synopsis: While wandering through a field, a pumpkin suddenly grows to an enormous size!

title: The City Where Ash Falls
synopsis: The Musketeers suddenly hear singing in the forest and investigate

title: The Princess of Thorns And Clover
synopsis: The Musketeers head towards the country where Briar Rose was born which is said to have the nicest elves in all of Phandavale.

title: Trude's Maze
synopsis: Kyupi leads the gang through a dense jungle. Is Kyupi leading them the right way or are they lost again?

title: The Okashi Forest's Memories
synopsis: A wise old tree tells the Musketeers a story about two siblings who wander into a forest.

title: Salamandra Village
synopsis: While traversing the desert, the Musketeers are fighting a giant insect

title: Secret Of The Cellar
synopsis: The Musketeers are enjoying a leisurely stroll through the town

title: Souta And The Magician In Love
synopsis: Ringo gets lost in the forest and it's up to the gang to find her before something else does...

title: A Friend For A Thousand Years
synopsis: What was suppose to be a joyous occasion has turned sour when a friend turns evil.

title: Magic Hater Hans
synopsis: The gang is lost so they hitch a ride to the nearest town

title: The Man With A Flute In His Heart
synopsis: The Fairy Musketeers embark on a journey into Phandavale

title: Our Journey
synopsis: With her captured Ringo, Gretel tells Hanzel a plan to lure Souta into a trap which would put her in a position to obtain the key.

title: Sorry, Ringo
synopsis: Shirayuki investigates the portal to Fandale and comes to the conclusion that it becomes narrower each time she checks on it. This means they have to hurry up and head into Fandale before the gate closes!

title: The Awakening of Thorn Princess
synopsis: Shirayuki and Val sense a great evil is emanating from the school and go on an investigation.

title: Gretel's Trap
synopsis: Souta's class head's out on a school trip to an enormous garden.

title: The Interesting Transfer Student
synopsis: Souta is heading to school when he's attacked by a nightmarian.

title: Magic Girl Snow White
synopsis: When Souta awakens, he thinks that the girl who saved him is a dream but seeing her in his room, he realizes that it wasn't a dream at all!

title: Akazukin Finally Comes
synopsis: When Suzukaze Souta was a young boy, his mom told him a fairy tale about a man who was so powerful, that the king divided the world into science and magic.

title: Kan’u Accomplishes her Goal
synopsis: Ryūbi, with the help of Kan'u and her group, has quelled the rebellion, but there is more to Ryūbi that meets Kan'u eyes. With his chance to make his claim to fame, Ryūbi abandons Touka and decides to focus on the fighting the rebels and tries to encourage Aisha to join him...

title: Kan’u Encounters Ryuubi
synopsis: While Rinrin and Shuri are still sleeping at their camp, Kan'u wakes up and immediately finds herself in the middle of a battle between bandits and militias. They decide to team up with Ryūbi's army to defeat the bandits; and with Rinrin fighting skills, Shuri's strategies and Kan'u strength they will help Ryūbi get back in the good graces of his lord.

title: Sonsaku’s Life is Threatened
synopsis: The kingdom of Wu under Queen Sonsaku has been rapidly expanding through warfare. However her younger sister has been warning her that the battles will exhaust her people and supplies. And subsequently on that day, they all learn of a pending assassination plot from an unknown stranger...

title: Enshou Finds a Treasure
synopsis: Bunshu and Ganryo find a treasure map in the warehouse and go searching for the treasure with Ensho. At that time, Soso, Kakoton, and Juniku were taking an occasional breather when they began to head toward an onsen. Kanu unexpectedly would get a whiff of the sulfur from the onsen so she headed that way. However, it didn’t seem like the water from that onsen was flowing.

title: Kan'u Interrupts Kouchuu's Plot
synopsis: At the tea house near the mountain’s ridge, a young lady is entangled with a bad guy when Kanu enters to help. During the course of events, Kanu ends up paying this lady’s check. Her name was Sonshoko and she promised to repay her so she declared to be the servant of Kanu and her friends.

title: Chohi has a Fight with Kan'u
synopsis: Komei and three other people continued the journey with Kanu. Once, an argument suddenly arose when there was a fork in the road and everyone went down their own path. Chohi ended up on her own when she came across a town. With low traveling expenses, she lacked the money for food. Having a plan, she began to wander about the town since she knew about a big celebration that was going to occur.

title: Chohi Competes with Koumei
synopsis: Kanu is walking in the mountains when she gets lost in the thick fog with Choun. Futhermore, Kanu slips on the cliff and ends up spraining her ankle. As they are waiting for the fog to clear up, Chohi finds a small cottage. It turns out it’s at the bottom of the mountain where there is an elementary school where Suikyo-sensei teaches. The cottage is the home of the student, Komei.

title: Kan'u Exterminates a Monster
synopsis: The group meets Toutaku, the Governess of Zhao, and she informs everyone that she came to investigate a rumor that a monster has been threatening a village. While they implore the help of strategist Ka Ku, Kan'u and friends decide to take on the 'monster' despite being a bit weary and scared about facing it.

title: Bachō Attacks Sōsō
synopsis: After subduing the rebel armies, Sōsō and her troops return to Shao. Upon her return she sees Chōhi and Bachō. Bachō, however, scream's out Sōsō's name and charges at her; but for what reason?

title: Chōhi Battles with Bachō
synopsis: With their new found friend, Kan'u and friends decide to work at a restaurant in order to cover their traveling expenses. However, Chōhi was no good at it, and decided earn money another way where she meets Bachō.

title: Kan'u is Going to Die with Chōun
synopsis: Kan'u and Chōhi are on their journey together, and their first stop happens when, Kōsonsan, a local feudal lord and Chōun ask the two to help them find a hidden base belonging to bandits so they can be eliminated. However upon finding the bandits, Kan'u and Chōhi fight them off, taking away Chōun's glory. However, they offer her an alternative...

title: The Sisterhood of Kan'u, Chōhi and the Sisters
synopsis: During a time of peace, Kan'u travels throughtout the land training her skills; but on an auspicious day she enters a village to encounter Chōhi, a small bandit girl from the mountains. On that day, Chōhi is being sought out by the head of the village for the damages she has done to the village. However, Kan'u decides to take on Chōhi and her rag-tag group of friends...

title: The Day of New Life
synopsis: Ozma's nature is revealed, and it's time for Maya to make her choice: begin a new era with the life inside the zone, or allow humanity to remain in control of a dying planet.

title: Episode 5: The masked man
synopsis: The Bardanos finds itself in Ozma's nest: a strange cave filled with fresh water and life. Bainas shoots Gido's mask, and the face beneath it is that of Sam's brother.

title: To the Ends of the Earth
synopsis: As Gido escapes with Maya, Sam sets off in pursuit with Mimay in tow. But their bike is no match for the Theseus sand cruiser, and Gido escapes. To catch them, they'll have to go back under the ground with the Bardanos...

title: A Thousand Years of Doubt
synopsis: Sam takes Maya to a hidden shelter constructed in the distant past, and filled with ancient technology. This shelter is the source of the ship's technology, and the secret of Sam's plans to hunt the sand whale...

title: Diving Limits
synopsis: The Sand Pirates have escaped with Maya, and Theseus is in hot pursuit. The pirates dive under the sand, but are locked down by sand anchors. The pressure and temperature in the ship are rising, and time is running out...

title: Ozma 1, "The Sand Whale"
synopsis: It's a post-apocalyptic future, and the oceans have dried up and the world turned into a single massive desert. Sam Coyne is out hunting sand whales, when he stumbles across a much bigger prize: a mysterious woman on the run from a fleet of destroyers!

title: See You Tomorrow
synopsis: Hello! It's Amaya Kanaka! I believe it's always important to be prepared for anything! And so, I'm going to say something that's not very good! I'm now going to say something nice! ...If I said that, I'd be raising the bar too much. ...Crap, I forgot what I was going to say. Anyway, it's the last episode. That was really fast. Anyway, thank you very much! It would make me very happy if we can meet somewhere again! Everyone, please don't forget Amaya Kanaka! *The last episode is about summer vacation.

title: Rain
synopsis: Um... Jinguji Hika...ri? Hikaru...? Whatever. My name is actually Yamashita Sumiko and I'm the teacher of the 1st Year, Class 3. It's raining today so I don't feel like doing anything. I could really care  that Amaya is wearing rain boots and Iwasawa isn't wearing any shoes at all. Why is it even raining? It's not like anyone wants to leave their house when it's raining, so everything should just be closed. Then again, it would suck if the convinience stores were closed, too. Then... ...Stop talking about this nonsense and go home already. And that ends the first semester! less

title: Problem
synopsis: Hello, it's been a while. It's Uehara Ayuko. It's already episode 10. Nothing has changed in our everyday lives. Just like when we first started school, Kanakana covered my eyes, but I'm not who I used to be a few months ago! I feel like I've almost gotten to the level of Saki-chan, who can dodge Kanakana. Then again, not many people play "guess who?" at our age... We tried to be like the rest of the female students in the world and talk about love, but apparently that was beyond our level...

title: Dreams
synopsis: Hello, everyone! It's Wakatsuki Misuzu! I may not look it, but I am a teacher. People always mistake me for a student! Students even ask me out. The principal even calls me cute. In this episode, everyone was talking about their dreams, and I could smell that the youth were troubled with what they should do, so I appeared! But...

title: Club Activities
synopsis: Hello, I'm Amaya Kanaka. Let's do club activities. Our story finally takes movement in episode 8! And Kanaka's ambition comes to light!! Club activities! Differences of opinion! Confusion and frustration! Comforting each other with passionate friendship! This is our youth!! Well, in the end, nothing really happens. I'm not lying!

title: The Amaya Household
synopsis: Hello, I'm Amaya Kanaka's younger brother, Souta. I apologize for any trouble that my sister may have caused you. Continuing from last time, everyone is over at our house, but it's not like my sister is going to clean her room, so she's doing whatever she wants to. I've received quite a bit of unfair treatment. It was a day that I learned how to entertain guests even though I'm a junior high student. Sigh...

title: Younger Brother
synopsis: Hey, it's Iwasawa Saki. Testing week begins today and school gets out early, so we all went to Kanaka's house and... slept. I think I was asleep. I wonder why I'm in charge of the lead-in this week. I don't know what happened, so you should just watch.

title: Incident
synopsis: Hello, I'm Uehara Ayuko. We find out this episode that I could die at any time. Thank goodness. Er, wait, that's not it! In this episode, I end up killing Kanakana... That's not it either! I wonder why I feel like I'm being messed around with as soon as I started high school...

title: Sensei
synopsis: Matsuno Shusaku, 28 years old! High school teacher! I teach math!! They say I'm scary, but I'm the only one that can right the wrongs at this school!!

title: Home Room
synopsis: Nice to meet you, my name is Yanase Mei. As soon as I started high school, not only did I end up in a class with a very odd teacher, surrounded by odd classmates, but I was forced to be class representative in a day full of upheaval.

title: First Day of School
synopsis: Heyo, I'm Iwasawa Saki. Um, I'm Kanaka's childhood friend. We just started our high school life. In this episode, a gorilla and a condor will make an appearance. Just kidding. Well, not really.

title: The Day Before
synopsis: It is I, Amaya Kanaka of "Aiura"! Amazingly, I start high school tomorrow! I'm a lovely fifteen year old!! In the glorious first episode of the anime, I show off my secret technique and maybe give some elementary school kid a snack?!

title: PV
synopsis: Promotional Video

title: Traveling Daru
synopsis: Daru, a cherished handmade stuffed toy, gets lost and separated from its owner one day when at the airport. Determined to find her again, Daru sets out on a journey around the world in search of her. As time passes, the girl begins to forget about Daru. Will Daru be able to find and see his beloved owner again?

title: Traveling Daru Trailer
synopsis: Daru, a cherished handmade stuffed toy, gets lost and separated from its owner one day when at the airport. Determined to find her again, Daru sets out on a journey around the world in search of her. As time passes, the girl begins to forget about Daru. Will Daru be able to find and see his beloved owner again?

title: Everything Will Become a Dream
synopsis: Even in a dream you can’t escape reality.

title: Yurumates Reverse
synopsis: Doing things in reserve cures the boredom by causing many problems.

title: Number Six Assassin
synopsis: Living the cardboard box life.

title: Every New Year's Sake Mood
synopsis: You have to start the New Year off doing something smart!

title: Battle for the Last Sweet Dumpling
synopsis: When it comes to food, it's war.

title: Final Episode of Psychic Ronin Yurume
synopsis: What would you do if you won 100,000,000 yen?

title: Surprise Aquarium
synopsis: It’s typhoon season and the fish are flying.

title: Room, Heaven, and Hell
synopsis: The power is out at Maison Du Wish, is it a blackout or something else…

title: Sleeping Combo
synopsis: Sleep is awesome

title: Next Generation Notice
synopsis: Things get out of hand when the apartment chore list gets passed around.

title: Slow Holiday
synopsis: It’s Golden Week and all the residents are going home except for poor Yuru.

title: Cardboard Box Jungle
synopsis: A magic wand from Sae’s Mom brings Magic to the apartment complex.

title: The Birthday Playoff
synopsis: It's the little sister's birthday. Everyone wants to at least make the cool-headed little sister smile on her birthday, so they...

title: Pattern Sister
synopsis: Sae comes from a very strict family, so when her sister announces she will be visiting. She needs the help of all her friends to make a good impression.

title: Packed for Cherry Blossom Viewing
synopsis: Watching the cherry blossoms, a time honored event.

title: Unopened Doors
synopsis: Write an embarrassing secret that you can’t tell others. Some take it as a joke, but one takes it to heart.

title: How to Celebrate New Year's
synopsis: New Year’s traditions, dreams, and tricks are talked about, while Yurume receives a gift from her mother.

title: Tabletop Puzzle
synopsis: Yurume is determined to not get out from under the Kotatsu, but after getting it stuck in the hallway her friends try to help remove it.

title: Japan's Two Choice Weather Agency
synopsis: The unpredictable weather is causing much grief to Yurume, and the residents bet on the weather pattern.

title: Ice Cream's Close Shave
synopsis: The battle for the ice cream has begun; it’s going to get hot out there. And the winner might actually be the loser.

title: Watermelon Splitting
synopsis: A watermelon splitting contest brings out the inner savages of the residents.

title: Tanabata Festival Rain or Shine
synopsis: It’s Tanabata and as everyone writes wishes, things start to get out of hand.

title: Let's talk about Matsukichi
synopsis: The girls of Maison Du Wish use different types of test to understand the complexity of Matsukichi.

title: A True Lie
synopsis: The April fools jokes at Maison Du Wish are getting stranger by the moment, until one of the jokes become true.

title: Image Chicken Race
synopsis: Winter is changing into Spring and the residents of Maison Du Wish are changing with it. New haircuts, robots, rich girls, change is in the air.

title: Yurume Goes to Tokyo
synopsis: Aida Yurume has just moved to Tokyo and her new neighbors greet her in peculiar ways.

title: Reverse
synopsis: The news of Kurokan getting fired has been spread out! Without Kurokan, the seniors are successfully bribed by villagers and the freshmen become help. Asia and Kurokan are at the shrine in the middle of the night. Asai reports everything about the team to him. Kurokan needs Asai to lead the team without his presence. One day after a practice, when Hiraizumi is about to let the coach say a few words, Kurokan shows up. Everyone is stunned! The freshmen and Hiraizumi show no fear to the villagers and keep following Kurokan! Because everyone knows, only Kurokan can lead the team to Koshien! less

title: Kurokan's dismissal
synopsis: Asai runs in panic towards Kurokan. They see parents with the senior students walking towards the principal’s office. The parents' intention is to fire Kurokan! Although other teachers tried to help Kurokan with all of their power, the principal is under the pressure of the parents. Reporter Koshimitsu has heard of Kurokan's leaving. He thinks it's Kurokan's strategy to disrupt other schools. Koshimizu uses an interview as an excuse to take pictures of Sakamato doing pitches and secretly gives the pictures to Morioka.

title: Washinomori collapse
synopsis: Ever since the freshmen joined, the frenemies' atmosphere has raised between seniors and freshmen. Ogasawara can't control his anger anymore. He kicks the bucket full of coins and the coins are all over the ground. The tention explores and the freshmen and seniors get into fights. Kurokan seems to know it's coming and looks like he doesn't care. At the same time, Morioka is watching Sakamoto’s pitches repeatedly and trying to find his flaws.

title: Dissatisfaction
synopsis: Washinomori loses the spring game. After going through this incident, Sakamoto becomes more active and more interactive with other players. Sakamoto tells Kurokan that he’s ready to join professional baseball! Meanwhile, the tension between the second graders and freshmen could explode anytime! Morioka accidently gets a tape of the game where Sakamoto has 21 consecutive strikeouts. He wants to have a fair game and intentds to reject the help. After he knows that there is only Kurokan in Hitomi's eyes, he takes the tape back.

title: Absence of Ace
synopsis: Kurokan tells Sakamoto about the accident happened to his parents. Kurokan wants Sakamoto to go to the hospital immediately! Hitomi comes to help right after receiving Kurokan's call. The team is really down after knowing Sakamoto's absence. Kurokan sends Kojika to replace Sakamoto. Kojika is standing on the pitching mound and trembling with fear when the fans realize that the pitcher isn't Sakamoto and start to shout and begin to make noise. Kurokan switches the players to the freshmen gradually who doesn't have emotional burden and play exceptionally well. Eventually, Kirino relies on their experience and strength to win the game! But there's good news from the hospital--Sakamoto's parents are in a stable condition.

title: Trials
synopsis: Washinomori has become famous. The residents of the village are more enthusiastic about baseball and the school successfully recruits a lot of new students. Kurokan encourages the rookies to get a part-time job in town, hoping that they will have more interaction with the people, and to gain their trust. Training has finally started. The spring season game at Koshien Stadium is about to start. It's time to see the results of all the training. When the team is ready to leave for the game, the news on TV is reporting major accidents. Kurokan walks calmly back and calls for Sakamoto. What happened?

title: Perfect game
synopsis: Sakamoto continues to strike out the batters and consecutively strikes out the 20th batter. The rain is getting heavier, but the two coaches are still fiercely determined. Keiyo's Hosogoe doesn't show the slightest fear when facing Sakamoto and still shows excellent control of the ball. Due to the rain, the umpire calls the end of the match. The pitchers of both teams have struck out 21 batters and it's a tie. Ever since their first game with Keiyo, the school has received a lot of supports from all areas. A new year is coming, Kurokan gets really drunk in the party at his place and talk about his goal: to play at Koshien Stadium.

title: Amazing power
synopsis: Sakamoto uses three straight balls to finish off Keiyo's top slugger, Hosogoe. Keiyo has a three up， three down inning twice in a row. Surprisingly, during the first two innings both teams have a three up, three down inning. The top half of the third inning, Keiyo is faced with the fierce-looking pitcher for the first time. Keiyo's batters are struck out. After the fourth inning, Sakamoto and Hosogoe performs equally well with 12 consecutive strike outs. It's a beautiful battle among the pitchers. The batting of both teams have been completely overthrown by the pitchers, and they still can't break the deadlock. After the sixth inning, both teams refuse to give in, and have 18 consecutive strikeouts. It's the seventh inning of Washinomori and Keiyo's practice game in the rain.

title: Best members
synopsis: On the day of the game, a lot of people come to Washnomori High School to cheer them on. Every coach and press from the prefecture is at Washnomori High School. They are surprised to see Keiyo's Fall Champion Team playing the game. The game is starting, Keiyo bats first. Sakamoto throws three strikeouts in a row. The Keiyo players had enough fun and are going to play this game seriously. The Keiyo pitcher, Hosogoe, strikes the batters out with frightening breaking balls and Washinomori has a three up, three down inning. Sakamoto has amazing strength and Hosogoe has brilliant techniques. Kurokan says the win or lose of this game depends on who gets the most strikeouts.

title: Video tape
synopsis: The All Day News reporter, Koshimizu, is trying to dig out the dirt of Kurokan. He goes to Hitomi's clinic wanting to prove Kurokan's rumors, but she denies the rumors. While Kurokan is working part-time to afford Sakamoto's salary, Hitomi visits and tells him about Koshimizu and that he inadvertently mentioned that he knew the coach of Keiyo High School. Kurokan asks Koshimizu to assist with organizing a practice game with Keiyo shows Keiyo a video tape of Sakamoto pitching.

title: Drastic remedy
synopsis: Kurokan asks Asai's grandfather to make special cow dung bombs to serve as baseballs during Asai's training. At first, Asia is very resistant. Asai who is tied up and splashed with cow dung cries and laughs while trying to catch Kurokan's cow dung bombs. He successfully catches the cow dung bombs and he has the confidence to catch Sakamoto's 150km/h fastballs. Other high school baseball teams from all over the prefecture contact Washinomori hoping to be able to hold a practice game after hearing about Sakamoto's strength

title: Professional declaration
synopsis: Kurokan calls Koshimizu a low-life reporter who gets so angry and wants to use the press to completely destroy him. Meanwhile, Kurokan publicly tells the press that Sakamoto is being paid to play baseball which attracts many reporters to the school. Kurokan and Sakamoto show the training to them which is then covered in the newspapers and attracts many viewers. In order to catch Sakamoto's super-fastballs, Kurokan needs to help the catcher overcome his fear for fastballs.

title: Provocation
synopsis: The reporter of All Day News contacts Washinomori High School and inquires about Kurokan paying a student to play baseball. The principal is furious and and wants to fire him immediately. Mr. Yanagi thinks this will raise the doubts of the press and the public. Kurokan is temporary still the coach. The reporter finds Kurokan and threatens to report the story.

title: Revelation
synopsis: Sakamoto starts to show up for practice. Miss Hiraizumi hears that Kurokan pays Sakamoto and feels worried. She arranges to meet with Dr. Hitomi to discuss about the situation. Hitomi just laughs and teels her to trust Kurokan. At this moment, a reporter from All Day News overhears their conversation and wishes to know the whole story.

title: End of the game
synopsis: In the bottom half of the seventh inning, the Washinomori players are confused. Kirino takes this opportunity to strike back and to take the lead. Kirino puts up a fight and scores 9 points in one go. The game ends earlier. Although losing is inevitable, Kurokan tells the players to use their brains and think of the reasons of losing. Kurokan decides to solove the problem of Sakamoto. He goes to the gas station where Sakamoto works. After he learns about his living conditions he wants to sign Sakamoto for a monthly salary of ￥150,000.
