title: Turning point
synopsis: With the bing from the Goddess of Luck and their beautiful teamwork, Washinomori makes it impossible for Kirino to score. Bottom half of the seventh inning， Kirino's hitter almost hits a home run. Kurokan immediately changes the pitcher to Sakamoto and expects strikeouts. Sakamoto's first ball silences the audience. Even the players on the field are shocked. Kenichiro shouts for them to run. When the player on the third base comes to, he runs to home base and scores the team's first point. less

title: Error
synopsis: Top half of the second inning, Kirino's pitcher ends with a 3 down 3 up inning. Sakamoto, the ninth batter from Washinomori, hits a solo home run. Kirino are two points behind and they have now finally awakened. With Kurokan that keeps changing his strategies and with the strength of Sakamoto's back, Washinomori is now in the lead.

title: Pre-emption
synopsis: The game between Kirino and Washinomori is officially starting. Washinomori hits the first ball. It's a good start to Kurokan's tactic. Top half of the first inning, Washinomori gains the first score with a squeeze tactic. Bottom half of the first inning, Sakamoto accurately passes the ball from the outfield and a Kirino player is tagged before the home plate. The first inning is over. Washinomori has shocked the audience. They are currently ahead by one score.

title: Shaking
synopsis: The first game since Kurokan's return is against his old ally Morioka. This gets the attention of a lot of reporters which makes the Washinomori players even more nervous. While the Washinomori's ninth player Sakamoto is rushing to the game, Kirino is warming up with remarkable skills that scares Washinomori. Sakamo finally arrives and he throws a perfectly accurate long pass in the outfield during warm-up. Kurokan also shows off with what is called Japan's first vertical super flying ball. Everyone is amazed.

title: Confirmation
synopsis: Hitomi is interested in Washinomori's condition. She has been observing how much effort Kurokan puts into baseball. Hitomi believes that Kurokan can make another Kirino miracle and take Washinomori into Koshien Stadium. Kurokan changes his mind and decides to participate in the fall championships, but they never thought their first oppoent would be Kirino!

title: Disappointment of Kurokan
synopsis: While Washinomori players are training, there is a surprise. The Kirino High players pay a visit to Kurokan. Although the qualities of the Washinomori players are really poor, they're encourged to follow Kurokan no matter what. While Morioka is vigorously recruiting players for Kirino, Hitomi shows up in the practicing field of Washinomori.

title: Oath of Tears
synopsis: After the first day of training, there is only one player left in the baseball ground! Kurokan decides to bring them back for training in order to get rid of the kids' cowardliness. Under the motivation of Kurokan, they are all back on the field and finally have a decent practicing area. Kurokan brings back the enthusiastic life of baseball to Washinomori！

title: Disqualified captain
synopsis: Questions about the baseball coach causes a dispute in the school's meeting. For the school, teachers want good behaved students who don't disobey the school policy. Miss Hiraizumi was very supportive to the students at first until she finds out the truth about the money and is furiously angry at Kurokan. Meanwhile, the principle of Washinomori High hears about the rumors of Kurokan. How will the school handle this?

title: The first new step
synopsis: After hearing the sincere appeal, Kurokan chooses to go with Washinomori High. Even though the school shows no hospitality nor help, Kurokan decides to fight until the end！

title: Kurokan's value
synopsis: Without Kurokan, Kirino High loses their first battle at Koshien Stadium. Meanwhile, Kurokan has some visitors. Joyo Univ. Kamobara High asks Kurokan to be their coach and provides excellent conditions. Washinomori High students, on the other hand, is willing to offer more than they have. What's Kurokan's deision?

title: ALL or NOTHING
synopsis: During a crucial moment, Kurokan wants everyone to use the deadly Kirino tactic. Ishimitsu passes the ball to the home plate. Kirino successfully tags the Hanaoka runner and wins the ticket to Koshien. However, Kurokan gets nothing but blame for his arrogant attitude. Kurokan doesn't want to go back to the traditional way and decides to walk away.

title: Forced break
synopsis: "After all the days of training, Kirino High has successfully entered the semifinals. Kirino High gives a perfect performance with no errors for the season, but Kurokan asks the captain to make an error purposely in order to loosen the tense in the team. Finally into the most important game with Hanaoka High, Kurokan has already planned tactics, but the opponents are not that easy to deal with. Neither Hanaoka High nor Kirino can seem to break this deadlock." After all the days of training, Kirino High has successfully entered the semifinals. Kirino High gives a perfect performance with no errors for the season, but Kurokan asks the captain to make an error purposely in order to loosen the tense in the team. Finally into the most important game with Hanaoka High, Kurokan has already planned tactics, but the opponents are not that easy to deal with. Neither Hanaoka High nor Kirino can seem to break this deadlock.

title: Borrowed
synopsis: Kurokan takes responsibility by deciding to leave the team for losing the game. After the debate between OB and Support Association, Kurokan remains his coach position. However, Morioka and Kurokan still have conflict on the training policy. Soon, the baseball season is coming! This time Kirino High must take vengeance！

title: Winning formula
synopsis: The game is coming to an end and something unexpected happens. This is high school baseball！

title: Decisive moment
synopsis: Kirono High finally sends Masamiya to the game, but the opponent purposefully gives him a base on ball. Just as the spirits are getting low, Tamari hits a long hit right down right-center field. Kirino High takes advantage of their opponents' fatigue and strikes back！Kirino High finally wins the game with the walk-off hit.

title: Rhythm
synopsis: Kirino High's first game of the Fall Championships, but the score is falling far behind just in the first two innings. Kurokan quietly plans the next strategy. In order to win, Kurokan sends out an unexpected ace pitcher.

title: Split
synopsis: Kurokan's decison has casued negative reactions from school authority and team players. The Support Association and Almuni Club form an alliance in order to kick Kurokan out of Kirono High. The team players are also split into two groups where most of them are against Kurokan. Morioka finally understands Kurokan's plan for Masamiya, but how will Kurokan win the Fall Championships?

title: Kurokan-style baseball
synopsis: To Kirino High, the goal of getting into Koshien Stadium becomes important because the 100th anniversary is around the corner. However, Kurokan's unique way of training has upset the Kirino High Baseball Team Support Association and Alumni Club. Morioka, on the other hand, is a preferrable coach beacuse of his solid style. At the same time, Kurokan's decision on player positions has caused confusions to the team.

title: Goodbye Reinya!
synopsis: Deep in the holy mountains, Reinya trains with the old master to gain the strength to defeat the invaders who beat her once. One day, the master introduces Reinya to Black Reinya and her sidekick Black Chutaro. The appearance of new rivals sets Reinya and Chutaro's fighting spirits aflame, but the two do not stand a chance against Black Reinya's incredible strength.

title: I'll never forgive this affair!
synopsis: Reinya gets excited about true love of Akemi and Tatsuhiko while watching her favorite soap opera "Love in Space: From the Magellanic Clouds with Love" when Tatsuhiko walks into Faminya with his real girlfriend. Unable to distinguish between fiction and reality, the furious Reinya follows the couple. When Reinya pulls out a gun-shaped object, Chutaro begins to worry.

title: Oh, no... Reinya is finally beaten!
synopsis: In her heat induced delirium, Reinya drinks what she thinks is a can of juice brought to her by a balloon. When she finally comes to, she realizes she just stole some juice from a little girl, who runs off to report the incident to her father, the Captain. That night, the Captain and his daughter read Reinya's letter. His daughter unsettles him when she makes him promise he will catch Reinya this time. At that moment, Reinya makes her appearance.

title: Organize the Shinsengumi Troops!
synopsis: Policewoman Nocchi is so absorbed in the Oedo Police Department's Brain Analyzer, she doe not notice when the electric fan blows her skirt up. Just when the Captain shows up, Nocchi suddenly shouts, "90% of Reinya is Shinsengumi!" and leaves the police department while muttering something under her breath. Meanwhile, Reinya returns to her hideout with the golden dark soy sauce with Nocchi hidden inside. Reinya uses her Kitty Eyes to discover Nocchi is Isami Kondo, leader of the Shinsengumi.

title: Mission Impossible: Reinya's Date!!
synopsis: Reinya invites the Detective on a picnic as Faminya's clerk Reina, making the obsessive Detective's imagination run wild has he fantasizes about marrying her. However, Reinya cares nothing for the Detective's feelings and desires only to get information about the golden macadamia chocolate. On the day of the picnic, Reinya is enjoying the Detective's homemade sandwiches when suddenly, her face turns blue. The sandwiches contain natto, Reinya's forbidden food, causing her to break into many small Reinyas which are swept away in a river.

title: No way! Reinya is cursed!
synopsis: Reinya snatches a golden witch from the billionaire's mansion, but for some reason, he is relieved to see it go. Strange things begin happening to Reinya. Mysterious carnivorous plants take over her hideout, and she finds a hole in her favorite socks. The golden witch turns out to be a cursed object bringing bad luck to Reinya's hideout. When Chutaro is eaten by the carnivorous plant, he advices her to throw the statue away, and Reinya is forced to choose between her love for gold and her love for her sock.

title: I wanna be a ninja!
synopsis: Wanting to leave her name in history, Phantom Thief Reinya tries to come up with a memorable special ability. Inspired by the book "How to be a Ninja", she begins training in ninja techniques. However, the electric fan of her "Hidden Leaf Technique" leaves her in a mess, and she nearly drowns when a dragonfly perches the straw of her "Hidden Water Technique." Realizing the plastic straw is too thin for the "Hidden Water Technique," she replaces it with a bamboo tube just as a sparrow approaches.

title: Shoot! Reinya is trapped!"
synopsis: While fleeing the scene in her flying balloon swing, Reinya drops her shoe. Chutaro warns her the police might perform a DNA analysis on some hair attached to her shoe, but Reinya merely fusses over the pimple on her neck and her refusal to eat natto. Finally, Reinya decides to sneak into the Oedo Police Department and finds her shoe on a table. She approaches without caution, only to be caught in the Captain's secret weapon designed specifically to thwart Reinya, the "Phantom Thief Sticky Glue."

title: No way! Someone's got it in for me!
synopsis: Reinya's favorite soap opera “Stolen Love in Space: From the Magellanic Clouds with Love” is on the air. The show's love triangle between a mollusk-shaped and rock-shaped alien brings tears to her eyes when a package from Feline Express sets off her hideout's alarm system. Reinya takes the package to the idiots of the Oedo Police Department who take it to the Hazardous Material Management Facility to be examined.

title: Stolen Love in Space?”
synopsis: A message from Reinya arrives at the Oedo Police Department announcing her plans to steal the Golden Kid's Meal. The thee idiots arrive at the scene of the crime to secure the area. On her way to the Golden Kid's Meal, Reinya activates her “Kitty Mode,” transforming her eyes into lamps and giving her superhuman speed. Reinya is a kitty-person, a cat-human hybrid. Meanwhile, the Captain and Nocchi play cards while waiting for Reinya, but the thief does not make an appearance.

title: Tete-a-tete
synopsis: While reading reading her favorite “Monthly Thief Magazine,” Reinya spots a fortune telling her to steal something that drives married women wild for good luck and begins planning her next burglary. Up above in the convenience store, the three idiot police arrive. Too busy reading to deal with customers, Reinya sends Chutaro to deal with them, and his apathy drives her crazy. Reinya reluctantly heads to the register, driving the Detective into his world of delusion as he expresses his love for Reina with exaggerated gestures.

title: Here comes Phantom Thief Reinya!
synopsis: Reinya works as the poster girl for convenience store Faminya by day and steals golden treasures as Phantom Theif Reinya by night. With her sidekick Chutaro, Reinya plays a slapstick game of cat-and-mouse with the perverted Captain, the delusional Detective, and Nocchi of the Oedo Police Department. The Golden Umakabai, a solid gold statue of a local instant noodle brand, is scheduled to go on display at the Hakata Museum. Following her motto “nothing is greater than gold,” Reinya decides to snatch this golden treasure. However, the Captain, the Detective, and Nocchi are on full alert for Reinya at the museum.

title: Taro's Monster Hunt
synopsis: Sound: Talkie

title: Danemon's Monster Hunt (Shojoji no Tanuki-bayashi Ban Danemon) (benshi version)
synopsis: Sound: Benshi narration (midori Sawato) Produced:1935

synopsis: Sound: Benshi narration (Midori Sawato) Produced:1931 A baseball game between rabbits and tanuki (raccoon dogs)

title: The Black Cat (Kuro Nyago)
synopsis: Sound: Record talkie Producer, Drector, Drawings; Novuro Ofuji Produced: 1929 The first animation ever to be accompanied by music.

title: BWFC 2017 Awards Ceremony
synopsis: Come witness the hype, as we announced the winners of the 2017 Banpresto World Figure Colosseum at New York Comic Con! After months of blood, sweat and tears, the contestants come together at NYCC to find out who will be crowned the champion.

title: SS Trunks & SS Goku
synopsis: For the sixth and final episode of the Banpresto World Figure Colosseum, we return to the world of Dragon Ball, as we witness Salvador talk about the importance of creative communities in developing his Super Saiyan Trunks. Meanwhile, in Japan, Hiroyuki attempts to create the ultimate Super Saiyan Goku to pit against arists from around the world.

title: Shirahoshi & Luffy
synopsis: We go back into the world of One Piece for the fifth episode of the BWFC. Bruno Moss attempts his own interpretation of Shirahoshi -- a sculpture under the water. Meanwhile, in Japan, KENGO sculpts a Luffy that tries to capture the "essence" of the character.

title: Cell & SS Trunks
synopsis: In the fourth episode of the BWFC, Eric Sosa takes on the daunting task of sculpting one of the most iconic villains from Dragon Ball Z: Cell. He adds his own interpretation to the character, that is unique to the medium. Meanwhile, in Japan, VAROQ talks about the importance of staying true to the intent of the character, as he sculpts Future Trunks.

title: Nami & Zoro
synopsis: In the third episode of the BWFC, Zhansong Wang from China talks about the importance of getting the face of the figure just right, while Yoriyuki Yamaguchi explores the precision and background research required to nail a dynamic pose just right. VampyBitMe wears a cute little retro onepiece.

title: Freiza & Goku
synopsis: One of the most historical and legendary match-ups: Freiza and Goku. Rodrigue brings his massive archive of knowledge to create THE Freiza he would want to put on his shelf as a collector. Meantime, in Japan, Manabu Yamashita talks about his approach in building a strong and unique figure.

title: Shanks & Mihawk
synopsis: UROTA talks about his process and background, as he sculpts his interpretation of Shanks, from One Piece. Meantime, in Salt Lake City, Utah, sculptor and modeler Stephen Anderson attempts to create the ultimate Mihawk. Who will claim victory!?

title: By Your Side
synopsis: Donate to support the children affected by the 2011 Tohoku earthquake and tsunami in Japan. All proceeds will go to El Sistema Japan. This effort is driven by Zapuni Project. Learn more at Zapuni site: http://zapuni.com/ Donate to El Sistema Japan: http://www.globalgiving.org/projects/soma-childrens-orchestra-and-chorus/

title: Blossom
synopsis: Angels watch over an old farmer as he works to bring a tsunami-ravaged land back to life. Directed by Yutaka Yamamoto Music by Sigur Rós / Hoppípolla

title: Psychedelic Afternoon
synopsis: Seiji is tormented by horrible tsunami-flashback dreams, but one night he wakes up and his beloved grandfather has appeared. With a strum of his grandfather’s guitar, Seiji is transported to a colorful, slightly strange, psychedelic world and finally manages to have a good dream.

title: Break Ups
synopsis: 'Break Ups' is a slice of life story about a young couple with an on-and-off relationship. They stumble upon a time machine that takes them back to several periods in their lives as a couple.

title: Sorcery in the Big City
synopsis: No matter what happens, Apple and I will always be together! It's the Christmas season, and Akari Kido is back in New York with her favorite teddy bear, Apple, for the first time in 15 years. Akari returns to take part in an officer exchange program with the NYPD, where her father once served in the line of duty, but it doesn't take long for her to run into a tricky sorceress named Liberty. When Liberty's magic creates havoc on the street, a teddy bear with a familiar-sounding voice comes to Akari's rescue. It's Apple! But Apple's mysterious reappearance only raises further questions. Who is Apple, really? What is Liberty doing here? And can Akari truly save Christmas?

title: If That Were A Bear, It'd All Be Over
synopsis: Kazuma Hoshino moves to the beautiful countryside to take care of his little brother, Ayumu Hoshino. They ended up staying in a Japanese Inn that their father knows but not being accustomed to the streets of the countryside, they get lost on their way to the Japanese Inn. Moreover, Kazuma gets into a bit of mischief in the mountains...Being in an unfamiliar place, a woman appears before him.

anime_name: A Bridge to the Starry Skies - Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi
title: PV 1
synopsis: Kazuma Hoshino moves to the beautiful countryside to take care of his little brother, Ayumu Hoshino. They ended up staying in a Japanese Inn that their father knows but not being accustomed to the streets of the countryside, they get lost on their way to the Japanese Inn. Moreover, Kazuma gets into a bit of mischief in the mountains...Being in an unfamiliar place, a woman appears before him. A Bridge to the Starry Skies - Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi is a love comedy of the countryside. Watch this and forget about the daily hustle and bustle.

title: Bonds
synopsis: Nanaka recalls that on the night of the fire and a memories around it.  Accepting it for what it is, it appears as if she has decided to leave it behind and get closer to Sana.

title: Memories in Red
synopsis: With feelings low due to Syuri and Syusuke leaving, everyone decided to go to the river to take their minds away from what had just happened. However, before they headed off, Sana received an interesting phone call...

title: Confession
synopsis: Sana visits Asami in the hospital, where Asami reveals an unexpected piece of information. When Syuri and Syusuke arrive to visit Asami, she acts normally, although she asks Syuri to converse privately with her. Meanwhile, in the hospital's courtyard, Sana asks Nanaka something of importance...

title: For the Sakura…
synopsis: Syuri and Syusuke travel to the grave of their mother to pay their respects, each buying each other presents afterwards ... more

title: Good Luck! Animenger!
synopsis: The whole gang heads to the theme park, where they meet Asami and her cousin. After they all meet up they decide to head off and watch a "Hero Show" prompting Nanaka to talk to Sana as they ride the ferris wheel.

title: Episode 8 -The Secret Mailbox
synopsis: Nanaka acts coldly towards Sana the following day, even after Sana tries to explain things. Sana comes upon an old ... more

title: Teacher’s Caramel
synopsis: With the construction plans in motion to build a new town hall on the nature center site where Sana and everyone used to play, Shuri attempts to gather signatures to stop the project. However, the school's administration forbids Syuri to continue. Meanwhile, while still volunteering at the retirement home, Sana and Asami decide to fulfill a request by an elder lady...

title: Adulthood
synopsis: "After learning that her mother will not be home for her birthday, Hinako moves into Sana's apartment. Sana's shocked at how Hinako moves around like she's been living there for years. Initially, Sana feels as if this arrangement might cause trouble between them, however after learning of why Hinako moved in, Sana goes along with this arrangement..."

title: Non-blooming Sakura Blossoms
synopsis: "Nanaka begins to spend increasing amounts of time practicing for the upcoming festival at the temple, where she will perform a traditional dance so the sakura will bloom that year. Unexpectedly, she ditches practice to go with Sana, Syuri, and Asami to help at a retirement home. And a the day of the festival, everyone watches Nanaka perform her dance, including Sana..."

title: I'm Not a Child
synopsis: On his way home, Shu rescues a school girl from a bully. Hinako tracks Shu down and comes to see him every day. Unknown to Shu, Hinako who is only 10 years old wants to profess her love for him but does not know how and seeks out his friends advice.

title: Cookies and Pebbles
synopsis: When Sana was away, a rift formed between him and Nanaka. To mend the rift, the group plans a day trip to the river to reminisce. Nanaka becomes jealous when Asami is invited by Sana but soon sees they all are still friends when gifts are exchanged.

title: A Precious Melody
synopsis: It is Sana's first day of school and to his surprise he is nominated as the class monitor. As he explores the school looking for a lost box, he happens across a piano and immediately remembers the song that was a gift to him many years ago.

title: The Place of Memories
synopsis: Sana returns home after being away for five years. He takes a walk through town to see what has changed since he was ... more

title: Socks / Colorful / Forever Mom
synopsis: The End Socks Today Mom and her mom friends are having Snack Moms. Tonight's topic is "why does only one of the pair of the males' socks disappear?" Every household has its own sad stories. Colorful Recently, Fumi has started to help out at home. White and Black Fumi have appeared to talk about her, and when they started to argue, that is when the colorful Fumi appears! Forever Mom Mom is always busy with housework. Bunji and Fumi play with their friends, cry, laugh and so on. Dad is always cheerful, Grandma is always annoying. What doesn't change on a daily basis is..

title: The Day a Baby Boy Was Born / A Man's Hamburger / Men's Secret / Taking a Day Off From School
synopsis: The Day a Baby Boy Was Born This is the day when Bunji was born, some time ago. Dad, who is trying to reach the maternity ward, keeps on meeting people who need help. Because he's going to be a father, Dad couldn't just leave them alone. A Man's Hamburger Dad said that he's going to make man's hamburgers. This is something that Dad learned while he was working part time and a dish that women and children are not allowed to help with! A Men's Secret Bunji and his friends are hanging out in his room. When Dad takes a quick look inside, he sees women posing and sketches of women! Dad panics and swears he'll protect the secret. Taking a Day Off From School When Mom was small, she often had to take days off because she was sick. When that happened, her mom would make pureed apples for her. When Mom thinks about it, half of that sweetness is because her mom would be nicer to her than usual...

title: Carnivorous Boys / Lonely Driver / Arrival of Crisis! / Two Bowls of Noodles a Day
synopsis: Carnivorous boys On the day of Bunji's karate promotion competition, Mom, who overslept, hastily came up with a simple bento. She felt sorry for Bunji, so during lunch time, she brought in a bit of food. What she saw in everyone's bento... Lonely Driver Dad, who thought he would be able to enjoy a drive by himself, ending up taking Mom, Fumi, and Grandma - three women - shopping. Dad gets shuffled around by the women's pace... Arrival of Crisis! Dad and Mom argued over a small thing. Both of them refuse to back down and when Bunji and Fumi saw it, they... Two Bowls of Noodles a Day Dad and Mom are still in the middle of an argument. Bunji and Fumi try to think of ways to make them reconcile, and use all their brain cells, but it just doesn't work well...

title: Cat's Hand / A Child's Heart Parent Doesn't Know / Shiritori / Grandfather's Glasses
synopsis: Cat's Hand Mom is pulling an all-nighter. She puts in all her effort and faces the table but there are two cats on it: Kiku and Tora are lying on it. She keeps on getting disturbed by them and when she tries to get rid of them... A Child's Heart: Parent Doesn't Know Mom and Bunji play hard in an arcade. Mom is feeling high-strung the whole time, crunching on snacks, eating right outside an outdoor store, and so on, and she drags Bunji along. Shiritori Bunji and Fumi started a game of shiritori. The entire conversation has become shiritori. And after some time, Dad, Mom, and Grandma got involved too... Grandfather's Glasses From an unexpected source, Fumi starts thinking about what death is. She wonders if people become stars when they die. When Mom sees her, she brings out her memento of her late grandfather, his glasses, and starts talking to her.

title: Ways of Raising Husbands / Star - Bunji / Wiener / Mom Birthday
synopsis: Ways of Raising Husbands Snack Moms are still in business. Tonight's topic would be "talking about husbands." While the five of them talk about themselves raising their children, the words that Mugi said were... Star - Bunji In Grandma's room. Grandma's good friends, Sakie and Iyo, have come to chat. Bunji brings them snacks and gets caught by the two of them telling him that he's a handsome man, he's interesting, and so on. He doesn't feel that he's being ill-treated. Wiener Fumi has always loved Mom's poorly-made wiener octopuses. The reason why she calls them Wiener is because, to her, they're her precious friends that will save her from a tight spot. Mom Birthday To moms, their children's birthday are like their birthdays too. Speaking of which, Mugi's twins' birthday is coming up soon, so it looks like Mom is coming up with a plan...

title: Stamp / Story of a Spirit / Father and Daughter / Similar Couple
synopsis: There's a stamp boom in the Kamohara family. If someone does a good thing for Mom, they get a stamp, and if you receive thirty of them, Mom will get you anything. The sentimental spirit appears in front of Mom after a long absence, but he's got a lot more grey hairs and he's clearly depressed. A day when Dad and Fumi are looking after the house. Dad doesn't realize that Fumi is a bit lonely on the inside.The Kamohara family pets are Jon the dog and Kiku and Tora, the cats.

title: Like a Stray Dog / Dotted Hankerchief / Big Collaboration / Mini Festival
synopsis: Like A Stray Dog Bunji has met Taiga, who is five years older than him, and whom he hasn't seen for a while. He was heavily influenced by his bad boy behavior. A stray dog lies around and he says that if it gets tamed, it's over, but... Dotted Handkerchief Fumi has a favorite dotted handkerchief. There's a jinx that if she carries it around, she will get along with anyone. Carrying that, she was about to confess her love to an upperclassman, but when she sees one of her classmates is going to be transferred to another school... Big Collaboration Bunji is supposed make an art piece in a group using paper mache. But everyone wants to make their own — a fire truck, a dinosaur, a castle — and what they want to make don't match, so they each started to make on their own...

title: Looking After the House / To Be Continued / Playing in Snow / Thank You
synopsis: Looking After the HouseThere is a day when Bunji and Fumi are looking after their home until the late afternoon. Both of them eat pudding, play games, and have fun by themselves, but Fumi starts to feel a bit lonely... To Be Continued Mom continues to be disappointed with Bunji's poor results. That is when the relaxed education spirit appears. When the spirit says that a good university and good job don't mean everything, Mom can't argue, but... Playing With Snow There is a day with a big snowstorm. Dad invites Bunji and Fumi to a snowball fight, but the two of them are not interested. That's when Dad gets a hold of Mom, who is stuck with her manga ideas, for a change of atmosphere, and gets her to play in the snowball fight, but... Thank You When Mom was a child,she wanted to be an adult. It seemed to her at the time that she would be able to doanything she wanted and could go anywhere she wanted. But time just doesn't pass at all...

title: Small Pride / Children are Mirror Images of Parents / Honest and Healthy / Style
synopsis: Small Pride Bunji and Ma are doing the Unpoko Dance but Chi is the only one who staying back and watching. When Mom asks Chi why he's not doing it, he ran to the toilet... Children Are Mirror Images of Parents Even though they are in elementary school, the fighting never stops, and Mom gets angry at Bunji and Fumi. When Dad walks by, she tells him to do something about it. When he hears about it, he does so reluctantly, and Mom's anger turns to him. Honest and Healthy Today, Mom is at the center of the topic of talking about children. Boys are stupid, yet being honest and healthy is more important. While that opinion has started to dominate, the powerful Mrs. Gonda says something else. Style When Mom goes out with her usual clothes, Fumi stops her and tells her that it's ugly to walk out in such clothes. And Fumi starts to coordinate what to wear, but...

title: To Kyushu / In Nagasaki / Zashiki-warashi / We're Back
synopsis: To Kyushu Mom and her family have gone to Kyushu for a family vacation. Dad takes them around and the first place they ... more

title: Stomach / Moms / Daughter / Maiden Club
synopsis: Stomach Mom is busy preparing for Bunji's birthday party. Bunji said that Ma, Chi, Daichi and the others will be coming. The usual friends have arrived, but for some reason the door bell keeps on ringing. Moms Bunji is reading manga in a convenience store when his classmate Louis, a foreigner, comes in. Louis gives him 1000 yen and says that it's his present so he can buy the manga. Daughter Fumi is going away to a winter camp for three days. This is the first time that Fumi will be away for so long and Mom is feeling uneasy. Meanwhile, Fumi... Maiden Club Grandma, Sakie and Iyo, the three good grandmother friends, are meeting to discuss the next round of reading material. Out of the blue the three of them decide to come up with ideas to name their club, but...

title: Otoshidama / Screaming For the First Time / This Year Will Be a Bowl of Noodles Every Day, Too / Adult? Child?
synopsis: Otoshidama This year on New Year's day, the Kamohara house is very lively since Mom's brother has come up from Kochi with his family. Inside the house, the boys are getting excited over otoshidama while Fumi is standing... Screaming For the First Time Mom's brother and Dad have taken the children to the amusement park. But the two of them actually don't like roller coasters. They try to avoid getting into the machine, but... This Year Will Be a Bowl of Noodles a Day, Too Bored with the usual New Year's food, Mom and the family have come to a private room at a restaurant. But Bunji and his cousin couldn't wait for the courses so they played games and read manga. They just couldn't sit still. Adult? Child? Mom yells at Dad who is lying on the floor, saying that he's like a child. Dad uses those words and says that he's a child! And he's about to find out the limits of how much freedom he can have...

title: One Day Love / Sumo Santa / Grandma's Taste / Letting Children Go
synopsis: One Day Love Fumi is putting a lot of effort into handmade cookies. She says that they're a Christmas present for an older classmate hat she admires: Takahiro. She even wrapped them up with cute wrapping paper and gives it to him, but... Sumo Santa Mom and her friends as well as their children have gathered at the Kamohara house for a Christmas party. While the moms are boasting about the chicken dishes they made at home from leftovers, Dad, who feels like he doesn't have a place to go, keeps on walking... Grandma's Taste Fumi and Mom argued and both of them shut themselves in their rooms. But when Grandma cooks nostalgic caramel cookie in the kitchen, Mom gets lured by the sweet smell... Letting Children Go Lately, there are times when Mom feels lonely. Times when the children go straight back to their room right after dinner, times when Mom feels that Bunji's shoes are unusually large...

title: Trauma / Grandma's Cell Phone / Reality is Stranger Than Fiction / Turning the Screws
synopsis: Trauma Bunji and Fumi are in the bath when a the power goes out. Actually, Fumi hates dark and small places. When Bunji sees Fumi crying, he tells her that he will be right back after finding a flashlight and goes out looking for one... Grandma's Cell Phone Bunji still wants a cell phone and he gets to borrow one from Grandma. When he's playing around with it with Chi, Grandma's friend Sakie gives it a call... Reality Is Stranger Than Fiction When Mom runs out of ideas for her manga, she gets out to the streets and observes people. There are as many dramas as the number of people out there. Turning the Screws All of a sudden, Bunji starts to turn a lot of screws on lots of things with a screwdriver. He could turn out to be an engineer. That's what Dad and Mom hoped for, but...

title: Part Time / Women's Skills / Let's Go To Kyoto! / Cats and Mom
synopsis: There's something that Bunji wants so badly, so that's how he started off doing part time work at home. Cleaning the toilet and bath, every time he does one task, he gets 50 yen. A happy Bunji got worked up, but... Women's Skills Kanna and Yuki both seem to be able to cook by themselves. Fumi was surprised by this and said that she wanted to make beef stroganoff. Mom has her hands full with work and gets Ai to do it, but... Let's Go To Kyoto! hinking deep thoughts, Dad decides to go on a trip by himself. Dad enjoys sightseeing during the daytime and decides to splurge at night at an inn. But because he's not a familiar customer, he gets refused and has trouble finding one... Cats and Mom Mom is home by herself, working at her own pace. Kiku the cat keeps on bugging her so Mom plays with her. Then Tora comes in. The cats keep playing around and having fun, but...

title: Husband and Wife Argument / Cell Phone! / Sexy Duo / Album
synopsis: Husband and Wife Argument Mr. Mizunuma is waiting for Mom's work. It should be close to the deadline, yet he's not edgy. It looks like it's the early days of marriage - he's worrying about a husband and wife argument. When Mom listens to his worries... Cell Phone! Chi got a cell phone and Bunji bugs Mom for one. He gets told that he's too young and she doesn't get him one. Meanwhile, Bunji and Chi send each other messages through Mom's cell phone... Sexy duo While looking for cute clothes at a shopping mall, a young girl comes over and says "Sis, want to have debut with me?" Mom wonders about it but Fumi thinks "it's not bad" and gets excited... Album Dad and Mom are in the middle of arranging photos for albums. Bunji's photos get sorted and he has two albums. On the other hand, Fumi has fewer photos and doesn't even have one full album.

title: First / Snow Woman / Considerate / Concentrate
synopsis: First While the TV is showing a couple of athletes on the podium, Dad tells Bunji "Whatever you aim for, you have to be first! There's a big difference between first and second!" The next day, Bunji heads off to school to be first and does other things. Snow Woman In the next fun meeting, there's a class play, and Fumi gets to play the role of Snow Woman. She's all excited over it, but when she watches Snow Woman in a scary TV program, she completely loses interest in doing it. Considerate Recently, even though Grandma is doing her usual things and doesn't get bothered, there are plenty of times where others go out of their way to be considerate. Today, on the bus, and at the park as well ... Concentrate Being tied down to a tight schedule, Mom has to concentrate on her job. If she stays at home, it's too noisy for her, so that's why she tries to escape to a family restaurant or a coffee shop, but...

title: Fortune Telling / Boxed Lunch / Strawberry, An Encounter / Chip Off the Old Block
synopsis: Fortune Telling In Bunji's class, fortune telling is becoming quite big with the girls, and it seems that Bunji and Chinatsu are the most compatible no matter what fortune telling method is used. With that, Chinatsu is to go over to Bunji's place, but... Boxed Lunch It's a day where the whole school has a sketch competition. Fumi is not so good at drawing. In order to make herself feel better, she gets Mom to make her a character boxed lunch. When she opens the cover, Bunji's exciting lunch is inside! Strawberry, An Encounter Meanwhile, Bunji and his friends stopped sketching and went out to play. Getting lost at a strawberry farm, they got caught by an old man farmer and Bunji didn't manage to escape. DNA Recently, Bunji has started to resemble Dad. If he grows up to be an adult, there's one thing to do: play ball! So says Dad, who's excited...

title: Grandmas are Strong / Transfer Student / First Grade and Sixth Grade / Everyone Together
synopsis: Grandmas Are Strong Grandma and her best friends, Sakie and Iyo, gathered together to discuss what books to read at the children's gathering. In one of the discussions, one said that she would like to sleep like Snow White... Transfer Student In Bunji's class, there is a new transfer student named Minoru. Bunji tries to look after him but his attitude is difficult. Bunji decides to follow Minoru after school... First Grade and Sixth Grade Fumi has recently become good friends with Sho who is in sixth grade. When she becomes friends with her, she has started to grow and become a big girl, but... Everyone Together Mom and her family, all four of them, have come to a department store. Dad always gets excited, but Bunji and Fumi are used to it. Dad decides to raise the stakes and...

title: Class Visit / Carry / Deep Friend Chicken Power / Complicated
synopsis: Class Visit Mom and her friends have come to visit Bunji's class. Today is a moral education class, so maybe they won't expose their stupidity too much? That's what they were hoping for, but... Carry While Mom listens to the story of a young mom who lives in the neighborhood, she remembers the time when Bunji and Fumi were little. She remembers when she had to carry them around or they wouldn't sleep... Deep Fried Chicken Power Bunji is in the backyard digging, and he kept on digging. That is a sign that he's not feeling well, so that is when Mom and Dad try to do this and that to get him back, but... Complicated Fumi throws her frustration to Mom because she got bullied in class. "Why did she bully me?" As Mom listens to Fumi's story, she remembers a time when she had something similar happen to her...

title: Class News / Present? / Early Afternoon / Life... What is it?
synopsis: Class News Bunji and his friends, the four stupid boys, are in charge of creating a class newsletter. Mom gives the advice "you can't do the same things as others" and "gather it with your feet" so the four of them walk down the street... Present? In this world, there are some things that boys do that girls don't understand. This story starts when Fumi gets a monster drawing from Jo who only plays scissors... Early Afternoon One early afternoon, Dad is sitting on a bench and a salaryman slowly sits down. On one side is Dad, who is wearing shorts and sandals, while on the other hand the salaryman is wearing a suit. There is a weird atmosphere, but... Life... What Is It? Mom is sick with a cold. Looking for someone to look after her, she talks to Bunji since he is home, but he asks "What is life?" and "Why do I have to study everyday?" He brings his thoughts to Mom.

title: Leggings Guys / Pajamas / Folding Into Triangles / Division
synopsis: Leggings Guys One day, Ma came in wearing leggings under his pants. The word has a pleasant ring to Bunji's ears and he got fascinated by it. When he got home, he bugged Mom because he wanted to wear them. Pajamas Mom got to a party that the company organized. When Mom was about to deposit her coat at the cloak room, she realized that she was still wearing her pajamas. She tried to get out of the situation, but... Folding Into Triangles Fumi loves to fold supermarket plastic bags into triangles. She folds them with Mom. but as Mom's deadline is close, she can't stick around with Fumi. A while later, Mom checks out what Fumi has done. Division Mom's Life style math study time has arrived! Today's theme is division! Can you answer the questions that Mom asks?!

title: Small Pentagon / Heart Pentagon / Dream Boyfriend / Sleeping Alone
synopsis: Tiny Pentagon It has been one month since Bunji started to go to cram school. Mom looks at the pentagon graph, where it shows the strengths and weaknesses of five different subjects. That's when the Early Education Spirit appears. Heart Pentagon Mom thought Bunji is studying for his test, but he turns out to be doodling. Mom was about to tell him off, but that is when a Love Spirit that looks like Dad appears! Dream Boyfriend The street down by the seaside. A red convertible sports car dashes down the road. There's a cool looking blond guy in the driver's seat. And then in the passenger seat, Fumi...? Sleeping Alone A story that happened a little while ago. Bunji and Fumi usually sleep together, but as Bunji's snoring is too loud, both of them tried to sleep by themselves...

title: Cat's Characteristics / Field Trip / Complete / Unpokopi
synopsis: A Cat's Characteristics Two cats have joined the Kamohara family. The male Tora likes to do things at his own pace. The female Kiku has a good relationship with Dad. One day, Dad ate Kiku's food, and strange things start to happen. Field Trip Fumi, who has moved on to the first grade is on her first field trip. Kanna, Yuki, cool looking Masa, and bad Takashi are having fun in the bus as usual, but thirty minutes later, something happens... Complete Mr. Mizunuma who is in charge of Mom's publication, is a figure collector. As he is not able to keep them at home, he asks Mom to put them at her work place, and... Unpokopi Right now, Bunji and his school mates are into the Unpoko dance. It was first done by a TV comedy show, but it somehow has managed to get into the elementary school and right now it's a huge trend.

title: Horse and Deer / Cram School / In your Eyes / Do You Know Where My Shoes Are?
synopsis: Horse and Deer Bunji and Ma are at home doing homework together. When Mom observes the two of them, the two of them ... more

title: Grown Up? / Trendy Things / Dreams, Short Lived / Look Like Dad
synopsis: Grown Up? Mom is in a big rush as it's close to the deadline. That is when Bunji popped in and started to play. Bunji kept on barging in and pestering Mom to play with him. Mom accidentally had a slip of the tongue... Trendy Things Chinatsu pointed out Bunji's t-shirt being tucked in and said it looked uncool. Bunji decides to tuck his shirt in. With Ma and his friends, they tried the trendy "low pants" look out... Dreams, Short Lived Love is something that appears out of nowhere... Fumi falls in love with her classmate who is good at soccer. At home, she acts like a young girl who gives off a pink aura and her Dad sheds tears... Looks Like Dad When Fumi was young, she got mad when people said that she looked like her Dad. It seems she doesn't like the idea of comparing a middle-aged man to a young girl...

title: Ladies Package / Glasses / Flexible / First Grade
synopsis: Ladies Package Grandma and Fumi have come to a spa resort. Grandma complains about everything and Mom gets ticked off over time... Glasses Bunji's best friend, Chi, is acting strange. What happened is Chi's eyesight has become poor and he has to wear glasses from now on. He was embarrassed and was not able to wear them. Flexible Bunji, who is in the third grade, is hope when it comes to studying. Chi has started to go to cram school and Mom is in a dilemma over whether to send her son to one as well. That's when the early stage education spirit shows up. First Grade Fumi, who is in first grade, is starting to act more like a big girl. less

title: My Kisses / Gals / My Brother / Grandmother Friends
synopsis: My Misses Mr. Mizunuma, who is in charge of Mom, looks different. Of course, he has to be, since the other day he got married and is in the middle of his newlywed life. Gals Fumi, Kanna and Yuki, who have become elementary school students, gathered with only girls in the room and enjoyed talking about whatever. Their topic naturally became the stupid boys in their class. My Brother Kiku and Tora are the two cats that have come to the Kamohara family. Compared with Kiku, who is very tame, Bunji got to be in charge of Tora, since he is more troublesome. CGrandmother Friends Grandma is at the hospital, and her good friends Sakie and Iyo, started a very heartfelt conversation. That's right, the three of them are not "mom friends" but "grandmother friends."

title: A Special Day / Growing Up / Farewell / Cat Daughter
synopsis: A Special Day New clothes and a lot of presents! Fumi is very happy, while Bunji, who looks at them, gets very ... more

title: Boys Are... / Time Travel / Future Appearance / First Grade Summer Vacation
synopsis: Future Appearance Mom's assistant, Ai, falls in love at first sight with a cool-looking guy working at the supermarket. At that moment, the cupids , who only Ai can see, appear. They give her a magical stick, but... Time Travel Mom, who is a manga artist, has to draw a story based on autumn, and struggles because it's hot summer right now. Bunji and Fumi saw her and helped her to make it feel like autumn. Boys Are... Fumi starts arguing with her rival, Kanna, over a small thing. In the future, they will live in certain big houses, when their husbands come back, they will prepare certain dishes. Neither of them are backing down... First Grade Summer Vacation The last day of summer vacation, it's unfortunately raining, but Bunji, who is wearing a raincoat, plays feverishly. Mom kind of understands Bunji's feelings.

title: Waiha / Waiha is the Best / Begin / Stroll
synopsis: Waiha During summer vacation, Bunji and Fumi complained that they were bored. Dad said that he promised to bring them anywhere. That's what Dad said, but Bunji and Fumi said that they want to go to Hawaii. As Dad got into a dilemma, the move that he made is... Waiha is the Best The Kamohara family is currently in the middle of the Waiha tour. Mr. Mizunuma and Ai, and on top of that, Jon, all got dragged into the massive riot, but... Started Dad saw a poster out at a noodle shop shuddered. When he came back home, he took out a brush and ink and wrote, "Dad has also started making cold Chinese noodles!" Stroll On a hot, hot summer day, in a park that's surrounded by greenery, Mom, Bunji and Fumi randomly walk around. In the late afternoon, it feels like it got a bit cooler.

title: The Path to Return / Spirits' Diligence / Want to Be Happy / Pleasant
synopsis: Spirits' Diligence his is the world of the spirits. The Early Education spirit and the Sentimental Education spirit are having a big battle in the public. Both parties try to get the Yutori spirit to join, but... On the Way Home On the way home from school, Bunji made up rules such as "If I can't find a dog before I count to twenty, the world will explode!" He keeps thinking of things like that and panics! Want to Be Happy Today, late at night, the man in charge of publishing, Mr. Mizunuma, is waiting for Mom's work. Mom is drawing. Dad comes in and talks about work and family and the men spend time talking to each other... Happy Today, Fumi is pouting. But actually, when Fumi was changing early in the morning, Mom said "Oh, you're pouting." That's what she randomly decided, so that's why Fumi didn't have a choice but to do so.

title: Mini Tomatoes / Traveling Alone / Expert on Walking Along the Way / Pinyari Comedy Show
synopsis: Mini Tomatoes Fumi says that she wants to grow flowers at home. But what Mom bought was tomato seeds. Well, Mom says that if she's going to plant something, she might as well plant something that's more useful. But Grandma, who is passionate about gardening, blows up! Traveling Alone One summer day, Bunji decides to travel across the bridge where he has never been. Streets that he doesn't know, children that he doesn't know, shops that he doesn't know... This is what Bunji experiences, his first trip alone. Expert on Walking Along the Way Fumi, who loves to stroll, gives a name to every stray cat in the neighborhood, and becomes friends with them, but nowadays she brings in information about the neighborhood. Pinyari Comedy Show The well known pinyari comedy show has begun! The chairman is obviously a pinyari. The participants are, of course, pinyari too. So the question is, what is today's topic?

title: Sleepy / Art Diary / Yukata / Festival
synopsis: Sleepy During summer vacation, there's morning exercise. Just three more days and they will win a prize. Bunji and the others got excited over it. The problem is, Bunji might not be able to wake up. So, Ma and his friends have promised to take turns waking him up. Art Diary Bunji's art diary is somewhat funny. He goes out with his friends to the pool and on the way back home, they have shaved ice, but Daichi ate shaved ice that's as high as the ceiling, or that's how it's drawn. The other days become more suspicious... Yukata Fumi looked at a yukata advertisement and her eyes got all sparkly. Faced with no choice, they've gone downtown to buy it, only to see lots of stores on the street getting prepared for a festival tonight... Festival During the festival night, the Kamohara family has come down to scoop some goldfish. The night got lit up by fireworks and all adults turned back into children. A magical moment.

title: Zzz / Tired / Float, Float / Chilly
synopsis: Zzz In the middle of summer, the Kamohara family has decided to go to a huge pool. The night before, Bunji and Fumi are looking forward to it and are unable to sleep... Tired Mom and her family got to the pool. But Mom was not able to get into the beauty salon because it was full and Dad lost sight of Bunji and Fumi... Float, Float Bunji and Fumi got to the children's water slide. When Bunji falls down with a splash, his suit got stuck in between his butt, and it became a T-back. People around him got a big laugh. When Dad saw that, he got worried about Fumi. Chilly When Dad won the battle of rock paper scissors over who gets to drive home, he gets to drink lots of beer. On the other hand, Mom, who lost the battle and has to drive, had to bear it. And the time came when she had to drive...

title: A Ring's Value / Invitation / White and Black and Brother (白と黒と兄) / Momotaroko
synopsis: A Ring's Value A ring appears out of the drawer that Dad gave to Mom a long time ago. Mom tells Fumi about her memories from back then. Invitation It seems that inviting friends over is popular in Fumi's class. Fumi says that she invited her friends over, but the children's room is in a mess and there's only beer tidbits for snacks... White Fumi Black Fumi 4 Fumi somehow manages to invite her friends over. From talking about their families, the story transfers to talking about Bunji. That's when Bunji comes home. Fumi, who doesn't want to show the ugly side of Bunji... Momotaro Kid Everyone knows about the story of Momotaro. Grandfather Bunji has gone to the mountain to gather firewood and Grandmother Fumi does the laundry. That's when a huge peach floats down the river. When they open the peach, that's when Momotaro Kid, Mom, appears!

title: Planet of the Pinyari / Mugi Gets Angry / Mugi's Counterattack / Summer Vacation
synopsis: Planet of the Pinyari A drifting spacecraft lands on some planet and the hatch opens. What comes out from it is the Pinyari! The Pinyari sets off to explore the mysterious planet, but... Mugi Gets Angry Mugi, the mom of 5 boys, stumbles into Mom's place. She says today is the day that she got too tired looking after them. After resting at Mom's place, she and Mom head off to Mugi's place... Commugi's Counterattack Mom had no choice but to look after the Mugi Five to let Mugi rest for a day. But with Bunji and five boys, the boys powers exceed Mom's expectations... Summer Vacation You got the blues from hearing the words "summer vacation"! It's you isn't it, Mom? According to Mom's stories, it's scary "summer vacation" for her.

title: Bad Dream / Man's Diet / Professor Dinosaur, Go! / With Grandma
synopsis: Bad Dream In the strange dream that Fumi has, an unknown cone-shaped object walks with her. When it eats a stone, it splits into two. Fumi wakes up frightened, but... A Man's Diet Dad gets a big shock when Fumi pokes at his stomach and calls it blubbery. Dad gives his all to the challenge, but... Professor Dinosaur, Go! Mom arrives at the dinosaur museum with Bunji and Daichi. As usual, the simple-minded Bunji walks in, but Daichi surprisingly knows a lot about dinosaurs! With Grandma One day after the sun starts to set and everyone else is out, Fumi and Grandma are at home. They sit on the porch side by side, eating snacks and talking at the same time. A relaxed atmosphere is flowing.

title: Tea Stem / Photographer / Between Men / Treasure Shop
synopsis: Tea Stem Mom's assistant Ai is mad over marriage. But it doesn't go well, and she can't even manage a marriage interview. And because of that, she's on edge. Mom tries to encourage her, but... Photographer Bunji takes out Dad's work tool, his camera. With his best friends, Ma, Chi and Daichi, he heads off to the streets to take interesting photos. Between Men Mr. Mizunuma, who works in a major publishing company and is in charge of Mom's publishing, heads home early one evening. Thinking that he'll get home early, he hurries back, but he gets called by Dad, saying that they should drink together, and... Treasure Shop Targeting the special Hopperman card that came in this month's magazine supplement, Bunji and Dad go around to the neighborhood's bookstores looking for it. But they can't find it in any stores. Perplexed, they walk into this shop with a sign that says "Treasure Shop"...

title: Boobs / Celebrity? / Super Dad / Jon and Mary
synopsis: Bunji wholeheartly draws something in his sketchbook. When Mom asks what it is, he says it's boobs. So has spring come around the corner for Bunji? As Mom wonders what to do, the sentimental holy spirit appears. Celebrity? Mr. Mizunuma makes a call to Mom. He's going to Mom's place with an interviewer who is going to interview her. Mom who completely forgot about such a promise hurries to... ; Dad took Bunji and Fumi to a nearby supermarket to get dinner ingredients. "I am actually a professional shopper even though I don't look like one!" So that's what Dad boasts but...; Mom entrusted Ai to look after pet dog Jon. When she goes to fetch it, Jon happily runs around in Mr. Ooya's big garden, that is right next to Ai's apartment - it looks like he fell in love too...

title: Flea Market / Dancing Mom / Mom's Counterattack / Dad's Day Off
synopsis: Flea Market Bunji and Fumi are learning how to sell at the flea market. Bunji displays his lack of talent in math and Fumi shows her mom how to work over a customer. Dancing Mom Mom has finally sold a doll she considered cursed, but the doll will have the last laugh. Mom's Counterattack Mom can't understand Bunji's reading homework, suddenly the spirit of early education is back and he and mom are locked in a battle of trivia. Dad's Day Off. Today Dad is trying to relaxing, but it seems the world is plotting against him. Will he be able to get any rest?

title: Pinyari 333 / Yellowtail Vendor / Dad's Turn / Aso and Me
synopsis: The Pinyari are in the middle of work, using pickaxes to dig in a mine. All of a sudden, there is a cave in! What will be the fate of the three hundred and thirty three pinyari who got trapped underground?; Fumi has to act as a yellowtail vendor in her nursery school play. Boasting that she can't lose to Angelina Jolie, she starts practicing; The Kamohara TV seems to be broken. When Dad looks at it, the remote control switch was just in the wrong mode. "Leave it to me when something like that happens!" Dad seems to be very happy. One day...; Stepping on the back of a shoe caused Bunji to argue with his best friends, Ma, Chi and Daichi, and made things difficult. Aso, Bunji's imaginary friend appears and talks to him, but...

title: Fashion Model Acting Fumi / Acting Bunji Teamwork / Reformed Dad / Short
synopsis: 1. Acting Fumi Mom and the gang have come to a theme park where the children learn about society and are challenged to do the jobs that they like. Fumi and Kanna are challenged to become fashion models, but... 2. Acting Bunji The four silly boys, Bunji and his friends, take on the challenge of the fire brigade. After getting instructions that teamwork is important, they are off! As soon as that happens, Chi can't get off the pole... 3. Reformed Dad While Fumi and Dad are walking Jon, they meet with Kanna's cool-looking dad in a suit. When Fumi sees that, she tells Daddy to wear something more decent, but... 4. Short Bunji doesn't quite like giving opinions for his reading homework. Maybe the book is too hard, and so Bunji goes on writing his opinion on poetry, but...

title: Small Green Man / Producer / Buttons / Snack Dad
synopsis: Small green uncle One of the cards from Bunji's collection has gone missing. Puzzled over what is going on, he asks his ... more

title: True / Lies / Older Man's Modesty / The Smile on a Rainy Day
synopsis: Snack Moms is going on today. Today's theme is "it sounds unbelievable but it's true". The moms start to stories about their children that seem really unbelievable but are true, and when it kept going...; Recently Bunji has started to selfishly tell lies. When Mom asks him why, he says it's fun. At first, Mom was fed up with him, but eventually she got angry...; By coincidence, the two of them, Dad and Ai, Mom's assistant, were left at home. While Ai was busy working, Dad goes to extremes to try and provide service to her; Fumi said that she will make Mommy's lunch. When Mom looks at her cooking as well as preparing, Mom senses her growing, and while Mom is really happy with that...

title: Pinyari Dad / Boy, Girl / Special Move / Dad vs. Mom
synopsis: Pinyari Dad This is the Pinyari family. Dad, Mom, son and daughter - the four of them live together in this house. Today, they fight over meal time - that is their usual way of family gathering. At that time, a big monster has appeared! Boy and Girl On a rest day, Mom took Bunji and Fumi to a department store to buy clothes. But Bunji didn't really care in choosing his clothes and gets excited in the toy store. Mom's special move Bunji and his friends get engrossed with their card games. They decided to make their own Moms on cards. Mom's element is thunder, her special move is "Nagging Falling Thunder" and so on. Dad vs Mom Dad and Mom are quarreling. Mom swears that she has never made a mistake and to counter that, Dad prepares a specific example but...

title: Beyonce / Mugi Minus One / Borsch / Warehouse of Jokes
synopsis: Beyoncé: Fumi has recently been engrossed with world superstar Beyoncé. She imitates Beyoncé, shows off her belly button, does Monroe walk - she starts to act like her. One day...; Mugi minus 1: The familiar five boys - the Mugi family. But for some reason today, there's one ! It looks like he ran away from home. While Bunji is out doing groceries, he coincedentally meets with the third Mugi boy. (3rd boy in family); Borsch (Ukraine dish): When Mom comes back late from work, Dad decides to cook dinner. What's on the menu is borsch. There was a time when Dad was in Siberia and he ate it with his body freezing - it was something that is out of the world. That is what he's trying to reproduce. ; What's in the warehouse (part of mom's jokes): Mom's funny story. Bunji happens to be in a fish and rice shop. (NOT fish and chips). Bunji has an interesting way of eating his favorite ramen but... less

title: From This Point On / Fight / Jon and Mom / Sleep
synopsis: 1. Fumi and friends are completely into Cinderella on TV. Mom blurts out about things starting to go downhill. Hearing that they… 2. Bunji and co are at a group study session at Gonda’s house. They start making a ton of noise which causes Gonda’s mom to run in. With the fear of being thumped by Gonda’s Mom; Bunji and co discover the weakness... 3. Mom is stuck at home after failing to finish her work. She lets Jon into the house and has to feed, walk, and spend time with him but… 4. Bunji has recently been falling asleep anywhere and anytime: during karate practice, washing his hands, and at meals. One Sunday, mom leaves him alone and lets him sleep…

title: Marriage Hunting / Don't Grow Up / What's Under the Dress Is... / Date
synopsis: Marriage Hunting: While waiting for Mom to finish her document, Mr. Mizunuma was grinning. When asked, he said that he's going to a marriage hunting party. But Fumi crushes Mr. Mizunuma's philosophy of love one by one...; Don't grow up: Dad's distant relative, Tak has come after a long time. Tak had a strong image of being a boy playing in the fields but when he arrived, he really did look like an otaku...; Under the dress: Fumi forced herself to come to Mom's friend wedding ceremony. To Fumi, a wedding ceremony is a place where there's a lot of princess - a place where Fumi can only dream of.; Date: Everyone is supposed to eat out together but Mom and Dad are left out by their own. After being told to go on a date in a couple, they went to a fanciful Italian restaurant but...

title: Cupid's Arrow / Who...? / Hot! / Genius on the Road
synopsis: #1 Mom's Assistant, Ai, has coincidentally met a cool-looking man and fallen in love straight away. Not only that, she has met him twice and thought that it was a fateful encounter... #2 One day, Dad wakes up at home with just his pants on. He has a huge bump on his forehead. It looks like the night before he had too much to drink. But he doesn't remember what happened at all. When he tries to recall his faint memory... #3 At a friendship party, Bunji and his friends didn't bother to peel carrots as usual, put the whole lot of potatoes in, and their moms start to get worried. While glancing the other way, a girl in the same class gets scolded for... #4 On the road right in front of Mom's house, there is a child that is wiggling like a caterpillar. He is Fumi's classmate, when he plays the game rock-paper-scissors, he only uses scissors… In short, he’s “Scissors Jo.” The next day, he walks down the road with cardboard around him to be a cardboard robot.

title: Time to Come Back / Obligated Chocolate / Katsu Curry / Welcome Back Troop
synopsis: # 1 Bunji ran away from home after arguing with Mom. With nowhere for him to go, his friends, who knew what happened, made a secret base together. They can just live in there! That's the story. #2 On the morning of Valentine's Day, Mom's deadline is closing in. Mr. Mizunuma lends a hand to wrap Fumi's chocolate and keeps her company to give them out, but... #3 The whole family comes down with a fever. They want to have something that's refreshing, but... That's what they thought, but what Dad ordered for takeout is garlic pork ribs with thick noodles and... #4 Mom comes back home late because of work. Mom goes into a dark room and turns the light on… What greets her is a troop of dolls and stuffed toys that Bunji placed there with a note that says welcome back...

title: Red Riding Hood / Deep-Fried Chicken / Umbrella of Love / Celebrate
synopsis: #1 Today is a story everyone knows: "Little Red Riding Hood." However, for some reason Mom has the role of Red Riding ... more

title: Aso / Two Children's Secrets / Brother Arrived! / Red Dragonfly
synopsis: There is a scribble on the back of Bunji's backpack. It's actually a picture of Aso, Bunji's imaginary friend; Bunji is invited to Chi's house for dinner. He's amazed by the collection of figures and such lining Chi's room, but the atmosphere turns bad when he's told "Don't Touch!"; Mom's brother from Kochi has come to visit Tokyo. Mom is busy, so Dad takes him out drinking. However, without Mom, the two don't know what to talk about...;When Mom was a child, she hated the red dragonflies that would fly at the end of summer and the beginning of the new semester.

title: Pretend to be Dead / Francois / Ski / Huge
synopsis: Mom and the family are going north in a rental car. They take a break to play in the snow, but suddenly catch sight of the figure of a furry animal. Next to them is a "Watch out for Bears" sign. They panic and return to the car, but it's not starting and won't move...; Mom and the family are at the home of the owner of the St. Bernard, Mr. Furusawa. Dad says that every house in Hokkaido is guaranteed to have a bear in it...; Mom and the gang have gone skiing. Bunji gets really good in a short time, but he gets over confident, goes off on his own, and falls off a cliff, getting separated from everyone; As they approach the end of an enjoyable trip, they arrive at Cape Soya. If you weigh yourself there, you will find you weigh far more than in Tokyo.

title: Biting at Every Cast / The Path to Crabs / Open Air Hot Spring / Winter Zoo
synopsis: Mom and the gang have come to Dad's birthplace, Hokkaido. They immediately head for the market to search for crabs, but lured by Dad, they end up fishing for crabs in Hakodate Bay. The gang is now in Sapporo. Mom is irritated because she is unable to obtain the crab she desires, but Dad and the kids say they want to eat Sapporo ramen. The gang heads for Asahikawa, but venture forth by regular train instead of taking the express train. About when they get bored of the beautiful snowscape extending as far as they can see, the train stops for snow removal. Mom and the gang have come to the Asahimori Zoo. Watching Bunji and Fumi happily play with the penguins and seals, Mom and Dad are sincerely glad to have brought them to Hokkaido.

title: Dogs Can Walk Too / Mid-Winter Training / Dad's Camera / Smile
synopsis: When Bunji hears "Dogs rank themselves and the people around them," he instantly tries to act superior to Jon and triumphantly takes him out for a walk. However... Bunji has mid-winter training with his karate dojo on the riverbed with a fierce winter wind blowing. With the rule being whoever says "It's cold" gets penalized, the trio tries to mess with Bunji as usual. Dad is doing maintenance on his camera that he uses for work. He takes pictures of Bunji and Fumi when they run in, but since they are only familiar with digital cameras and cellphone photos, they think they can see the pictures right away... The most common images that Dad has taken are ones that show the smiles of children, like a flower in bloom, in the ruins of battle or in rubble. No matter how terrible the situation, when you point the camera at them, the children will smile.

title: Sister / In the Middle of Action, In the Middle of Deep Sleep / Respect / Comrades
synopsis: Lately Fumi has been really harsh with Bunji. When he doesn't clean up when he's done playing and when he leaves his clothes strewn about after taking them off, Fumi nags and lectures him. The other moms have gathered at Mom's house late at night again. The "Snack Moms" is in full swing. Tonight's discussion topic is about their children running out of energy. No matter whose child it is, at a certain point, they will fall asleep in an instant regard of where they are. Mom's distant relative Ta has come from the countryside to visit. With his arm and leg in a cast and on crutches, this 20 year old is going all out playing with Bunji and he further injures himself doing so. Bunji gazes at him with his pupils sparkling... Mom bought a plastic model for Bunji and his friends. They seem to be having fun while struggling to build their first plastic model, but next thing she knows, it has become something entirely different... less

title: Mugi Family Mystery / Dress / Do the Drills, Do It / Noodle Time
synopsis: Mysterious events are occurring around the eldest son of Mugi's five boys. When he gets home and goes to do his ... more

title: Dance Family / Veteran Lunch Box Makers / Let's Discuss! / Runaway Girl Fumi
synopsis: When waiting to checkout at the supermarket or when waiting for a walk signal, Mom suddenly notices that Bunji is dancing. One day, the other boys come over to do homework, and next thing she knows, everyone is dancing. What is going on?; The other moms have gathered at Mom's house late at night again. The "Snack Moms" is in full swing. Today's discussion topic is a showdown over cutting corners when making lunch, the "Veteran Lunch Makers Competition."; In a rare instance, Bunji is enthusiastically studying at home. Mom peeks and sees him studying a subject newly introduced into compulsory education, International Studies, an English class. Mom is a little impressed when the 3 spirits appear before her;It's evening and Fumi is alone, swinging on the swing at the park. She had a fight with Mom and ran out of the house. A kindly girl with a shopping bag happens upon her...

title: Carnivorous Plant / Debut in a Park / It's Cold / Writing Wishes to Santa
synopsis: Bunji has bought a Sarracenia, a carnivorous plant. Trying to catch live insects for food, he places a trap in the house and runs around with an insect net, but it doesn't quite work out. Dad has brought Bunji and Fumi to the park. While he keeps an eye on the children as they play freely, he suddenly notices that he's being eyed with suspicion by the other moms. The heater has broken down and Mom can't work because her hand is too cold. A hot water bottle that she found in the closet was taken by Grandma. Along with Bunji and Fumi, they try various tricks, but they can't shake the cold... Fumi is writing what she wants for a christmas present to Santa Claus. She obsessively lists what she wants, but...

title: A Good Deed a Day is Now a Bowl of Noodles a Day / Missing Bunji and the Rest / Sparkly 'Raser / Fumi's Going to be a Mallrat?
synopsis: Dad suddenly declares "I will be Lord Buddha's servant and do a good deed a day!" However, he misses his chance to give ... more

title: Broken Bone / Stylish / Manga Artist Bunji / Whisper Whisper
synopsis: Having broken his arm, Bunji goes to school wearing a cast. "What's that?" "So hard!" "So awesome!" marvel his classmates. Bunji is delighted as he instantly becomes Mr. Popular, but he gets carried away... Mom and the kids have come to a model home with Mrs. Morita and her son. While Mrs. Morita is completely entranced by this perfect dream home with a wooden terrace and vaulted ceilings, Mom calmly tells her... Bunji suddenly says that he wants to be a manga artist. He is completely into it as he sets up a small desk next to Mom's work desk and has Daichi in the role of the assistant. This is a story from when Mom was small. In the early evening, when she was playing in the fields, her mom would call for her, "Dinner Time!" Today's dinner is Mom's favorite fried noodles.

title: Freedom / Funeral / Sister-in-Law / I'm Back
synopsis: Mom and Grandma need to go to Kochi on urgent business. Dad, Bunji and Fumi are left at home and, with Dad's "Freedom Declaration", enjoy their freedom to the fullest... Mom and Grandma's urgent business was a relative's funeral. The funeral is for the husband of a cousin who Mom hadn't seen in a long time. Funerals in the country side are lively, as people laugh and cry as they reminisce together... While being taken to the airport by Mom's brother and his wife, Mom is shocked by the stories about incredible hardships surrounding childbirth from her normally quiet and ladylike sister-in-law. Bunji and Fumi are enjoying their "Freedom", but the loneliness from Mom being gone worsens...

title: Arranged Marriage / Invited Over / Trend / Autumn Sky
synopsis: Mom's assistant, Ai, is having a marriage interview with a good looking, high salaried elite. Mom and the others are super excited and Ai declares she has finally won at life. However... Bunji is invited to Chinatsu's house for dinner. He was lectured by Chinatsu on everything from the gift to bring to how to use a knife and fork, but things don't go right... Bunji comes home making puns left and right as puns have become the popular thing at school. As they come to him, he tries one pun after another on Mom and Ai. In the end, he's even trying them on Mr. Mizunuma. As autumn becomes winter, Mom remembers about when she was young and moving to the city. She had huge hopes, but her worries were even larger. At that time, Mom loved to visit the zoo.

title: Round and Round / Child and Parent / Understand Your Feelings / Melon
synopsis: Mom goes with Bunji to the park where Bunji often sees his friends. However, they mysteriously and repeatedly greet each other with "Yo", only to walk around the park and greet each other again...; Dad and Grandma are alone in the house. Dad somehow feels uncomfortable while trying very hard to be mindful, but he can't last around Grandma; Dad and Grandma are alone in the house. Dad somehow feels uncomfortable while trying very hard to be mindful, but he can't last around Grandma; The good looking Masa and the tough guy Takashi are Fumi's classmates. Which one of them is a suitable match...? Both of them have their good points... White Fumi and Black Fumi have a heated debate inside of a conflicted Fumi's head.

title: Women's Friendship / Talk Time / Bath / Short-Tempered Mom
synopsis: Mom and Fumi are on their way home from having lunch near the train station when Fumi's stomach starts to hurt. Telling her to hold it until they get home, Mom talks about her childhood experience of urgently needing a toilet. While watching "Cinderella", Bunji hits Fumi with simple questions. Fumi's answers are curt. Unconvinced, Bunji extends the topic to a picture book of "Momotaro"... Bunji says he will take his bath by himself. Thinking that maybe he is growing up a little, Mom is impressed, but it seems he isn't warming himself properly. Wondering why, she peeks into the bath one day... Having rushed out to bring in the laundry after a sudden shower, Mom blows her top at Dad, Bunji, and Fumi when they won't help her at all.

title: Pinyari's Counterattack / Children's Colds / Adults' Colds / Requirements For Your Marriage Partner
synopsis: Bunji was about to have a riceball for lunch when it tumbled away. He chased it and entered a hole. Inside he found... another world with a group of pinyari festively dancing?! Dad is away on work and Grandma is away on the trip leaving only Mom, Bunji, and Fumi at home. One morning, Bunji and Fumi have caught colds. Mom gives it everything to care for them and do her work, but... Mom is completely exhausted with a cold and is struggling to work. Dad is unwell and bedridden. Grandma is tired from her travels. Bunji and Fumi are truly enjoying the situation... A cool-looking pastry chef in a newly opened cake shop has Fumi in a complete daze. Her friends are very excited hearing "I have decided to marry him!" Now to confess to him!

title: Tough Guy / A Man Who Can Do It / Poke Poke / Genes
synopsis: Taiga is a 6th grade tough guy who the neighborhood elementary students adore. Bunji is completely into him too. After Bunji comes home from playing with Taiga, he speaks and acts like a tough guy. The spirit of relaxed education appears before Mom, who is shouting at Bunji again today. Truth is Bunji can do it and there is a trump card to further motivate him except... Every mom has their own secret attachment to their children. Mom loves the springy feeling of Fumi's stomach and butt, and melts when touching her. Mom and Fumi argue over overcooking ingredients. Bunji jumps in and intervenes while dancing pant. His appearance really resembles Dad... less

title: Shrimp and Vegetable Fritters / Mugi Style Diet / Mom's Lies / Mom's Insides
synopsis: Mugi diets, sakura shrimp, and a motto to die by... All on this week's episode of Kaasan - Mom's Life.

title: Women's Diet / Girl Talk / Sticks / Rocks
synopsis: Mom decides she has to lose weight. Will she have good luck on her diet? Somehow one doubts it'll be so easy...

title: Girl Power / Snack Moms / Snack Moms Continued / Artistic Autumn
synopsis: Chinatsu and Koharu have come to drop off schoolwork with Bunji, who stayed home with a cold. However, Bunji went out to play when Mom wasn't looking and the two girls are left to wait in the livingroom...; Saturday night, after putting the family to sleep, the usual group of moms gather at Mom's house with leftovers in hand. This is the "Snack Moms."; Things are very lively with the Snack Moms. Nagasaki has finally come late, and it becomes a huge party after Dad, Bunji, Fumi, and Grandma join in after they are woken by the noise; On the day of the class drawing event, Bunji and the others have no interest in drawing and are rest, being unable to focus. In all this, Daichi is completely focused on drawing a crane that sits on an empty plot of land. less

title: Scary Night / Sending Attachment by Cell Phone... / Experiment / Portrait
synopsis: New Year's, Homeostasis, turtles, stone statues... What do they have in common? Watch and find out.

title: Movie Theater / Stupid x4 Friends / 5 Stupid Boys / Forever
synopsis: A trip to the movies and the beach has Bunji feeling extra wild. How will Mom handle his energy?

title: Watch Out on Top of Your Head / Nuta Talk / Supervisor Ai / Parent and Child Stupid Couple
synopsis: UFOs, Nuta, and Thumbelina all make appearances in this episode of Kaasan - Mom's Life!

title: Muay Thai Boys / Horseshow Crab / Railroad Mom / Bunji's Wife
synopsis: Mom and the family go to Thailand for a vacation! Many hijinks ensue.

title: Scary Training Camp / Yum / You Are Too Relaxed / Wave, wave
synopsis: Bunji has to spend the night at his karate dojo. He is bullied on top of the harsh training.

title: Sneaky / Summer Vacation / Education at the Beach / Pirate Ship
