synopsis: Bunji is acting strange... He clutches a 100 yen coin and paces nervously outside of supermarkets and convenience stores...

title: Parent and Child Quarrel / Mosquito / Daughter's Request / Inside the Deck
synopsis: Mom is exhausted after pulling an all-nighter, so she goes to have a beer...

title: Fell Out / Animals / Bangs / Summer Notice
synopsis: The plan to predict the test questions is unable to produce success and Bunji's kanji test ends in total defeat. Mom studies with Bunji as she sets a low goal of "a least get a 20 out of a 100," but...; Mom has come to a hotel buffet with Daichi's family and Chinatsu's family. Chinatsu's mom is very easygoing toward the high spirited Bunji and Daichi who are rampaging about, but...; Mom has inadvertently cut Fumi's bangs too short. Fumi is in a horrible mood and is still unhappy the next day when she is being taken to nursery school. However, accidentally, Mom makes Fumi even angrier...; Bunji has caught a summer cold. The day after, when he's supposed to take a day off, he heads to school with a runny nose and when he returns, he say he wants to go to the pool.

title: Mountain Test / Spirits x3 / A Princess's Heart / Not Wasteful Boy
synopsis: Bunji's class has a short kanji test tomorrow, but Bunji can't remember the kanji. Mom has a plan to predict which kanji will likely be on the test, but...; Mom is disappointed by Bunji's test results today too when the three Spirits of Eduction appear. The three spirits don't get along and somehow, a competition between them begins; Mom gives Fumi a Marie Antoinette DVD as a reward for helping out. Fumi is really excited, but as she watches, she unexpectedly understands how easily a woman's heart changes; Bunji hated sleeping since nursery school. His reasoning is "That's because it's a waste of a day going away." As Mom tries to find a way to put him to sleep, Bunji is...

title: Kids' World / Crying Out Loud On Top of a Faraway Mountain / Big Family Operation / Couple's Conversation
synopsis: In Bunji's group of friends who usually get along, Ma and Chi are having a rare fight. Bunji is perplexed as he is caught between two people who refuse to talk to each other; Having a dream of downing a cold beer at the restaurant on the summit of a mountain, Mom has come with the family to summit a mountain. But with the cable car not moving, they decide to actually climb up the mountain...; Mom and the family decide to go to a BBQ place for dinner. They are each going to do their own thing until it's time to meet and then meet at the restaurant, but...; You can't tell if Dad is listening to Mom's daily gossiping or complaining about trivial things. But Mom shows no interest when Dad is into what happened in the baseball game...

title: Safari Park / Dad Vs. Mr. Okita / Brother and Sister / Going Home
synopsis: After seeing it on TV, the Kamohara family goes to a safari park. However, Dad says, "A safari park is not a zoo! It's a savanna where survival of the fittest reigns!"; Having arrived at the safari park, the Kamohara family boards the animal bus to take them around the park. Seeing the guide, Okita, has fully captured the children's hearts, a sense of rivalry burns within Dad; Bunji and Fumi head to the petting area alone. Like an older brother, Bunji tries to look after his little sister, but a little misunderstanding blows up and things get unpleasant; On the way home, Mom gets irritated after they get caught up in a large traffic jam. She notices that Bunji, Fumi, and even Dad need to go to the bathroom. They manage to make it to a service area at the last minute but...

title: Studying at Daichi's Place / Take It Home / Blackout / Blackout Again
synopsis: Kenta, Daichi, and Bunji are studying at Daichi's house. Kenta is usually so cocky, but his whole expression changes ... more

title: Go Go Bunji Man 4 / White or Black / Made Up / Slump Mom
synopsis: Bunji Man is energetic even in the rain because of his "Aqua Form," created from a garbage bag or supermarket bag. With this, one can freely play, even in the rain; Mom and Fumi are shopping in Ginza. Unexpectedly, in the children's clothes section of the department store, they run into Fumi's rival, Kanna, and her mom. As they are trying on clothes, the girls compete and Black Fumi and White Fumi appear; Fumi is frowning while they are having tea in the department store cafe with Kanna and her mom. Even here, a fierce battle over the menu begins between White Fumi and Black Fumi; Mom has finally finished work. Or so she thinks when another deadline appears. Her brush doesn't make any progress, as the only thing that does progress is time as she sleeps, plays, or just spaces out.

title: Bazaar / Vendor Technique / Strong Person / Launch
synopsis: Mom is tasked with running the games at the kindergarten bazaar. The previous day Mom ignored her work to slave over making some game character cosplay outfits. The kids run in, delighted, and Mom is satisfied. At the bazaar, Chi's mother joins in selling frankfurters. She sighs as she is tasked with a quota of selling 1500 in one day. Dad rushes in right before the end of the bazaar to capitalize on the discounts. Mom wants him to buy some silverware but for whatever reason he doesn't act as the prices plummet. The bazaar ends. The boss, Kenta, Ma's mother, who worked the games, and Chi's mother who cooked the frankfurters all celebrate a successful day of sales.

title: Breakfast / Soccer / Father's Day... What Happened? / Rainy Days
synopsis: The Kamohara family dog, Jon. He came with a great pedigree but, because Mom's motto is "Dogs belong outside," he has endured a tough life. Today will we find out what Jon's true motives are?! Dad returns from overseas with soccer fever. He monopolizes the TV and tries to force everyone to watch a soccer match. Dad is acting exceptionally strange today, because tomorrow is Father's Day. He is trying to be the model father because his kids are to be writing him "Thank you, Dad" cards. It is pouring outside. Unable to study, the family reminisces of their younger days while the rain pours outside.

title: The Legendary Curry / Grandma's Love / Tooth Came Out / Two Going Shopping
synopsis: One day, Dad says he wants to make the legendary Kamo curry. He had it once in India, long ago, and sets off on a gastronomical journey to relive the experience. Bunji is acting really down. He has a tooth that is about to fall out, but he mistakes it for being sick. Mom tries to explain to him that it only hurts until it falls out and then it feels better, but... "I... fell in love." Grandma is obsessed with the mature Korean TV star, Yong-sama. She tells Mom she wants her to buy her the DVDs of a Korean drama that Yong-sama stars in... Bunji and Fumi go shopping by themselves for the first time, with Mom's permission. Since she said they can buy whatever they want with their allowance, they skip off merrily to the supermarket. However...

title: First Love... Fumi / First Love... Bunji / Tadpoles Hopping / Couple Love
synopsis: Fumi and Dad go to a parent & child cooking class. Fumi is upset, saying she wished Mom was there, when she becomes ... more

title: Crawfish / Dad's Pure Heart / Astronaut / To Be An Astronaut
synopsis: Bunji and Daichi are out fishing for crawfish and loving it. They are using smoked squid for bait, but the giant blue crawfish doesn't take to it. They wonder why and then... Fumi and Dad go to a department to shop for clothes. They go into a "gal" event and Fumi gets into a conversation. Dad is quickly left out. Bunji says he wants to be an astronaut. Dad, completely drunk, grabs a swimming ring and goggles and says he'll train him to become one. Bunji goes with his class to a space museum. Bunji spouts off the suspect info regarding space he learned from Dad and his classmates make fun of him. But the astronaut goes to Bunji and...

title: Sports Festival / Run Away! / Evil Eyes / Run Run!
synopsis: Bunji, Ma, Chi, Daichi, and Kenta, the five idiots, focus on training for the following day's athletic meet. They mean no ill will, but the group keeps acting as one... The Kamohara household is super excited the night before the athletic meet, because Bunji was told he has been chosen for the relay race. The truth is he was chosen by random lottery, but they're so excited he can't bring himself to say... The morning of the meet. Dad, being a professional cameraman, stands by at the gate to get the best possible vantage point. The rival fathers coerce him, however. Ball throwing, ball rolling, and lunchtime all pass. It is finally time for the relay race. Bunji has butterflies in his stomach when Ma shows up to cheer him on.

title: Sleepover / Dad's Udon... Nope, Mom's Suiton / Stuffing As Much As You Can / Like
synopsis: Bunji, Ma, Chi, and Daichi are having a sleepover party tonight. Mom prepares for all contingencies, but the four of them go into crazy mode right at the start! Dad always invites the family out for noodles, but no one wants to go today. Reluctantly, they go anyway. On the way they find a tool to make udon with. Surprisingly, Bunji and Fumi get real into it! Mrs. Gonda takes Mom to the supermarket. In a race to beat the clock on a limited time sale, they go into super battle mode, employing the wits of the housewives... Fumi gets over a cold and returns to kindergarten. Upon her return, she is surrounded by the boys of the class: The good-looking Masa, the somewhat bad guy, Takashi, Joe with the scissors, and others...

title: Chimaki Riot / The Collapse of the Universe / Spring and Muddy / Tadpole Rescue Team
synopsis: Bunji takes the entire class's supply of chimaki peels home after lunch. Ma follows, along with others. Mom watches over ... more

title: The Path to School / School Lunch / Noodle Shop of Horrors / Peepy Hole
synopsis: Bunji dropped all his school belongings on the roadway leading to school, but the kindhearted Chinatsu brought them to him. Mom, suspicious, secretly follows Bunji to school... Only those who finish their lunches fast in Bunji's class can have seconds. Because Daichi is out today, his pudding remains. The speed-eating battle for the pudding begins! Dad says he wants to go get ramen noodles in the middle of the night. Bunji goes along with him to his favorite noodle shop, but it's closed. They decide to go find a new place! Mom and Fumi go to the park on a day off. In the warm spring sunshine, they casually waste the day away listening to sparrows going "peep".

title: 4 Vs. 1 / Drag Chain / Aquarium / Fish Are For Eating
synopsis: Mom takes the four dummies, Bunji, Ma, Chi, and Daichi to the aquarium. Mom asks them to calm down on the train ride there, but they won't listen...The four finally arrive and exit the train. They just need to board the bus. However, one leaves to go to the bathroom and another disappears. This continues so they cannot get mving...Mom finally feels at ease, seeing the boys enjoying the aquarium. Eventually she dozes off. Thinking it's so loud, she wakes up to see...! Just when they're ready to leave, they see the souvenior corner. Mom tastes a side dish for sake while the kids make noise...

title: Hairdresser / Selling Coconuts / Toilet Splash Lake / We Love Cambodia
synopsis: Mom and the family head to Cambodia over spring break. Dad is supposed to meet them there, but he's not at the ... more

title: Where did I come from? / Stored Jokes / Acting Like Hopperman / Children's Door
synopsis: Just a normal day in the lives of Mom, Dad, Bunji and Fumi. They all have things to do, and gather around Mom. She loved ... more

title: No Alcohol / Relax / A Guy's Back / Photograph
synopsis: Dad is told he cannot drink alcohol for a while upon having his wisdom teeth removed. He inches ever so close to giving into temptation, each time being reprimanded by Mom, Bunji, and Fumi. Once again, the spirit of early education appears to Mom as she worries about Bunji's school issues. Then suddenly, the peculiar "spirit of relaxed education" appears! Taka, Mom's friend as a little girl, appears. He looks like a run-of-the-mill businessman, but has a certain kindness to him. He accompanies him on the way to karate class, and suddenly busts into a demonstration! The mothers are having tea. It turns into a discussion about their children, and Mom goes off on a rant about hers. Dad returns and goes into a talk about the second child, e.g. Fumi...

title: From Morning On / Curry / Turtle Race / White Day Fuss
synopsis: Mom will never lower her head to Grandma. So again, she has to put up with her slovenly behavior. Then one day, Mom lies to her as she leaves to go play mahjong...At the monthly PTA meeting, Mugi, the mother in a very large family, stands up and makes a proclamation. Her suggestion is received very well by the other mothers. Bunji and Daichi are racing turtles in the hallway. Dad declares, "If it's horse racing, leave it to me!" Mom is brought in as a reluctant color commentator, and they're off...! Bunji and Mom go to a department store to buy a return gift to give to Chinatsu on White Day. Looking to choose a gift that "tickles a woman's feelings," Mom picks out the sweet that's all the rage: macarons.

title: Pinyari / Big Sister / HIgh Heels / Science Type
synopsis: The mysterious life-form, pinyari. It's always going after everyone. Fumi and Bunji heard about the pinyari from Mom and ... more

title: From His Father / Boys' Classroom / White Skirt / Famous Actress
synopsis: Mom takes Bunji to a karate dojo. At first he is excited, saying he want "to be strong, like Hopperman!" But, he ends up dearly frightened of the energy emitted by the instructor. Bunji plays hookie from his karate on, but Mom catches him with his favorite chicken drumstick. Mom tries to convince him to give it another try, but Bunji is genuinely terrified and won't listen. Fumi becomes obsessed with a white dress on display at a department store, saying she wants it so bad. She pesters Mom every day about it, and every day Mom says no, saying she will get it dirty. But then something happens...! Mom has a deadline fast approaching and cannot take time to listen to Fumi. Seeing her mom hard at work, Fumi gets near her and begins to recite a picture book... less

title: Hallucination / 13-7＝？/ Ogres Stay Outside / Touch
synopsis: Bunji is struggling with subtraction. Determined to teach it to him today, Mom tries drawing familiar things for him...; Mom, feeling down with a cold, has Dad, Bunji, and Fumi pitch in and do the housework in her stead. She begins to feel better, after the respite. She then sees what she believes to be a surreal hallucination...; Mom and the other moms are busy preparing for Bean Throwing Day. Dad brings the children along, but everyone is dressed "out of season." The dads, unreliable as they may be, have to play the role of the ogres; Dad is acting very lazily when Mom yells to him, "You are the pillar of this family!"

title: Dodgeball / Pretty Exciting / Getting Prepared / Birthday Party
synopsis: Dad enters the Parent/Child Ball Match Tournament on Bunji's team. He's casually playing around when a fast ball comes flying in. Bunji looks and sees Gonda on the opposing team! They are ready to duel to the end with their familial pride on the line. Bunji develops a bad habit where he chews on his hand while watching TV...Bunji, the "king of forgetfulness" announces he has a test tomorrow. He was able to forward a message from his teacher without forgetting it! After this, he's ready to study hard and get a 100 on his test! Mom sees this and helps. Many of Fumi's friends come over for her birthday party. Fumi gets upset with Kanna in a discussion about cooking. Inside of Fumi, White Fumi and Black Fumi argue...

title: Bunji's Assault! Dinner at a Friend's Place 2 / Everyday Mom, One Day Mom / Want to go and see? / Dad's Back
synopsis: Bunji is invited for a hotpot dinner at the home of the four Iwamura children. Unable to be silent, the hotpot master, Dad, teaches Bunji how to be a hotpot samurai; Mom's assistant, Ai, takes Bunji and Daichi to a Hopperman show per Mom's request. Ai braces herself for the worst, but the boys' behavior far surpasses her expectations; Dad is out of town on business. Against the dry winter night, Mom gently asks Bunji and Fumi if they want to go see the snow; Dad is sorting war photographs for his work. Bunji walks in and offers to help. Dad is proud that he gets to show his working self to his son once in a while.

title: Go Go Bunji Man 3 / Little Pu, Little Pi / Public Field Trip / Observation Journal
synopsis: Once again, Bunji Man is out on patrol to protect the peace of the neighborhood; A huge dog and Mizunu-Man appear as well. Fumi is playing with her three favorite dolls. This leads Mom to search all over the house...; Bunji is on a field trip to visit the fire station. Bunji is sad that he lost rock-paper-scissors and will not be allowed to be on the hook-and-ladder truck. He ends up being oddly shown around by a high-tension fireman...; Bunji has to write an observation journal over winter break. He decides that he's not going to tell Mom what he's writing about. Bunji is praised for his observation journal after winter break ends. It seems he was writing about Mom...

title: Zoo / Call of the Wild / Boy's Early Education / Favorites
synopsis: Dad gets mad when he sees a tiger on TV being so friendly to humans. He says he's going to show his family what real tigers are like, and whisks them off to the zoo. Unfortunately, the tigers and lions didn't get the memo...; The boss monkey at the monkey mountain threatens Dad. Dad, doing a great job imitating the monkey, appears to be having a conversation with him...; Bunji says he's going to marry a girl from his class. Then, she makes him sign a contract to those words. Suddenly, the spirit of early education appears to let Mom know that this girl is just toying with Bunji's emotions; Mom and Fumi are casually baking cookies on a calm afternoon. Suddenly, Fumi asks Mom if she's ever kissed a man other than Dad! Mom quickly answers that she has. Fumi then...

title: New Year's Day / Japanese Badminton / Mochi is Delicious / Tastes Horrible
synopsis: The family is back in Kochi for New Years break. The children are so excited for their otoshidama. Seeing this, Dad begins to tease them.; Mom's brother and Dad go to teach the kids badminton, for fun, but it turns into a big competition between them so the kids wander off...; The family goes to a mochi making competition. Dad and Bunji enter the contest while Mom and Fumi help sell things. As soon as they start selling, the men rush in.; Bored with the New Year's food, Mom begins to cook something that her father used to always make her just using flour and sugar.

title: Genius Performance / Run Away, Mom! / Snowball Fight / At the End of the Year
synopsis: The family goes to visit Dad in the hospital. Each night, you can hear the cries of the cicada, well out of season. This starts a rumor about cicada ghosts being in the hospital; Mom awakes from a nap to the sound of Bunji and Fumi yelling "Jon!" She thinks something's amiss, and sure enough, when she looks in the mirror she sees that she turned into Jon!; It's the first time it's snowed at the Kamogara house in a long time. They break up into two squads, managed by Mom and Dad respectively, and have a snowball fight. Mom uses her clever wit to slowly collapse Dad's team; Mom and the family are shopping at a department store at New Year;s. Dad, in a rare display of generosity, offers to buy Bunji and Fumi one toy each. Mom asks, "What, I don't get one?"

title: Go Go, Bunji Man 2 / Mothers' Tea Party / Men's Outing / Desire Tree
synopsis: Defender of justice, Bunji Man. Once again, he rounds up Commander Fumi and goes to seek the town for people in need. He then encounters Daichi who is being picked on by some boys at a shop selling sweets; Back at home, Daichi's mother and Mrs. Gonda are visiting. As Mrs. Gonda discusses her strong child rearing techniques, the topic of conversation turns to their three boys' report cards; On a day off, Bunji and Dad go to a conveyor belt sushi restaurant. Dad, teaching his son about sushi etiquette, proclaims, "You must start with the gyoku!" and "Don't use chopsticks!" etc.; The Kamohara family's wishes for Santa Claus to adorn their Christmas tree. A mix of the Japanese holiday, Tanabata, and Christmas. In them, you can see what the family members truly desire.

title: White Fumi, Black Fumi / Gala Occasion / Huge Mistake / Leader of Fools
synopsis: Fumi and her rival, Kanna, battle it out to decide who gets to play Cinderella in the upcoming school play. Thus begins a strenuous battle between the mean "Black Fumi" and the kind and pure "White Fumi."; Eventually, they decide to let Fumi, Yuki, and Kanna all be Cinderella. The family watches the train wreck in bewilderment; Bunji and three of his stupid friends cannot remember last night's homework. This leads into being scolded but having fun as well; The four of them are crawling around in the sandbox at the park. They don't mind the pain as they continue to romp around and have fun. Unfortunately, Bunji decides he wants his stupidity to surpass all the others and...

title: That's the super bath house / Playing House / You are reliable / Mrs. Manga Writer
synopsis: Mom and the gang visit a super bathhouse! Dad is all fired up and causing a ruckus all over the place. He then encounters an elderly, hermit-like man called the "bathhouse chief."; Fumi's friend Ako is over to play. While Mom isn't looking, Bunji is drawn into a crazy session of playing house with the girls; The class representative from Bunji's school, Nochiharu, is leaps and bounds a better student than Bunji. He begins to back Bunji up when playing and at school...; The girls from Bunji's class come over to play. Something doesn't feel right, and Mom has a bad feeling. Just as she thinks this, they say they want to see her draw manga...

title: Children's Time / Continued... Children's Time / Able to ride it! / Little Brother? / Subtraction / Subtraction Counterattack
synopsis: Bunji is obsessed with his toy cars. Mom means to look after him, but because she doesn't stop him, he drifts into the toy car's soul. Bunji, Ma and Chi play in the mud again. They become the "fried oyster men"!; Bunji practices riding a bike. With Mom, Dad, and Grandma on his side, Daichi and him manage to pedal!; Fumi declares she wants a little brother. Mom tells her to make do with Jon instead. Fumi begins to treat Jon like her younger brother.; Bunji enters first grade and has trouble with subtraction. Mom takes advice from the spirit and buys him the easiest practice book she can. They vow to practice ten minutes a day, but...; Bunji's troubles with subtraction continues. Mom makes him an exercise involving loaning money, but Bunji just says he won't give the money back!

title: Go Go, Bunji Man / Cleaning Frenzy / Dear son, where are you going... / Bunji's Assault! Dinner at a Friend's Place
synopsis: The defender of justice, Bunji Man! He patrols the town looking for people in trouble, with Fumi and the others in tow. Upon doing so, he encounters a young boy trying to find a winning ice cream stick at a convenience store; Upon returning home from school, Bunji casually announces that he had an accident (#2) at school. Mom is startled and tells him that he must bear it and continue to focus, when that happens; That night, Mom, Mrs. Morita, and Mrs. Nagasaki gather at the school. They attempt to look for their children's forgotten items. They brace themselves for the worse as they dig in, but keep finding unexpected things, one after another...; Bunji is invited to dinner at the stately residence of his classmate, Hiku. Bunji frolics around like usual as the butler, Mr. Yagi, grows concerned...

title: Reading Time / Kanji / Heart Signs / Errand
synopsis: Mom is extremely worried because Bunji is showing zero interest in reading. Surprised that he cannot do math at all either, she makes him do math tables. Bunji then...; Bunji scores a 90 on his kanji test! The Kamohara household is delighted. When Mom tries to teach him the one he got wrong, Dad interrupts with his special kanji training!; Fumi hides under her bed and won't come out. Mom brushes it off, but Dad sees it as a sign of her soul and many hijinks ensue.; Dad and Fumi go to the supermarket on an errand run. While Dad is trying to get a read on Fumi's soul's sign, he manages to get inebriated at a wine tasting they're holding. Only then does Fumi open up...

title: The Mugi Five Appear! / Picnic / Mrs. Mugi's Secret / It's okay as long as they don't die
synopsis: Mom gets to witness Mrs. Mugi and her five sons.

title: Daichi / Ah, Kanji / Escape / Shy
synopsis: Bunji's friend Daichi is always running around in short pants. One day, he comes across 17 turtles and brings them back to play with. Bunji is all excuses because he doesn't want to study kanji. As Mom is stressed over the situation, the spirit of early education and spirit of educational enrichment appear before her. Of course, it turns into a fight as usual. Mom thinks that Fumi is tone-deaf, but actually it's a trait handed down from her. Wanting to do something about it, Mom hastily buys a piano. The two start to practice, but... Bunji is worried his friends will see him holding hands with his mother at the crosswalk on their way to school, now that he's an elementary school student.

title: Carry Umbrellas! / Shiritori / Halloween / Not a Good Fit
synopsis: Mom picks up Bunji from school on a rainy day, with an umbrella in her hand. She notices responsible little girls and rambunctious little boys, without umbrellas, running about...; Dad apologizes profusely after Mom says she'll divorce him if all he ever does is drink. Bunji hears this and asks what "divorce" means. He finds out it's something scarier than a ghost; Mom and the gang get dressed up and walk around the neighborhood for Halloween. But, they are chased by a dog and get lectures by Dad who has no idea what Halloween is.; At the kindergarten Halloween party, there are a group of young moms who are enthusiastic about it, a group who have no idea what it is, and a group of randomly crazy foreign moms...

title: A Little Bald Spot / Sesame Seeds of the Belly Button / Zzzzz... / Boy Talk
synopsis: Mom spots a large bald spot on the back of Bunji's head. The Spirit of Early Education freaks Mom out when he tells her that it's a boy's spirit callingfor help due to being neglected by his parents. Mom tried to improve her lax attitude towards Bunji, but...; Bunji can't calm down and can't sit still for lunch or going to the bathroom. That behavior just makes his school teacher say that "Bunji sure has a strong sense of curiosity." Mom was impressed by this, but...; Mom goes to wake Fumi up after sending Bunji off to school. She is enticed by Fumi's comfortable bed and drifts off to sleep herself, to the sound of Fumi's breathing. She drifts off to dreamland. Then, Bunji, Ma, and Chi engage in a never-ending argument about peppers, which, incidentally, they all hate.

title: What It Means To Be a Boy / Three Stupid Boys / Feminine Charms / The Road to Napping
synopsis: Bunji comes home after losing a fight. Mom thinks that, since Dad is never around, Bunji never learned how to fight. So, she starts the "Men's intensive training month."; Bunji, Ma, and Chi, all good friends, form an idiotic trio. The three of them are always so lively! Then, on a rainy day, they're all in the Kamohara home...; Through her work, Mom meets an idol and is impressed by the many feminine charms she has. Hearing her speak, Mom, in a flurry of stupidity, forces poor Fumi to dance.; It's early afternoon and Mom is sleeping, not doing any work. Just before, Bunji almost did something very dangerous, but he got away okay. She feels so relieved and dozes off...

title: Bunji's Secret / Bunji, First Grade Student / The Last Crab Mom / Ah, Nursery School
synopsis: Bunji becomes a first grader, at long last. That morning, Dad tells Bunji that he is to become a chosen, special first grader. Bunji believes these words and sets off for school...; Mom is more worried than ever due to the fact that Bunji's entering elementary school. The more she thinks about it, the more nervous she gets, to the point where she can't even effectively get work done.; And then the crab arrives! Mom was planning to hog it all for herself and not tell anyone about it, but Grandma notices.; The elementary school day begins earlier than kindergarten did. Mom has to wake up extra early to take Bunji to school. Plus he has homework which he needs help with. Mom is getting burned out by this routine, when she had to stay up all night to finish work and then take Bunji to school and...

title: The scene after it rains / Argument / Disappearing Mom / The Night Festival
synopsis: In order for the kids to show off at the kindergarten athletic meet, Dad starts a strict training regimen. But, due to inclimate weather, the meet is cancelled; Upon heading to the park after the rain, Dad is delighted to see the sun be out. Bunji gets into an argument with a friend, but he says a bunch of things they don't understand; Mom begins to lecture Bunji about quarrels, but...; Mom's deadline is fast approaching and Dad, Fumi, and Bunji are romping around like usual. Before they realize it, Mom is nowhere to be seen... Did she run away?; The family goes to a local festival. They eat yakisoba, do target practice, and visit the night vendors. Dad, now drunk, goes all out in a battle at the ball throwing stand...

title: Dokedoke / Beam / Treasure / Close friends
synopsis: Like always, mom is taking the kids on the bike as she is huffing and puffing biking up a hill. As she is riding, she sees another homemaker speeding right past her on an electric bike; Mom noticed when she started to lecture Bunji, a beam came from his head and he wasn’t listening. Today, his beam also appears and he begins his communication; Out of nowhere, Fumi said that she wants her own room so she went to ask her dad; Bunji and Ma-kun have a falling out. Even though he is upset over the phone, Bunji asks Ma-kun over to play. They have a huge fight again so mom gives up on them.

title: Chop / Want to become / Mom's knowledge: laundry compilation / Contact
synopsis: Bunji is unable to express his gratitude to people. Mom must try tactics from the advice given to her by the spirits of early childhood education; Recently, Fumi has an aspiration to become a model. When asked why she wants to be a beautiful lady, she has a surprising answer; Mothers with sons are always concerned when they do laundry but what is mom’s secret technique?; In town, there is the sound of a child crying when all of a sudden, a bunch of middle-aged women gather around. Back in the days, mom never understood why people did this but now she is one of them.

title: Starting tomorrow / Seriously, starting tomorrow / Bedtime stories / Luxurious worry
synopsis: Bunji doesn’t keep a calm composure when crossing the street which worries Mom that one day he will get into an accident. On day, Bunji was late so mom couldn’t help but…; Grandma and Bunji are left at home as Fumi goes shopping with Mom. If Bunji went as well, he would enjoy it at the beginning but he would gradually turn the other way; Mom begins to read Taro’s book to Bunji and Fumi. But from one of Bunji’s simple questions, the talk of Taro begins to gradually escalate; In order to teach the kids to become independent, Mom told them to go to bed on their own. However, the two weren’t used to it so they tried every which way to not be separated from their mom.

title: Strategy / Gathering shells at low tide / Collect tadpoles / Mini-mom
synopsis: Today is the day that everyone is going to the amusement park. However, mom is trying to avoid going by having Ma-kun’s mom and Chi-kun’s mom take the kids; Bunji and the other kids are having a jolly time gathering shells while the mothers let out a sigh. They see a mother and daughter walk gracefully before them; Bunji & Fumi go to a nearby pond to catch tadpoles. Dad began to tell them about how tadpoles turn into frogs; Unexpectedly, Bunji and Fumi were the only ones in the house. Fumi suddenly missed her mom and began to cry.

title: To attain enlightenment / Sucking up the fat / Barbecue / Close friends
synopsis: Mom is trying to reach her work deadline when she receives a call from Chi-kun’s mother who’s down with a cold which puts mom in a pinch; Mom and Bunji went to Iwamura’s house where there are four boys. They are tough boys and usually place baseball at home; They went camping with another family by the riverbed. Dad claimed to be the Commander Fire when Bunji and the other boys began to set up the portable stove; Bunji and the other kids swam in the river, caught rhinoceros beetles in the mountains, and fully enjoy the camping trip. However, Bunji’s rhinoceros beetle went missing so everyone began searching…

title: Lucky? / Be alike? / Find a way to praise them? / Look at the back
synopsis: It's been a while since dad has been home. He mentions how girls are better since Fumi is emotionally attached while Bunji is a bit hurt; Dad went barhopping while Bunji went to friend's after friend's house. Mom lectured them respectively; Bunji's teacher complimented his artwork despite his lack of talent which mom learns from; Dad made some time and played with the kids as much as possible. They sat on his lap while watching TV. Mom was earnestly looking from behind which reminded her of her own dad.

title: Hometown / Bean Washer / Dad's name / Blue place
synopsis: The family went back to mom's hometown, Tosa. Somehow, the heat is different from Tokyo's so they are fully enjoying the countryside. Rumor is, there is a ghost that appears in "Hell's Valley" when Bunji and Fumi go exploring; Mom and her older brother unexpectedly went to their parents' home. Mom didn't know everything about her real dad and for the first time, her brother begins to speak of him; Mom and her brother took the Buddhist tablet and the picture of their dad to bring back to their homes which was a secret between them.

title: Summer vacation is not over yet / Summer vacation is still not over / Not yet, not yet. Summer vacation is not over yet / Not yet, not yet, not yet. Summer vacation is not over.
synopsis: Taking advantage of the summer holidays, the family goes to Singapore. Bunji is amazed by everything and becomes the laughing stock but kids from other countries seem to do the same; Bunji is ecstatic to see a water slide at the pool when the stronger Russian, Misha appears. Bunji can't create quite as big of a splash as Misha; After Singapore, they are off to the Philippines to meet up with dad who shows them around; Bunji and Fumi are around the same age as the street children who are begging for money.

title: Twist / Just this day! / I can't take this anymore / A locust's call
synopsis: In order for mom to finish up the manuscript, she told Bunji to go play but you'll never guess what he did; The day of the deadline - Since grandma wasn't around, mom had to feed the kids and go to work afterwards. However, she didn't make their favorite food...; Mom was working all night long and just when she thought she could take a break, Bunji and Fumi catch a cold where mom must nurse them back to health; Bunji, Fumi, and grandma go back to Kochi. Mom was planning on enjoying some alone time.

title: Do whatever / Sorry / It's contagious / Street at night
synopsis: Again, Bunji chooses to continue playing even though he needs to go to the bathroom so he ends up peeing himself. That's when the discipline Gods appear before the exhausted mom; Mom always points out how good of a child Fumi is but on occasion, she unexpectedly scolds her quite harshly. On that particular day, she punished her mistakenly; Recently, Fumi has been acting strangely giving Bunji some attitude; One evening, mom forgot about something she had to take care of and ended up rushing out of the house without her bag. She went to give Bunji and Fumi the things they forgot but it started to get late...

title: Come on, eat / Lift the ban / You are bad / Parents' example
synopsis: Mom wrote about strange foods that aren't normally eaten in Japan in her manga when one day, Bunji wants to eat something that's unthinkable; Even though they heard that you become a fool if you eat sweets, Bunji and Fumi still want to eat them; Fumi makes up a story and tells it at home and at school. Mom was concerned about this so she asks Fumi why she created a story and was surprised to hear her answer; On occasion, Mom will go out at night with those she knows from work as her reward where she gets pretty drunk. However, looking at the faces of Bunji and Fumi while they are asleep is really the biggest reward.

title: Busy / Boys' Mom / Yes, that's it! / Kitchen
synopsis: Whenever Bunji needs to go to the bathroom, he is known for not being able to hold it and has a bad habit of continuing to play despite his need to go; Bunji was covered in dirt when mom came to pick him up. She let him be and joined Morita-san and Nagasaki-san as they began to talk about being a mother of sons; Bunji is running all over the place sticking beans in his ears, a doll's hand in his nose and digging himself a hole. Mom is speech when Fumi says…; Fumi didn't cry when going to school but that’s because… less

title: Escaping / Dogs stay outside / I am a dog / Escape again
synopsis: John, the pet dog, is good at escaping and the whole family goes out to look for him; Bunji and Fumi let John inside the house despite mom’s petition that he’s an outside dog. Guess what John brings for mom…; When John didn’t have a name, Bunji called him “Batman” and Fumi called him “Butterfly”. Despite what they called him, he always responded happily; John manages to escape again but this time, they can’t find him…

title: Impossible after all! / Juice came out / Backpack / Dream
synopsis: Mom's favorite willow tree was covered with caterpillars which she abors; Bunji is not always well behaved, so the discipline Gods scold Mom and urge her to improve in this area; Fumi suddenly wants a backpack so grandma makes her one but she doesn’t like it; Seeing the beautiful sunset, Mom and the kids take a stroll when Mom asks them what they want to be when they grow up.

title: Clean up / Multiplication tables / Motivation / Bring out your motivation
synopsis: We see mom scolding Bunji for not cleaning up even though she hates doing it herself; After cleaning, they take out an electronic multiplication table that Fumi and Bunji start playing with. Mom is a bit hesitant since she is not so good with the multiplication table; One day, Mom is surprised when Bunji states his desire to study so she takes him to the hospital where they find nothing wrong with him. But, is there anything wrong with his body?

title: Splish, splash / I did nothing wrong / Monster / Puzzun
synopsis: Mom is leisurely shopping with Fumi when she needs to go to the bathroom so rushes there but…; Bunji is out with his friend while Fumi is home with Mom pouting since she would rather be out – Mom is about to lose her patience; Deadlines are piling up so Mom needs to work on Sunday but her children want to go out to play; Perhaps, Italian cuisine?

title: Grandpa / It's a fact / I love you / Slam
synopsis: We follow the family as we find out that Mom was raised in a small fishing village in Kochi, Fumi works her manipulative ways to get what she wants at times but ruins her new dress in the next short, and finally Dad, who works as a cameraman, one day returns home and sees Bunji who he hasn’t seen in a long time.

title: I'm going back / To start out with... / She's good / Together
synopsis: We learn about how Mom and Dad met in a jungle in Thailand, they go to a ramen shop with their kids, and dad makes Fumi promise to never leave and stay with him forever.

title: The bazaar is really a pain / Aggressive nursery school / I won't do it again! / On my palm
synopsis: Mom worries that she doesn’t bring anything to the school’s bazaar, Bunji cries since he doesn’t get to buy a toy he wants, Bunji plays in the mud at the park washing away the dirt in an area meant for pets, and mom reminisces about the past.

title: The descent of the spirit (精霊降臨) / The descent of the spirit (精霊の逆襲) / Look at me! / Brother and sister
synopsis: In these next shorts, mom is shocked that Bunji has poor hiragana recognition. In different efforts, she finally decides to help him improve but sometimes gets a bit impatient. Fumi absolutely loves batman and throws her batman figurine out when she discovers he has a girlfriend. Mom has promised to take Bunji and Fumi to the park this Sunday but her body is so tired that Bunji and Fumi decide to…

title: Manga Artist Mom / Mom, the manga artist / Scheme / Gush
synopsis: Mom is a cartoonist and she has a deadline to make today. Despite this, she makes breakfast for the kids, takes them to school, and ends up volunteering to help draw the poster for the Parents' Bazaar Day. Tomorrow, is Bunji's birthday and he ends up getting sesame salt…

title: Bedwetting / Response / The Sun Roars! / Greetings / Crab Mom / Mail
synopsis: In these 6 hilarious shorts, Mainichi Kaasan shows us that from registering kids for pre-school to a crazy family trip to the beach, it's no easy job being a mom!

title: Fantasy Future
synopsis: Time that has passed can never return. But even if everything in the past is lost, there is still hope for the future.

title: Process and Reality
synopsis: Victor resolves to battle Aiks, even if it means losing his mother for a second time. Kiri, Mina, and Blaze arrive join forces with him. But Aiks has many strange powers not yet revealed, and none of the Chronos Rulers have glimpsed his true form.

title: The Transcendence of the Ego
synopsis: Mina and Blaze have engaged in an intense battle with Fujimoto and Raiko. Meanwhile, Kiri rushed to Victor's aid in the nick of time as he was facing his long-standing adversary, Aiks.

title: Conjectures and Refutations
synopsis: As Kiri's group heads deeper into the forest, they come across a wall of time. As they search for the truth behind the reversed flow of time in Couljours, they're attacked by Fujibayashi and Raiko.

title: Responsibility and Principle
synopsis: Kiri, Mina, and Blaze head into the forest on the outskirts of town in pursuit of a huge snake-shaped Horologue. Its behavior is not like that of other Horologues, leading Kiri to believe it has something to do with what's happening in Couljours.

title: Fact and Fiction
synopsis: The party has arrived in Couljours. Victor feels nostalgic as he observes a town that looks just the way he remembers it, but then he encounters his parents, who were supposed to be dead, and his younger self.

title: The Poverty of Philosophy
synopsis: En route to Couljours on a jet, Victor's party encounters a strange man who bears a deep regret and a ring that commands a Horologue. Can even four Chronos Rulers together defeat such a powerful foe while trapped so high in the air?

title: Will and Representation
synopsis: Having completed Aisrehdar's tests, Victor and Kiri's lives briefly return to relative calm.They attempt to decipher a mysterious coded language in their efforts to find the records of Victor's past work with Chronos.

title: Beyond Good and Evil
synopsis: Victor and Aisrehdar battle one-on-one for the possession of UNIQUE, the original Oath of Time. What tricks will the expert gambler attempt to use on the child of a god? Meanwhile, Kiri and Blaze battle using the opposing forces of water and fire.

title: The Concept of Anxiety
synopsis: Victor ends up in a battle with Aisrehdar, the leader of Chronos that rules over all creation, but the difference in their strength is incomparable. Mina catches up to them and witnesses something unbelievable...

title: Twilight of the Idols
synopsis: Mina leads Victor and Kiri to the headquarters of Chronos, a secret organization founded to battle Horologues. As he searches for information on his own past within the facility, Victor discovers a record of his work within the organization.

title: Memory and Reminiscence
synopsis: A pure white Horologue appears in Celavie, a casino town swirling with greed, its huge size implying that it must have devoured thousands of years worth of time, and Victor and Kiri face the brunt of its immensely powerful attacks until they're saved by Mina, a girl who can control wind. But Kiri isn't pleased to see how intimately she acts with Victor.

title: Being and Nothingness
synopsis: There is a legend in this city that says if you make a wish under the clock tower at midnight on the night of a full moon, time will be turned back. Koyuki, who lost her older brother in an accident, meets the brothers named Victor and Kiri on a snowy day in the graveyard. It appears that they have some kind of secret...

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Tower of Druaga FINALE
synopsis: The final installment of the Tower of Druaga.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: One Solitary Shield
synopsis: The evil deity Druaga finally shows its gigantic figure. Neeba and his party bravely face off against it, but the demon god’s power is so overwhelming that the party soon begins to loose ground. Seeing that they are cornered, Jil tries to rush to their rescue. However, he is stopped by Kaaya who maintains that they should continue to make their way toward the top floor of the tower. Jil shakes free from her grasp and dashes off toward Druaga...

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Summer’s End
synopsis: Jil’s party has now reached the “Shrine of Diamond”. The top floor and their ultimate goal “Shrine of Sky” is now close at hand. Neeba’s party, the Uruk Army and Pazuz go their separate ways in order to reach the top of the Tower. As the respective parties continue their quests, each and every Climber’s dreams, objectives and ambitions are intermingled and eventually develop into a fierce battle, marking another chapter in the history of the Tower of demon god.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Eleven Nines
synopsis: Jil and his party enter an area supported only by thin pillars. They engage in a battle against a balloon-shaped monster called Barbar and, demonstrating well-coordinated team play, they defeat the enemy in the end, thanks to Melt's magical tricks. The festive mood from the victory, however, is short-lived as the feebly structured area collapses due to the explosion caused by Barbar's demise. The collapse of the area also extends to other areas on the same floor, thus causing Neeba's party and the Uruk Army much chaos. In the end, members of all parties find themselves separated from each other.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Tower of Legend
synopsis: Kaaya is stricken by some unknown illness. The party is puzzled by this illness whose name and symptoms seem rather sketchy. Jil, in all his na�vet�, sets out to search for the cause of this mysterious ailment. They finally arrive where the answer supposedly lies. Only, the place turns out to be nothing like any other floor in the Tower they have visited so far! What are the challenges that await Jil and his friends in this strange and unknown area?

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Dance with the One-Winged Dragon!
synopsis: The Uruk Army led by General Kelb is unable to move forward as a single-winged dragon suddenly appears before them. Inside the Tower, there is an unprecedented militant atmosphere as the Uruk Army�s anger reaches a crescendo at the total annihilation of the Scout Regiment by the dragon. Jil�s party and Neeba�s party observe the army as they prepare for the upcoming battle against the dragon. Jil tries to persuade Neeba, who is also known by some as �Neeba the Dragon Slayer�, that the Climbers need to work closely with the Uruk Army to defeat the dragon. Will he succeed in getting his party and Neeba�s party to join the Uruk Army in their quest to slay the dragon...?

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Bridge of Lightning
synopsis: Jil and his party encounter another party that has practically been wiped out in a fierce battle against the ogres. There they manage to rescue an aged warrior called Gigi who was an acclaimed Guardian of the past. They take Gigi to a camping area on the way but are unable to take a moment of rest as they are plagued by one jam after another. One of the party members has a wallet pick-pocketed while a heated argument erupts between Coopa and Melt. In the end, reconciliation seems out of the question as Coopa, disgusted by her petulant master, decides to leave the party to be on her own!

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Ziusudra's Trap
synopsis: On their journey Jil and the others pass a signboard indicating a shortcut. But the "shortcut" turns out to be a series of different traps that hinder their efforts to go forward. While one of the traps causes their gender to switch, the other forces them to wear animal costumes. Subsequently they arrive at the final gate. But getting through that exit door turns out to be harder they had ever imagined!

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Band of the Hand
synopsis: Jil and his party set out on their expedition among the other Climbers and face their first battle. However, their struggle against the powerful foe Kusarakk is harder then they had expected as their teamwork has not yet been refined to say the least. Ahmey is the only member who has experience as a Climber and they follow her confident guidance. They listen to her advice regarding battle strategies and numerous rules of thumb about Climbing. Now equipped with the necessary knowledge and skills, they resume to confront the Kusarakk again.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Before Departure
synopsis: Jil barely escapes from the scene of the King's assassination thanks to the quick-wit of Neeba. The next day, the review of troops by the King goes on as scheduled. At the ceremony, Jil is dumbstruck; before him is none other than King Gilgamesh who he saw murdered the night before! Meanwhile in the city of Meskia, a giant slime that suddenly appeared was causing much havoc. A young girl named Coopa is embodied by the slime but is quickly rescued by Ahmey. When Coopa learns that Jil and the others are "Climbers", she insists on allowing herself and her master, a mage named Melt, to joint their party.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: Meskia, the City in the Tower
synopsis: Because of a blunder during his first battle, Neeba is forced to fire Jil from the group. Though disheartened by the humiliating dismissal, his desire to conquer the evil deity does not wane. As Jil wanders the city of Meskia which is filled with anticipation for the third season of expedition to the Tower, he meets a mysterious girl named Kaaya and a close-mouthed young woman called Ahmey. When Jil learns of the great hero King Gilgamesh's visit to the city, he takes his new friends to watch the procession. There he accidentally comes upon the figure of Neeba in the bustling crowd.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: The Great Tower of Druaga
synopsis: The legendary Tower of Druaga is resurrected eighty years after the hero Gilgamesh has taken it down. In order to destroy the evil deity Druaga, the Kingdom of Uruk dispatches its troops to the tower, but the expedition repeatedly fails in its efforts. A young man named Jil who has been bed by the goddess Ishtar, is awarded a set of brilliant golden amour and a sword from Gilgamesh as tokens to defeat the maumet. Sent off by the cheering crowd, our young hero Jil confidently sets out to confront the evil deity inhabiting the tower. Helped by great friends such as the archer Neeba and a Mage called Fatina, he heads for the uppermost floor of the Tower! less

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK-
title: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Aegis of URUK- Trailer
synopsis: Defeat the demon, save the kingdom - and don't forget those extra lives!

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: Oretachi ni Tsubasa wa
synopsis: Takashi decides to face the truth they have been carrying. With Kakeru's help, Takashi retraces his past with Kobato. When Takashi is nearly crushed by the weight of his past, Kobato shows him kindness.

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: Are you familiar with imoto-moe
synopsis: Having finally awoken, Takashi returns to his ordinary life where he finds Asuka waiting for him. While on their way home together, Asuka invites Takashi up to her room. Once there, Takashi reveals he is not from this world, but from the kingdom of Gretagard. Hearing Takashi's confession, Asuka shows him the truth.

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: Please, Always Be a Fan, Okay?
synopsis: Takashi still has not returned. Hayato and Shusuke continue to spend their days filling in for him. Taking Takashi's place, Hayato attends school and enjoys spending time with Naru. Meanwhile, Shusuke searches for a way to help Hiyoko when someone unexpected shows up at Alexander.

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: My heart is pounding!
synopsis: Shusuke's review of Hiyoko's book appears in a magazine. Hiyoko quietly enjoys the article, but Eriko's harsh criticism brings her down. Shusuke notices a strange relationship between Eriko and Hiyoko. Hayato and Naru's search for her bicycle hits a wall. Just as the two are about to give up, they discover a surprising truth.

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: Is the busty cream girl here yet?
synopsis: With Karura gone, Takashi, Shusuke, and Hayato return to their lives. Everything should have gone back to normal. The incident takes place at Takashi's school. Takashi's trips to Gretagard become more and more frequent as he comes under stress at school. When he reaches his mental breaking point while working on his graduation anthology with Masako, Takashi leaves for Gretagard before a concerned Asuka's eyes.

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: The prestigous king will taste victory!
synopsis: Gauda, Itami Karura returns from the abyss. Born before Takashi, Shusuke, and Hayato, he is the only man Otori Kakeru has ever fallen for. When he finally sees Karura again, Kakeru's excitement reaches its peak. The terrible king's Christmas party turns into a frenzy in the crowded streets of Yanagihara.

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: Eek! Don't, they'll hear me!
synopsis: Martinez is taken to the hospital after he is attacked by a mysterious assailant. When Hayato realizes the culprit is the bishop, feelings of rage begin churning in his heart. Hayato searches Yanagihara by night for the bishop. Sensing someone following him, Hayato prepares for a counterattack--but finds not the bishop, but a concerned Naru. The actual bishop appears and makes his move!

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: The virtuous Lord Hawk!
synopsis: While Takashi leads a peaceful life at school, on a subconscious level, his mind was reaching its limit. When confronted with thought remarks and forced to take on responsibilities, Takashi has a coughing fit, and amidst a golden glow, he departs for Gretagard. Hayato makes his regular appearance at Yanagihara at night, where he finds a crowd in front of the train station. With an ominous feeling, he pushes through the crowd to find... less

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: Dora-san... I think I'm pregnant...
synopsis: While looking for her bicycle, Naru and Hayato run into Ai. A battle for love between two young girls unfolds on Globe Street that night... Even while caught between the girls, Hayato gathers information on the R Wings of the previous night's battle. Shusuke and Hiyoko's relationship slowly begins to improve when they are attacked by a mysterious man wearing a hat. Hiyoko attempts to protect Shusuke, and Shusuke loses consciousness... Their stories intertwine.

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: Kobata-san is Cute
synopsis: While searching the streets at night for a bicycle, Hayato happens across a battle between the YFB and R Wings. What started as games quickly changes with a single shot. Shusuke tries to repair his relationship with Hiyoko, but all his attempts backfire. He gets in an argument with Eriko over Hiyoko's book, and Hiyoko overhears his conversation... Takashi and his younger sister Kobato share breakfast. As usual, their interaction is strangely formal...

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: My Favorite Animal is Pegasus
synopsis: Hayato meets Otori Naru, a young girl searching the streets of Yanagihara for her bicycle at night, and accepts the job. She requests he find her stolen red bicycle. On his way home from receiving a job from editor Yoneda, Shusuke runs into author Tamaizumi Hiyoko. However, Shusuke confuses Hiyoko with another author and makes mistake after mistake. He regains his composure and heads to the mixer at Alexander, but...! Takashi has another peaceful day. He greets his friends, performs his student council duties and chats with his girlfriend Watarai Asuka. He sees a peaceful world through his eyes...

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: A Hypothetical Fairy Tale
synopsis: Poor freeter Chitose Shusuke is spending the day at cafe Alexander again with the regular Kakeru and waitresses Eriko and Kinako when the bartender Karuo suggest they hold a mixer. Narita Hayato prowls Yanagihara at night. He exchanges greetings with the locals while heading to "Paru Crepe" to see if there's any work for his self-managed construction company. Misora Academy student Haneda Takashi has another peaceful day. However, he carries a secret...

anime_name: We, Without Wings - under the innocent sky
title: PV 1
synopsis: In the big city of Yanagihara, the masses of people and buildings make it a bustling place to exist, and it too can take a life of its own and bury and render the beautiful starry sky expression. And yet, people will meet and fall in love here in this city; while that happens everywhere, this is no mundane tale. It may not be a fairytale but it will be a tale to remember nonetheless.” less

title: Stay With Me, Daddy!
synopsis: With everyone else gone, our hero takes on the Great Emperor in the decisive battle. The truth is revealed.

title: Eleventh Day as a Hero: I am a loser. Please let me die.
synopsis: Our hero comes face to face with his own powerness, as the Great Emperor sets his sights on everyone he cares about.

title: Tenth Day as a Superhero "This Episode Is Low on Laughs and Salt Content"
synopsis: The Great Emperor wreaks havoc upon our hero's home. How will Moemoe, Min-chan, and the hero respond?

title: Ninth Day as a Superhero "If You'll Do It, I'll Take off My Underwear Right Away"
synopsis: Prince Moe's plan is put into action, as our hero, Moemoe, and Yamada arrive as dinner guests. Meanwhile, Min-chan finds something surprising...

title: Eighth Day as a Superhero: "I Want Multiple Girlfriends at Once!"
synopsis: The Great Emperor's past and motivations are revealed.

title: Seventh Day as a Superhero: "Inhabitant of the Other World"
synopsis: When a man who looks exactly like our hero shows up, a huge mystery gets solved.

title: Sixth Day as a Superhero: A Somewhat Heart-Racing Development
synopsis: Prince Moemoe is confronted by a woman from his past.

title: Fifth Day as a Superhero: "Quit Patching It Up With Tape"
synopsis: A broken tap forces Min-chan to ask the superhero and his new flatmate for help.

title: Fourth Day as a Superhero: "Eight Different Types of Screams"
synopsis: The alien prince decides to take on the superhero himself in a battle for... the... ages?

title: Third Day as a Superhero: "A Leader Really Must"
synopsis: The aliens figure out that Min-chan is the superhero's weakness and try to attack her, but...

title: Second Day as a Superhero: "Brutal, Brutal, Brutal Death"
synopsis: Earth's superhero must fend off many threats — his perverted neighbor, invading aliens, and the boy making moves on his daughter.

title: First Day as a Superhero
synopsis: The strained relationship between an attractive ladies' man and his only daughter gets even worse when he becomes a superhero... with an unexpected side-effect.

title: Mi is for Me and You and Everyone
synopsis: Will any conclusion be reached among these supremely chaotic relationships? Or has nothing changed at all? No, no, perhaps the changes just aren't visible...

title: Everyone and Summer Vacation - Part 2
synopsis: Something good always happens in the wake of something bad? Don't assume summer vacation will last forever.

title: Everyone and Summer Vacation - Part 1
synopsis: Some lazy, some efficient... everyone handles summer vacation in their own way. Where good things happen, so shall bad things as well...

title: Shaky Loves and Horror! A Midsummer's Nightmare!!
synopsis: The whole gang decides to check out a haunted house, each with their own high expectations. Thrilling and chilling developments only accelerate the chaos...

title: Soul Brother and Real Brothers
synopsis: As if Yoshioka weren't enough of a handful, now it turns out he's Atsushi's brother?! Another unexpected new character joins the mix, bringing further chaos to the Miyagawa family and friends...

title: Tiny and Days of Anguish
synopsis: After constantly suffering at the whims of Yoshioka, Makoto Kobayashi - also known as Tiny - finally resorts to his trump card...

title: Take and Job Hunting!
synopsis: The next-door neighbor, Take, has a tendency to quit jobs as soon as his workplaces romances go awry. But today, something is different...

title: Atsushi and the White-Spotted Longhorn Beetle
synopsis: Sayo is stressing over the feelings she has for Atsushi that never reach him, when suddenly...

title: Atsushi and the Student Teacher, Miss Kawauchi
synopsis: The new student teacher, Miss Kawauchi, tries to make a move on Atsushi...

title: Inborn Nature and Illegality
synopsis: The little girl lover by nature, Yoshioka, makes his official appearance... as does the long-suffering Kobayashi.

title: Sayo and Shelter from the Rain
synopsis: Even though she knows he's a child, poor Sayo still can't help how she feels about Atsushi.

title: Recorder and Ransel Mi
synopsis: Atsumi stresses over height gaps, Atsushi gets taken into custody by a female cop whenever he's with Hina, Sayo has her eye on Atsushi... Those days are back again. But this time, a new character is sneaking up on Atsumi...

title: Recorder and Ransel Mi
synopsis: Q & A!

title: Atsushi and Bye-Byes
synopsis: Atsumi, Atushi, and Sayo enjoy a nice meal out.

title: Atsushi and Chases
synopsis: A simple game of hide and seeks leads to the arrest of Atushi.

title: Big Sister and Little Sister
synopsis: Sayo mentions to Atsumi she has always wanted a little sister.

title: Atsushi and Culture Fairs
synopsis: Atushi and his friends visit the culture fair happening at Atsumi’s school.

title: Atsushi and Hand-Me-Downs
synopsis: A sleepy Atsumi allows Atushi to pick out his own clothes for the day. Atushi picks a shirt that makes him look like a Ninja, right?

title: Misunderstandings and Truth
synopsis: Sayo visits Atsumi the day after the sports festival, while there the truth finally comes out

title: Atsushi and Sports Day - Part 2
synopsis: Atushi’s sports day continues with Atsumi getting mistaken for on the elementary students.

title: Atsushi and Sports Day - Part 1
synopsis: With Atushi’s sports day coming up he needs a family member to participate in the family events. Will it be Mom with her sudden hip pain, Dad with his knee acting up, or Atsumi?

title: Family and Hot Springs
synopsis: A family trip to the hot springs causes problems for Atsumi that will require help from Atushi.

title: Pastries and Cheering
synopsis: Atsumi went a little overboard in the kitchen prepping for Atushi and his friends. Sayo drops by and weeps for the wrong person.

title: Atsushi and his Dream
synopsis: Atushi and Atsumi discuss what type of job they would like in the future, Take gives an interesting suggestion.

title: Atsushi and the Bike
synopsis: Atushi’s friends are helping him ride his bike without training wheels. It should be easy, right?

title: The New Students and the Misunderstanding
synopsis: The new students mistake Atushi for a teacher, and Atsumi has to deal with the whispers of the new students.

title: Flower Viewing and Siblings
synopsis: Atsushi and Atsumi stumble upon a Ms. Moriyama, who is very drunk; she takes this opportunity to express some feelings with Atsushi

title: Atsushi and Misunderstandings
synopsis: It is safety week and Atushi’s teacher encourages him to make himself known to the police and volunteers. What can possibly go wrong?

title: Atsushi and the Library
synopsis: Atsumi has sent Atsushi to the library to finish his summer homework. Saya is also at there and the misunderstandings continue.

title: Atsushi and White Day
synopsis: Atushi has to return the favor from Valentine Day but with so many girls, he will have to rely on Atsumi.

title: Take and Finding a Job
synopsis: Takeni has quit his job again and searches for comfort and sympathy from Atushi and Atsumi.

title: Atsushi and the Doll Festival
synopsis: Hina has invited Atsushi to her doll festival, but deciding what to wear and meeting Hina’s mom are his biggest problems.

title: Movies and Misunderstandings
synopsis: Atsumi won tickets to the movies and Atushi begs her to go. Also going is Sayo; she is finally getting her chance to meet the little brother.

title: Atsushi and Chocolate
synopsis: Valentine day approaches and Atushi’s friends prep to help him eat his expected haul of chocolate.

title: Atsushi and the Bean-Throwing Festival
synopsis: Atsushi has to dress up as demon for the winter solstice bean throwing. Atsushi is proving to be a very good demon, almost too good.

title: Atsushi and Grade School
synopsis: The new teacher, Nukimura is uncomfortable with Atushi… size. But it’s not just Nukimura, the local P.T. doesn’t understand him.

title: Sayo and Atsumi
synopsis: Atsumi and Sayo discuss their age and ideal man.

title: Atsumi and the Everyday
synopsis: Atsumi is constantly teased, questioned, and misunderstood because of her height. But at home she is just an ordinary girl, with an ordinary bother.

title: Atsushi and Atsumi
synopsis: Atsushi is worried about his upcoming recorder test. However, after he tries to show off to his classmate, he might have greater troubles.

title: Wish Upon a Star
synopsis: The hotel's guests and employees alike write their wishes on strips to hang on the bamboo tree for the Star Festival. Will their wishes come true?

title: Satou-san is Off Today
synopsis: Satou-san, the security guard and poster girl for Sparrow's Hotel, hasn't been seen in a while. Has she disappeared, never to return?

title: The Day the Storms Arise
synopsis: A storm slows down hotel business as many guests cancel their reservations. But what will this storm really bring to Sparrow's Hotel?

title: Sudden Comic Event
synopsis: The staff of Sparrow's Hotel are thrilled to see the hotel suddenly packed with guests. But their visitors this time are a bit different from the norm...

title: The Infiltrator Returns
synopsis: A new transfer joins the staff.

title: The New Sparrow's Hotel Has Begun
synopsis: Sparrow's Hotel is undergoing renovations to attract a new customer base, and among the construction workers is a somewhat unusual character. How will Satou contend with him?

title: Both My Hotel and My Wallet Are in a Slump
synopsis: Golden Week is over and business has slowed down at Sparrow's Hotel, leaving everyone with empty wallets at the end of the month. What will Manager Tamaki do about this predicament?

title: Golden Week!
synopsis: In the hotel industry, Golden Week isn't all about fun times. Manager Shiokawa is raring to go, but all Misono feels is dread. So, what crazy incidents will befall Sparrow's Hotel during Golden Week?!

title: Kojou "S" On the Scene
synopsis: Kojou from hotel service checks into Sparrow's Hotel under cover as a guest to secretly check on the staff's competency. But it seems Satou has sensed... murderous intent?

title: Cherry Blossom Viewing Rocks!
synopsis: The employees of Sparrow's Hotel go out to enjoy a day of cherry blossom viewing. When Satou Sayuri stands up to entertain the crowd, their reactions are...

title: Large Breasts and Assassination
synopsis: Shiokawa Tomoki, the front desk manager of Sparrow's Hotel, was short on staff and decided to recruit a new employee. The one to respond was Satou Sayuri, who declared that her strong points were "large breasts and assassination." So Shiokawa decided to give her a try...

title: The Invincible Front Desk Lady
synopsis: On a chaotic, sometimes dangerous downtown block sits an orderly, peaceful hotel. And in that hotel...

title: The Color Of Ripe Golden Grains
synopsis: Kyrie talks about his past to Caramia and Scarlet, but once he’s finished, he tells them it was all a lie. Axel emerges to see Caramia on the ground and Kyrie holding a water gun. Kyrie has doused Caramia, fully knowing he hates water...

title: Substitute
synopsis: Caramia substitutes for Kyrie and helps Scarlet study for his exam. On the way home, they are greeted by Caesar. Caramia points out Scarlet has changed and isn’t afraid of Caesar anymore.

title: Hazardous Materials
synopsis: Scarlet is forced to make a promise with Axel about not telling the other students about his sweet tooth. As Scarlet reassures Axel he won’t tell a soul, Ande interrupts them. Ande threatens them to buy box of matches or else she’ll spread rumors about their secret conversation...

title: Field Trip
synopsis: Scarlet is out in town for a field trip and wanders around to see where he can pass the time. A boy named Alfani drags him to a butler café saying it’s a perfect place to pass the time. A man named Dorian Gray tries to force Scarlet in the café, but So, the headmaster of Oz Academy, interferes...

title: The Student Council President
synopsis: While walking down the hallway, Scarlet is called by the class president, Pashet. She demands a report regarding the gardening club which Scarlet has no clue. Scarlet sees Kyrie walking by and calls him to clear things out, but Kyrie looks annoyed for some reason...

title: Donuts
synopsis: Scarlet visits the nurse’s office to check on his teachers only to find... a lion? While trying to figure out where Caramia is, a scarecrow and a tin-man appear to make the matter more confusing. As the masked man, Robin Hood, explains about the teacher’s special powers, Hameln walks in...

title: Attack
synopsis: Caramia, Kyrie, and Axel are preparing for the attack by the Grimm Academy, but somehow, Scarlet is involved as well. Kyrie hands Scarlet a sniper rifle and tells him to participate in the battle. As Scarlet tells Kyrie he’s never even seen a gun before, the students of the Grimm Academy, Hansel and Gretel appears...

title: The Letter
synopsis: Scarlet and Bercy are walking to school when they bump into Judie. He’s been dumped by a girl again, but he feels he will succeed in getting a girlfriend soon. Scarlet wonders if he himself will ever have a girlfriend when a mysterious girl appears with a letter and a gift...

title: The Cafeteria
synopsis: Scarlet forgets his lunch and decides to buy lunch at the cafeteria. There, he meets a larger-than-life cafeteria lady. She tells Scarlet to call her "Big sister." Scarlet finds a vacant seat by the window, but someone was already at that table...

title: Remedial Club
synopsis: As Scarlet gets ready for Kyrie’s club, his classmate Bercy starts talking to him. Scarlet admits he didn’t recognize Bercy and feels guilty. When Scarlet arrives in the teacher’s office, Kyrie tells him to sit on Axel’s chair...

title: Remedy
synopsis: Concerned about the difficult classes, Scarlet tries to consult with Caramia. But before he can ask, Kyrie comes to confront Caramia. Kyrie suggests Scarlet to join his club if he wants to raise his grades.

title: Welcome to Oz Academy
synopsis: Today is the 1st day of Oz School for Scarlet. Worried about his new environment, Scarlet gets lost in the forest while walking towards the school. Fortunately, he finds someone and tries to ask him for direction, but the guy takes out two swords?!

title: The Sunshine Song
synopsis: Every year the second years participate in the "workplace experience." When the boys discover the Hidamari Kindergarten they attended is on the list, they all agree to visit. While the boys have not visited in a while, the place has not changed. Shun and the others feel nostalgic, and Kaname feels nervous at the thought of meeting Kaori-sensei again. As Chizuru observes the scene, an acorn falls directly on his head! Terrorized by the brats Ken-chan and Sono-chan, will the boys finish their workplace experience without any trouble?

title: Middle School Diary
synopsis: After Shun receives a call from his younger brother Fuyuki after school, the boys make a trip to their old middle school. Extremely curious about Shun's younger brother, Chizuru cannot conceal his surprise when he discovers Fuyuki is the complete opposite of his brother. The rest of the boys are impressed by how much Fuyuki has grown. Recently, Fuyuki got himself a girlfriend, and the boys demand to see her. Fuyuki leads them to the kendo dojo where they participate in the kendo club together.

title: Crescent Moon Silhouette
synopsis: When the boys end up in the school cafeteria, they meet the beautiful and hardworking Hanayo wearing her apron and bandana. With the weather growing too cold to eat outside, the boys happily agree to eat lunch indoors, but Yuki does not share their excitement. He has been collecting stickers from bags of bread and hopes to redeem them for a plate. Later, Yuki witnesses Hanayo eatingi bread during the break. Yuki learns they are both collecting the same stickers, giving rise to a strange relationship between the two.

title: On Your Mark
synopsis: Today is the cultural festival and everybody is doing their part. Masaki is practicing hard as her role as the mouse in Cinderella to impress Shun.

title: Naked King
synopsis: With the arrival of fall, the students of Homare High School busy themselves with preparations for the cultural festival. Class representative and student council president Kaname runs around, trying to stay on top of all his responsibilities. When Chizuru and Yuki goof off, Kaname's annoyance reaches its peak, and Kaname realizes he's forgotten to prepare an important item for the festival.

title: Daily Wage Hero/Senpai and Me
synopsis: As an official member of the manga club, underclassman Matsushita-kun asks Yuki to draw a manga for him. Preferring to read rather than write, Yuki suggests they have a manga drawing relay. The relay begins with Chizuru's excitement and Kaname's disappointment. Each will have the chance to show off his drawing skills.

title: Next to an Apple
synopsis: Yuta receives a confession of love from his classmate Takahashi-san. Having coincidentally witnessed the event, his friends anxiously await Yuta's answer. Feeling a little lonely when Yuta walks home with Takahashi-san without warning, the boys decide to follow them.

title: Glasses and Et Cetera
synopsis: With summer ending, the boys gather at Kaname's house to finish their homework. Inspired by his own study tools, Chizuru asks Kaname when he began wearing classes. Thinking he looked terrible in glasses, Kaname recalls how he refused to wear them in front of his friends.

title: One Summer
synopsis: Now that summer vacation has started, Chizuru wants to play, but Yuki and Kaname won't hang out with him. At Shun's suggestion, they invite the boys and Masaki to a summer festival. Masaki acts rudely to an excited Chizuru. Unimpressed be her behavior, Chizuru noticing something in her expression toward Shun.

title: Noisy Medicine
synopsis: Koichi question about childhood friends dug up old memories from Kaname; from when Koichi was a volunteer teacher at Kaname's kindergarten and his first love rival.

title: The Straw-colored Boy
synopsis: A transfer student arrives in Yuki and Kaname's class. The blond boy's name is "Tachibana Chizuru." The cheerful Chizuru approaches Yuki and suddenly announces they once played together in their childhood. While Yuki typically ignores others, Chizuru's strange introduction has Yuki running to Yuta's class during his break. Is Chizuru telling the truth?

title: The Day the Tulips Bloomed
synopsis: A young girl with a scraped knee suddenly appears before Shun. He tries to give her a flowery band-aid, but she runs away. Despite his shock, Shun chases after her and manages to give her a band-aid, but starting the next day, she begins harassing him...

title: On our 17th Spring
synopsis: A beautiful spring. As usual, new Homare High School second years Shuta, Yuki, Kaname and Shun head to school under the sakura in full bloom. Kaname sets out to fill the gaps of his classmate Yuki's high school experience by forcing him to join a club.

title: Rainbow Gate
synopsis: Rina gains a huge advantage over Rio, but Rio starts to rally, as the two put their Roll Rulers to the test. Rio takes Rina and Joker into her Roll Ruler world, where secrets cannot be hidden.

title: Speculation
synopsis: Rio vs. Rina-the battle of the century rapidly approaches. At Howard's suggestion, Rio and her friends visit a beautiful resort on the coast. While her friends enjoy themselves in the hot springs playing ping pong, Rio heads by herself to a summer home outside the town where she once spent time with Rina and her mother. As the pleasant memories come back to life in her mind, an surprising figure watches her.

title: Number Ten
synopsis: Rio acquires two gates after defeating Dana in a gate battle. Having regained her confidence, Rio and her friends triumphantly enter Goldschmidt Kingdom. While buying back the casino with their winnings, Mint's stuffed bear Choco goes missing. Their search for Choco is interrupted by Cartia's henchman "Number Ten", the Yang Yang and An An combo!

title: Reverse
synopsis: Rio, Howard and Dana find themselves in an empty street, the creation of the mysterious Joker's roll ruler. Roll ruler manipulates the luck of others and controls the game. When Rio accepts Joker's challenge and suffers a losing streak at the mercy of his roll ruler, Rio recalls an incident with Rina from her childhood. Will Rio escape from Joker's world?

title: Joker
synopsis: Rio and her childhood friend Rina's battle ends with Rina's victory. Cartia takes over Howard Resort and leaves everyone to float aimly in Sky Resort. Having lost all her gates and betrayed by Rina, Rio finds herself broken. Rio polishes a roulette by herself in the abandoned hall when a mysterious customer appears! Rio's fight for her recovery begins! less

title: Ace
