synopsis: With Jack's help, Mint and Linda fight to take back control of Sky Resort. Meanwhile, Rio challenges Cartia's third henchman, King. The powerful King recommends a coin toss, but a devious trick hides behind the simplicity of the game. With Rina taken hostage, can the cornered Rio win this challenge? What is Cartia's trump card?

title: Ant Lion
synopsis: Cartia's henchmen give Rio no time to rest. Her next opponent is the "Merci Queen", a skilled sniper. Rio competes against her in Sky Resort's "Sky Jumping Shooting". While the two are evenly matched, Rio falls under increasing pressure from Cartia's tricks. Meanwhile, Mint searches for Jack to find information on Cartia. less

title: Roll Ruler
synopsis: The person behind Linda's hacking is the female casino owner rapidly acquiring power through force, Cartia. Seeking to make Howard Resort her own, she challenges Rio to a gate battle against her own employee, Jack. Without even any knowledge about the appearance of her opponent, Rio cannot hide her anxiety as the battle approaches. While trying to help Rio, Mint meets a young boy with unusual powers.

title: Sky Resort
synopsis: Sky Resort at the peak of the island's mountain is finally open! Howard orders Rio and the others to work at Sky Resort. From the vast casino floor to the hologram theater and the thrilling extreme slider, the resort is full of various cutting edge attractions. They cannot believe their eyes when they meet Linda, the robot dealer of the flying resort. However, a group of suspicious figures have their eyes on Rio during the grand opening ceremony.

title: Sisters
synopsis: Rio's childhood friend Rina arrives at Howard Resort as a new dealer. Delighted by their reunion, Rio shows her around the island. While taking in the various sights together, Rio recalls the time they spent together as children... After spying on the pair get along so well, Howard creates a new event to bring excitement to his resort: a disc shoot out between Rio and Rina!

title: Misery
synopsis: Howard Resort prepares for the opening on new facilities! However, the hotel and casino "Misery Castle" comes with rumors of ghosts. As the castle is prepared for its opening, strange events begin happening. Disappearing wings, sudden blackouts, and a woman wearing a red dress... In their investigation, Rio and Ania find clues that point to the castle's previous owner, Misery, as the culprit of the incidents...

title: Gate Holder
synopsis: Newbie dealer Ania Fortuna arrives at Howard Resort. Assigned to train Ania, Rio is impressed by her card shuffling skills. However, she is exceptionally clumsy...Meanwhile, the arrogant Elvis shows up at the resort casino with an entourage of women. As gate holder, one who holds one of only thirteen rare gate cards in the world, he challenges Rio, also a gate holder, to a duel for her card.

title: Goddess of Victory
synopsis: Mint Clark arrives at Howard Resort with her multimillionaire grandfather. Tired of amusement parks and beaches, Mint spots the beautiful dealer Rio, also known as the "Goddess of Victory." While Mint is captivated by her smile, a man named Orlin Dunhill appears before them and attempts to steal Mint's precious stuffed bear. Rio must play poker to save Mint.

title: Introduction
synopsis: Introductory Video

synopsis: Yukatas, shaved ice, and fireworks; It's a summer festival.

title: Nekoyama-san and the Sick Day
synopsis: A fever induced dream has real world effects.

title: Nekoyama-san and Pool Opening
synopsis: Everyone is excited for the pool opening except for a ghost and a cat.

title: Inugami-san and a Lovers' Quarrel
synopsis: A lovers' quarrel for all the animals to see.

title: Nekoyama-san and Torikai-san
synopsis: A beautiful ghost makes herself known.

synopsis: We're late! We're totally late!

title: Nekoyama-san and Karaoke
synopsis: Nekoyama first time at karaoke is full of surprises.

title: Nekoyama-san and Glasses
synopsis: Don't be ridiculous! Glasses are what you need!

title: Nekoyama-san and Catnip Tea
synopsis: Inugami's perfect plan has hit one major snag...

title: Ushiwaka-san and Nezu-san
synopsis: A mousey girl and... cow?

title: Inugami-san and Nekoyama-san
synopsis: Inugami is a dog-like person who loves cats. Nekoyama is a cat-like person who loves dogs.

title: Until We Come 'Round Again
synopsis: So long, round cat.

title: Round the End of the Year
synopsis: What do you do to celebrate the end of the year?

synopsis: The 50th Episode Reference-loaded Extravaganza! Hya~

title: Sneeze Three Times, Take Three Spheres
synopsis: Hide is sick and Poyo is there to help.

title: With Love and Spheres
synopsis: How do you stay warm in the winter?

title: The Sphere of Warring States, Round 2
synopsis: Moe has been transported back to warring states era and she is getting married?!

title: The Sphere of Warring States, Round 1
synopsis: Moe has been transported back to warring states era.

title: It Was a Sphere Tastier Than a Chestnut
synopsis: Meat, potatoes, and a little weight gain.

title: Round, Round, Grumble and Frown
synopsis: A cat never forgives and never forgets.

title: Read, See, Sphere
synopsis: Does Poyo have what it takes to be a model?

title: I Found a Tiny Sphere
synopsis: All about Daifuku!

title: A Fighting Sphere Shot!
synopsis: How strong are the members of the Sato family?

title: As Autumn Deepens, What Does the Sphere Do?
synopsis: The colder air makes everyone a bit rounder.

title: It Was a Sphere Like a Lantern
synopsis: Living with Poyo pays off at the sports fest and Papa Sato doesn’t fool around with thieves.

title: Because the World is So Round
synopsis: What would happen if Poyo went to space… or was from space?

title: Fur Everywhere, Spheres Everywhere
synopsis: It's all about pet hair and beauty salons.

title: The Sphere Circled Round or Whatever
synopsis: Moe has an obvious addiction to all that is round.

title: Next to the Sphere Was Another Sphere
synopsis: It is the season for Chrysanthemum.

title: Rumble, Flash, Spheres Pouring Down
synopsis: The weather turns the conversation into a game of “What If”?

title: The Lantern Festival Should Be Round
synopsis: Chikuba~ Chikuba~ Poyo~ Poyo~ Hya~

title: Round Summer Mystery
synopsis: A monk has come to perform a Buddhist memorial service and runs into Poyo.

title: The Roundest Day of the Summer
synopsis: Cucumbers, watermelons, and snakes all make for great summer snacks.

title: Aloha Sphere
synopsis: The heat is bad and everybody is dealing with it in their own special way.

title: Summer All A-Round
synopsis: The summer season continues and we focus this time on Kurobe and Hide.

title: The Summer-Colored Sphere
synopsis: Summer has come and everyone handles it a different way.

title: The Bamboo Leaves Rustle in the Spheres
synopsis: Cats and Humans a like enjoy Tanabata.

title: Spherely-Poly
synopsis: Food can be a power weapon or super cute, as everything is better when it looks like Poyo!

title: Let's Do Some Sphere-ious Tidying
synopsis: The Sato household is on a cleaning spree!

title: Rain and Toads on Spheres
synopsis: During the rainy season cabin fever sets in and guardian spirit comes out.

title: Drizzle, Drizzle, Sphere, Sphere
synopsis: Everybody spends their time different on a rainy day, animals and humans alike.

title: Sphere Magistrate
synopsis: Poyo is the unofficial ruler of the neighborhood, but what happens when one of this subjects become a temporary housemate?

title: The Sphere's Habits
synopsis: We get a peek into the favorite phrases and habits of cat owners.

title: Mysterious Sphere
synopsis: A sudden phone call causes Moe to run out of the house leaving her Papa worried. And Yuka-san provides great story material for Hide.

title: Sphere Baldness
synopsis: A new house is being built in the area where the cats like to play; Poyo gets himself in a sticky situation.

title: A Real Ladies' Sphere
synopsis: A new cat is in the neighborhood causing unexpected trouble for Poyo.

title: The Sphere Weather
synopsis: Moe attempts to create a Poyo steamed cake, Grandma learns to appreciate her Kuro, and Poyo might be a superhero!

title: The Sphere Fights
synopsis: The Legacy of Poyo continues around the neighborhood, but does anyone know what he is?

title: Sphere Snapshots
synopsis: Moe is determined to get Poyo into cat magazines. Every one offers their own version of what it will take to make it happen.

title: The Hated Sphere
synopsis: The Sato’s have new neighbors, the Tanakas. The Wife, Yuka is afraid of animals; how will she react to Poyo?

title: The Sphere of Blessings
synopsis: Spring is here, it’s time to show a little skin, be a little lazy, and suffer from allergies.

title: The Season of the Sphere
synopsis: It is strawberry season and an old friend is back of Poyo’s is back. Hide, Moe, and Maki are enlisted to work at Akai’s Strawberry Field.

title: The Sphere is Nice and Warm
synopsis: When spring arrives the routines change around the household. Let’s check in with Poyo’s family and see how they are handling the season change.

title: The Sphere Stood Up
synopsis: Moe explains the various tricks and behavior of Poyo. The other pet owners share the quirks of Kuro, Tsuku, and Daifuku.

title: The Sphere Has Been Waiting for You
synopsis: Granny has won an overnight trip to a hot spring but is reluctant to leave Kuro alone. Hide agrees to watch Kuro and Poyo, so Moe and Granny can enjoy the trip.

title: Come, Sphere
synopsis: Moe and works out during the winter season, Poyo gives up his secret base, and a girl will wear anything in the cold to look cute.

title: Snow Falling on Spheres
synopsis: Kurobe, the cat next door, is missing. The old lady next door has enlisted the Sato family and friends to help find him.

title: When With a Sphere, Do as the Sphere Does!
synopsis: Poyo is acting as a surrogate mother for the orphaned kittens, while the Saito’s search for adopters. But spending time with Poyo, each kitten is developing a unique trait.

title: Come In, Sphere
synopsis: It is the start of the New Year, and traditional beans thrown for Setsubun affect the pets of Moe, Maki, and Suzuki differently.

title: The Sphere's Three Neighbors
synopsis: Poyo earns the respect of the owners Farmer’s Market, and we meet Hide’s classmates Maki and Suzuki.

title: The Sphere and Kuro
synopsis: Poyo has a new cat friend, Kurobe, and shows Hide why he is so dashing.

title: Forever With the Sphere
synopsis: Moe continues her narrative about the Sato family and Poyo’s mysterious nature.

title: All About Maru the Cat...
synopsis: Moe meets Maru after passing out on the street. What is this mysterious creature?

title: Inferno Cop "Die Hollen Polizei" Karaoke
synopsis: Inferno Cop "Die Hollen Polizei" Karaoke

title: Let's search for tomorrow
synopsis: Inferno Cop was always in search of a neverending hope for tomorrow...

title: Fact File 12
synopsis: Claudia

title: Condemn the Evil, Part 2
synopsis: The being that is both Alpha and Omega appears. At last, it's the final chapter of Inferno Cop!

title: Fact File 11
synopsis: 3rd Destroy Finale

title: Condemn the Evil, Part 1
synopsis: Inferno Cop returns to Jack Knife Edge Town. It would be the beginning of the end of everything.

title: Fact File 10
synopsis: Khnum-Khufu

title: King's Intervention
synopsis: Inferno Cop had finally arrived at the pyramid. Can he succeed in unlocking the royal family's mysteries?

title: Fact File 09
synopsis: Malt Loaf

title: Rest in peace, my friend
synopsis: After losing Hellfire Boy, Inferno Cop has lost hope and fallen into depression. Will he ever be able to stand on his own feet again...?

title: Fact File 08
synopsis: Hellfire Boy

title: Accelerating Spirit
synopsis: Inferno Cop meets a boy who calls himself Hellfire Boy. He carries the flames of Hell within him, as well...

title: Fact File 07
synopsis: Auntie Grenda

title: Inferno, an incident in Hell
synopsis: After Inferno Cop and Mecha Cop become false gods, a real god appears before them.

title: Fact File 06
synopsis: Dilosmonotolcoltsaurus

title: From the Ancient Village
synopsis: Inferno Cop transverses space-time with his archenemy Mecha Cop. All is for the sake of taking back the present.

title: Fact File 05
synopsis: Mecha Cop

title: The Apocalyptic World
synopsis: After escaping from the hospital of the secret society Southern Cross, Inferno Cop sees a completely transfigured world.

title: Fact File 04
synopsis: High Pirest Trio

title: Escape from Nightmare
synopsis: The paddy wagon carrying Inferno Cop away after being found guilty plunges into a ravine. When Inferno Cop awakens, a mysterious character stands nearby...

title: Fact File 03
synopsis: Mister Judge

title: Proof of Justice
synopsis: The guardian of the law, Mr. Judge, has charged Inferno Cop with infanticide. A battle in the courtroom is about to begin.

title: Fact File 02
synopsis: Baby

title: Deep Blue Baby
synopsis: When Jack Knife Edge Town is suddenly transformed into ocean, a new life lets out its first cry.

title: Fact File 01
synopsis: Inferno Cop

title: The Badge from Hell
synopsis: Justice has grown corrupt and evil runs rampant in Jack Knife Edge Town. The tortured gasps of the weak resound again today...

title: Final Tournament - Part 2
synopsis: Arashi vs. Tetsunishiki. Two old friends battle for the championship, to prove themselves as the strongest sumo wrestler in the world. Arashi is up against his toughest opponent, but will Tetsunishiki's body hold up long enough to claim victory?

title: Final Tournament - Part 1
synopsis: The final tournament is here, and Arashi is making good use of all the techniques he's learned from his travels, racking up an unbeaten record. His friend and rival also cannot be touched, but even outside of the ring he acts cold to his old friend. Arashi is worried that Te-chan has become a whole different person in the year he's been away...

title: Tokyo Tournament
synopsis: Arashi returns to Tokyo, summoned there for a rematch with his childhood friend, Tetsunishiki by his sumo boss, Coach. But when he arrives, he realizes that he has only learned 47 of the 48 secret techniques! To obtain the final piece, Arashi must defeat a legendary Yokozuna in Sumo history... Coach himself.

title: Hawaii Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is chilling out in Hawaii, when he sees a local surfer popular with all the girls. Arashi dismisses him as a flirt picking up girls and calls surfing silly, and Duke challenges him to show his skills on the surfboard.

title: Australia Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is in Australia after Hoho mentions he heard one of the 48 secret techniques is there. Not having any other clues, Arashi stumbles upon a kangaroo ranch, where he gets to fight an opponent far stronger than any human...

title: Macao Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is drawn to the glittering lights of Macao's casinos, and runs into an old friend, Badri! The two of them get on a huge winning streak, and attract the attention of the owner of the casino, the genius gambler Hoho, who invites Arashi for a personal duel...

title: China Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is in China, and is mistaken for Zhuge Liang by Liu Long and his followers Fei Chang and Yu Guan. Arashi volunteers to go to ask Qiān Sun to form an alliance with Liu Long in order to defeat the evil Chancellor Cao Cāng Cāng. Can Arashi help unite the country?

title: Korea Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is in Korea, which means Korean food! While chowing down the local cuisine, he overhears a tearful scene between two lovers, split apart by circumstance.

title: Mongolia Tournament
synopsis: Arashi finds himself in Mongolia, a rival country in the sport of sumo wrestling, but something seems amiss in the village. It seems a single man has been going around challenging all the villages to a sumo bout with the entire village on the line! Arashi heads out to stop this person, and to learn from a powerful foe.

title: Thailand Tournament
synopsis: Arashi arrives in Thailand, and gets picked up by a tour guide in a Tuk-Tuk taxi. After seeing a giant Buddha and riding an elephant, he's taken to see some Thai boxing. Inspired, Arashi challenges the King of the Super Heavyweights, Pappon!

title: India Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is in India, and of course the first thing on his plate is curry. But into the same restaurant walks Shaiva, a dancing star with an incredible appetite. Arashi meets up with Shaiva again near the Ganges River, but an encounter with a cobra puts him and Shaiva is a tight spot! Can Arashi learn that sometimes you have to destroy yourself to overcome your own limits?

title: Abu Dhabi Tournament
synopsis: Arashi sees a young boy being bullied on the street and saves him. The boy is so impressed that he asks Arashi if he can be his disciple! But the boy's father turns out to be Badri, the world's greatest oil baron.

title: South Africa Tournament
synopsis: Arashi comes upon a diamond mine and gets caught up in an attack by a group of armed smugglers. What's worth more: A 32 carat diamond or a human life?

title: Kenya Tournament
synopsis: Arashi marvels at the natural beauty of the savanna, that is, until a lion almost eats him! Saved by the head of the local village, Elmoran, Arashi helps hunt Big Daddy, a giant lion that's been attacking people.

title: Egypt Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is wandering in the desert, desperately searching for some water, when he comes across some giant pyramids being built. He helps with the construction in exchange for some water, and meets King Phara-oh. But when Cleonpatran shows up, Phara-oh runs off for some reason...

title: Turkey Tournament
synopsis: Arashi ventures into Istanbul, where he heads to a local sauna for a bath. But he runs into the divine oily god of Turkish Sumo, Ozman. Which Sumo with rein supreme?! Watch out, Arashi... He's a slippery one!

title: Greece Tournament
synopsis: Arashi pays a visit to the Parthenon and stumbles upon a meeting of the gods. Sent as a representative of humanity to Hades, Arashi must convince Hadus, the lord of the underworld, that humanity is worth saving. This might be one bout Arashi can't win through force...

title: Romania Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is lost in a dark forest somewhere in Romania, when he comes across a kind young woman who offers to let him rest in her house. It seems that she's just happy to finally have a visitor she can talk to... Or rather, suck from?

title: Russia Tournament
synopsis: Arashi goes for a swim in a heated pool to warm up from the cold of the Moscow's winter, when he encounters a group of synchronized swimmers. The leader of the group, Elschenko, tries to recruit Arashi into the group, but he thinks the sport is too feminine. Arashi soon learns that displays of grace require incredible strength out of sight.

title: Finland Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is in Finland on Christmas Eve, when he happens upon Santa's workshop! Arashi is eager to help deliver presents but Santa seems somewhat different than how he had imagined him to be...

title: Sweden Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is going for a walk in Sweden when suddenly a nearby house explodes! Sir Nobelson, a scientist inventor, has finally completed his greatest invention, dynamite, to help his friend finish building a tunnel. But there are people who would use such power for evil in this world...

title: Austria Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is invited to a feast at the Austrian court in honor of his victory at the Champion's Tournament, and he runs into the world's greatest composer, Mozun. The ever polite Arashi is asked to help teach Mozun some manners, but ends up becoming the inspiration for his latest symphony instead.

title: Champion's Tournament - Conclusion
synopsis: Mikoshiarashi vs. Porunga, Gugliel vs. Julius! It's the semi-finals and final match-up in the Champion's Tournament, and only the warrior who can master not only his own power, but that of the heavens itself may prevail. Fight on, Naked Wolves!

title: Champion's Tournament - Finals
synopsis: Arashi has gotten past the tournament preliminaries, and the 8 finalists pair off in the quarter-finals. Nachopulco, Gugliel, and Arashi up against Porunga, Gargon, and Usshishi! Who will make it to the semi-finals?

title: Champion's Tournament - Preliminaries
synopsis: Arashi enters a tournament taking place in the Colosseum to determine the greatest warrior in all of Europe. With over 100 fierce warriors vying for the title, an incredible free for-all begins to pick the 8 finalists.

title: Love Tournament
synopsis: Arashi arrives in Italy, and tries to find his childhood friend Hikaru-chan, who he heard was in the country. Arashi makes a scene and spots Hikaru-chan in the crowd, but she runs away, leading him to the Colosseum. What could Hikaru-chan be trying to tell Arashi?

title: Switzerland Tournament
synopsis: Arashi's in Switzerland, the land of banks, but plum out of cash. Heading to a bank to withdraw some money, Arashi is caught up in an attempted robbery, and meets Meister, a master Swiss watchmaker. Meister helps Arashi with a complete tune-up: Of both his watch, and his body.

title: Alps Tournament
synopsis: Arashi meets up with a small girl and helps her carry some heavy bags back to her cabin in the Alps. Inside the cabin, however, is a familiar face...

title: Hesse Tournament
synopsis: In search of a local map, Arashi encounters a strange fellow who throws him into the world of a fairy tale! Can Arashi live happily ever after?

title: Stuttgart Tournament
synopsis: Entering Germany for the first time, Arashi feels like having a beer, but gets in a car accident while trying to save a puppy. Arashi is fine, but the car is another story... Can the genius car engineer Merben analyze the secret behind what makes Arashi's body so strong?

title: Scotland Tournament
synopsis: Outside a stately mansion, Arashi is caught up in a murder investigation. Can the ultimate detective, Holmeslock, solve the crime and prove Arashi's innocence?

title: London Tournament
synopsis: After running into a funny, boy-like character in a London pub, Arashi is taken to "pure heart land," an island where kids never grow up. But just as he arrives, the evil Captain Hoo-kun appears...

title: Bourgogne Tournament
synopsis: Arashi sits down for a nice full course French meal, but seems to not understand how to properly savor the experience. At a local winery, he learns the secret to using all 5 of his sense... Not just for enjoying food and wine, but for sumo wrestling as well!

title: Paris Collection Tournament
synopsis: Arashi confronts a man secretly taking pictures of him around Paris, and it turns out he's a budding photographer who's just really shy. Arashi offers to be his practice subject, and gets scouted to be the next top model.

title: Paris Tournament
synopsis: Arashi becomes quick pals with Emperor Napoleonne, and offers to help him invade Italy by crossing the Alps. Thanks to their indomitable spirit, they overcome the shear ludicrousness of the concept and somehow emerge victorious.

title: Barcelona Tournament
synopsis: Back in Japan, Arashi's rival Tetsunishiki is racking up wins in the sumo world. A mysterious architect helps Arashi regain his motivation to keep going on his quest to become the greatest sumo wrestler in the world.

title: Pamplona Tournament
synopsis: Arriving finally in Europe, Arashi is transfixed by all the beautiful women. Catching one, on the other hand, proves to be quite a challenge...

title: Atlantic Ocean Tournament
synopsis: Having successfully beaten off the pirates, Arashi is back on his way to Europe. But Captain Hawk wants revenge! Arashi and the rest of the ship is saved at the last moment by a gallant explorer... Maybe he can teach Arashi a thing or two?

title: Caribbean Sea Tournament
synopsis: Enjoying his Atlantic cruise, Arashi hears rumors of a vicious pirate named Hawk who has been attacking ships. There's no way he'd actually attack this ship though... right?!

title: Argentina Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is looking forward to getting on board a cruise ship, but all the tickets are sold out. With no where else to turn, he offers to help out a young man who says he knows the captain of the ship, but... can a sumo wrestler dance the tango?

title: Columbia Tournament
synopsis: In a rush to get to the airport, Arashi gets on the wrong bus. When that bus breaks down near a coffee plantation, Arashi heads to a famous local coffee shop.

title: Amazon Tournament
synopsis: Hearing news of a mysterious hermit that lives deep in the Amazon Jungle, Arashi goes to see him in search of another one of the 48 techniques. But will he become one with nature, or just fish food?

title: Rio de Janeiro Tournament
synopsis: It's the day before a dance carnival in Rio, and one team's main dancer has gone missing! Can Arashi learn the secret behind the samba in only 1 night of practice? Can he get over the embarrassment of wearing such gaudy outfits? Can a sumo wrestler shake his hips like that in the first place?

title: Jamaica Tournament
synopsis: Impressed by the sites and tastes of the island, Arashi is faced with a choice between two restaurants. But it seems the entire country is on the verge of a civil war between two political parties. Could the music of the master rastafarian, Bob, calm the masses?

title: Cuba Tournament
synopsis: Still feeling quite happy after his Mexican wrestling adventure, Arashi talks back to a Cuban military patrol and is thrown into jail along with other political prisoners. Never giving up hope, they wait for the day their hero, Guevaran, will lead an attack to rescue them...

title: Mexico Tournament
synopsis: After being introduced to the wonders of tequila at a Mexican bar, Arashi is taken in by a mysterious masked wrestler who recruits Arashi as his new partner. Could this be the birth of the ultimate Lucha tag-team?

title: D.C. Tournament
synopsis: While visiting the White House, Arashi is mistakenly arrested for being the ringleader of a terrorist organization. But thanks to his keen eye, he helps Edgar, the nation's top FBI watchdog, apprehend the real mastermind.

title: Cleveland Tournament
synopsis: Arashi is scouted by the manager for the New York Nyankees for his amazing arm, and the home run king of the Cleveland Iideyansu, Rodry, is seriously mad at having his spotlight taken away. This grudge can only be settled in one way: Baseball!

title: New York Tournament
synopsis: Tricked by a taxi cab driver, Arashi-kun is in dire need of money, stranded in the middle of New York City. With no where else to turn, he enters a funky dance contest, only to find that the local dance legend, Bootsy, may hold the secret to one of the 48 techniques...

title: Montreal Tournament
synopsis: Hitchhiking up north in Canada, Arashi-kun passes out in a sudden blizzard, but is saved by the girlfriend of Canadian Ice Hockey Star Justin. Justin is none too pleased about his girl taking in another man, and challenges Mikoshiarashi to a one-on-one hockey showdown!

title: L.A. Tournament
synopsis: In search of the 48 secret techniques, Mikoshiarashi travels to L.A. where his attire gets him in trouble immediately. Thankfully, he is saved by the master of distortion rock, Breaky, who might have a thing or two to teach the young sumo wrestler...

title: New Year's Tournament
synopsis: Mikoshiarashi and Tetsunoshiki were mawashi wearing middle schoolers who would practice sumo every day by the river on their way home. Scouted by a sumo master, both of them trained hard every day. Finally, during the final match of the New Year's Grand Sumo Tournament, Mikoshiarashi must fight his friend Tetsunoshiki for the title, but is completely defeated. Disappointed but not discouraged, Mikoshiarashi consults his Sumo Boss for advice...

title: Four Best Friends
synopsis: When Miki and Chihiro get in a huge fight, Mayu tries to help patch things up.

title: Christmas Jobs!
synopsis: It's Christmastime and Chihiro wants some extra cash, so she tries to get the girls to take part-time jobs at the local bakery. Selling cake in Santa outfits, what could go wrong?

title: Mayu Never gets Mad?
synopsis: Ritsuki's in a foul mood as usual, but then she wonders if has Morita-san ever gotten mad?

title: Carelessness is Funny
synopsis: Mayu and the girls get worried when Miki doesn't show up for school, and it only gets worse when they find out she's been in a traffic accident.

title: Home Sick
synopsis: Mayu's got plans to hang out with her friends, but she's stuck at home sick in bed. With the quiet Morita-san weakened and further silenced by her cold, what can she do?!

title: Preparation is Everything at the Culture Festival
synopsis: Class 2-3 decides to hold a flea market for the school Culture Festival. The four girls…whoa, what'd they bring?!

title: Hama-sensei is a Worrywart
synopsis: Student teacher Hama-sensei is taking over Mayu's class, and Mayu's blank stare has the new teacher worried about her.

title: Fall is the Season of Love?!
synopsis: Unable to contain his passion any longer, one of Ritsuki's juniors musters up his courage and confesses his love. Unfortunately, when he opens his eyes, it's Mayu that's standing there.

title: An Exciting Sleepover!
synopsis: The girls decide to have a slumber party at the Morita house, and Mayu wants to girl talk about romance.

title: New Seats are the Luck of the Draw
synopsis: Delusional Oono-kun's dream comes true when his new seat puts him right next to Mayu! He wants to get closer to her, but can fantasy become reality?

title: Fall is the Season for Reading
synopsis: There's nothing like a good book on a fall afternoon! And a good book is just what Mayu wants, but can she find something that can draw her in?

title: Baking is Serious Business
synopsis: Hana-chan schools her class mates in proper baking etiquette.

title: Our Homeroom Teacher is Maki-sensei
synopsis: Maki-Sensei catches "cute moments" from some of her students.

title: Spending Our Day off Together
synopsis: Mayu and her friends meet up on their free day for a day of shopping.

title: A Passionate Couple
synopsis: Mayu parents are going through a rough time, and she is unsure of what to say.

title: Every now and then I go on my own
synopsis: A test draws near. The class is abuzz. Morita-san seems like the responsible type. But how will things play out?

title: Yamamoto-san is so Cool
synopsis: Yamamoto san is a model student, versatile athlete, and class representative. But she seems to always have it out for Mayu. What does this mean?

title: The Pool Rules!
synopsis: Summer means gym class at the pool for class 2-3! But Morita-san's a little shy about her body. Things that aren't normally on display are suddenly there for everyone to see...including her hidden talent!

title: You've Gotta wear Yukatas to the Summer Festival
synopsis: Morita-san, Miki, Chihiro and Hana-chan are decked out in their yukatas and headed for the summer festival! But when Miki's obi comes loose, it's up to Morita-san to fix it...then HER clothes get messed up.

title: The Ideal Man
synopsis: What is a high school girl's ideal man like? Inquiring minds want to know.

title: Runaway Imaginations
synopsis: Since Morita-san is so quiet, the boys in her class get some strange ideas about her. They shouldn't be thinking such things.

title: High School Girls Love Sweets
synopsis: Four good friends who love sweets, lured in by sugary temptations...

title: Girls can be Lazy too
synopsis: It is a very hot day and the girls have taken to fanning themselves. Chihiro gets the idea to let people pay to fan their legs.

title: Hana-chan is Really Shy
synopsis: Matsuzaka Hana is a little scared of her classmate, Morita-san. Especially her eyes...but today, Hana will have to summon all her courage and talk to her.

title: Miki never Shuts Up
synopsis: Mayu's friend Murakoshi Miki talks a mile a minute, and Mayu finds herself getting a little jealous...

title: Morita-san is so Quiet
synopsis: Morita Mayu is always hanging out with her friend Murakoshi Miki. Mayu is a very quiet girl, but Miki is a total motor mouth. What kind of conversations do these two classmates have?

title: Wooser's Hand to Mouth Life a Dream Play...
synopsis: With a piece of ice hidden in a snowball, a snow fight turns murderous.

title: Wooser's Kind World
synopsis: Wooser becomes omnipotent. His powers know no bounds, changing the weather, changing even the laws of nature and finally even consuming the world.

title: Detective Wooser's Final Problem
synopsis: Detective Wooser solves the crime of the century. Ajipon has been murdered, and it's up to Wooser to find the killer.

title: Hunter Wooser and the Law of the Festival
synopsis: Wooser loves his uniforms, and he loves his uniform doujinshi. He loves them so much that he'll brave the sweltering heat, freezing cold, and massive crowds to get them. But there is one final test he must past... the mysterious masked swordsman!

title: Blue Seas, White Sand, Black Wooser
synopsis: Wooser and the gang are trapped in coffins on a beach next to a sea of blood. They seem oblivious to this.

title: Daydreaming Wooser Transforms Once More
synopsis: Wooser is turned into a grasshopper and smashes up the city again. Rin and Len must transform into magical girls to stop him.

title: The Villager Wooser and His True Bestial Nature
synopsis: Wooser plays a game where one player is the werewolf, and the others are villagers trying to find him. The game is popular with middle school and high school girls, which is why Wooser likes it. He's a villager, so will he be able to find the wolf in time?

title: Director Wooser and the Twilight Age of Movie Madness
synopsis: To fund his elegant lifestyle of never leaving the house, Wooser decides to enter a one million yen movie contest. But he knows nothing about making movies, and has nothing but crazy ideas. Just when the project is about to fall apart, a certain famous movie actress agrees to help.

title: Wooser53, I'm Going to Be an Idol
synopsis: If having two people makes the work go twice as fast, having fifty three people will make it go fifty three times as fast! Wooser splits himself into 53 Woosers and forms an idol group, Wooser53. With Miss Monochrome's help, they go big.

title: Everything Becomes J/K
synopsis: You can never remember what exactly goes on in an episode of Wooser, can you? But did you know this is actually the 88,888th broadcast of this episode? Is everything a dream? Can Wooser overcome Nietzsche's Eternal Recurrence, and defeat Diogenes in his attempt to live an austere life?

title: Wooser-sensei's Battle with Deadlines
synopsis: It hurts... it hurts so much... Wooser is in great pain staring at a blank white sheet of paper. His deadline is coming but he's too hung over to think of anything. He wasn't just being lazy, though, he was drinking all night with the sponsers to keep from running out of money. WIll Wooser be able to overcome the evil within himself and meet his deadline?

title: Wooser the Strategist and His Cunning Plan
synopsis: Yesterday, tomorrow, and likely for the rest of time, Wooser just sits and consumes instead of working. Darth Wooser almost calls him a NEET, but is stopped by the self-destruct circuits that will destroy him if he insults his master. To make things worse, Wooser actively tries to get him to self-destruct. What will be the fate of Darth Wooser?

title: wooser's hand to mouth life is back again
synopsis: This is the tale of an unknown hero. Once day, Wooser leaves for deep space, risking his life to protect the things he loves. ... Probably the things he loves are money, meat, and girls. Also uniforms. But there are those who love him anyway: Rin, and Ren. When the wish they made on a starry sky is heard, a miracle will occur in a distant galaxy!

title: OVA
synopsis: Cadis Etrama di Raizel wakes up from 820-years long sleep and starts a new life as a high school student. His peaceful days as a student are soon interrupted as his new human friends are assaulted by mysterious attackers with superhuman abilities. Check out the original series at http://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/nobe/list?title_no=87 less

title: Suto Pura
synopsis: Suddenly, Kou finds himself in the world of gal games. Who could the heroine be?

title: Fiction
synopsis: Hanei writes novels as a hobby. Everyone does their best to make an appeal to become the model for the main character. Who will end up being the main character? Will the novel ever be completed?

title: Similar
synopsis: Nana runs into the agency, saying that Takumi's been kidnapped. Takumi and the others head to the culprits hideout to save the kidnapped Takumi. Will Takumi be able to save Takumi?

title: Influence
synopsis: Takumi and the others are at a celebrity party as bodyguards... when Rusty Nail appears. Will Takumi and the others be able to save the celebs from Rusty?

title: Intruder
synopsis: The last day of summer vacation, Takumi and the others are asked to help Masashi out with his homework. Mera, Kaori, Kanno and others end up helping out as well... will the homework ever be finished?

title: Restrains
synopsis: Kanno, Hanei, and Takumi wake up in a secret room again. Will they be able to escape the secret room?

title: Escape
synopsis: Kanno, Hanei, Mera, and Kaori wake up, trapped in a secret room. Will they be able to escape the secret room?

title: Resistans
synopsis: President Mikuni's nephew shows up at the agency. His attitude pisses Takumi off... Will they be able to break through the nephew's icy heart?

title: Princess
synopsis: Takumi and company show up at Kiyoko's high school culture festival. They end up helping out with Kiyoko's class's play at the very last minute, but will the play end safely?

title: Crime
synopsis: A guy wants to leave the gang he's currently in and asks the Mikuni Detective Agency for help. The group agrees and infiltrates the gang. Will the guy's wish come true?

title: Exchange
synopsis: Kou and Takumi fall down some stairs and somehow end up in a cliche situation where they switch bodies. Will they be able to turn back to normal?

title: Reconduct
synopsis: A woman named Nana appears at the Mikuni Detective Agency to take Kou and Takumi back home. Will they be able to get away from her grasp?

title: Hero
synopsis: The detectives are put in charge of doing a hero show in one of Mikuni's buildings... of course things don't go well.

title: Antique
synopsis: The detectives accept a job to appraise an odd antique at Kiyoko's house... and find a very shady treasure there.

title: Curse
synopsis: The detectives are asked to take care of a cursed medal that brings misfortune upon its owner. Will they be able to survive the series of misfortune that falls upon them?

title: Guard
synopsis: The detectives are put in charge of guarding a client by request of the Mikuni company. Will they be able to guard him?

title: Intruder
synopsis: The team is put in charge of capturing the pervert that keeps showing up at Kiyoko's school. Takumi and the others go undercover but will they be able to catch the pervert?

title: Procession
synopsis: Masamune is being targeted by someone so Takumi and the others help protect him. Who is the mysterious person after Masamune?

title: Precious
synopsis: The team randomly runs into Rusty Nail at a supermarket. Rusty declares that she will get back at them for ruining her last job by stealing something from their agency. Will Takumi and the others be able to protect their agency?

title: Mistress
synopsis: The team sneaks into some company building to steal some top secret information. Kou's really not up for this mission, however Takumi and the others seem rather excited to complete this mission.

title: Trap
synopsis: The gang takes the job from Ozu to go save Dorothy, and find themselves in an underground lair filled with traps.

title: Hospital
synopsis: The gang decides to go to a doctor to get Masamune's wounds treated. They were greated by a suspicious looking doctor and a little girl.

title: Princess
synopsis: The Mikuni Detective Agency has been hired as bodyguards to protect a rich man's only daughter. Despite her being difficult, they were going through with their mission.

title: Thief
synopsis: A phantom thief named Rusty Nail sends a letter to a mansion, saying they're going to steal their treasure. The Mikuni Detective Agency is called to protect the treasure, but are they up to this challenge?

title: PV
synopsis: Promotional Video

title: The Magic of Happiness
synopsis: Ibuki finally got Shikimori's Treasure. He ignored Shinya and got his elder sister's Natsuo to be revived. However, Ibuki's thoughts returned and the secret formula began take a shape of its own as the demons attacked him. So, Haruhi finally appeared at the origin of Yuma's disappearance.

title: Shikimori Treasure
synopsis: Haruhi and her friends know about Shikimori's Treasure, Mizuhosaka Academy's establishment and Yuma's past. Suzuri asked Haruhi and Anri to prevent Ibuki from obtaining the Shikimori Treasure. Furthermore, Suzuri wanted to hand it to Anri and entrust Haruhi with Natsuo’s memento but...

title: The Past
synopsis: Ibuki got closer to Haruhi in order to get closer to the Shikimori Treasure. Yuma tried to stop the witchcraft war between the two, but her magic went haywire which cause Sumomo to become unconscious. Haruhi and her friends were puzzled by everything that was happening before them and with Suzuri performed a treatment for Sumomo. The tale of the Shikimori Treasure begins.

title: School Festival
synopsis: Since the fortune telling research training camp, Haruhi and Yuma have become good friends. They were busy preparing for the Mizuhosaka Academy festival which brought them closer together. However, Minagi sensei from witchcraft class had to go to a business trip suddenly and asked Haruhi for a favor.

title: Summer Prediction
synopsis: When summer vacation arrived, Haruhi and her friends took a vacation. Following Koyuki's suggestion, Ibuki and the Kamiyo twins went to the training camp for fortune telling research at Mizuhosaka Academy's boardinghouse located by the beach. Yuma was semi-cold towards Haruhi but he was appointed to become better friends with her during this trip. While everyone was enjoying themselves, strange silhouettes drew near Haruhi and Yuma.

title: Ibuki Friendship Plan
synopsis: Sumomo was having a bento box with Ibuki who she has become friends with. Though she was concerned about becoming friends with everyone. Haruhi and her friends think of different ways to help Sumomo. Everyone gathered their bento boxes and went to the arcade but things didn't go very well. Therefore, everyone went along with Koyuki's suggestion of going bowling but...

title: A Mysterious Transfer Student
synopsis: Sumomo said she wants to introduce some people. Ibuki, who was transferred into Sumomo's class, was introduced to all the students. One night, Haruhi and Saya were talking to Ibuki and when they asked her a sensitive question that bothered her, she became upset and left. Will the slightly eccentric Ibuki and Sumomo become friends?

title: The Midnight Beauty
synopsis: It's the night that Hachi was reading a very important erotic book on school grounds. He saw a mysterious female ghost and thought she was attractive. Without thinking, he began to approach her but at that moment; he suddenly reached a state of shock and fainted. The next day, Hachi was furious when he found out the female ghost had died so Haruhi, Yuma and friends began a search. Will he be able to revisit this woman's soul?

title: Tama chan disappeared
synopsis: One day, Sumomo suddenly wanted to join the "Fortune Telling Club" that was being run by Koyuki. Koyuki is the only one running the club but it seems she does it because all the members have lots of fun. As a matter of fact, Haruhi and her friends joined as well. Koyuki led the group makin Tama-chan when Anri said something that hurt Tama-chan which cause a huge uproar.

title: Oasis
synopsis: Bento boxes for lunch are quite popular at Mizuhosaka Academy's. Yuma's mother-in-law, Otoha, who works at Oasis, the school's cafeteria, has been worried about the lack of customers. That's when Anri started working there part-time as a waitress. She put all her time and energy in handing out pamphlets and such in order to drive in more customers but all her hard work didn't seem to pay off.

title: Cherry Blossom Viewing
synopsis: After the explosion in witchcraft class, Haruhi and Anri were transferred to Yuma's class. In preparation for the school's entrance ceremony, Haruhi and Anri were lining up the chairs when Anri's magic went haywire again. Despite the riot that was caused, Yuma and his friends were able to attend the ceremony without a scratch and Yuma's sister-in-law, Sumomo, was happy to be entering the school. However, Haruhi seemed depressed when Hachisuke suggested for everyone to go cherry blossom viewing.

title: Valentine
synopsis: She's clever, attractive, and quick witted. Furthermore, she’s also impeccable. Who other than the perfect, Haruhi Kamisaka! Valentine's Day was approaching so she went with her close friend, Anri Hiragi who was in her witchcraft class at Mizuhozaka Academy, to buy chocolates. After they finished shoppoing, Haruhi walked by a nearby park when she saw some boys picking on a girl. She decided to help the girl when...

title: The Path
synopsis: The final round.

title: Intensify
synopsis: With the fourth round coming to an end, all bets are off as the players discover new talents and push their abilities to the limit.

title: Aspiration
synopsis: As the fourth players' match begins, Arata tries to bring Achiga into the lead, but must defend against others who want t to take second place from Achiga.

title: Free For All
synopsis: The game continues!

title: Promise
synopsis: Playing against a champion has forced the girls to evaluate their plays styles and never give up fighting for points.

title: Determination
synopsis: The stress of the game is starting to affect the players, some faster than others. One player in particular might not make it to the end of the game.

title: Dealer's Streak
synopsis: Miyanaga Teru is unstoppable. The players are trying reaching their breaking pot and new techniques must be used.

title: Best
synopsis: Miyanaga Teru is known for dominating games and with each win she earns more points. Kuro hasn’t been able to make a move and the ace, Toki from Senriyama, is unable to stop her streak.

title: Training
synopsis: Tournament rules say that individual players can’t practice with players outside of their own school. Using this rule, the girls invite players to practice against their team.

title: Conviction
synopsis: Arata’s turn at the board went well, but it didn’t provide the necessary boost to Achiga’s points. The last player, Shizu, is going in with all eyes on her and her unique but dangerous play style.

title: Recovery
synopsis: After Senriyama domination of the first round, Achiga is left in last place. Yuu promises to get the lost points back in her game. And Ako's speed play disrupts the pace of the other players.

title: Veteran
synopsis: Matsumi's dragon road has been shut down by Toki, the player from Senriyama. It is as if she can predict what tiles will be played. With such a frightening power, do any of the other players stand a chance?

title: The Nationals
synopsis: It’s the start of the Nationals, and there are many teams with strong players aiming for the top spot. Kuro Matsumi is the first from Achiga to play in the competition. Her challengers think she is weak, but she will show them the Dragon Road.

title: Contact
synopsis: The prefectural tournament has started and Achiga’s first opponent is the famed 9 time winners, Bansei. This is what the girls have trained for; this is their stepping stone to reaching Nodoka.

title: Beginning
synopsis: The girls have to find two more members before they can be an official club, but Bansei holds a monopoly on the serious players. It is time to track down old friends and rebuild Achiga’s Mahjong Club!

title: Chance Meeting
synopsis: Ako, Shizuno, and Nodoka were best friends in middle school, often going to Achiga Girls’ School to play Mahjong. But as time passed, they saw each other  and less of each other. That was until Shizuno saw Nodoka win the middle school Mahjong Singles tournament. She is determined to meet her friend again, at the inter-high mahjong tournament! less

title: Trailer
synopsis: Promotional Trailer

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: The Hands that Bind
synopsis: At last the true form of the Tower of Druaga reveals itself. Jil and Neeba, Kaaya and Saccubus finally confront each other and the ultimate result of the battle has still yet to be seen...

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: Slayer of God
synopsis: The battle between Neeba and the Shadow of the King of Gilgamesh ensues in the throne room. However, Jil arrives too late, as Neeba falls to the King's power. Now the decisive battle begins between the King's shadow and Jil begins...

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: Last Resort
synopsis: Ki reaches the top of the tower along with her captors: Succubus and Neeba. Meanwhile, Jil and his comrades are only one level behind. Yet at the top of the tower awaits the shadow of the King of Gilgamesh, whose power has increased. Now it's up to Neeba and Jil to stop the dark shadow of the king.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: At the End of the Dream
synopsis: When Jil returns, he finds that Fatina and the rest of his gang had been attacked. At the Grave of the Dragon, Jil’s party, Gremica’s party, Uragon, and Mite meet to figure out their situation, and confirm their purpose for climbing the tower. Just then, the Mythical Tower begins to undergo yet another change. Meanwhile, Ethana starts a riot in the city of Meskia. And on the top floor of the tower, Kaaya faces off with the shadow of King Gilgamesh.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: Their Past
synopsis: Jil and his gang proceed through the Floor of the Dried-up Lake. They arrive at a giant grave of a dragon scattered with its skeletal remains, where Neeba and the injured Kaaya had been taking a rest. Jil inadvertently becomes a decoy to attract Specula, when he reunites with Neeba. Specula is still on their pursuit, and Gremica, Neeba’s archery master, also arrives. Neeba is forced to come to terms with his past; his complicated relation between his half brother Jil, and his breakaway from Gremica who had been his mentor; which drives him toward a certain future...

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: The Chateau of Everlasting Spring
synopsis: Jil and his gang reach the next floor, and run into Melt and Coopa. A grandiose mansion appears before them, where Ahmey, who was supposed to be dead, is awaiting them. Kally also appears. Jil is happy to meet his old friends, but at the same time is bewildered. In exchange for their delight in meeting old comrades, the gang gradually looses their eagerness to proceed. Then, Specula, Blood, and Ice launch an assault on them.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: The Four Assassins
synopsis: On the Floor of the Rainforest, Jil is targeted by an assassin working for Gremica. Then, two more assassins appear. Meanwhile, Neeba and Kaaya are churning their way through the Floor of the Lake. In their conversation, Kaaya advocates the graciousness of God, but Neeba replies with frustration that God is capricious. These two are also attacked by two assassins. The four assassins are droids with the spirits of the four knights that used to guard Druaga. Neeba speculates that they come from the caskets that Pazuz had been carrying. The ones attacking Jil are Mite and Specula. Jil, along with Fatina, Utu, and Henaro, struggle to put up a fight. The ones attacking Neeba are Blood and Ice. Neeba is cornered, when Kaaya casts a powerful spell.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: The Land of Shadows
synopsis: At the top of the Mythical Tower resides the shadow of King Gilgamesh, and it is affecting the real Gilgamesh. Neeba and Kaaya are climbing toward the top of the tower in order to take the shadow down. In their pursuit, Jil and his gang enter a floor with a yellow sky, a terrifying place where monsters that are the shadows of children attack anyone who enters one after another. Jil and the gang are cornered...

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: Into the Phantasm
synopsis: Jil, Ki, and the gang arrive at the Shrine of Sky. The Golden Knights, as well as Melt and Coopa, who are all after Jil’s gang, arrive shortly after and also enter the shrine. Inside, the evil god Druaga awaits them. Jil and the others engage in a battle with Druaga once again. In the midst of the fighting, Ki suddenly takes the form of an adult, and reveals to Jil all of the mysteries: Kaaya’s wish, and why Jil had been betrayed. What is the connection between Kaaya and Ki? The story moves on the Mythical Tower...

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: City of Dreams: Meltland
synopsis: Jil and his gang go to the Shrine of Emery, and find that their former comrade Melt has become a millionaire, after his success at managing a ski resort. Now being a wealthy man, Melt puts his connections with the army above his friendship with old party-mates and hands over Jil, Ki, and the gang to Uragon, and the gang is subsequently incarcerated. Meanwhile, the Ropers who are being exploited by Melt are planning an escape in the backyard of the resort. An avalanche occurs, and the escape of the Ropers begins...

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: Capital City Meskia
synopsis: The mysterious girl identifies herself as Ki: she has the same name as the priestess of Ishitar, the late wife of King Gilgamesh. Ki tells Jil and the others that she can take them to the ‘Mythical Tower’. Jil believes this and starts to prepare for the journey, upsetting Fatina. Just then, Uragon, commander of the Golden Knights, who is after Ki appears before them. Uragon is determined to capture Ki, and will stop at nothing. It seems that there is no way Jil and his allies will be able to escape from the encirclement.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-
title: The Tower of Gilgamesh
synopsis: Six months has passed from the conquering of Druaga. King Gilgamesh had taken all the credit, and the former climbers who knew the truth were wasting their days away. Jil, who is unable to recover from the shock of Neeba and Kaaya disappearing in the “Mythical Tower,” is reclusing himself in his room at the inn he is freeloading at. Fatina is working as a tour guide, and is watching over him sometimes with patience, sometimes with severity. One day, the two encounter a little girl who is being pursued by the army.

anime_name: The Tower of DRUAGA -the Sword of URUK-

synopsis: Promotional Trailer 1

Monochrome³
synopsis: Miss Monochrome's first tour reaches its final performance. After the concert, Miss Monochrome, who had made a promise with a certain fan, heads to a wrap-up party along with the entire crew.

title: Distress
synopsis: Miss Monochrome's first tour lands in Hokkaido! Following the concert, Miss Monochrome meets a fan named Kita Umio while doing promotional activities in her mascot outfit.

title: A
synopsis: Following her concert, Miss Monochrome is feeling down after holding a planned, well-balanced Question Corner. She wants to be more unpredictable so that she can surprise her fans. This is when a brand new idea strikes her...

title: Radio
synopsis: Miss Monochrome's live tour lands in Sendai! After, she plans to board the last bullet train to make a recording for a musical program the next morning but just misses it. It's looking like she will have to cancel this long-awaited show, but...

title: Unity
synopsis: Miss Monochrome's live tour heads to Fukuoka!

title: Project
synopsis: One rainy day, Miss Monochrome picks up a help white cat on her way home and nurses it through the night.

title: Disguise
synopsis: Miss Monochrome holds a live concert in Osaka! After the concert, when Miss Monochrome and the others go compaigning to promote her CD and tour, as well as to see the sights, they run into Kikuko, who has come to Osaka to preview a different concert venue.

title: Fisherman
synopsis: Miss Monochrome and her gang head to Okayama for their last rehearsal before the live tour.

title: Girlfriend
synopsis: Miss Monochrome finds KIKUKO collaboration on the shelf at the convenience store, and declares that she'll come up with a huge collaboration project herself.

title: Appeal
synopsis: Miss Monochrome enters the Mascot Character Grand Prix!

title: Mister
synopsis: Miss Monochrome wakes up in her 4.5 tatami-mat apartment, suddenly wonders what would happen if she flipped the positive and negative ends of her battery, and decides to test it out...

title: Exercise
synopsis: Miss Monochrome and the others hold a publicity meeting at Heimin Records, and determine that in order to surpass Super Idol Kikuko, who sells 100,002,000 copies of her albums, they need to increase Miss Monochrome's visibility.

title: DISKJOCKEY
synopsis: The android and idol Miss Monochrome visits the summit of Mt. Fuji to pray that her recently released first album is a hit, and for her live tour's success.

title: Monochrome²
synopsis: Mana-chan shows up in the nick of time, just when the record label's in danger of going bankrupt.

title: Crisis 4696
synopsis: Gazing at a poster of Miss Monochrome, Maneo is assailed by a wave of bittersweet emotions.

title: Innerspace
synopsis: Miss Monochrome painstakingly practices for her first live tour. She demonstrates her status as an out-of-place artifact by having Ru-chan install a program within her and performing a brand-new dance perfectly her very first time. While a new program is installing, Promoter Yayoi carely pulls out her USB cable. Miss Monochrome freezes up, and her behavior becomes very peculiar... less

title: Seventeen
synopsis: Miss Monochrome wants to investigate the differences between her and Kikuko, the idol of nationwide fame. Miss Monochrome and Maneo turn detective and practice tailing targets and deductive reasoning on the street corner, then begin to do an undercover investigation of Kikuko's working site.

title: Publicity
synopsis: Miss Monochrome holds a briefing session about the concert's stage setting in her 4.5 tatami mat-wide apartment with Ru-chan, Maneo, and Yayoi. She suggests an idea which would cost a massive amount of money, but it's very unlikely that Heimin Records could implement such a scheme.

title: Requiem
synopsis: On a drizzley morning, Miss Monochrome wakes up in her four and a half tatami-mat sized apartment. When she tries to change her battery, a leak in her roof causes her battery box to explode. What should appear from the smoke of the explosion but a good-looking guy in the form of a battery! Miss Monochrome and Battery-kun are shocked by this destined encounter. Thus begins their days of friendship.

title: Again
synopsis: Miss Monochrome and Yui, Akemi, Kana, and Atsuko of Caramel are obsessed with dance rehearsal for their first live tour. Ru-chan provides on-point leadership, and everyone gets enthusiastic about practice. Meanwhile, Promoter Yayoi brings them work. It appears they've gotten a request to appear in a certain program, but it's a project Miss Monochrome and Maneo have heard of somewhere before.

title: Showdown
synopsis: Ru-chan is put in charge of the live-tour band and lighting, and Miss Monochrome and the others have hired dancers on their frivolous budget. Miss Monochrome goes to the TV studio for a filming job, when Producer Takashita introduces her to the idol group "Caramel" that has just debuted. Miss Monochrome and Yui, Akemi, Kana, and Atsuko from Caramel all perform a mannequin act together. When Producer Takishita commends her for looking out for her juniors, Miss Monochrome gets smug and starts acting patronizing to them.

title: Scout
synopsis: Miss Monochrome and the others hold a concert production meeting in the conference room of Heimin Records, where Yayoi works. While Yayoi is away, Miss Monochrome wins and returns with the Woose-demy Award for Best Mannequin Act from the world of dreams and illusions, and jokingly brings up the idea of a live-concert master of ceremonies. Meanwhile, Yayoi proposes a production that puts the band members in the spotlight. The coworker Akiko is eager to do a guitar solo and starts to show off her incredible guitar technique, but this leaves Miss Monochrome with a dubious look on her face.

title: Goods
synopsis: Miss Monochrome and her coworker Akiko have a jam session behind the convenience store. Both Maneo and Yayoi are content and praise how great it sounds. When Miss Monochrome and the others return to the office, they discuss creating goods to sell at her live concerts. It's an exciting promo-items meeting where ideas like Reversi, Rubik's Cubes, glow sticks, towels, T-shirts, and come up like rapid-fire. But when Akiko proposes guitar picks, Miss Monochrome immediately says they're unnecessary...

title: Guitarist
synopsis: Promoter Yayoi Konno tells Miss Monochrome, the active idol and a part-time convenience store worker, that it's time for them to reserve venues for her live tour and asks if she has any requests. Miss Monochrome throws out exaggerated dreams like "All the famous domes and halls in the country" and "150,000 small venues" as a joke. Incredibly, Yayoi shows how skilled she is by jumping into her car, driving all over with her engine roaring, and actually reserving them all. Next, Miss Monochrome and Maneo meet with Yayoi in the convenience store office and begin their live performance-centered meeting.

title: Promoter
synopsis: Miss Monochrome, Maneo, and Ru-chan discuss the creation of an album and her live tour in the convenience store office. When they are boggled by how much they don't know, Super Idol Kikuko's manager, Mana-chan, appears before them. She says they are missing a promoter who will make all the arrangements for her concerts, and announces that she will take the job. Next, she claims she will need another 700 million yen. Unable to come up with that much money, Miss Monochrome goes to a certain mountain pass to search for a promoter on her own.

title: Reignition
synopsis: Miss Monochrome wakes up in a small apartment room. She's an android and an idol. Her goal is to compete against super idol KIKUKO. She decides to go on tour to gather fans, and to make an album to go on tour with.

title: Monochrome
synopsis: Miss Monochrome walks through an alley on the way home from a job and is informed by an old man who jumps out from the shadows of a telephone pole that her CD debut as been confirmed. Monochrome goes through recording and has her cover shot taken.

title: Idol
synopsis: Miss Monochrome observes a singing program after a drama recording and meets Mana, who took her 19.3 billion yen and disappeared, at the studio. Mana had been working as a certain idol's manager.

title: Audition
synopsis: "I want to stand out more all on my own." Miss Monochrome says she wants to earn a job on her own and tells Maneo she wants to be entered into an audition.

title: Fighter
synopsis: After she finishes with her job at the event venue for the Idol-filled Imitation Tournament, Miss Monochrome decides to join the long line that's formed for the neighboring building.

title: Rival
synopsis: A group of UFOs approaches Earth and an alien-lead human hunt is held. "The human hunt was a blast! We just about hunted them to extinction!" The Earth is covered in flames.

title: Winner
synopsis: When Miss Monochrome wishes, "I want to stand out more. I want to aim for greater heights." Maneo brings her jobs as a race queen and mountain-climbing reporter.

title: Props
synopsis: Miss Monochrome watches Kikuko's concert on TV and realizes what she needs more of are props.

title: Job
synopsis: Miss Monochrome says she will work hard and do anything to Maneo and asks him to get her work. She does everything at her own pace, the same as ever, and angers the director at her drama shoot.

title: Halloween
synopsis: Maneo brings a Halloween cosplay party job to Monochrome, who is watching Super Idol Kikuko's concert airing on a TV on the street.

title: METAMORPHOSE
synopsis: Monochrome notices a nendoroid of the super idol Kikuko in a toy shop's show window and requests a nendoroid version of herself from Maneo, but his efforts are in vain.

title: Vengeance
synopsis: Aliens come to Earth to enjoy their first human hunt in hundreds of millions of years. Right around then, Maneo and Miss Monochrome are captivated by a golden AA battery in a show window in the shopping district.

title: Heaven
synopsis: Miss Monochrome suggests to Maneo that she wants to appear on a drama at the convenience store where he's employed as a manager. Maneo gets straight to business and comes back with a role where she will act like a mannequin.

title: Fall
synopsis: The android and idol Miss Monochrome had often dreamed in her castle of a beautiful girl's appearance. One day, Monochrome saw the super idol Kikuko's exploits on TV and consulted Mana, the girl who was earnestly assisting her with her idol activities.

title: Monochrome
