title: PV 2
synopsis: Promotional Video 2

title: PV 1
synopsis: Promotional Video 1

title: Exciting Surprise
synopsis: The girls must keep Kouki out of the student council room while they prepare a surprise birthday party for him.

title: Round-and-Round Swimming
synopsis: The girls of the student council are visiting a water park... but an unexpected accident takes all the relaxation out of their vacation!

title: This-and-That Slapstick
synopsis: Now that students have the ability to upload videos to the school's website, Kaoruko suggests that the student council try filming a movie to upload.

title: Kitty Kitty Melancholic
synopsis: Mihiro finds a lost cat on the way to school and asks Toa to help her find its owner.

title: Heart-Pounding Mechanics
synopsis: Ashe and Mihiro enter the student council room to find a robot inside! The robot, Axis-kun, was built to help with various tasks, and the school is assisting in its development as a monitor. But as Ashe inspects the newcomer, she gets a bit too excited and the inevitable happens...

title: Mumbly Sleeping
synopsis: Kaoruko hasn't slept for about a week in her rush to complete another manuscript, so the other student council girls decide to do whatever they can to help her get some sleep...

title: Puzzlingly Mysterious
synopsis: Mihiro finds a piece of paper in the student council room with some odd scribbles that might be handwriting. Kaoruko thinks it must be a riddle that Kouki devised for an upcoming story in his manga, and sets about trying to decipher it!

title: Scary After-School
synopsis: Ashe is reading a book of school horror stories and loses track of the time. When she finally gets up to leave, the school is already dark and empty...

title: Frantic Hunting
synopsis: Though Kaoruko has completed her mountain of work, the student council room is now buried under a mountain of trash. Kaoruko was enjoying the feeling of having her manuscript done, but then a small black form scurries in front of her...

title: Last-Minute Drawing
synopsis: As the deadline for her manuscript approaches, Kaoruko is struggling with the poses of some of the characters, so she asks Toa and Mihiro to model for her. Toa isn't interested at first, but when Kaoruko offers her favorite food as compensation...

title: Cheerful Cooking
synopsis: Miyase Restaurant, Mihiro's family business, plans to add some new items to its menu for the summer... so Mihiro decides to ask the other student council members to help come up with ideas.

title: Glaring Summer Days
synopsis: It's still only June, but Ousui Academy is stricken by intense heat. To make matters worse, the air conditioner in the student council room is broken. Then Ashe comes up with an idea to combat the heat...

title: Military!
synopsis: We've indulged in the depravity of this nation, we can't go back to a battlefield without air conditioning, kotatsu, or convenience stores!

title: The Defector Girl!?
synopsis: There's a cute girl walking through the rain with no umbrella...

title: Grue's Battle Chronicles...
synopsis: This must be a sign of my master's love...

title: The Last Night...
synopsis: Colonel Aria Glassmann of the Duchy of Krakozhia Army Special Forces. As of this date, you are ordered to leave Japan.

title: Operation: Magical Girl!!
synopsis: Carrying the wishes of the planet Emiemi, I'm the magical girl, Magical Emiru!

title: Landing Mission Successful?
synopsis: It's summer, and this is the beach!

title: Reinforcements Have Arrived!!
synopsis: A new pet.

title: Nuclear Warhead Captured!!
synopsis: Rebuilding the house!

title: The Ultimate Weapon Next Door!!
synopsis: B-B-B-Beautiful!

title: New Weapon for Extreme Cold!
synopsis: This is no longer just an ordinary kotatsu!

title: Assassin!! Delivery?!
synopsis: Once I find him, I'll blast him with some C4...

title: The Mission Begins!
synopsis: Our enemy, the Republic of Grania, is after your life.

title: Sunlight Girls
synopsis: Everyone eats a meal while cleaning up the ruins of the castle. And then someone slips away!? Date-sensei leaves to find the armor, still buried in the rubble. She hasn't given up on getting it yet. And just as she finds it, Hideyoshi appears... What will be the fate of the battle girls?

title: Battle Maiden
synopsis: At last the Crimson Armor has activated! The Armor absorbs Ieyasu's dark heart and goes out of control. Nobunaga and Mitsuhide are power against Ieyasu's overwhelming might. Imagawa Yoshimoto, Takeda Shingen, and Uesugi Kenshin come to help! Nobunaga begs for the others to help her save the innocent people. And the Battle Maidens at last join together...!! less

title: Thief Maiden
synopsis: Masamune took advantage of the confusion at Honnouji to steal the armor! Nobunaga follows her to Azuchi castle, but finds Masamune lying on the ground midway. The armor had been stolen by Ieyasu. Nobunaga and Mitsuhide hurry to the castle to stop Ieyasu from getting all the armor. Masamune tells Hideyoshi the truth behind everything that's happened...

title: Double Suicide Maiden
synopsis: At last Nobunaga has all the armor! They head back to Azuchi Castle, where they've left the remaining pieces. On the way back, they stop at Honnouji Temple. Even a dummy like Hideyoshi remembers that name! Her textbook says that this is where Akechi Mitsuhide killed Oda Nobunaga... no way! Meanwhile, Mitsuhide is at her breaking point. With some advice from Masamune, she takes action. Everything she does is for love..

title: Saigoku Maiden
synopsis: The group is confronted by a very... unique trio: Mouri Motonari, Chousokabe Motochika, and Ootomo Sourin. Nobunaga captures them and makes them give up the location of the armor. But the box with the armor in it is trapped, and Hideyoshi is taken prisoner. Nobunaga heads to the mountain where she's being held, her features twisted with a terrible rage...

title: Fever Maiden
synopsis: Nobunaga sets off to recover the last three pieces of armor in Saigoku. Of course, there's no cars or trains, and Hideyoshi is quickly exhausted. They decide to rest at a ton, but for some reason the town is overflowing with rumros that Nobunaga is a demon who eats children and babies! And they say that Mitsuhide is the one who spread the rumors! Meanwhile, Hideyoshi gets more and more tired, and finally falls ill...

title: Drama Maiden
synopsis: Everyone decides to put on a play at Hideyoshi's suggestion. Nobody knows what a "play" is supposed to be, so Hideyoshi has to teach them everything. She starts making the set and working on the script! But she has no idea what to write, and so asks Yoshimoto, who loves everything literary. Yoshimoto's idea is a world of passion with lots of girls in love! And just once things start to get in shape, everybody starts trying to win themselves a bigger part...

title: Memory Maiden
synopsis: The long rain has everybody feeling a bit melancholy, and each character remembers somehing from their past. Mitsuhide thinks back to the rainy day when she first met Nobunaga. Nobunaga shows Hideyoshi a pipe she always carries with her, and talks about the memories it holds. And Date Masamune thinks about something that happened only a short while ago...

title: Ghost Story Girl
synopsis: At Tokugawa Ieyasu's suggestion, everyone goes hawk hunting. Hideyoshi is looking forward to her first meat in ages. A bit after they begin, the hawk flies off into the forest after its prey... Everyone follows the hawk, but instead they find a grave and ghosts! If they can't tell scary stories to satisfy the ghosts, they won't be able to leave...!?

title: Confrontation Maiden
synopsis: Uesugi Kenshin and Takeda Shingen are rivals. The two of them are battling again today like always, and seem to be enjoying themselves. Both have pieces of the armor, but neither will simply hand it over. Mitsuhide suggests a plan to trick them both and get the armor, but Nobunaga refuses, not wanting to ruin their fight. Meanwhile, Hideyoshi is depressed that her cell phone is broken...

title: Sky Maiden
synopsis: Nobunaga learns that Imagawa Yoshimoto has the left leg of the Crimson Armor. But Yoshimoto, while uninterested in the armor, has no intention of just giving it over. She brings a large army and attacks Nobunaga! Nobunaga returns to her castle, where Hideyoshi gives her a plan. And Nobunaga sends a challenging letter to Yoshimoto...

title: A Confused Maiden
synopsis: It's been decided that Hideyoshi will help look for the legendary Crimson Armor. Also, this world looks like the Warring States era, but it looks like there's only girls... Hideyoshi stays with Nobunaga and Mitsuhide, but she's worried about whether or not she'll be able to go home. And then a weird dog appears. For some reason, the dog starts talking to her?

title: A Maiden Teleported
synopsis: The Present Day. There's a middle school girl named Hideyoshino who loves fashion and cell phones. Her nickname at school is "Hideyoshi." Just before her exams, she realizes that her only hope is divine intervention, and goes to a shrine. There she is whisked away by a mysterious light...The next thing she knows, she is surrounded by female bandits who proceed to attack her! She is saved by a general with a gigantic sword. The general calls herself Oda Nobunaga...

title: PV
synopsis: Promotional Video

title: Ending
synopsis: Ending

title: Playing Hero
synopsis: Rollnya demands the boys rescue her from peril.

title: Flattery Shop
synopsis: Donyatsu tries to start a complimenting business.

title: Biggs and Wedge
synopsis: Marchmallows Biggs and Wedge try to defeat Donyatsu.

title: Famous Quotes
synopsis: Bagel tries to remember that one famous line from that one Arnie movie.

title: Natural Enemy
synopsis: The Marchmallows vow to eat all the round things.

title: Planetarium
synopsis: Baumcougar tries to impress everyone with his home planetarium.

title: Let's Play With Robosaki-san
synopsis: Robosaki-san wants to play with Donyatsu and Bagel.

title: Word Association
synopsis: Croquen's word association game does not go as planned.

title: Itchy
synopsis: Donyatsu itches, but he's not sure exactly where.

title: Tummy Ache
synopsis: Bagel's friends fail to help him cope with stomach pain.

title: Super Matsuzaki Brothers
synopsis: Rollnya wants to go shopping, but Bagel and Donyatsu are distracted.

title: Catch-Ball
synopsis: Bagel tries to play catch with Donyatsu.

title: Strange Coincidence, Fate, Contention
synopsis: Salutations, it's Meiko. Can you imagine? Mayu's having a marriage meeting with the Lord Tsukuyomi! And all that without asking me first! Sasana, are you alright with that!? Anyway, we have to align our forces and do everything to get Mayu back! Let's go!

title: Stray Cat Ran After
synopsis: It's Sasana. Mayu has been chosen to become Princess Kukuri's successor as the guardian of the Moon Stores. If that happens, Mayu will have to return to Heaven and won't be able to see Yuzu any more. A Yaoyorozudou without Mayu... Just like Yuzu, I can't even imagine it.

title: Lost Cat on the Earth
synopsis: It's Yuzu. Amane, who's also a cat god, came to see Mayu. Amane is very serious and thus a polar opposite to Mayu. And there's talk of Lord Tsukuyomi wanting Mayu to become a guardian cat. Could it be that Mayu won't be able to stay here any more?

title: Rainy Rainy
synopsis: It's Mayu. It's been quite a few years since then. I do clearly remember that the hydrangeas were blooming beautifully despite the relent rain. When I was hiding from the rain in a dilapidated little shrine after being thrown from Tagamagahara he started talking to me. Yes, the cat named Kotetsu. less

title: Mukoubuchi Dice Roll
synopsis: It's Gonta's mother Shizuha. Between you and me, I have to tell you that I love gambling. Today I milk- err played against Mayu in a game of Even or Odd dice. Of course I won. I took a video game from Mayu as my spoils, but then she game to get it back. Is... "this" that important?

title: September Thriller Night
synopsis: It's Gonta. Tomorrow is finally the day of our Inari Shrine's festival. Thanks to the help of Yuzu and the others, our preparations are perfect! So tonight Yuzu and the others are staying over. Of course somehow the ghost stories got started... Ahhh, I'm totally not scared (sweat). Yeah, not scared...

title: Recollection of the Antiquity
synopsis: It's Yuzu. Today I'm visiting Grandpa Genzou with the "Fujitsubo bean cakes" from our beach trip. Grandpa Genzou is the one who showed me the ropes of the antique business. But, that's not all. I consider him my mentor outside the antique business as well.

title: Typhoon God Overrun
synopsis: It's Gonta. I won at a raffle at the shopping mall and am at the beach with Yuzu. White sandy beaches, the crashing of the waves, and the bright sun. true vacation in anybody's book! Watermelon pinata! Beach volleyball! And Yuzu in her swim suit! Falling off???!!!

title: Memory Halation Summer
synopsis: My name is Urara. I'm the best Nightmare Eater of the Three Kingdoms. When I returned to the Yaoyorozudou after a long hiatus, I couldn't find the owner, Makitarou anywhere...I see, I guess the store is now being run by this girl called Yuzu...But anyhow, I was quite surprised to see that such a lazy Cat God was living here.

title: Desperate Deadline
synopsis: It's Shamo. My friend Yukina is a manga artist and she's a descendant of the Yin-Yang sorcerors. She uses familiars as assitants. But right when "this month's issue needs extra pages", they go on strike. That's why Mayu and I, and all the others are going to help Yukina, but...

title: Sakura Front Overture
synopsis: It's Yoshino. My granda the Cherry Blossom God entrusted me with the task to make the cherry blossoms bloom this year... However, due to a minor mistake I lost the very very important jar with the blooming ashes. It's my fault that everybody can't enjoy their cherry blossom viewing this year. Mayu, what should I do?

title: The God of Poverty's Inspect+
synopsis: It's Mayu. Since I was banished from Takamagahara, I ended up staying at an antique shop in this town called Yaoyorozudou. While I was enjoying the quiet life due to the kindness of the owner Yuzu, a scary rumor floated our way - the God of Povery was coming to this town. We have to do whatever we can to prevent that. I don't want to be poor!

title: PV
synopsis: Promo Video

title: What is SHOUJO?
synopsis: For this episode of Anime Academy, Reina Scully (@reinascully) covers SHOUJO, or young girl in Japanese anime. Shoujo anime is a favorite genre with flagship shows like Sailor Moon, Blue Spring Ride, My Love Story!!, My Little Monster and more. Which Shoujo anime do you love? Let us know any favorites we missed in the comments below.

title: What is Shounen
synopsis: For our first episode of Anime Academy, Victoria Holden (@sailorbee) covers SHOUNEN, or young man in Japanese anime. Shounen anime is a favorite genre with flagship shows like Naruto, Dragon Ball, Attack on Titan, Full Metal Alchemist, One Piece and more. Which Shounen anime do you love? Let us know any favorites we missed in the comments below. Subscribe to Crunchyroll's YouTube channel for more original programming: http://bit.ly/crunchyrollsubscribe

title: The General's Attempt to Suppress the Yellow Turban Rebellion
synopsis: As the bandits advance on the city, Aisha and Rinrin do everything they can to hold down the city gates and protect the villagers. Will the truth about Ryubi finally be revealed?

title: Bachou Tries to Hold It In
synopsis: Aisha, Rinrin and Shuri become involved in a war between bandits and a militia, siding with the militia. During the resulting chaos, Bacho has a near-death experience.

title: Koumei Wishes for a Sister
synopsis: As the Queen expands her territory by way of war, an attempt is made on her life. With no one to blame, she holds Aisha as the prime suspect.

title: Gakushin, Riten, and Ukin Protect a Village
synopsis: When Relha's group discover a treasure map they find themselves being pursued by an unknown force. When the force they think is following them turns out different from what they imagined, it's secrets are then revealed.

title: Enjutsu Orders a Monster's Extermination
synopsis: Enjutsu desires to have a villa built in the place where a haunted shrine stands. She tasks the girls to destroy the monster that lurks within the shrine in exchange for Ryubi's family sword.

title: Chinkyuu is taken in by Ryofu
synopsis: Chinkyu, loyal companion and strategist to Ryofu, reveals her life story to our heroines. New friendships are formed and Rin Rin parts with her special dog charm.

title: Ten'i Is Tested by Sousou
synopsis: The Three Cho Sisters learn to use the manipulative magical powers of the Crucial Keys to win over the crowd. Soso holds a gourmet food tasting session and tests the culinary prowess of a local chef named Ten’i.

title: Kakuka and Teiiku Come Into Sousou's Service
synopsis: While on their merry travels, our heroines encounter Kakuka and Teiiku, two aspiring strategists who seek employment under Lord Soso.

title: The Three Chou Sisters Acquire the "Crucial Keys to the Way of Peace"
synopsis: The Three Cho Sisters meet a traveling magician and receive a mysterious book that amplifies their magical powers as well as their traveling act.

title: Kousonsan Fights Enshou!
synopsis: Ryuubi and her party come Kousonsan's city. Kousonsan welcomes them and is surprised that Ryuubi comes with them. A game of wits, strength and technique ensues with the ornate sword as the prize.

title: Ryuubi Visits Touka Village
synopsis: Ryubi is cornered by the trio bandits who have perverse thoughts about her. Kan-u's group arrives just in time and with one swing, Kan-u sends the trio away saving Ryubi from the bandits.

title: Bachou's Anguish
synopsis: With Koumei's strategism and the five strong warriors Kan'u, Chouhi, Chouun, Bachou and Kouchuu's power, the bandits do not stand a chance when they are confronted in battle.

title: Pages in Black (The World of Folk Tale) Curse of Pharaoh, Egyptian Kings
synopsis: Rei Kigata receives a mysterious newspaper called Horror News every mid-night. That newspaper tells the story of a series of strange happenings that involves many fatal accidents among the investigation parties of the tomb of Tutankhamun.

title: Pages in Red (The World of Bizarrerie) Horror of a Mountain Cabin Part 3
synopsis: The wanted murderer proceeds preparation to kill Kigata first. By spreading a bundle of huge animal’s hair down outside a window of the lodge and making a fake foot prints of a big snowman, the murderer makes the impression of snowman stick in their mind of the uncle and Saho, and tells Kigata to come out of the lodge at 8 pm sharp.

title: Pages in Red (The World of Bizarrerie) Horror of a Mountain Cabin Part 2
synopsis: The wanted man gathers Kigata, his uncle and Saho and starts to talk about snowmen knowns as “Yetis”. He claims “Yetis” do not only lives in the Himalayas but also in that snowy mountain in Japan.

title: Pages in Red (The World of Bizarrerie) Horror of a Mountain Cabin Part 1
synopsis: Rei Kigata is in a snowy mountain with his uncle to enjoy skiing. Kigata and his uncle join the uncle’s friend’s young daughter, Saho, in the mountain and decided to stay in the usual mountain lodge they stay every year.

title: Pages in Black (The World of Folk Tale) The True Story of Yotsuya Kaidan, the story of Oiwa and Iemon.
synopsis: The truth behind the famous horror story, Yotusya Kaida told by Rei Kigata, who is destined to read Horror News every now and then. Lemon, who was taken into a marriage to an ugly woman, Oiwa. He and his business higher-up had deceived Oiwa and kicked her out of her house and family.

title: Pages in White (The World of Spirits) The Self and The Self Part 2
synopsis: Being suspected by other team mates that there is one more of him, Takahashi is thrown out from the baseball team. While seeking advice from Kigata, Takahashi complains a harsh stomachache. He is brought to a hospital and receives a diagnosis of having a foreign body in his stomach.

title: Pages in White (The World of Spirits) The Self and The Self Part 1
synopsis: The baseball team at Ishido Middle School has hard practices. One day, they have strange incidents where they seemingly have the 14th member though the team has only 13 players.

title: Pages in Blue (The World of Outer Space) Mysterious Light in a Sky Part 4
synopsis: No one in his class or even his teachers do not believe Kigata’s story. He become obsessed with an idea of getting himself on one of those UFOs to make everybody believes what he says. Then again, Elina Matsuoka appears in front of him.

title: Pages in Blue (The World of Outer Space) Mysterious Light in a Sky Part 3
synopsis: The man who shot the rifle to Kigata and Elina turns out to be a huntsman who works in the valley. He says he mistook them as the luminous monster. Elina who Kigata thought running away together is nowhere to be seen.

title: Pages in Blue (The World of Outer Space) Mysterious Light in a Sky Part 2
synopsis: The mysterious girl Elina is able to talk to Kigata and even to alien beings by telepathy. With that conversation and promise to see each other again, she goes away.

title: Pages in Blue (The World of Outer Space) Mysterious Light in a Sky Part 1
synopsis: Rei Kigata finds an article in Horror News that says “He sees Unidentified Flying Objects in a sky.” Kigata tells that story to other class mates and they decides, involving a science teacher, to have outdoor observation to find the UFO.

title: Pages in Red (The World of Bizarrerie) Someone bites. Part 2
synopsis: Okuyama get sick in the bullet train. She leaves her seat and goes to a washroom. There, she meets a woman who asks Okuyama to take care of her baby while she uses a toilet.

title: Pages in Red (The World of Bizarrerie) Someone bites. Part 1
synopsis: Kigata and other students at Ishido Middle School come to Kyoto for their school trip. That day later in the evening, one of the female student, Okuyama faints in anemia and started to confess that she is haunted and attacked by a vampire. There is a bite mark with blood on one of her arms.

title: Pages in White (The World of Spirits) This mysterious newspaper is delivered at midnight! Part 3
synopsis: Horror News comes that night in front of Kigata and the teacher. And comes the spirit, too. But the newspaper looks normal to the teacher and he cannot see the spirit even though the spirit gets rough with him. The teacher took Kigata to a medium who has an ability to see and speak to spirits.

title: Pages in White (The World of Spirits) This mysterious newspaper is delivered at midnight! Part 2
synopsis: Rei Kigata is haunted by a mysterious newspaper called Horror News and he has to read it everyday at midnight. He also experiences speaking with a spirit. That spirit tells him that there are many things existing in this world even though you cannot actually see them.

title: Pages in White (The World of Spirits) This mysterious newspaper is delivered at midnight! Part 1
synopsis: Rei Kigata is a boy, a first year middle schooler at Ishido Middle School. He is not a believer of any paranormal phenomenon such as existence of ghosts or spirits in any kind, but one day at midnight, while he is in sleep, a mysterious newspaper called “Horror News” is delivered to his room.

title: pkpk, shrshr, krkr appear!
synopsis: Picking the right club is very important!

title: nmnm Appears!
synopsis: shr-chan wants to leave behind a memorable quote. And everyone comes out for a game of baseball.

title: usus Appears
synopsis: The gdgd Fairies along with their new friends go on a magical camping trip.

title: mkmk appears!
synopsis: shr-chan starts the story, kr-chan builds up the story, and it's up to pk-chan to finish it. But her dad might cause problems.

title: umum Appears!
synopsis: Three new fairies have moved in and try to figure out how to introduce themselves to their neighbors.

title: trtr appears!
synopsis: A nasty impact has caused the fairies to switch bodies and later pkpk meets her father.

title: tgtg Appears!
synopsis: The Fairies take a holiday to a hot spring and play a very interesting game.

title: lplp appears!
synopsis: The Fairies go back in time and everything makes starts to make sense.

title: gdgd and Magic are Real
synopsis: What’s the difference between a witch and a magical girl? This time the fairies play, What’s in the box?

title: gdgd Advice Hotline
synopsis: Viewers have a chance to call in and get helpful advice from the Fairies.

title: Weather
synopsis: The fairies discuss the weather, heroes, and the dubbing lake returns.

title: Déjà Vu
synopsis: Join krkr, pkpk, and shrshr for Tea Time, the Magic Room, and the all new Magic Speaker.

title: PV
synopsis: Promotional Video

title: Beyond the Horizon of Endless Recollection: Eternal
synopsis: It’s been 10 years and kr-chan has returned to the tree house she shared with her other fairies. She must enlist the help of Fusako to sober up shr-chan so they can attempt to bring pk-chan back to life.

title: Previously on Unreleased Fairies
synopsis: To make their magic stronger the Fairies decide to practice outside the time room.

title: Last Three Days
synopsis: pk-chan is looking for a hobby but the focus seems to be only on shopping. The fairies build their ideal house and one seems to take it ideas from a famous plumber.

title: Hobby
synopsis: pk-chan is looking for a hobby but the focus seems to be only on shopping. The fairies build their ideal house and one seems to take it ideas from a famous plumber.

title: Sayings
synopsis: Shr-chan dislikes the phrase “the grass greener on the other side.” So the fairies attempt to figure out what it actually means. The girls attempt to do a gdgd live broadcast and come up with different ways to attract viewers.

title: Everyday Good Deed
synopsis: Shiru wants to do good deeds every day but wants low risk, high reward. Then the girls play a game that will change them forever. Finally, they peak into another word.

title: Previously on Gudaguda Fairies
synopsis: The fairies play real-life version of party games. But things get out of hand when the monkeys they're playing with start evolving...

title: Waiting Time
synopsis: srsr is 10 minutes late to the meeting. There's a deep and terrifying reason why she's always late...

title: Tears
synopsis: pkpk was crying last night and now her eyes are swelled up. Tears are strange; you cry when you're happy and when you're sad. This discussion of tears reveals a terrifying plot!

title: Rumours
synopsis: pkpk can't stop sneezing. People say if you sneeze it's because people are saying something about you. But what are they saying about pkpk? You can see right here!

title: Little Happiness
synopsis: Is luck getting to sleep in for a while and not be late? Is happiness finding money in your coat pocket? The girls discuss what is luck and happiness and have a bungee jump bread-eating contest.

title: Sleep
synopsis: Todays talk is about sleep, the fairies discuss how much sleep is needed to be efficient and the different type of sleepers. In The Room of Spirit and Time a dangerous game of magic shiritori is played.

title: Episode 8
synopsis: Kitakata Toshizou was a chef at the restaurant “Goryokakutei” in Hakodate! He helps restaurants that are on the verge of going under get back on their feet. But Toshizou's training all but a piece of cake: only those who can grasp their true potential can pass his strict training. What will the next restaurant be!

title: Episode 1

But Toshizou's training all but a piece of cake: only those who can grasp their true potential can pass his strict training. What will the next restaurant be!

title: Awakening ~Love Drawn in Starry Skies, Your Present is Me, Thank You, Wooser~
synopsis: "If only I could turn back time..." she whispered, smiling sadly. Even if learning the truth hurts you, people can become stronger, and time will heal all wounds. There is nothing to hear. I pray that your future will be a bright and shining one. And for that to happen, I will carry the weight of this sin.

title: Hope ~Lalalalalalalalalaalalalaa, lalalalalalalalalaalalalaa~
synopsis: As the last episode approaches, Wooser has run out of jokes. In a last, desperate attempt, he searches for "Out of jokes". Help me Go*gle Wan Kenobi, you're my only hope! At the same time, he searches for "Cannons and Drills to help you on the battlefield", but he can't find the cannon part he needs. Cannon! Bring me a cannon!

title: Fate ~The Strongest Enemy Appears; A Cruel, Inescapable Destiny; Wooser is Judged~
synopsis: Wooser is on the run for a murder he didn't commit, and decides that while he's on the run from the law, he should try and commit a few more crimes. So he steals the production fund for the anime and uses it to search for buried treasure. As Wooser goes out of control, the hammer of justice descends upon him... and lands about 3 feet to the left.

title: Recollections ~The Real You, the Truth You Must Confront, Wooser Turns Away
synopsis: Wooser awakes in the world of the dead. Things seem very strange there. To get a better idea of the situation, he turns on the TV. There he sees Darth Wooser, who tells him of the day when he changed fate, and the sorrowful events he'd forgotten. Wait, no, that's the weather he's reading

title: Cheers ~A Time for Blessings, Keep Common Sense in Mind, Because Wooser Won't~
synopsis: Wooser, with the help of an army of river otters, goes to an audition to become an idol, but just before his performance it's discovered that some of his group are actually sea otters and beavers. "But I want to sing!", Wooser yells. To defeat the other idols, Wooser will (not) have to pilot a giant robot with resolve in his heart.

title: Inevitability ~The World Changes. The Future Lies Ahead. Wooser Refuses to Move Forward~
synopsis: Wooser manages to swap the doors to the men's and women's baths through the sheer power of his lust. Meanwhile, an unidentified object appears in the skies over America, and the military starts to panic. Will we be able to talk to them? Will Ajipon's noble sacrifice once again save the world? Will it? Will it?

title: Trust: ~Midsummer Night Illusion, Mechanical Comrade, Wooser Doesn't Have Many Friends~
synopsis: After a long journey, Wooser finds himself in a world where humans are ruled by machines. "I'm an animal, though, so I don't care," says Wooser, unconcerned. But an end assault by robot soldiers puts him up against the wall: "At this rate, I'll run out of quarters..." He's barely got enough money to make bus fare home... can he awaken to a new power? Maybe? Please? less

title: Promise: ~A Passion for Uniforms, A Family Restaurant is Fine, Burning Wooser~
synopsis: "Avenge me," the man whispered as he died. Following clues found in the man's belongings, Wooser visits heaven on earth, a girl's high school! As Wooser is caught up in the troubles of the student council, he realizes something is wrong... This school has no uniforms! An unhappy Wooser chances upon a local restaurant... maybe he'll find something nice there. I hope so.

title: Evolution ~Fragments of Ephemeral Dreams, Guidance of Shining Stars, Wooser Going His Own Way~
synopsis: Wooser drops his wallet, along with the letter for the queen, and is forced to spend the night outside. The crackling of a fire, the twinkling of the stars in the sky... forget the queen, and forget the letter. Just as wooser is about to fall into a peaceful slumber, a horde of monsters attack! An army of immortal soldiers and dark conspiracy controlling them... do not feature in this episode!

title: ~Memories Faded, Memories Unfading, The Cutest Wooser in the World~
synopsis: After his battle with the enemy fleet, Wooser is hired as a tactical advisor. He agrees, and is taken to a magical kingdom made of candy. But this splendid, delicious land conceals a dark secret. Where did all the people go? ... we'll probably never find out!

title: JUSTICE -A Lonely Battle, A Sworn Victory for Mother, Wooser Goes for the Draw~
synopsis: Caught once again in a time warp, Wooser awakens to find himself drifting into port on a ship unlike any he's ever seen. The port is surrounded by multiple battleships, and the situation is dire. But Wooser puts his counterattack plan into operation! But what can he do with only one ship and limited weapons? What fate will befall our hero just before he wakes up and finds out it was all a dream!?

title: The Beginning - The Scenery of a Certain Day, The Girls' Daily Lives, The Return of Wooser -
synopsis: After the tragedy that claimed so many lives, Wooser awakens in a mechanical castle. Caught off guard by the sudden time slip, he witnesses a general who looks just like him... Wooser kills the general and takes his place, and now he's off to warp history to his own twisted ends... maybe! He may just go watch TV.

title: Love and Goodbyes and Wooser
synopsis: The Earth's destruction draws near as the asteroid reaches every closer. The prophecies say the last hope for humanity is for Wooser to unleash his true power, but... Meanwhile, the US Government and NASA ask Wooser for his help, and he demands an astronomical sum of money in exchange. As the people of the world despair... oh wait, it's the last episode!?

title: Ghosts and Opera and Wooser
synopsis: A murder in a locked room. The only people in the room were Wooser and the victim. The security camera footage shows Wooser yelling "Behold! This is the ultimate time table trick!" as he beats the victim to death with a time table. But for some reason he has an alibi? The detectives search for the true culprit, but...

title: Money and Magic and Wooser
synopsis: Every night, Wooser is visited by a mysterious girl in his dreams, who says, "Hero, please save my world!" The insomnia makes him very angry, and he leads an undead army into the world of dreams and destroys it. The girl was the Queen of this world. "The shorter the sadness you must endure, the better," Wooser whispers, as he goes back to his hand-to-mouth life.

title: Bugs and Masks and Wooser
synopsis: Wooser is kidnapped by an evil organization, which does twisted surgery on him to give him the power of the insects. After gaining the bagworm's inability to move, and the short lifespan of a dragonfly, Wooser becomes the ultimate creature... then dies several days later. Maybe the dragonfly wasn't such a good idea after all.

title: Boredom and Machines and Wooser
synopsis: Wooser steals the activation key to the ultimate mech, which took 10 years and trillions of dollars to create, and finds himself a wanted criminal. As he evades Interpol to commit further thefts, what is his goal? And just when it seems he's giving the treasures he's taken to poor children...???

title: Forests and Baths and Wooser
synopsis: Through an almost unreal level of retconning, the show manages to avoid being canceled after the swimsuit episode, but the threat remains. A "bath episode" is proposed as a way to counter this threat. As things get more desperate, tempers will flare and the team will fall apart... is what my horoscope said today.

title: Sea and Swimsuits and Wooser
synopsis: Wooser saves a turtle at the beach, and that turtle leads him to an underwater world... the next day he is found drowned. The mysteries deepen as the case twists and turns. A trick with the time tables, and the shadow of the true culprit lurking in the background... Who is "The Animal Which must not be named?" A shocking truth is about to be revealed... or if it is, that would be really cool, anyway.

title: Bears and Gourmet and Wooser
synopsis: Tonight is the Masked Ball. At the strict Private Wooser Academy, the rules are relaxed just for today, and the boys put on masks and begin a battle royale to win the hearts of the girls they desire. As Wooser advances forward, his arch-enemy Melon Bear appears... but if so, so what?

title: Moe and Check it Out and Wooser
synopsis: Wooser falls off a cliff in the heat of battle and is saved by a young girl. A brief respite is interrupted by the flames of war, and the girl is shot and killed. A raging Wooser regains the powers sealed along with his memories... or so I once thought.

title: Wealth and Power and Wooser
synopsis: Wooser burns the city to the ground and slays the king of the Oasis. He names himself emperor and begins to invade the surrounding countries, bringing them under his banner, only to find that he left his wallet at home. Without it things are hope... But then he puts his secret plan into action... maybe! less

title: Stars and Rock and Wooser
synopsis: Wooser and his friends barely escape from the syndicate's pursuit, but they paid a heavy price. Ajipon, we'll never forget you... But as they sorrowfully travel through the desert, they see an oasis! Ajipon's ghost appears before them as they enjoy their vacation... possibly!

title: Meat and Pandas and Wooser
synopsis: 20XX, the world is in chaos. In a city ruled by fear and despair and where righteousness is justice, a dark hero emerges. Even if his fists shatter, he probably won't stop punching that wall. Now his lonesome battle with himself begins... maybe. Maybe it won't!

title: Happily Married
synopsis: A married couple.

title: Sukiyaki Dinner
synopsis: Dinner is served.

title: Nameko 01 Opening
synopsis: S1 Opening

title: Mizu no kotoba / Aquatic Language (Japanese)
synopsis: Several strangers are spending their evening in a small cafe. They include: two gossiping girls, two debating men, a bookworm and a boy, who just broke up with his girlfriend. The cafe's waitress starts a chat with the boy, persuading him to take a closer look at certain easel, while other customers begin to notice unusual things...

title: Mizu no kotoba / Aquatic Language (English dub)
synopsis: Several strangers are spending their evening in a small cafe. They include: two gossiping girls, two debating men, a bookworm and a boy, who just broke up with his girlfriend. The cafe's waitress starts a chat with the boy, persuading him to take a closer look at certain easel, while other customers begin to notice unusual things...

title: Clover
synopsis: "Endings and beginnings" is the theme in this story of Ms. Sakurada, a teacher who is leaving her elementary school upon reaching retirement age. As she immerses herself in the memories held within the school building, she's presented with an offer to turn this ending into a new beginning.

title: Summer Festival
synopsis: "Loss" is the theme in this tale of two children, Haruka and Yukari, who are reunited at a summer festival. After learning that the Lantern Festival is a time when those who have passed away return to visit the living world, Yukari heads off to the summer festival in hopes that she'll be able to see her friend Haruka again.

title: Transistor Smartphone
synopsis: "Adolescent emotions" is the theme in this story of two women, Koizumi and Kumeno, reflecting on the strange feelings inspired by the not-quite-curiosity, not-quite-friendship between them in their high school days.

title: Recipe
synopsis: This tale of aspirations and the journey through life follows Nagi, a young man about to set off for Italy in pursuit of his dream, and Azuma, who trained him... as well as the man Azuma herself once aspired to be like.

title: Stöhn Mir Ins Mikro, Kleines
synopsis: Nachdem sie in der vorletzten Folge schon mit unseren beiden Moderatoren über die Schwierigkeiten von Dialogbüchern und Sprechercastings geredet hatten, kehren Katharina und Chris heute zurück, um ein wenig über die Eigenheiten des Synchronsprechens selbst zu reden - die Besonderheiten beim Vertonen von versauterem Material eingeschlossen!

title: Von Messen & Maskottchen: Unser Besuch auf der Dokomi 2016
synopsis: Vorletztes Wochenende waren wir zu Gast auf der Dokomi in Düsseldorf, um ein wenig mit unseren Fans zu plaudern und euch auch unsere neuen Maskottchen vorzustellen. René und Jörg haben sich hierzu mal ein halbes Stündchen zusammengesetzt, um über die Messe zu resümieren und euch ein paar Ausschnitte unseres Panels zu präsentieren.

title: Subs, Dubs & Andere Eskapaden
synopsis: In der heutigen Folge des Knuspercast begrüßen wir zwei spezielle Gäste: Die Synchronsprecherin Katharina von Daake und Tonmeister Chris vom Münchner Studio Violet Media. Gemeinsam mit ihnen plaudern Jörg und René ein wenig über die Situation der deutschen Synchronindustrie und auch über das Highlight der Karriere von Jürgen Drews.

title: Jörg's Bizarre Adventure
synopsis: Animefans mit Testosteron-Mangel aufgehört: In Folge Nummer 4 unseres Knuspercast erzählen euch René und Jörg, wieso gerade die männlichsten aller Männer guten Geschmack beweisen können und natürlich Fans von JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure sind. Zwischen Rockklassikern und schlechtem Englisch bringen euch die beiden bei, wie man am besten seine Posen vollführt.

title: Jahresrückblick
synopsis: 2015 ist vorüber und das neue Jahr hat bereits begonnen. Nichtsdestotrotz blickt der liebe René mit unserem Übersetzer Jörg und unserem Reviewer Andreas einmal auf das vergangene Jahr zurück und gemeinsam erzählen sie ein wenig von ihren Highlight – sexualisierte Pommes inklusive.

title: The Fanart God Only Knows
synopsis: In der heutigen Folge unterhalten sich René und Chadi nicht nur über die Spracheinstellungen auf unserer Seite, sondern auch über die potenziell schrecklichsten Fanarts in der Geschichte des Internets - und irgendwo dazwischen findet The World God Only Knows auch noch Erwähnung.

title: Güldene Zeiten
synopsis: In unserer allerersten Folge besprechen wir einen der größten Romanzen-Anime der letzten Jahre: Golden Time. Unsere beiden Herzensbrecher René und Chadi sagen euch, wieso ihr einen Blick auf die Beziehung von Banri und Koko werfen solltet und wieso sie so einzigartig in dem Genre ist. Wir wünschen euch viel Spaß bei der ersten Folge des Knuspercast~

title: Southpaw!! PART II
synopsis: For an extra caution, Shangli-la takes Kouji as its hostage. When Daiki gets to the place, he sees all Shangli-la team members beaten down and lying on the floor. It was the Blond Lefty who beat all the men by himself. His name is now revealed and it's Amagi. Amagi has wanted a one-on-one fight against Daiki and he prepares a perfect stage for the fight. How does Daiki fight against this daunting fighter!?

title: Southpaw!! PART I
synopsis: A blond lefty beats gang team's leaders one after another in town and makes quick fight money. Got eyes on this, gang team Shangli-la's Jinnai comes up with a cool idea and approaches to the Blond Lefty. Jinnai's idea is to knock down Two Men Army by using this Blond Lefty! Jinnai puts 500K for the fight money. How does this play on the fate of Two Men Army?

title: Last Memory PART II
synopsis: Shinjo proposes a one-on-one fight against Red Skelton's Kenmochi. However, creepy Kenmochi commands the whole gang team to attack him once. Daiki hears about this confrontation between Shinjo and Red Skelton at Shinjo's bike shop. Without telling Shinjo, Daiki re-assembles Midnight King. As Two Men Army and Midnight King watch, the one-on-one fight between Shinjo and Kenmoch begins. Their one-on-one fight plays long. No one know which one is going to win!!

title: Last Memory PART I
synopsis: The formar leader of Midnight King Shinjo returns to the town. He was believed to be retired from the gang fights and now he works at a bike shop. So it happens, Shinjo saves Mai who get bullied by a gang team Red Skelton. Got mad by this happening, the leader of Red Skelton Kenmochi attacks the owner of the bike shop where Shinjo works. The owner suffers a severe injury which takes 2 months to heal. Shinjo's inner anger starts to burn quietly but hard and red!

title: Another Brother PART II
synopsis: Real Daiki and Jin hear about a rumor of phony Daiki and rush to the place where the confrontation takes place. Phony Daiki is in one-on-one fight against the leader of the rival gang team. Battered so hard by the rival leader, phony Daiki tries to protect the girl who lured him into the situation. Feeling his true guts, real Daiki jumps into the midest of the fight to rescue the two.

title: Another Brother PART I
synopsis: Someone alike Daiki walks around the town and pretends to be Daiki, one of the Two Men Army. This phony Daiki happens to save a girl bullied by a gang team and get rid of them. Lured by the girl, phony Daiki gets to a hang-aorund place of the other gang team Wild Cat. He get involved in a private war against its rival team Kind Edge. Phony Daiki is no good at fighting at all. How does this trick play on this guy's life?

title: P.S. I LOVE YOU PART II
synopsis: A mysterious and beautiful lady makes visit to Daiki at his gym. Her name is Ryoko. Daiki and Ryoko have something in their past. Ryoko cared Daiki. Daiki feels momentary comfort with the memory he had with Ryoko. The past days that the two share and their lives crisscross again for a moment. No matter how true they becomes to themselves, there are the days they cannot take back and embrace. And are separate roads lying infront of them on which each has to take a step forward. The story about Daiki's reminisence over his younger days. PART 2

title: P.S. I LOVE YOU PART I
synopsis: A mysterious and beautiful lady makes visit to Daiki at his gym. Her name is Ryoko. Daiki and Ryoko have something in their past. Ryoko cared Daiki. Daiki feels momentary comfort with the memory he had with Ryoko. No matter how true they becomes to themselves, there are the days they cannot take back and embrace. And are separate roads lying infront of them on which each has to take a step forward. The story about Daiki's reminisence over his younger days. PART 1

title: White Trap 3
synopsis: Rescued by Captain Kuwaki, Daiki and his friends are released from the jail. They rushes to the drop-off place of Shizuka's ransom in order to save her. Now with Jin joining the team, they are to make the final confrontation against the gangster. Little Shizuka's life in danger, they must fight out and win this battle! Daiki and Jin, stop the kidnappers and ugly policemen, and kick ass their nefarious plan!!

title: White Trap 2 = Part 2
synopsis: Viciously entrapped by the local gangster and ugly policemen, Daiki and his friends get arrested and jailed. Now sweeping the intruders, the kidnappers pressure Shizuka's grandfather Saeki. Captain Kuwaki hurries to the site from Tokyo. Is he able to salvage the situation? The gangster and ugly policemen's evil deed... that ignites the fuse of Daiki's anger!!

title: White Trap 2 = Part 1
synopsis: The gangster's violent attack starts. Daiki and his friends hit back against the gangster's army and its leader Kaieda, who penetrate into Keiko's villa. Mai ski downhills and reaches to the police station. She reports the situation at the villa to the police, but guess whom the police arrest when they get to the villa... The double traps darkly entangles Daiki and his friends. How will they get out and overcome this danger??

title: White Trap 1 = Part 2
synopsis: In order to protect Shizuka, the granddaughter of a local big shot, Daiki and his friends shelter Shizuka in Keiko's resort villa. However, Shizuka gets sick and runs high fever. The gangsters destroy Keiko's car. Daiki and his friends lose their transportation. Mai volunteers skies downhill to call a help from the police force as she is the only one good at skiing. Is Mai able to find the police safely? And are Daiki and his friends able to shelter Shizuka and fend the gangster's fierce attack?

title: White Trap 1 = Part 1
synopsis: Keiko, Daiki and Mai are driving up to a snow mountain. Ryuzaki is on ahead, supposed to wait for them up there. It's supposed to be a fun skiing vacation, however, up there what waits for them is a threat by a local gang group who attempt to kidnap Shizuka, a grand-daughter of a local big shot. The gang group are to start their attack. Are Daiki and his friends able to protect Shizuka throughout this dangerous situation??

title: Double Justice Part 2
synopsis: Daiki is recruited by Hijiri to be a member of Shinsen Gumi. But he questions the army's idea to have a better world just by sweeping out the bad ones. Meanwhile, Daiki gets to know the truth about the cause of the death of Hijiri's younger brother. He makes up his mind!! Hijiri gets chased after by the police force because of Shinsen Gumi's loss of control. The police force gets there to stop further expansion of city damages. And Daiki and JIn who get involved in that voltex more and more... Where do these fierce battles end up??

title: Double Justice Part 1
synopsis: Daiki runs into his senior student Kengo Hijiri, whom he knows from his junior school days. And at the same time, there have been repeated cases where street gangs get busted by a militant group called Shinsen Gumi. Captain Kuwaki asks Daiki and Jin to get some information. Meanwhile, Daiki gets to know that the leader of Shinsen Gumi is none other than his senior student, Kengo Hijiri...

title: A Boy Meets A Girl, Part II
synopsis: Having admiration to Daiki's fighting style, Kouji follows after Daiki everyday. Meanwhile, Kouji's girlfriend Miki is kidnapped by a street gang group. Kouji chases after the gang desperately to rescue Miki. Hearing this happening, Daiki and Jin get on their foot and chase after Kouji and Miki...!? How does Kouji's first love story go? Are Daiki and Jin able to rescue the young loves? PART II

title: A Boy Meets A Girl, Part I
synopsis: Having admiration to Daiki's fighting style, Kouji follows after Daiki everyday. Meanwhile, Kouji's girlfriend Miki is kidnapped by a street gang group. Kouji chases after the gang desperately to rescue Miki. Hearing this happening, Daiki and Jin get on their foot and chase after Kouji and Miki...!? How does Kouji's first love story go? Are Daiki and Jin able to rescue the young loves? PART I

title: Lady Tiger!
synopsis: Daiki's junior fellow Kouji gets trapped and bitterly betrayed by Maki, the leader of the up-rising gang team Mad Powers, whom Kouji admired so much. As result, Kouji is sold to the enemy team Metal Dog as a sacrifice. Been worrying about Kouji's recent behavior, Keiko talk his situation to Daiki. The two is heading to the place of confrontation to rescue Kouji together!!

title: Tokyo Crusade Part 4
synopsis: It comes to the climax of the battle at BC's home park. Daiki is ready to face BC's unbeatable leader Nodou. But in all what happen, Ryuzaki's female friend Keiko is taken as a hostage. What's the plan, Daiki? Would they be able to take back Keiko safely, or...??

title: Tokyo Crusade Part 3
synopsis: After defeating Haryu and his men, Daiki, Jin, Ryuzaki and Shinjo go down to Black Crusader's evil lair. Waiting for them there were BC's eerie looking top members, Fukuo, Taira and their boss, Nodo. BC's top guys attack Daiki and his friends in vicious ways. Daiki and his team get back footed in BC's home park and separated. Does Daiki's fair fight beat up these basehearted BC bosses?

title: Tokyo Crusade Part 2
synopsis: Police force ace captain Kuwaki is investigating the violent cases caused by Crusader. Meanwhile, Daiki, Jin and Ryuzaki step into the enemy territory to rescue Midnight King!!

title: Tokyo Crusade Part 1
synopsis: The magnum combo Daiki and Jin double their hands again! Shibaura's craziest bike-rider gang Midnight King gets into bloody insurrection against another violent rival gang group Black Crusader… Yokohama's sharp knuckle fighter Ryuzaki has joined the team, Daiki and Jin start firing in tough and hard bloody new battles!!

title: Full-Metal Leather!!!!
synopsis: Having a skirmish against gangsters from Yokohama, Daiki is attacked by a hatchet man Ryuzaki who is sent by those Yokohama gangs. Is Daiki able to stop this skilled fist fighter Ryuzaki by himself? And there again, Mai gets trapped and held as a hostage by the gangs. Can Daiki rescue her in time again?

title: Midnight Trap!!!
synopsis: Daiki gets trapped in a false charge and suspected that he had attacked the younger brother of Shinjo whose wounds and injuries are not completely healed yet. Burnt in anger, the Head of Midnight King, Shinjo's older brother challenges Daiki a one-on-one battle! Rescuing him from this crisis and cleared the false charge is none other than Daiki's trustful partner Jin himself.

title: Mariwana Night!!
synopsis: Junya, a son of a gang group's boss unleashes violence in a popular dance club Mariwana. Hearing it, Daiki appears at the club and beats Junya to a pulp. Burnt with anger, Junya takes a group of militants in the gang members, trying to attack Daiki and his friends. Under a full-scale war against the gang group, is the combo, Daiki and JIn, able to overcome this crisis?

title: Double Power!
synopsis: Unbeatable Fist-Fighter Daiki Hayami and Professional Knuckler Jin Takayama ram into the incredible fight against Shibaura's craziest bike gang Midnight King and its head Shinjo Brothers!! Unfair and underhanded Midnight King takes one of Daiki's classmates Mai as its hostage. That makes Daiki and Jin's anger get to the high peak!!
